story:
L'appli ( pour le moment, si ça ne marche pas, tester avec un Firefox à jour https://www.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/ )  : https://www.iwinote.com/

 

J'aime la musique, danser et toute la variété de mélodie que créent les musiciens.
Pour les aider à concrétiser plus facilement les airs qui leur passent par la tête et qu'ils ne se perdent pas, j'ai conçu ce projet et souhaite en faire un outil abouti qui leur sera très utile avec un maximum de fonctionnalités.

Je suis développeur web à mon compte depuis plus de 6 ans et depuis un moment je me suis orienté vers les webapps.

 

Pourquoi un financement participatif ?
Car je cherche à pouvoir développer mes projets pour la satisfaction de l'utilisateur ( et non pour maximiser le profit et chercher des techniques obscures pour garder l'utilisateur captif ) , pour pouvoir le développer en open source :)

Côté technique, je suis fan de l'idée de webapps, pouvoir créer des outils efficaces, instantanément accessibles par l'utilisateur sans dépendance de tel ou tel système d'exploitation, sur PC ou smartphone, en ayant accès à plein de fonctionnalité de la machine et d'internet ^^

story:
After several months of product development, we're back with an upgraded version of the true wireless earbuds! Throughout the journey, we've gathered feedback from backers and added new AI features that everyone loves.

We have added the latest AI-controlled assistive features, such as head gestures and multi-touch controls. Along with the independent connection, voice assistant support, and other amazing features, Mobovi Earbuds Gesture gives you an intuitive hands-free experience.

Mobvoi Earbuds Gesture's smart and simple features are created to assist you with your everyday life. Spend less time on your phone and carry on with your daily routines.Our in-house TicMotion ™: Head-gesture Controls detects head movements via the six-axis motion sensor. Pick up calls by nodding twice or refuse calls by shaking twice.

Answer the call

Reject the call

Manage your audio with simple taps! No matter how fast you tap it, the high-sensible touch bar will recognize the command. 

When you're listening to music

When you get a call

The dual-mic noise cancellation eliminates any ambient noise during phone calls and delivers crystal-clear audio. Embedded with dual microphones, Mobvoi Earbuds Gesture can detect over 6,000 different sound characteristics to create an immersive listening experience.

The independent connection allows you to pair the Mobvoi Earbuds Gesture on both sides with your smartphone and seamlessly switch between earbuds.

With a high-quality built-in button battery, Mobvoi Earbuds Gesture is embedded with a powerful battery life of up to 50 hours and provides up to 10 hours with a single use of earbuds. You only need to charge once, and you're set for almost a week! Let's move the beat.

Monitor battery life and change the custom settings of the head gestures in the Mobvoi app.

Mobvoi Earbuds Gesture is ergonomically designed to fit comfortably and securely in your ears. Each pair comes with a pair of silicone tips to provide noise cancellation.

Exercise freely and don't be afraid of sweat! An IPX5 dust and waterproof rating have you covered whether you sweat, stand in the rain, or have an accidental spill.

Improved connection speed and up to 10 meters of connection range with Bluetooth 5.0.

Long press for two seconds to access your voice assistant to command your order, such as controlling your music, making calls, navigating to your home, and more.

Take advantage of our special offer bundle when you buy Mobvoi Earbuds Gesture and TicWatch Pro 2020 together! As a dynamic duo, it exclusively allows you to lead a productive lifestyle.

Mobvoi Earbuds Gesture and TicWatch Pro 2020 can be connected through the mobile app. When there's an incoming call, it can be received from the watch and controlled by the earbuds. Featuring a dual-screen design, the TicWatch Pro 2020 offers long-lasting battery life with 1GB of RAM for a smoother experience.

                     


Founded in 2012 by former Googlers, Mobvoi’s aim is to define the next generation of human-machine interaction, creating a more natural and intuitive way for people to interact with machines. Providing users with more intuitive and innovative ways of interacting with their tech is how we get there.

Contact: info@longhamtec.com
Customer service: crowdfunding@mobvoi.com​

story:
You are able to buy great sound speaker and car audio (Hi-Fi) system. Untill now it was impossible to buy something like gSOUND system. gSOUND is something completely new and special. Because of a new approach we have developed extraordinary audio analog&digital balancer gadget and we have find an easy way to embed into your existing car audio system.

We have fully functional samples of the gSOUND system (several prototypes) that will soon be ready for production. We are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs. Placing an order of multiple thousands of units is beyond our grasp. This is where you come in. You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the homes of our customers.

Your support will make this possible! Thank you for your support!

For more information please contact us!

If you have embed gSOUND, the following happens: a sound propagation follows - reacts in relation to the movement of the car. If the car turns left, sound is transferred to the front right speaker, if the car is accelerating at the same time the sound passes from the front right into rear right speaker. You literally feel the music; you can almost touch the sound; music goes smoothly with the car motion. If you are breaking, car sound goes to the front speakers; if you accelerating, sound goes to rear speakers; if you are turning right, sound goes from back to front left speaker; if you are turning left, sound goes from back to front right speaker; simply incredible. New way to listen and feel your favorite music. A unique feeling. New experience.

What is gSOUND?

gSOUND is an hardware component that is embed between the existing components, between your car audio system and speakers. This is an audio analog&digital balancer gadget that was designed in Agromehatronika LLC! So, we decided to start Indiegogo's Campaign for introduce gSOUND to wider audience, audiophiles and all others who loves good sound.

We offer gSOUND to you at below-retail pricing while we get ready to start shipping it around May 2015. The gSOUND is developed and will be introduced to the world via Crowd-Funding. We feel that this is the absolute best way to show the world its capabilities in an exciting and interactive way. One that allows the crowd to join forces with us to bring about real change in the car audio system sound. While at the same time, allowing individuals over the world to engage, suggest and share their ideas to make the gSOUND experience a truly special.

How it works?

Working principle is simple, but the hardware component and technology are TOP SECRET.

If your car have a built-in standard car audio system with a minimum of four speakers (two front and two rear) yust install gSOUND between the existing car audio suistema and speakers, and will give you a unique feeling of sound (gSOUND are the hardware component that is coupled between the existing components, or between your audio system and speakers. If you have more than four speakers it will be even better!).

You will receive an unspeakable gSOUND experience at below-retail pricing.

It sounds frickin 'awesome!

That's all you must to know!

What does it sound like?

How do we say this politely? It sounds frickin' awesome! But you don't have to take our word for it. We took gSOUND to Car Audio & Tuning Shows in the region and asked audiophiles to take a listen and tell us what they thought. Guys mostly have extolled the idea and a different approach and comments was extraordinary, outstanding, remarkable, ...

Feelings are remarkable; you literally feel music; you almost can touch the sound; music goes smoothly with car motion. If you are breaking, car sounds goes to front speakers; if you are accelerating, sounds goes to rear speakers; if you are turning right, sounds goes from back speakers to front left speaker; if you are turning left, sounds goes from back speakers to front right speaker.

Installation gSOUND

Installation is simple because the gSOUND has embedded standard car audio connectors. gSOUND is hardware component that is embed between the existing components, or between your audio system and speakers. gSOUND is mounted with standard ISO Connector and you will receive also instruction for direct wire connecting. It is very simple to connect.

Just plug and play!

Product Comparison

In this moment there is no any similar device on market. gSOUND is unique!


Project timeline

August 2014

The idea was born

September 2014

The first prototype was born :-)

October 2014

First upgrade prototype ;-)))

October – December 2014

Electronics and plastics development begins, final box size/resizing

Electronics supplier and final assembler selected

Facebook, Twiter, Youtube, Internet pages launched

Video production begins

March 2015

Campaign launches!

August 2015

The last deliveries are gone!


Why we need your help

We have fully functional samples of the gSOUND system (several prototypes) that will soon be ready for production. We are a small company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs. Placing an order of multiple thousands of units is beyond our grasp. This is where you come in. You can help us to increase the amount of product we can order from the factory as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the homes of our customers.

Your support will make this possible! Thank you for your support!

For more information please contact us!


About the team

Mario Blažeka I Co-Founder, Product & business development

Paula Verli I Co-Founder, Operations & Brand


About the Agromehatronika gSOUND team

We are a high tech focused team with a great idea, a love of invention and a passion for developing new products.


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

I've changed my mind. Can I get a refund?
Sorry, Indiegogo's policy is No Refunds. Unfortunately, there's nothing we can do about this. When your contribution is deposited into our PayPal account, it comes from Indiegogo, not from you. So if we were to refund your contribution, it wouldn't make it back to you. Please see Indiegogo's rules here.

Can I get multiple perks?
Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.

Can I change my perk?
Unfortunately, not during the campaign. But before we send you your gear, we'll send you an email with a link to a system that will help you manage your perk, input your shipping information, and purchase add-ons if you choose.

When you ship, will you please declare a lesser value on the customs form?
No.

What's the warranty?
gSOUND come with a 1 year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

How much is shipping?
Shipping is free for Croatia and other EU Countries, International shipping costs may apply. It really depends on where you live and what shipping service you choose. Rather than include an average shipping cost in the perk price, we prefer to give you shipping weight and dimensions so you can get a shipping quote. When it's time to ship, we'll ask you to choose a carrier and will send you a PayPal invoice to cover our costs.

Shipping dimensions:

gSOUND: 15 cm width, 10 cm depth, 5 cm height, 355 g
T-shirt: 15 cm width, 10 cm depth, 5 cm height, 200 g

Hoodie: 25 cm width, 15 cm depth, 5 cm height, 750 g


IMPORTANT: gSOUND is embed into existing car audio system and has no effect on existing sound quality. This means that the installation of gSOUND system on your existing car audio system will not improve the quality of poor car audio system.



Risk and Challenges

Working on bringing gSOUND to improve people audio listening habits has created some difficult challenges: 

1. MANUFACTURING 

To minimize the possibility of delays we're working with tooling and part manufacturers with a great track record for quick turnaround and quality parts. Agromehatronika team will supervise all process by phases.

2. PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS 

We plan on delivering the best end product we can to our awesome customers, Using prototypes to test and refine the product, implementing minor changes to optimize ease of use and installation.

3. FULFILLMENT 

We are working with supply chain experts to optimize our commercialization process, entering our manufacturing stage with back-up suppliers and manufacturers for all parts, To counter any problems that may rise and ensure on time delivery.

4. SOFTWARE 

Our software team is and will be tirelessly hunting, tracking, and fixing any bugs that arise to make the end user experience as awesome as possible.

5. FCC and CE testing

Our team is working hard to meet FCC and CE certification standards, eagerly anticipating official testing to begin.


Other Ways You Can Help

Not in a position to donate financially? We understand. If you cannot contribute, help get our campaign in front of those who can share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and any other platform you like. The more people who know, the better! Tell us your opinion about gSOUND idea. Watch our videos and ask others to watch them too. How to reach out more people. Support our campaign on other ways. Your opinion matters!


Thank you!

Please share our project thgrough Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!

If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us!

For Press Inquiries contact info@agromehatronika.hr


Help make it happen

The gSOUND system!

story:
Hello.  We are ConnectionOpen.  A small group of family and friends out to make a difference by offering a new and better way to connect and create over long distances.  Many of us have been in the entertainment and teaching business for decades. We have developed many important (and famous) contacts within the industry and hope to use them, your money and our double patented application to make this new way of connecting possible.  With this new tool in the arsenal of teachers, musicians, voice actors, broadcasters…..we can cut the lag time between destinations to fractions of a second, making it seem like you were in the same room with the other person!  On top of this, we send these transmissions uncompressed (unlike mp3), so the sound is natural and vibrant! We can also synchronize others to join in these sessions.  This can allow recording sessions, broadcast transmissions, demonstrators and presenters an opportunity to communicate and react instantly with the other participants, despite their points of origin.  

Currently we have the audio version completed and are looking for up to $1M in financing to program the remaining bits of code so we can add video at the same speed and vibrancy.  Besides being used for programming, the money we raise will also be used to hire other creative professionals to develop and customize ConnectionOpen for its wide range of potential products and markets. This will also include marketing to further craft and refine our positioning and sales professionals to help us identify emerging markets and strategies for this new way of communicating.  While there are products out there that do what we do…..none can compare to the quality, ease-of-use, extremely low latency and the strength of the 2 patents behind our process.  These valuable patents are like protection for your investment…..we own this type of transmission.

We have paved the way for synchronous connectivity with our work on the audio portion already…..now we just want to widen the roads a bit to allow for video.  By investing and having ownership in the ConnectionOpen project you will help open doors previously closed to others due to distance and resources.  Imagine the difference this will make between school districts that have little to no resources by hooking them up to those that are blessed with more.  Small businesses could present like pros, musicians and voice actors can perform in unison…..collaborating and creating new art forms and ways of sharing ideas even though each participant is in a different location.

The interest we have generated already is growing quickly.  We have presented to major OEM firms, studios and talent with our FREE beta version at www.connectionopen.com.  We invite you to try it for yourself as proof we’re on to something.  If you can’t invest……please spread the word about our amazing new technology so no one goes unheard.

This will also include marketing to further craft and refine our positioning and sales professionals to help us identify emerging markets and strategies for this new way of communicating.  While there are products out there that do what we do…..none can compare to the quality, ease-of-use, extremely low latency and the strength of the 2 patents behind our process.  These valuable patents are like protection for your investment…..we own this type of transmission.
We have paved the way for synchronous connectivity with our work on the audio portion already…..now we just want to widen the roads a bit to allow for video.  By investing and having ownership in the ConnectionOpen project you will help open doors previously closed to others due to distance and resources.  Imagine the difference this will make between school districts that have little to no resources by hooking them up to those that are blessed with more.  Small businesses could present like pros, musicians and voice actors can perform in unison…..collaborating and creating new art forms and ways of sharing ideas even though each participant is in a different location.
The interest we have generated already is growing quickly.  We have presented to major OEM firms, studios and talent with our FREE beta version at www.connectionopen.com.  We invite you to try it for yourself as proof we’re on to something.  If you can’t invest……please spread the word about our amazing new technology so no one goes unheard.

story:
VERTO is a pair of powerful, clear dual-sided headphones that can quickly switch between three different modes for an unparalleled versatile listening experience.  

Enjoy your music and audio the way you want it, exactly when you need it. With VERTO, your audio will be ready for you in any situation.

VERTO uses high-fidelity dual-sided coaxial speaker units to give you clear, powerful, rich sound from either side of the earphones. 

The speakers use a shared core to power either ends and incorporate different diaphragms on each side to adapt to the different listening modes.

On the HEADPHONE side, a thin vibration diaphragm gives you a crisp, detailed sound for extra fidelity in your audio.

On the SPEAKER side, a paper vibration diaphragm ensures powerful, dynamic sound and booming bass without compromising clarity in the highs or mid-tones.

VERTO is convenient and easy to use. Simply flip to switch modes.

VERTO detects the position of the speakers to determine what mode to switch to.

When the headphones flip, the core drivers also switch to project sound to the appropriate side, ensuring a seamless listening experience.

VERTO is perfect for commutes. Use headphones mode to zone out the drone of the subway, then switch to wearable mode to stay safe and aware when you bike or walk the rest of the way.

 

Focus at your favorite coffee shop with headphones mode. Work on your report or just enjoy to your morning playlist as you sip your latte.

 

Whether it’s a group call or a solo video meeting, VERTO is great for conferencing. The speakers will clearly project your calls, and the built-in mic will easily pick up and isolate your voice even on speaker mode.

 

Zone in on your workout with headphones mode, share the love with speakers mode or stay comfortable, safe and hindrance-free with wearables mode. 

 

With a built-in mic and easy side controls, VERTO can activate your virtual assistant without you pulling out your phone. Ask Siri a question or get Google to turn on your lights, VERTO is fully compatible with both iOS and Android OS. 

 

Blast music throughout the entire room or quickly set the ambiance for your kickback, VERTO speakers are loud, clear, powerful and ready to go in a moment’s notice. 

 

Whether you're wearing VERTO as headphones or hanging them as wearable speakers, VERTO will stay comfortable and perfectly placed in every mode.

The soft vegan leather over-ear cushions feel like pillows on your head when in headphone mode. They also act as cushion pads when in wearable speakers mode.

 

From design to materials, VERTO maximizes your listening enjoyment and operates at the highest level at all times.

When wearing VERTO as a wearable, the speakers sit right by your ear, so you can listen to your music without blasting everyone around you.

VERTO boasts an incredibly long-lasting battery. It can last up to 6 hours of playtime on speaker or wearable mode and up to 12 hours of playtime on headphones mode.

With the newest Quick Charge 3.0 9W Type-C technology, VERTO can be fully recharged in less than 2 hours. 

VERTO uses the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Bluetooth 5.0 is more power-efficient while boasting 4x the range, 2x the speed, and 8x the data transfer of the previous 4.0 technology. Best of all, you can pair two devices simultaneously for a seamless switching experience.

The 3-Way Switch Controls lets you easily control all your audio functions with just a single switch. Adjust your volume, skip forward and backward, pause and play, and activate your virtual assistant all with one simple control interface.    

    

     

You can even get an optional LEVO speaker stand. LEVO features a USB-C port for VERTO and a wireless charging base for any Qi-enabled device.

      With VERTO, you break free from the constraints of a single audio device and enter a world of unbound versatility and freedom.

story:
The world’s most DYNAMIC bluetooth Hi-Fi speaker - created by the leading HiFi acoustic design & engineering team at Morel.  

Two custom-made tweeters, a massive 6” double magnet woofer, fully dedicated amps, and a custom-built DSP deliver POWERFUL, ENGAGING, ACCURATE sound that can fill up any room.

Without compromising on quality, values, or production standards, Morel has created a truly affordable luxury Hi-Fi system for everyone.

True Hi-Fi has never been more accessible.

                        

 

An Emotionally Powerful Listening Experience

Enjoy the detailed highs, crystal clear mids, and robust bass. Hogtalare offers an emotionally powerful listening experience that is deep and powerful yet very articulate. The lifelike, high resolution, dynamic sound quality creates an incredibly engaging listening experience.

Uncompromising Dynamic Hi-Fi Audio

For bass, we use a HUGE double magnet 6-inch woofer with a reinforced cabinet to deliver an incredible deep bass sensation.

For maximum resolution, Hogtalare is equipped with two ¾” soft dome tweeters, custom-made to our strict specifications and rigid sonic demands to create smooth and detailed sound.

Each tweeter plays one channel (left or right), creating a true stereo experience with a full and vivid soundstage.

In fact, Hogtalare has an incredible 36hz-20khz frequency range!

 

Top-Tier Dedicated Acoustic Technology

3 Dedicated amps, one for the woofer, one for each of the tweeters, and a custom-built DSP gives you a clear, beautifully rich, powerfully dynamic sound from a compact package.

Be amazed with Hogtalare’s rich stereo sound, dynamic presentation and incredible clarity.

Crafting Hi-Fi Sound For 45 Years

We’re Morel, and, for the last 45 years, we’ve been creating high-end, high fidelity sound systems and speakers for people around the world. We love high-quality sound and music and only seek to make speakers that we ourselves enjoy, love, and want.

With Hogtalare, we did what we do best - create amazing high-quality speakers. But this time, we added the technology and refined the process to make it innovative and affordable, while keeping the sound, quality, and craftsmanship absolutely perfect.

We’re proud of what we’ve made and hope you’ll love it too.

A Legacy of Quality Craftsmanship

What Makes A True Hi-Fi System

The overall sound quality of a hi-fi system is determined by literally hundreds of aspects, from the quality of your power supply to the synergy between driver materials.

The tech used to transmit your audio from your source is just one link in the chain (which is also affected by a lot of variables), and its effect on the result is only limited by how well it’s implemented in the R&D process. This is exactly where Hogtalare shines!

From a sonic perspective, Hogtalare was developed like an old school hi-fi speaker, and only then did we add power and connectivity, making sure that everything was tailor-made to our spec and needs.

The result is an entire Hi-Fi system enclosed in a single box, designed with perfect harmony between all parts to ensure incredible sound. This is what Morel does best.

To get Hogtalare to sound just right, we had to mix modern technology with old-school acoustic design doctrine. We integrated our high-end audio craftsmanship with our award-winning tech to give you the perfect sound at the perfect price.

Expert Fundamentals

Hand craftsmanship and attention to detail are at the heart of the Morel production process. To produce loudspeakers that deliver that magical feeling, the human touch is an absolute necessity.

Each Hogtalare speaker is carefully assembled and extensively tested to ensure that it meets the highest standards. Morel’s four decades of experience and knowledge permeates in every detail of Hogtalare’s engineering and design.

This meticulous engineering process created an amazing self-contained HiFi system on par with some of the highest quality speakers ever.

Custom Electronics

Good sound doesn't need a lot of power, it needs the right kind of power. That’s why we designed Hogtalare’s electronics from scratch, with dedicated built-in amplifiers, for the woofer and each of the tweeters, and a custom-built DSP unit to sync everything together.

We used only the best acoustic technology and customized Hogtalare’s electronics to work in perfect sync with the full system. Our dedicated veteran, award-winning acoustic engineers made sure every piece of technology worked in tandem with the hardware.

Each piece was selected for sound quality first, instead of the glitz in getting the “latest” tech. This is why we chose Bluetooth 4.2 instead of Bluetooth 5 - it simply sounds better.

Seamless, Powerful Design

We designed Hogtalare as a simple, clean square - a shape that is perfect from a sonic perspective while staying modern and beautiful.

It also fits perfectly into an IKEA’s Kallax/Expedit shelf unit, the most sold piece of furniture in history - with over 130 million units sold.

Detailed for Optimal Power

We didn’t just design Hogtalare to be beautiful - we made sure every piece of hardware was perfectly placed and engineered for optimal output. We carefully selected the materials for each component and positioned them exactly where they needed to be to create the clearest, most powerful sound possible.

Each one of the drivers (woofer and tweeters) are specifically arranged to achieve their maximum resolution in relation to the cabinet and to one another.

The cabinet is made from a thick wood compound with internal bracing and reinforcement to provide phenomenal sonic performance and insulation.

To improve resolution with the grill on, we added waveguides (horns) to the frame, right above the tweeters. An EVA ring was also added to further improve resolution.

Backlit Magnetic Grill

The grill has a full fabric design. No holes, no cutouts, only beautiful simplicity. The grills come in a variety of subtle and vibrant colors to perfectly fit your home decor.

In order to maintain functionality without compromising the clean aesthetic, we made backlit buttons that you can see and operate through the fabric.

Wireless Stereo Pairing

For those who want a 2 speaker stereo system, Hogtalare supports TWS (True Wireless Stereo) pairing. That means you can wirelessly pair two Hogtalare units. Each unit will only play one channel (left or right), and you will get a dual speaker stereo system with unrivaled performance in this price range.

 

Bluetooth & Auxiliary Input

Hogtalare supports both BT (Bluetooth) and AUX (auxiliary) inputs.

Wirelessly stream music from your phone, connect your TV or laptop, or hook up your turntable to spin some vinyl.

Advanced Bluetooth 4.2 technology and aptX support give you the most optimal sound for range capacity.

Even our BT chip was specifically selected for its superior sonic characteristics, and APT-X support drastically improves the compression process in comparison to regular BT to give you higher fidelity.

Even in connectivity, we keep audio quality top of mind.

WiFi Ready

For those who need a WiFi speaker, Hogtalare has a WiFi enabled USB power port on the back, so just plug your Chromecast audio or equivalent.

From Supercars, Yachts, and Home Theaters…Now To You.

Throughout the years, Morel has developed an enviable reputation for technological innovation and design excellence.

Morel drivers, including tweeters, midrange, and woofers, are used in some of the most demanding, high-end products around the globe. Morel products and sound systems are sold in the home hi-fi, home theater, auto, and mobile audio markets worldwide.

Our goal is to make HiFi sound accessible to everyone. For over 44 years, we’ve been making some of the most advanced and high-quality hi-fi speakers in the world - we’re bringing that same mastery to you.

We took our expertise and put it all into one simple, well-designed, self-contained, high-value, incredibly priced speaker.

Enjoy high-quality sound without compromising your home’s aesthetic or breaking your budget.

 

This is what a Hi-Fi System should be.

Morel

In 1975, Meir Mordechai founded Morel. Inspired by a love of music and motivated by a dream, Mordecai sought to create a loudspeaker that would capture the magic in music in the most natural way.

His life-long quest resulted in successive generations of speakers and audio drivers that consistently set new standards for superb sound quality.

Over the years, Morel has developed an enviable reputation for technological innovation and design excellence. Morel drivers, including tweeters, midrange, and woofers, are utilized in some of the most demanding, high-end products around the globe.

Morel products and sound systems are sold in the home hi-fi, home theater, and mobile audio markets in more than 55 countries worldwide and have won handfuls of “Best of” awards in various reputable trade and technology shows.

story:
Our Newest Innovation: The Stealth Elite

The Stealth Elite is a unique pair of electronic hearing protection earbuds with attachable Bluetooth lanyard. Each set of Stealth Elites come with two earbuds independently powered by a standard #10 battery, a rechargeable lanyard with Bluetooth capabilities that can connect to your earbuds to play music or talk on the phone, several sizes of foam ear tips to fit with a Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) of 28, and several sizes of silicone tips designed for staying in your ear during physical activities. 

Check out our latest review over at Globo Surf!

 

What Makes The Stealth Elite Different? All of This Technology in One Tiny Package:

  • Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) of 28: Our electronic hearing protection compresses dangerously loud sounds for one of the top NRR ratings.
  • Water Resistant: Sweat-proof with an IPX6 rating.
  • Amplification Mode: Let's you hear faint sounds from a distance while protecting your ears from extremely loud sounds (5x amplification).
  • Awareness Mode: Allows ambient sounds to pass through even while you are listening to music or talking on the phone so you remain situationally aware.
  • Isolation Mode: Enjoy complete peace and quiet when you want to focus or recharge.
  • Wind Shield: Block the sound of wind when you are on-the-move or in a windy environment.
  • Clear, Natural Sound: Miniature analog hybrid circuits allow unparalleled sound. 

 

Hear What You Want to Hear...

Protecting our ears is essential if we want to hold onto our hearing for the rest of our life. Most hearing protection on the market today is either bulky, uncomfortable, or just doesn’t work nearly as well as it should. At Pro Ears, we believe that electronic hearing protection shouldn’t keep us from having fun or staying safe, it should give us the freedom to hear exactly what we want to hear. 

 

Over 25 Years of Protecting Hearing

From our early days in a garage in Phoenix, to our 30,000 square foot facility in Northern Michigan, we at Pro Ears pride ourselves in producing handmade electronic hearing protection for over 25 years. Each of our electronic models are made from premium materials to give our customers unmatched quality. Originally designed for gun range enthusiasts, our previous models were more traditional in looks, but savvy in tech.    

 

Everyone Needs Hearing Protection

While hearing protection is useful for the gun range or mowing your lawn, we realized that we hadn’t tapped into our technology’s full potential. Fueled by the challenge of innovation, we redesigned our traditional ear muffs from the ground up. Rather than making a product that only protects your hearing, we wanted to make a lightweight product that could play music, amplify your surroundings and still let you hear the conversation happening next to you. That’s why we’re excited to present to you our latest model yet: The Pro Ears Stealth Elite. 

 

Uses for Pro Ears Stealth Elite 

We've been developing this product prototype for over 2 years. As a seasoned company, we take research and development very seriously. We know our reputation depends upon it. And we take great pride in providing the highest quality hearing protection available on the market. The motivation behind creating the Stealth Elite was to create the a versatile hearing protection solution that would be compatible for nearly any environment or lifestyle.   

 

Shooting / Hunting   

Biking / Running / Gym   


 

Concerts / Sporting Events / Racetrack     

 

 

Yard Work / Construction / Tradesman    

 
 

 

Lightweight Without Sacrificing What's On the Inside

Taking influence from some of our favorite behind-the-head headphones, we developed lightweight, waterproof earbuds with Bluetooth capabilities that produce high-fidelity sound quality, but also can act as hearing protection for dangerously loud environments. This small innovation can handle even the toughest of environments.     

 

Is The Stealth Elite Waterproof?

We've design the Stealth Elite with all uses in mind. The water resistance testing on these was rated to an IPX6 rating, which means they can resist high-pressure, heavy sprays of water, but not water submersion. They'll fully withstand heavy sweat from your workout or while you're jogging or biking in the rain. Technically IPX6 is rated as "water resistant".

Isolation, Awareness & Amplification Settings

Want to tune out the world so you can listen to music or your favorite podcast? Isolation mode gives you the ability to pay attention to what you want to listen to. Setting the Elites to Awareness mode allows external noises to enter through the ear bud, without interrupting whatever you’re listening to. Perfect for people who are cycling to work but still need to hear a car passing you from behind. If you’re the hunting type, then you’ll love our Amplification mode. By switching the ear buds to Amplification, you’ll be able to amplify quiet sounds up to three times their normal decibel.   

 

By using miniaturized analog circuits and noise isolating microphones, the Stealth Elites comes with an incredible amount of features. With three modes of operation, the Stealth Elites are ready for whatever you want to listen to. 

What's Included In The Package? 

Included with each pair of Pro Ears Stealth Elite:

  • 2x In Ear Buds
  • 1x Micro USB cable 
  • 4x #10 batteries
  • 1x MMCX Cable (Bluetooth lanyard cable, rechargeable with micro USB cable)
  • 3x Sets of super soft foam tips (L, M, S)
  • 3x Sets of Silicon tips (L, M, S)
  • 3x Sets of ear hooks for added secure fit
  • Durable carry case with gold Pro Ears logo

Family-Run Small Business Needing to Scale Production

So why are we pre-selling our greatest product with Indiegogo? At Pro Ears, we are a small family-run business who primarily makes our products in-house. But in the last two years, we managed to partner with a world-class sourcing company with years of experience in bringing unique products to market. However, being as small as we are, we need your help to purchase the specialized tooling needed to bring our project to market, as well as be able to order the parts at a volume discount. Pre-selling units reduces our financial risk when bringing a new product to market and will allow us to produce the most feature rich product possible at the best price possible. 

 

Sound Engineer Partnerships

As you can see, we have the design and prototypes already finalized and ready for business. And our sourcing company is standing by us to help coordinate all stages of production and logistics. This not only ensures that you’ll get your Stealth Elites on time, but that you’ll receive the highest quality Stealth Elites we can possibly make.

Thank You For Supporting Us

With all the great components we've built into the Stealth Elites, we would have to charge a higher premium that could equal over $150 per unit. By backing our campaign for an exclusive early-bird discount, you can be one of the first to experience hearing protection that lets you choose what you want to hear while allowing us to purchase the tooling required to build the Stealth Elites at scale.

From all of us at Pro Ears, thank you for your support!

Water Resistant: Sweat-proof with an IPX6 rating.

Amplification Mode: Let's you hear faint sounds from a distance while protecting your ears from extremely loud sounds (5x amplification).

Awareness Mode: Allows ambient sounds to pass through even while you are listening to music or talking on the phone so you remain situationally aware.

Isolation Mode: Enjoy complete peace and quiet when you want to focus or recharge.

Wind Shield: Block the sound of wind when you are on-the-move or in a windy environment.

Clear, Natural Sound: Miniature analog hybrid circuits allow unparalleled sound. 
 

Pro Ears Stealth Elite Prototype (shown with and without Bluetooth 5 lanyard)
Our Working Prototype Being Tested


Pro Shooter Susan Hansen Testing the Stealth Elite Prototype
  Hear What You Want to Hear...Protecting our ears is essential if we want to hold onto our hearing for the rest of our life. Most hearing protection on the market today is either bulky, uncomfortable, or just doesn’t work nearly as well as it should. At Pro Ears, we believe that electronic hearing protection shouldn’t keep us from having fun or staying safe, it should give us the freedom to hear exactly what we want to hear.  Loyal Pro Ears Customers: Professional Shooters & Hunters
 Over 25 Years of Protecting HearingFrom our early days in a garage in Phoenix, to our 30,000 square foot facility in Northern Michigan, we at Pro Ears pride ourselves in producing handmade electronic hearing protection for over 25 years. Each of our electronic models are made from premium materials to give our customers unmatched quality. Originally designed for gun range enthusiasts, our previous models were more traditional in looks, but savvy in tech.     Retailers, Publications & Organizations That Sell, Trust & Depend on Pro Ears Hearing Protection Products
 Pro Ears hearing protection is trusted by LAPD, Department of Homeland Security, Department of Justice and The United States Army
 Everyone Needs Hearing ProtectionWhile hearing protection is useful for the gun range or mowing your lawn, we realized that we hadn’t tapped into our technology’s full potential. Fueled by the challenge of innovation, we redesigned our traditional ear muffs from the ground up. Rather than making a product that only protects your hearing, we wanted to make a lightweight product that could play music, amplify your surroundings and still let you hear the conversation happening next to you. That’s why we’re excited to present to you our latest model yet: The Pro Ears Stealth Elite.  Pro Ears Stealth Elite: 3 Products in 1- No Compromises
 Uses for Pro Ears Stealth Elite We've been developing this product prototype for over 2 years. As a seasoned company, we take research and development very seriously. We know our reputation depends upon it. And we take great pride in providing the highest quality hearing protection available on the market. The motivation behind creating the Stealth Elite was to create the a versatile hearing protection solution that would be compatible for nearly any environment or lifestyle.    Hear What You Want To Hear with Pro Ears Stealth Elite
 Shooting / Hunting   At the shooting range.
 5 times amplification, with industry trusted hearing protection
 Biking / Running / Gym   While biking, running or skiing.
  Tested by runners and dancers to ensure secure in-ear fitment
  Concerts / Sporting Events / Racetrack      
  Yard Work / Construction / Tradesman    
   Tested by tradesman in loud environments
   Lightweight Without Sacrificing What's On the InsideTaking influence from some of our favorite behind-the-head headphones, we developed lightweight, waterproof earbuds with Bluetooth capabilities that produce high-fidelity sound quality, but also can act as hearing protection for dangerously loud environments. This small innovation can handle even the toughest of environments.      Pro Ears Stealth Elite: The Technology Inside
 Water Resistant with an IPX6 Rating
 Is The Stealth Elite Waterproof?We've design the Stealth Elite with all uses in mind. The water resistance testing on these was rated to an IPX6 rating, which means they can resist high-pressure, heavy sprays of water, but not water submersion. They'll fully withstand heavy sweat from your workout or while you're jogging or biking in the rain. Technically IPX6 is rated as "water resistant".3 Sound Settings, 0 Compromises: Isolation | Awareness | Amplification
 Isolation, Awareness & Amplification SettingsWant to tune out the world so you can listen to music or your favorite podcast? Isolation mode gives you the ability to pay attention to what you want to listen to. Setting the Elites to Awareness mode allows external noises to enter through the ear bud, without interrupting whatever you’re listening to. Perfect for people who are cycling to work but still need to hear a car passing you from behind. If you’re the hunting type, then you’ll love our Amplification mode. By switching the ear buds to Amplification, you’ll be able to amplify quiet sounds up to three times their normal decibel.    
 By using miniaturized analog circuits and noise isolating microphones, the Stealth Elites comes with an incredible amount of features. With three modes of operation, the Stealth Elites are ready for whatever you want to listen to. What's Included In The Package? Package contents
 Included with each pair of Pro Ears Stealth Elite:
2x In Ear Buds
1x Micro USB cable 
4x #10 batteries
1x MMCX Cable (Bluetooth lanyard cable, rechargeable with micro USB cable)
3x Sets of super soft foam tips (L, M, S)
3x Sets of Silicon tips (L, M, S)
3x Sets of ear hooks for added secure fit
Durable carry case with gold Pro Ears logo
 

Some of our team in Grawn, Michigan (including our office guard dog)
 Family-Run Small Business Needing to Scale ProductionSo why are we pre-selling our greatest product with Indiegogo? At Pro Ears, we are a small family-run business who primarily makes our products in-house. But in the last two years, we managed to partner with a world-class sourcing company with years of experience in bringing unique products to market. However, being as small as we are, we need your help to purchase the specialized tooling needed to bring our project to market, as well as be able to order the parts at a volume discount. Pre-selling units reduces our financial risk when bringing a new product to market and will allow us to produce the most feature rich product possible at the best price possible.  Our sound engineering partners assembling and testing the Stealth Elite prototype
 Sound Engineer PartnershipsAs you can see, we have the design and prototypes already finalized and ready for business. And our sourcing company is standing by us to help coordinate all stages of production and logistics. This not only ensures that you’ll get your Stealth Elites on time, but that you’ll receive the highest quality Stealth Elites we can possibly make.Thank You For Supporting UsWith all the great components we've built into the Stealth Elites, we would have to charge a higher premium that could equal over $150 per unit. By backing our campaign for an exclusive early-bird discount, you can be one of the first to experience hearing protection that lets you choose what you want to hear while allowing us to purchase the tooling required to build the Stealth Elites at scale.From all of us at Pro Ears, thank you for your support!

story:
"Meanwhile the upper registers serve up every tinkle of broken glass in a fight scene, every tire screech during a car chase… and you can even hear the sound of a pin drop if it’s on the soundtrack. These are earphones you'll want if you’re going to watch a movie on your tablet or laptop. It’s the closest you’ll get to a tv soundbar in your pocket."  Forbes Magazine 

"As far as listening to music is concerned, the Oomo earphones deliver a big, warm and detailed sound. It’s not the audiophile sound of some earphones, which can often be dry and a little bit thin. These earphones offer a big, wraparound sound at a decent volume level, which is exactly what you want if you’re listening to music while you’re walking to work or taking a train journey somewhere."  Forbes Magazine


http://www.forbes.com/sites/marksparrow/2017/07/19/unique-3d-immersive-earbuds-offer-movie-theatre-sound-quality-at-a-bargain-price/#59c9923567d3

 


Oomo 3D Immersive Earbuds!

Hi, I'm Aaryan, founder of Oomo. I recently received the final samples, which were sent out to Hollywood's elite Sound Engineers, 15 nominations and winner of 5 Emmys, Jeff Charbonneau; 24 award nominations and winner of 4 Emmys, Nello Torri, and their team. They called back with great reviews, comparing Oomo to their $10,000 professional earphones. Nello mentioned other than their professional grade earphones, Oomo 3D, were the most immersive surround sound earphones he has experienced. "The sound quality was great. Rich, warm, smooth. Loved the surround feature. Made me feel like a participant, rather then just an observer." Nello Torri. 





My personal journey which led to Oomo is on the website: http://oomosound.com/our-story/

Here's the bit about Oomo: 
On one of my visit to China, on the very first day, I met the acoustic genius Mr. Lee who had been working on surround sound earbuds for over 6 years. He had with him the rudimentary working prototype, which when I demoed simply blew me away. I was with my ex business partner, manufacturer of sunglasses and now friend, Michael Hsu, who was helping me  to connect with sunglass manufacturers working with big brands. Because the meetings were set ahead, I had to honor it, but my heart and head was set on working with Mr. Lee on those earphones. All through my trip I kept asking to see Mr. Lee again. Lee had traveled back to his home in Taiwan. I delayed my trip by a week. Finally, we met at small earphones factory, the owner of which happened to be Michael's friend. We offered to partner up. He had made only one prototype, the gold colored earbuds in the picture, I wasn't going to leave without a sample, so one was handmade while I delayed my trip further. 
 

Many things still needed to be done, including a new mold and all other tests including test for mass production. It took another year to finally get the working, ready for mass production. 



Video of final product ready to ship:


 

There's a minimum requirement of 5000 units production. A 1000 pieces are ready to be shipped and on their way to Los Angeles.The manufacturer has placed their trust in us to fulfill our commitment of 4000 units more. I have full confidence in Oomo's sound quality but need your support to back us, try Oomo and spread the word. 

I met Jason, a super cool guy, when he came to see rental unit next door. Without disclosing they were surround sound, I asked him to try a pair of Oomo and recorded this with my phone. This was his genuine reaction. Oh, we're now friends. 



Part of the proceeds from all sales following the launch, will go toward helping the hearing impaired. 


I hope you can support this campaign and help us spread the word. 

Thank you! 

Aaryan 




 


http://www.digitaljournal.com/pr/3385985

story:
We Want Your Input

iASUS specializes in niche high quality communication products and this is our first mainstream consumer product offering. We feel customer input for product development is very important so we decided to reach out to the indiegogo community. If we reach our funding goal, we will offer the EAR3 in multiple colors (voted by you) and complete the development of the O3 earphones and 4GM music module that transforms the EAR3 into the total urban music solution.  

Mission

With 270,000 pedestrian traffic related deaths last year, 22% of all traffic accidents, finally there is a solution that does not compromise your personal audio experience with safety.

Walk, Run and Ride SAFE with IASUS EAR3.

SPREAD THE WORD AND MAKE LISTENING TO MUSIC OUTDOOR SAFE FOR EVERYONE. 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

story:
orrow

The Cutting-Edge Tech Behind The XLIFT

 

Packed with advanced tech. XLIFT can keep a slow rotating state while suspended thanks to its Revolutionary Technology  through the changes of electric current in the power supply module of the base. 

XLIFT magically will levitate without any assistance

 

          

Premium Audio Quality

The acoustic performance of each spectrum has been carefully assessed so that our speaker delivers a resonance-free panoramic sound effect.

This means superb clarity across the whole frequency spectrum, with soaring highs, warm mids and a bass that kicks like a mule!

Experience what a 360° Surround Sound system with a superb bass Amplifier 8W sounds like. 

 

Bluetooth Capability

We wanted to create something that apart from looking awesome, it also was highly practical!

Thanks to the high quality CSR Bluetooth 4.0 module, make and receive calls with high fidelity audio, unmatched clarity and stable connectivity!

DESIGN TO DIE FOR

The XLIFT speaker focuses heavily on the design of the sound chamber structure and the suspension, in a manner that delivers astounding Audio Quality with a design that’s just super cool to look at.

GREAT LASTING POWER

Features a 1500mAh battery with a standby time of a whopping 3 days and 5H of non-stop music playing, as well as a magnetic adsorption with a fascinating 360 spin.

             

3D Modeling And Printing Prototype 

Our team created the product design in 3D software and build multiple physical prototype in a 3D printer, Our prototype is ready in 90% and perfectly working the levitation system, we are in the process blue light system in the speaker.

 

 

                   

              

                                  Follow us

Always stay up to date with Xlift Proyect Team latest updates on social media.

  • FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/xliftproyectteam
  • INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/xliftproyect/

 

Fund Us & Join The Tech Revolution

All funding will go towards the first production run so that we can actually make this project a reality. Because of the high minimum order quantities, we need to order in bulk, and that’s where you guys and gals come in!

Help us make bring to life the future of speakers by sharing this campaign with a friend of yours and join us so that we can all enjoy the speakers of tom

, today!!

story:
The Miro speaker by Zbinno brings together clean sound with clean visuals for a unique experience. Interesting Engineering

The Miro by Zbinno smart media center is one of the most interesting gadgets you can find. ​Gizmochina

Miro is an interesting concept, not only because the scale of features that Zbinno - the company behind the Indiegogo campaign for this product - has tried to pack into a product sized a little smaller than a Subway sandwich, but also because it might be a glimpse into the future of controling your home hi-fi. WHATHIFI

Miro is the ultimate smart media center that offers a fascinating home theater experience. PRWeb

 

Boasting a richer, brighter, more detailed view when compared with screens under the same dimensions.

To support wide color, for even more vibrant greens and reds. This ensures truer-to-life pictures with realistically vivid details, essential for graphic design, color grading, and editing.

 

178° viewing angle

All the colors stay true and clear no matter which way you're looking at the screen.

 

Built-in 1¾ inch medium-high frequency driver,

the Craft carries crystal clear euphony. 

 

Dual speaker system.

The dual driver two frequency package, combines a separated Craft and Base design providing a crisp and rich harmony. 

The unique configuration rewards the listener with more clarity on treble, more depth in bass and helps preserve the acoustic essence of different music genres.

Loss-free Bluetooth audio transmission

Low transmission latency, superb fault tolerance against compression, high quality Bluetooth audio.

 

Home’s stereo system has been recognized as large space occupying objects go with wires and controlled by remote controller which is often buried in piles of things and difficult to find out. Miro disrupts that.

Crafted into a sleek design with a satin alloy body, Miro brings you songs, movies, TV shows and many more APPs for exploration.

Magnetic snap-on Bluetooth remote makes it easy to manage whenever you go. 

Entertainment anytime, anywhere

 

 

Miro supports 3 control modes to enable the most smooth and flexible experience.  

 

Select, change, and navigate your music and volume effortlessly from anywhere in your room with 10 meters Bluetooth transmission distance.

Snap-on magnetic control to avoid loss and ease preservation

 

 

Your favorite entertainment APPs are here, follow YouTube channels, get latest episodes on Netflix, explore a wealth of tracks on Spotify and many more in Pandora Box and Google Play.

custom-designed to facilitate your entire music life

 

Perfect device for emotional connection. Use Miro to see and talk to the one you care or make business conference while you’re cooking, reading or enjoying the cup of tea.

Play hundreds of funny games with unprecedented amazing experience. 

 

 

When WiFi is not available, you can share hotspot from mobile phones, even extend entertaining from pre-stored movies/music.

How it works?

  • Open the  hotspot on your phone
  • Turn on WIFI on Miro
  • Connect the hotspot
  • Explore freely online

 

 

Internal battery: 7.4V 4500mAh

 

 

 

 

 

Founded in 2012, a group of designers, geeks and audio professionals joined together to become the ZBINNO team. Miro was created because we want consumers to enjoy themselves in smart entertainment without compromising on sound/video quality. It aims to bring the authentic happiness back to us by giving it freedom to go. So we made it elegant, powerful, colorful and possible anywhere. This is Miro, one product, in your hands, on the go.

The market today is flooded with uneven quality of products, Bluetooth speaker, WiFi speaker, TV box, projector, tablet. People in search of the optimal media experience were busy with multi devices, and often got tethered to a very specific room if they want connected enjoyment of stereo sound. In many cases, the result is either sacrificing time and money on different gadgets, or stuck indoors for fair movie audio immersion. We miss the importance of entertainment: freedom. We want to bring it back.

 

 

 

Miro is in production, and we guarantee to ship March 2017. 

Packaging

 

 

Sharing is caring. We need your help to let your friends know about the campaign. Please take a minute to click one of the buttons to do it!

Feel free to download any material from: Media  kit, Indiegogo images, high-def images. 

 

 

Please contact crowdfunding@zbinnova.com with further questions or requests.

Q:What's in the box? 

A:

  • Miro 
  •  Remote Control 
  •  DC Power Adapter 
  •  User Guide 
  •  Guarantee Card 

Q: What colors do you offer? 

A: We offer space gray,gold and rose gold. We would love to hear your thoughts on what color to offer next! 

Q: What is the weight of Miro? 

 A: 0.78KG excluding packaging.

Q: How to connect the WIFI? 

A: Click "Network Settings" in setting function , find and enter the password to connect what WIFI you need. 

Q: How to connect BLUETOOTH? 

 A: Turn on “Bluetooth”,meanwhile press Menu & Home button to send signals,then you search “Smart MedieCenter”, click “Smart MedieCenter” into paring mode until connected. 

Q: What is the battery life? 

A: Up to 8 hours.

Q: How long does it take to get a full battery charge? 

A: 1 and a half hours.

Q: Is it a warranty for Miro? 

A: Yes, 365 days.

Q: Does it works in other languages rather than English? 

A: Yes, Chinese. 

Q: Does it play your own music on your cell phone? 

A: Yes, you can use airplay function to play your own music on your cell phone. 

Q: Can DC Power Adapter run on 100 to 240 Volts? 

A: Yes, it can.

story:
Please Help Bring Girl Rising to Team Englewood High School And Girls Around the World!

        Growing up in a dysfunctional family in an impoverished neighborhood in the Bronx, with little to no self-esteem was both challenging and discouraging. I felt like my dreams were unattainable and simply a make believe world that existed only on television and in novels.

        However, luckily for me, like Team Englewood High School, my high school, St. Raymond Academy for all girls would host events that featured guest speakers who took the time to share their stories on how they coped with the dysfunction of their day to day lives growing up.

They coped by:  getting involved with programs hosted by their dream college,  spending time reading and learning about things they enjoy at the library,  participating in extracurricular activities at their high school,  studying abroad, maintaining a part-time job,  tutoring young children,  creating meaningful relationships with their teachers and positive figures in their community and asking for advice about things that may seem embarrassing.

          Sharing their stories was transformative in that it provided my classmates and me with the motivation and action plan we needed to make immediate change in our lives. I went from being depressed and hopeless, to becoming a self-motivated and resilient person who had a reason to smile and laugh despite the unpleasant circumstances plaguing my environment. 

       Because  I was fortunate to have people inspire me to change by sharing their stories, it is my duty to continue this legacy of story sharing to help other girls change so they can one day share their story to create change. Girl Rising provides the platform and space to create this change for young women globally. 

        And with your support, I will be able to bring Girl Rising to the girls of Team Englewood High School in Chicago and girls around the world. I am living proof that the power of story telling is indeed transformative. Your contributions  will help to bring story telling to girls in need of positive change.

​10% of your contributions will go towards Team Englewood High School's Event:

  • Event Memorabilia

  • Entertainment

  • Event Decoration

  • Breakfast

  • Lunch

  • Purchase of the Girl Rising Film 

90% of the proceeds will go towards the GIRL RISING IMPACT FUND     

Girl Rising Impact Fund is made up of Seven NGO Partners helping further the Girl Rising mission around the world.

  • A New Day Cambodia
  • CARE
  • Partners in Health
  • Plan International USA
  • Room to Read
  • United Nations Foundation/Girl Up
  • World Vision for their girls’ education

story:
Hi everybody! Thanks for taking the time to check out my IndieGogo campaign! :) 

I'm a bicoastal musician, actress, model, and Editor-in-Chief of MITH Magazine living mainly between NYC and LA. I'm so excited to share my first pop single Like A Drum with you! I need your help to raise funds to release this song, film the official music video in London in two weeks, and to complete my EP of 5 songs total! The footage you see here is just a teaser. The final and official music video for this song will be completely magical. I am shooting it with an award-winning director! 

I wrote the song Like A Drum to celebrate overcoming obstacles and rising above like a bird escaped from a cage and not letting anything hold you down. I hope my song and my EP in development will share a strong message of hope to a darkened world.

 

My journey in entertainment and fashion began when I quit my day jobs in North Carolina as a Spanish teacher and interpreter in my early twenties and said goodbye to my hometown to pursue a career in New York City, first starting out with acting and modeling. After three years in NYC, I headed to LA for a year and worked bicoastally while recording my first pop single Like A Drum, and also co-founding MITH Magazine, a fashion and entertainment magazine spotlighting young up-and-coming stars.

I am so passionate about MITH Magazine, which is why I've included it in with the perks! MITH has a similar motive to my music...to tell the stories of the dreamers and the go-getters who accomplish the seemingly impossible by maintaining that resilient overcomer spirit despite all odds. MITH also sheds a very tasteful and elegant look on fashion and entertainment that is family-friendly, yet still edgy and modern. I try to incorporate these values in my magazine and all my creative work, including my music projects.

Through the funds raised in this campaign you will help to make this project a success, and I believe you will also help to spread strong messages of hope and resilience to uplift spirits for such a time as this. 

 

 

If I'm able to raise $50,000...

...I'll be able to make a 5-song EP! Even the smallest contribution is deeply meaningful. Here's how the finances break down for making an album and video shoots:

 

Recording Costs for my first single and 4 more songs for EP: $40,000

(This seems like a lot, but for high-quality production with award-winning talent, it adds up fast! After I complete all production for song and video on my first single by April 1st 2017, the total will already have reached $8,000 alone! And believe me, I aim to deliver you an amazing music video!) Keep in mind all the fees below: 

• Producer fees

• Mixing and mastering

• Music video production fees

• Vocal coach & vocal production fees

• Hired musicians for future songs

Branding & Packaging Costs: $5,000

• Cover artwork for 5 singles

• Cover artwork for EP

• Photo shoots (for website, flyers, digital promo and marketing)

• Website design

Marketing & PR Costs: $3,000

• Digital marketing

• Blog outreach

• PR services in US/Middle East/Europe

Extra/Misc. Costs: $2,000

• Payment processing fees (~3% of total)

• IndieGoGo's platform fees (5% of total)

• Perk production costs

• Inevitable miscellaneous fees can come up during the recording and production process. Sometimes things go wrong & it takes money to fix it. And sometimes things are taking too long and you need money to meet your deadline.

 

 

For helping me raise these funds, my favorite perk that I’m offering you is a subscription to MITH Magazine and also an exclusive song written just for you! For the exceedingly generous, I am offering producer credits and a live performance for you and your friends!

If you are unable to contribute financially, a tweet, share, or shout-out would be greatly appreciated. Do spread the word to family and friends about this campaign if you can. It helps come that much closer to making this campaign a success!

 

Thank you so much, and I can’t wait to share the final product of Like A Drum with you, and my EP!

story:
WHO ARE DROP LEGS?

We are a 6 piece Roots Hip Hop band from Byron Bay Australia and we've been playing and touring for about 2 and a half years. During this time we have released an EP, two follow up singles which were premiered on Australia's prestigious Triple J Radio Station, and have toured the East Coast of Australia 5 times and Indonesia once.

As a band we have a lot of great new unreleased music and our dream is to release it as an album (digitally, on CD and Vinyl) to current and new fans in Australia and overseas. We believe an important step towards this goal to utilise publicists and distribution networks to achieve our desired reach. This in turn will help us play bigger and better gigs and provide a solid platform to launch future releases. We all work regular jobs as well as rehearse, tour and record however now we need to ask for some extra help to reach this next step in our musical careers.  

 We have already recorded over half of the album,and we are extremely proud of how it is sounding - however we still need at least $10000 to add to our own contributions to invest in printing, promoting, publicising and distributing the next single (released early March) followed by rest of the album in the middle of the year. If we don't achieve this financial goal we will invest the money in the March single followed by an EP (extended play of around 6 tracks).

We live in an expensive world and greatly appreciate any contribution you make, and if you can't contribute - no worries, come along to one of our shows and we'll put you on the door...

Anyone who can contribute however, we will personally send you the following as a thank you offering when the album is released...

$10  = Sticker and shout out to you online

$25 + = Digital download of album + sticker sent out

$40  + = Signed CD sent to you + sticker

$60 + = Signed CD  + Drop Legs T - shirt + sticker 

$100 + = Signed CD + Drop Legs T- shirt  + sticker + name in the credits of album 

$500 + =  Signed Vinyl or CD + Drop Legs T - shirt + sticker + name in the credits + invitation to private launch party

$1000 + = All of the above + a personal song about you or your loved one

$1500 or more = All of the above + negotiable suggestions  

WHY?

If you are a music lover than this project will  surely interest you. So far on the album our unreleased tracks feature producers such as Paul Pilsenkis (Angus & Julia Stone, Mars Volta, Metallica, Dope Lemon, The Skatalites, Living End) and Andrew Mckinnon (Desmond Cheese). We have been recording out of Pete Murray's studio in Byron Bay as well as a mobile studio set up on a house overlooking Byron Bay town. 
Our music features drums, guitar, bass, saxophone, trumpet, keys, percussion, singing and rapping and its great for dancing, chilling out or cruising around town in your car. We have formulated our own Roots Hip Hop sounds which oozes of coastal vibe mixed with an urban street undertone. Here are some quotes from our website....

"Drop Legs are (or are damn sure about to be) everyone's favourite coastal chill/hip hop/reggae sensation. They're smooth, clever and funky, and you need them in your playlist." (Erica Mallett, FBi Radio, Coda Conduct)
"Loving the blend of reggae and hip hop you've got going on." Sarah Howells (Roots n All Triple J)

Please listen to our music on Spotify, or soundcloud ( https://soundcloud.com/droplegs ) or most other online listening platforms.

After packing out all our recent shows in Sydney, Gold Coast and Byron Bay and having our latest singles premiered on Triple J, we feel ready to launch into the next step of the journey.

Risks & Challenges

The main risk of this campaign is that we fall short of the required funding needed to launch the album. The way we will ensure to overcome this risk is to adjust our promotion and publicists budget accordingly, the lesser budget we have the less tracks and lower reach we will aim for. Ultimately we are going for quality over quantity - we would rather release fewer solid tracks and push it thoroughly to the right audience. 

Thank you for your contribution and Please share our campaign and use the Indiegogo share function!!!

story:
Gold Carbon with Matte Black Stands


So what do the people at the bleeding edge of tech have to say about the PANL1?:



 




The VETR Audio PANL1 is a stereo speaker system like no other.Its strikingly innovative design will catch eyes and complement any modern space. The centerpiece of each speaker is a twill carbon fiber panel, only 1.3mm thick, which provides crisp, natural sound. Our stands are 100% stainless steel, finished with a beautiful brushed surface or Eco-Friendly Matte Black powder coat. With a slim design and intelligent sizing, the PANL1 can fit into almost any space – whether at your computer desk, home theater, or in the living room for entertaining friends and family. Paired with our bespoke subwoofer and coupled with Bluetooth wireless the PANL1 system is a beautifully functional addition to any bedroom.

Complete PANL1 system with subwoofer


At the most fundamental level, every speaker uses electricity to vibrate a surface, producing sound. The PANL1 shares only this concept; the similarities end there. An average set of stereo speakers has just 17 square inches of area to reproduce sound; the PANL1 has 132. Typical stereo speakers have just 20 watts of output power per channel; the PANL1 has 48. Regular bookshelf speakers can be 6 inches thick; the PANL1 is less than 1.



Gold Carbon with Matte Black stands


Our speakers are built right here in the U.S.A. by hand. We take pride in our build quality and to ensure every system is up to our standards, each one is hand-built and tested by us. The PANL1 is built using high quality components to minimize defects and reduce waste - benefiting both our customers and the environment. Doing things right the first time is not just a rule to us but law. 

Gold Carbon with Matte Black Stands



Dimensions

Each speaker: 11"H x 6"W x 4"D

Subwoofer: 10"H x 11"W x 10"D

 

The PANL1 was designed from the ground up to fit into a sleek, modern world. Unlike the boxy, bulky speakers saturating the market today, we sought to change the way audio is seen. With unparalleled thinness and a propensity for grabbing attention, the PANL1 will make a bold statement in any setting.

Black Carbon with Matte Black Stands

Complete PANL1 system with subwoofer

The PANL1 speakers fill your room with beautifully clear sound whether you’re listening to acoustic recordings, watching action movies, or playing the latest games. Our low-profile subwoofer provides deep low notes and room-filling bass in a package that can be easily hidden under your desk or next to your TV. And because it’s tuned to perform perfectly with the PANL1 speakers, the whole sound range will seem to come from our slim bookshelf speakers – clear and precise, at any volume.

Blue Carbon with Matte Black Stands

Our design is like nothing else. From the first brainstorming sessions, initial sketches, and early proofs of concept nearly two years ago, we strived to create a minimalist, bold design that performs. Reactions to our speakers range from "These are amazing" to, simply, "wow." Our main goal, the overarching principal that we adhered to, has always been "Change the way people see audio." With the PANL1, we plan to achieve that.


Blue Carbon with Matte Black Stands




Complete System:

-2x PANL1 Speakers

-1x VETR Audio Subwoofer/Amplifier

-1x Remote Control

-1x Power Cable

-1x RCA to 3.5mm Cable


 

You choose your stand and PANL color. The stands come in either brushed stainless steel or beautiful matte black. The carbon fiber panels are available in 6 colors: black, silver, gold, pink, red, and blue. With 12 different color combos to pick from, you can choose a color combo to match any setting. We'll ask for your desired color combination in a survey at the conclusion of this campaign, then hand-build the system to your specifications.

Black Stand Color Combo

Brushed Stainless Stand Color Combos

Possible color combinations:

Gold Carbon with Matte Black

Silver Carbon with Matte Black

Red Carbon with Matte Black

Black Carbon with Brushed Stainless

Pink Carbon with Brushed Stainless

Black Carbon with Matte Black


Blue Carbon with Matte Black

Pink Carbon with Matte Black



By backing us, you'll be set to receive a system by our shipping date. Because our R&D is complete, manufacturing and assembly lined up, and logistics in place, you are placing a pre-order for our second run of systems. This is a retail ready system with our first crowdfunding campaign already finished and fulfilled, with the PANL1 already delivered to customers.


All 60 units of our first production run lined up and waiting to be boxed. All them hand built by us. 



Back us, share us, and let's make it happen!





None of this can happen with out the support of our customers, family, and friends. We feel a huge sense of pride when our designs excite the people around us, and we can't wait to share with you audio like you've never seen.

We set out to build a game changing product, maybe not one the entire world would notice, but one significant enough to be noticed.

What risks and challenges do we face?

Our primary challenge is finding or creating a space large enough to keep pace with the amount of orders we receive. A living room and garage provide ample space for small orders, but to ensure streamlined processes and on-time delivery for larger volumes, a dedicated office and warehouse is needed. Fortunately this issue is easily resolved: Phoenix has an ample supply of warehouse and commercial office space. Finding the right space to meet the demands of our customers is a simple matter of picking the best one.

While there are challenges we will likely face, we see very little in the way of potential risks. We have multiple suppliers and partners ready for all components of the PANL1 speakers; the R&D has already been done; we have already delivered systems to first run customers and they were assembled using the same processes we plan to use for these systems. We foresee very little risk to for a late delivery or non-delivery. Outside of catastrophic natural disasters, very little can interfere with us delivering the PANL1 to you.
