story:
THE WORLD'S FIRST GRAPHENE HEADPHONES

ORA GQ Headphones uses nanotechnology to deliver the most groundbreaking audio listening experience. Scientists have long promised that one day Graphene will find its way into many facets of our lives including displays, electronic circuits and sensors. ORA’s Graphene technology makes it one of the first companies to have created a commercially viable application for this Nobel-prize winning material, a major scientific achievement.

The GQ Headphones come equipped with ORA’s patented GrapheneQ™ membranes, providing unparalleled fidelity. The headphones also offer all the features you would expect from a high-end audio product: wired/wireless operation, a gesture control track-pad, a digital MEMS microphone, breathable lambskin leather and an ear-shaped design optimized for sound quality and isolated comfort.

AUDIO PRECISION VIA NANOTECHNOLOGY

Graphene pushes the limitations of loudspeakers, a technology that has seen little innovation since its invention in 1921. 

ORA takes a material that is 200 times stronger than steel and 1000 times lighter than paper and uses it to make flawless sound. 

This material provides significant benefits for loudspeaker performance:

  • Instant improvements in sound quality
  • Immediate extension of battery life, up to 70%
  • More volume from small speakers
  • Unrivaled high frequency response for improved localization cues

SOUND STAGE

Typical, closed, headphones (left) produce “in-head” imaging where the entire sound-stage appears to come only from the small space between your ears. GrapheneQ (right) provides better localization cues producing a wider, more realistic listening experience.

AUDIO PRECISION

GrapheneQ reacts more accurately than other materials which allows it to truthfully recreate the original recording without additional artifacts.

 

 

WHAT IS GRAPHENE?

Graphene is a new material, first isolated only 13 years ago. Formed from a single layer of carbon atoms, Graphene is a hexagonal crystal lattice in a perfect honeycomb structure. This fundamental geometry makes Graphene ridiculously strong and lightweight. It has been dubbed “the wonder material” because of its potential to change the world as we know it: from desalinating water, to curing spinal injuries, to making our computers 10,000x faster.

MATERIALS SCIENCE FOR THE BEST AUDIO

Graphene is considered the ‘holy grail’ for loudspeaker membranes, the part of the speaker that vibrates to produce sound. Because of its lightweight properties it can move quickly & easily and because of its incredible stiffness, it keeps its shape as it moves.

 

 

 

 From award-winning professionals to everyday music lovers...

 

 

We let world-famous conductor, Gustavo Dudamel, Music Director of the Los Angeles Philharmonic and the Orquesta Sinfónica Simón Bolívar, experience Graphene Audio and he was thrilled by the headphones' quality and accuracy of the sound.

A MESSAGE FROM GUSTAVO DUDAMEL

As a conductor, it is my job to listen. Recently, I was approached by ORA Sound, a nanotechnology startup claiming to have achieved groundbreaking levels of sound quality thanks to a new ‘wonder material’ called graphene.

I was immediately blown away by the level of detailed, crystal clear sound from their speakers. From Brahms to Latin American folk songs, I heard every musical detail with a level of clarity I’ve only ever experienced from the podium in front of an orchestra.

I am a fan of ORA and believe their technology can allow everyone to hear their favorite music like they are the conductor!

Good luck ORA.

- Gustavo Dudamel

DUDAMEL FOUNDATION PARTNERSHIP

ORA is thrilled to announce a partnership with Gustavo Dudamel and his charity, The Dudamel Foundation. Together we will provide children of diverse backgrounds with access to quality listening experiences. The partnership is inspired by the belief that the art of listening is fundamental to peace, harmony and understanding in our world.

 

LOUDSPEAKER HISTORY

Many of the recent advancements in loudspeakers and headphones have focused on the addition of digital processing (DSP). While DSP is a powerful tool, it can only act as a Band-Aid to mask the inherent performance issues of this century-old technology. ORA, instead, applies its expertise in nanotechnology and materials science to fundamentally improve the core of the loudspeaker and provide a level of quality and efficiency not possible from other consumer technologies.

UNCOMPROMISING SOUND

ORA’s patented GrapheneQ material is acoustically optimized to produce the smoothest, most extended frequency response for a true-to-life listening experience that will make you forget you are listening to loudspeakers.

  • Eliminates distortion for the most accurate audio
  • Detailed highs, crystal clear mids, and robust bass
  • Increased audio clarity through nano-scale audio precision
  • Lifelike, high resolution listening experience

IT’S ALL ABOUT EFFICIENCY

Speakers are probably the least efficient technology that we still use in our day to day lives. Less than 1% of the electrical power that goes into a speaker is converted into sound power. Graphene’s lightweight and low density properties means that it requires a lot less energy to move the membrane and produce sound.

 

A TECHNICAL INTRODUCTION TO GRAPHENE

Graphene is a new material, first isolated only 13 years ago. Formed from a single layer of carbon atoms, Graphene is a hexagonal crystal lattice in a perfect honeycomb structure. This fundamental geometry makes Graphene ridiculously strong and lightweight. In its pure form, Graphene is a single atomic layer of carbon. It can be very expensive and difficult to produce in sizes any bigger than small flakes. These challenges have prevented pristine Graphene from being integrated into consumer technologies.

THE GRAPHENEQ™ SOLUTION

At ORA, we’ve spent the last few years creating GrapheneQ, our own, proprietary Graphene-based nanocomposite formulation. We’ve specifically designed and optimized it for use in acoustic transducers. GrapheneQ is a composite material which is over 95% Graphene by weight. It is formed by depositing flakes of Graphene into thousands of layers that are bonded together with proprietary cross-linking agents. Rather than trying to form one, continuous layer of Graphene, GrapheneQ stacks flakes of Graphene together into a laminate material that preserves the benefits of Graphene while allowing the material to be formed into loudspeaker cones.

 

 

Laser scans were made with a Klippel test system at a 3rd party lab, Warkwyn, a subsidiary of the USA loudspeaker manufacturer MISCO. 

WARKWYN 2D LASER SCANS

 

 As loudspeaker cones move back and forth, transverse waves can also move through the membrane. Stiffer materials hold their shape better and prevent these transverse waves from coloring the sound.

WARKWYN 3D LASER SCANS

 

The polymer membrane is exhibiting speaker “Break-Up” where one part of the cone is moving forward (Blue) while another part of the cone is moving backward (Red). This causes distortion and cancellations at certain frequencies producing an irregular frequency response.

 

OPTIMIZED FOR SOUND ISOLATION AND ACOUSTICS

The closed back design and wooden ear cups provide excellent isolation from outside noise while offering optimized acoustic performance. These headphones are so comfortable, you’ll want to wear them all day long. The sealed, over-ear design is ergonomically shaped.

INNOVATIVE GESTURE CONTROLS

 

One Tap to Play/Pause; Double Tap to Answer a Call

 

Slide to Skip Tunes

 

Volume Up/Down

MATERIAL ELEGANCE

The lambskin leather we use for the headband and ear pads is extremely durable and offers a soft, breathable touch for long-term comfort. The headband’s interior is made out of premium fabric and features memory foam cushion inserts for ultimate comfort.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?

  • Ora GrapheneQ Headphones
  • 1.2m (3.9’) Audio cable with gold plated 3.5 mm (1/8”) connector and 6.3mm (1/4”) adapter
  • USB-C to USB-A cable for charging and updating 
  • Protective Carrying Case
  • Quickstart Guide
  • Warranty Information Card

 

ACADEMIC NETWORK

From conception, ORA has been collaborating with some of the brightest minds in academia. Our university network plays a central role in our day-to-day work. None of our materials science breakthroughs could have been achieved without the support of our university partners. BIG thank you to McGill University, Northwestern University and University of Michigan for your collaborative attitude and vision!

TANDEMLAUNCH

A startup foundry like no other, by focusing exclusively on turning inventions into companies in consumer electronics, TandemLaunch exposed ORA to extraordinary opportunities at even the earliest stages of its development. We’d like to extend our sincere appreciation and thanks to the partners and venture development teams at TandemLaunch who helped accelerate ORA at a break-neck pace while keeping our foundations strong - freeing us to focus on crafting our vision for consumer audio.

OTHER PARTNERS  

A BIG thank you to our family, friends and mentors who have helped make this campaign a reality. A special shout-out to I/O Studio (www.iostudio.ca), our talented video agency, Jordi Vilanova, our graphic designer, Alto Design (http://www.alto-design.com), our industrial designers, Proper Propaganda (www.properpropaganda.net), our PR professionals, and LaunchBoom (www.launchboom.com), our Pre-Launch Marketing Agency.

Formed from a single layer of carbon atoms, Graphene is a hexagonal crystal lattice in a perfect honeycomb structure. This fundamental geometry makes Graphene ridiculously strong and lightweight. It has been dubbed “the wonder material” because of its potential to change the world as we know it: from desalinating water, to curing spinal injuries, to making our computers 10,000x faster.MATERIALS SCIENCE FOR THE BEST AUDIOGraphene is considered the ‘holy grail’ for loudspeaker membranes, the part of the speaker that vibrates to produce sound. Because of its lightweight properties it can move quickly & easily and because of its incredible stiffness, it keeps its shape as it moves.    From award-winning professionals to everyday music lovers...  We let world-famous conductor, Gustavo Dudamel, Music Director of the Los Angeles Philharmonic and the Orquesta Sinfónica Simón Bolívar, experience Graphene Audio and he was thrilled by the headphones' quality and accuracy of the sound.A MESSAGE FROM GUSTAVO DUDAMELAs a conductor, it is my job to listen. Recently, I was approached by ORA Sound, a nanotechnology startup claiming to have achieved groundbreaking levels of sound quality thanks to a new ‘wonder material’ called graphene.I was immediately blown away by the level of detailed, crystal clear sound from their speakers. From Brahms to Latin American folk songs, I heard every musical detail with a level of clarity I’ve only ever experienced from the podium in front of an orchestra.I am a fan of ORA and believe their technology can allow everyone to hear their favorite music like they are the conductor!Good luck ORA.- Gustavo DudamelThe day Gustavo Dudamel experienced Graphene Audio for the first timeDUDAMEL FOUNDATION PARTNERSHIPORA is thrilled to announce a partnership with Gustavo Dudamel and his charity, The Dudamel Foundation. Together we will provide children of diverse backgrounds with access to quality listening experiences. The partnership is inspired by the belief that the art of listening is fundamental to peace, harmony and understanding in our world. LOUDSPEAKER HISTORYMany of the recent advancements in loudspeakers and headphones have focused on the addition of digital processing (DSP). While DSP is a powerful tool, it can only act as a Band-Aid to mask the inherent performance issues of this century-old technology. ORA, instead, applies its expertise in nanotechnology and materials science to fundamentally improve the core of the loudspeaker and provide a level of quality and efficiency not possible from other consumer technologies.UNCOMPROMISING SOUNDORA’s patented GrapheneQ material is acoustically optimized to produce the smoothest, most extended frequency response for a true-to-life listening experience that will make you forget you are listening to loudspeakers.
Eliminates distortion for the most accurate audio
Detailed highs, crystal clear mids, and robust bass
Increased audio clarity through nano-scale audio precision
Lifelike, high resolution listening experience
IT’S ALL ABOUT EFFICIENCYSpeakers are probably the least efficient technology that we still use in our day to day lives. Less than 1% of the electrical power that goes into a speaker is converted into sound power. Graphene’s lightweight and low density properties means that it requires a lot less energy to move the membrane and produce sound.ORA’s GrapheneQ enables far more energy-efficient loudspeakers. A TECHNICAL INTRODUCTION TO GRAPHENEGraphene is a new material, first isolated only 13 years ago. Formed from a single layer of carbon atoms, Graphene is a hexagonal crystal lattice in a perfect honeycomb structure. This fundamental geometry makes Graphene ridiculously strong and lightweight. In its pure form, Graphene is a single atomic layer of carbon. It can be very expensive and difficult to produce in sizes any bigger than small flakes. These challenges have prevented pristine Graphene from being integrated into consumer technologies.THE GRAPHENEQ™ SOLUTIONAt ORA, we’ve spent the last few years creating GrapheneQ, our own, proprietary Graphene-based nanocomposite formulation. We’ve specifically designed and optimized it for use in acoustic transducers. GrapheneQ is a composite material which is over 95% Graphene by weight. It is formed by depositing flakes of Graphene into thousands of layers that are bonded together with proprietary cross-linking agents. Rather than trying to form one, continuous layer of Graphene, GrapheneQ stacks flakes of Graphene together into a laminate material that preserves the benefits of Graphene while allowing the material to be formed into loudspeaker cones.Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) Comparison  Laser scans were made with a Klippel test system at a 3rd party lab, Warkwyn, a subsidiary of the USA loudspeaker manufacturer MISCO. WARKWYN 2D LASER SCANS Membrane motion in 2D cross-sections As loudspeaker cones move back and forth, transverse waves can also move through the membrane. Stiffer materials hold their shape better and prevent these transverse waves from coloring the sound.WARKWYN 3D LASER SCANS 3D membrane laser scansThe polymer membrane is exhibiting speaker “Break-Up” where one part of the cone is moving forward (Blue) while another part of the cone is moving backward (Red). This causes distortion and cancellations at certain frequencies producing an irregular frequency response. OPTIMIZED FOR SOUND ISOLATION AND ACOUSTICSThe closed back design and wooden ear cups provide excellent isolation from outside noise while offering optimized acoustic performance. These headphones are so comfortable, you’ll want to wear them all day long. The sealed, over-ear design is ergonomically shaped.INNOVATIVE GESTURE CONTROLSEven the slightest touch puts you in full control of ORA GQ Headphones. Use the unique touch interface on the aluminum disk to answer calls, change tunes, or adjust the volume. One Tap to Play/Pause; Double Tap to Answer a Call Slide to Skip Tunes Volume Up/DownMATERIAL ELEGANCEThe lambskin leather we use for the headband and ear pads is extremely durable and offers a soft, breathable touch for long-term comfort. The headband’s interior is made out of premium fabric and features memory foam cushion inserts for ultimate comfort.       WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
Ora GrapheneQ Headphones
1.2m (3.9’) Audio cable with gold plated 3.5 mm (1/8”) connector and 6.3mm (1/4”) adapter
USB-C to USB-A cable for charging and updating 
Protective Carrying Case
Quickstart Guide
Warranty Information Card
 ACADEMIC NETWORKFrom conception, ORA has been collaborating with some of the brightest minds in academia. Our university network plays a central role in our day-to-day work. None of our materials science breakthroughs could have been achieved without the support of our university partners. BIG thank you to McGill University, Northwestern University and University of Michigan for your collaborative attitude and vision!TANDEMLAUNCHA startup foundry like no other, by focusing exclusively on turning inventions into companies in consumer electronics, TandemLaunch exposed ORA to extraordinary opportunities at even the earliest stages of its development. We’d like to extend our sincere appreciation and thanks to the partners and venture development teams at TandemLaunch who helped accelerate ORA at a break-neck pace while keeping our foundations strong - freeing us to focus on crafting our vision for consumer audio.OTHER PARTNERS  A BIG thank you to our family, friends and mentors who have helped make this campaign a reality. A special shout-out to I/O Studio (www.iostudio.ca), our talented video agency, Jordi Vilanova, our graphic designer, Alto Design (http://www.alto-design.com), our industrial designers, Proper Propaganda (www.properpropaganda.net), our PR professionals, and LaunchBoom (www.launchboom.com), our Pre-Launch Marketing Agency.   This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct¬ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.

story:
Enjoy Electronics is proud to introduce RemindeЯ

The most powerful and creative all-in-one effects unit

lts sophisticated retro-futuristic soul and its powerful processor is a completely revolutionary point of view on the classic effects like Echo Space, Delay, Filters and Reverbs, implementing the sounds results with other innovative unique effects such as DOUBLE PULSE DELAY , with superlative sound quality

IDEA

Like many of music electronic addicts, we spent a good part of our life in our studio, surrounded by machines, synths, drum machines, controllers, effects and various softwares. You can own them or desire them all but you will always need to looking for that particular thing that will give harmony and character to your setup.

In our case, we searched in vain for a hardware multi-effect with immediate access to all the parameters, beautiful, comfortable and intuitive, to be used in live performance but able to stimulate extremely creative results even in the studio.

Having found nothing on the market that matched what we were looking for, we decided to develop it as I have been an electronics designer for over 10 years.

During the months of development, new functions born and many of them are not reproducible with any configuration or other tools on the market already.

The encounter with key persons of music electronic world, their love at first sight with RemindeЯ projected us into the idea of ​​making it available to all those who, like us, want to explore innovative rhythmic and harmonic results.  

Enjoy team finally exhibited the prototype at the SUPERBOOTH in Berlin

The amazement in the eyes of those who tried it was the demonstration that RemindeЯ is a unique product that should be available all over the world.

 

FEATURES

- Comprehensive, all-in one solution far intricate rhythms Echo space and width

- Direct and immediate access to all parameters with dedicated knobs

- True-stereo indipendent delay allowing you to create complex rhythmic patterns  

- Reverbs with Size and Resonance HiPass filter - knobs

- Double Pulse Delay

- Double Resonant filter that can be morphed from low pass to high pass 

- 4 Waveform Sync-able LFO

- A full, four-channel (quadraphonic) system reproducing the Left  Front, Left Back, Right Front, and Right Back audio signals in each of four separate speaker

- Mixer stage for DRY, WET and DPD

- Assignable Foot Switch

- Tap Tempo

- Intuitive OLED Display

- USB or 5-pin MIDI interface IN, OUT and THRU

- Supreme Audio Quality - 24 bit -96Khz Audio Converter

- Powered by USB 

SMART DESIGN

Behind Remider's smart and elegant design, it hides the essence of the meticulous study on the position of each individual knob and on the relationship between the functions assigned to them. The contact with Reminder will be remarkably surprising, and, since the first touch, you will see the simplicity of access to the desired function even when your gaze is turned to your synth in the studio, to the rest of your live set up  or to the dance floor. The design is so incredibly intuitive that you easily reach what you need at any time and place making the perfomers bring out all their creativity.

We at Enjoy Electronics come from the same world, we are Djs, Live performers, sound designers and it is exactly for this reason that we have succeeded in creating a device that is unique in its kind, intuitive and stimulating.

FILTER BANK

 

POWER DELAY

 

REVERB

 

LFO

MIXER

 

CONNECTIVITY 

On the back panel of Reminder you will have a multitude of connections that will allow you to communicate in input and output with all the most common instruments present in the studio or live setup

- 2 unbalanced Line In 1/4 Jack for audio signal 

- 4 unbalanced Line OUT  1/4 Jack Output with line level audio (a full quadraphonic four channels system) 

Midi IN, OUT e THRU -

USB

2 Foot Switch 1/4 Jack

SOUND

 

LIMITLESS CREATIVITY

REmindEЯ transforms every sound into an incredible and exciting groove. 

QUADRAPHONIC

REmindEЯ is equipped with 4 output channels. in order to take advantage of all the quadraphonic possibilities, you can assign different effects to different output channels. In the image below, we assigned the Double Pulse delay to channels 3 and 4.

The quadraphonic experience generated by REmindEЯ is so incredibly stimulating that it could soon become a standard for events. 

OLED DISPLAY

The OLED display is actually very functional. Thanks to its complete interface, it shows through the movement of minimal geometries , studied and designed to supply at every glance, an immediate confirmation of the current set up of the unit and its functioning status  

 

VIPs WORDS

Ali Dubfilre is a techno DJ and producer. Prior to his solo career, Dubfire made up half of the four times nominated and Grammy Award-winning duo, Deep Dish

 

Martin Buttrich is famous as fluent behind a mixing console as he is in front of a virtual drum kit.

 

PRESS REVIEW

 

TIMELINE

 

 

SPECS

Input Type:  1/4” Unbalanced TS

Input Impedance:  13,9KOhm

Max Input Level:  2.0 VRMS (+6dBu)

Output Type:  1/4” Unbalanced TS

Output Impedance:  336Ω

Latency (Audio in to Audio out) : 1,2 ms

Max Output Level:  2.5Vpp

Bit Depth : 24 bit 

MIDI support:  CC

Presets:  User presets

Display:  OLED

Connectors:

- 2 Line In 1/4 Jack for audio signal 

- 4 Line OUT  1/4 Jack Output with line level audio (a full quadraphonic four channels system) 

Midi IN, OUT e THRU -

USB

2 Foot Switch 1/4 Jack

 

Dimensions:

Width 18.1 IN / 46 CM
Depth 6.2 IN / 15,8 CM
Height 2.2 IN / 5.6 CM
Height with knobs 2.67 IN / 6.8 CM
Weight: 6.61 LBS / 3 KG

ASSEMBLY

We at Enjoy Electronics care a lot about the quality of our products. To guarantee the highest reliability, electronic components are assembled with latest generation technology to have an absolute precision, repeatability in serie and reach the highest quality standards.  

 

WHY SUPPORT THIS PROJECT?

The contribution from Indiegogo campaign will help us to arrange a massive production and reduce the costs that are related to a small batch, so to introduce RemindER at a more reasonable price and put it immediately into musicians live setup and studio's.
 

SHIPPING AND PAYMENT

REmindEЯ is in production phase just right now, so we will provide in any case to ship all units preordered during the campaign!

We expect to ship the very first REmindEЯ units in December, just in time for your own Christmas Gift. This will be known after we place the parts orders, but the mentioned deadlines are pretty realistic.

The Power Supply Unit is not included with the REmindEЯ, but any reasonably standard 2Amp USB  power supply will do well! We do not offer it because we cannot keep stock of all the different power outlets across the globe.

We ship worldwide with courier tracking like UPS or FedEx and other, with average 2 - 5 Business Day signed delivery. We will ship the REmindEЯ from Italy.  The shipping cost are not included. If you live outside the EU, additional duties, taxes and fees may be applied by your country’s customs, for which ENJOY LAB is not responsible for.If you are unsure of the regulations for your country, please check with the relevant public authority. We write the following customs commodity code on our devices shipments: 85437090.

To know the shipping cost, you can select the area where are you located among the ones in the campaign page. If it is not present, please write to us at info@enjoy-lab.com and we will provide to give you the best shipping cost till your address. 

If you are not 100% satisfied with your order, we will be happy to arrange a return for any unused and unmodified items purchased within 14 days. ENJOY LAB will accept goods that are in good condition, without any external and internal damage or modification, along with the full set of accessories and documentation.The refund amount does not include shipping cost. The customer covers the shipping back to ENJOY LAB. A copy of the original invoice or receipt must be supplied along with the item. The refund is transferred once we have received and inspected the returned item.

The warranty is one year or longer if required by the relevant legislation.

Special Thanks

There are a lot of people who helped RemindeЯ  get to this point. Here are just a few family and friends - without their encouragement this project would not be happening.

To name a few: Luigi, Rosa, Grazia, Amato, Giuseppe M, Giuseppe R, Alessandro, Gerardo, Titti, Carmine,Niko,ADF, Luigi e Alessandro, 

Enrico Cosimi, Francesco Borsotti, Andrea Pozzi, Valeria Vito, Giancarlo Lanza, Chris Calcutt, Ida Mandato, Michele Tabucchi, Alessandro Asso Stefana,  …and many more!

story:
The Gigaboom is our Staff Picked favorite speaker. It's  comes in two color ways, raw or gunmetal. Staff picked because:

1) THE BUILD IS BEEFY - it's constructed with a double-shot injected FULL TPU from body to core. Most speakers use over or single shot molding processes that aren't nearly as strong/thick. This process allows us the insane 4k lbs. crushproof rating. 

Since we use TPU, the speaker also absorbs shocks better than most speakers, which are generally made from abs plastics. ABS plastics are weaker and more brittle than TPU, but are used because...well...they're about half the price to use. TPU has insanely high shear and elastic strange, making it great in impact situations - for us, from 100ft. to the dirt, or from 30ft onto concrete, guaranteed. 

2) THE SOUND IS SUMPTUOUS - this is the speaker which caused one blind tester to say it had, "depth and clarity that gave [them] chills." We cannot summarize it better. Of all its totable competitors, this 86db, 50w speaker takes the cake. It quite simply has a fuller sound, and better bass. The 6 massive drivers and 2 T.I. amplifiers just do their job. As one of our team members said, "Think B*se, but bulletproof." 

DURABILITY / UTILITY

Body - Double Injected TPU Body w/ Metal Jacket 

IP67 - Waterproof for 30 min up to 3m (+ Dustproof) 

30+ ft - Standard In-House RoamProof drop test requirement 

4,000+ lbs - Standard In-House RoamProof load bear requirement 

Torch - 5 Lumen 3 in 1 SOS Signal Light 

5 -Year RoamProof Warranty

SOUND

Power - 2x 25W Ti Amplifiers ( 50W Total Output )

Drivers - Two 2.75” Subwoofers + Two 1” Tweeters; One 5" Passive Deep Bass Radiator.

TWS (TrueWireless) - Pair any 2 RoamProof speakers together for true stereo surround sound.

Bluetooth - CSR64210 4.0 Version 100 ft Range (Optional Aux-In)

Mic - Built-In, High Sensitivity w/ .CVC Echo Processing

Blind Test - participants preferred Gigaboom over Bea*s,  L* * ePro * f  and  J * Lcomparable speakers in full blind test.

BATTERY

Battery - 16000mah High-Stability Lithium Battery

Playtime - 20 Hours

Triple Charge Technology - 1) Solar @ 300mah (35-40 hours) 2) Micro USB @ 5v 2.1A (7.5 hours) 3) DC in @ 15v 4A (3 hours)

Built-in Powerbank - 2.1A USB-a Fast Charging Output + USB-c Output

OTHER

Dimensions - L 293 * W 162 * H 140mm ( 11.6 x 6.4 x 5.5 in ) 

Weight - 4.8 lbs

Colors - Raw (aluminum) or Gunmental

Mounting - Universal 1/4" Screw Mount

Accessories - Ships in aluminum Camp Chest, w/ 2 Signature RoamProof Kevlar Charging Cables, 1 Aux Cable, 1 Dc in Charger, 1 Universal Clamp for 1/4" screw mount, 1 Action Cam Mount, and 1 accessory tin. 

The Macro.II is the Packable alternative to the Gigaboom. 

Familiar with our smaller, Macroboom speaker? It's 2x as powerful, and is a big step up in bass. This is a perfect "step-up" speaker that sounds great on its own, and CRUSHES in surround mode when paired with another RoamProof speaker. Easily Packed/Carried.

SOUND

Power - 2x 15W Ti Amplifiers ( 30W Total Output ) 

Drivers - Two 2” Full Range Drivers; Two Passive Deep Bass Radiators. 

 TWS (TrueWireless) - Pair any 2 RoamProof speakers together for true stereo surround sound. 

Bluetooth - CSR64210 4.0 Version 100 ft Range (Optional Aux-In) 

Mic - Built-In, High Sensitivity w/ .CVC Echo Processing 

Blind Test - participants preferred Gigaboom over B*se, Bea*s, L* * ePro * f and J * Lcomparable speakers in full blind test.

DURABILITY / UTILITY

Body - Double Injected TPU Body w/ Metal Jacket 

IP67 - Waterproof for 30 min up to 3m (+ Dustproof) 

30+ ft - Standard In-House RoamProof drop test requirement 

4,000+ lbs - Standard In-House RoamProof load bear requirement 

Torch - 200 Lumen 3 in 1 SOS Signal Light

2 Yr. RoamPoof Warranty

BATTERY

Battery - 8800mah High-Stability Lithium Battery 

Playtime - 15 Hours 

Triple Charge Technology - 1) Solar @ 250mah (35-40 hours) 2) Micro USB @ 5v 2.1A (5 hours) 3) DC in @ 12v 2.7A (3.5 hours) 

Built-in Powerbank - 2.1A USB-a Fast Charging Output + USB-c Output

OTHER

Dimensions - L 233 * W 161 * H 89 mm ( 9.2 x 6.4 x 3.5 in ) 

Weight - 2.4 lbs 

Mounting - Universal 1/4" Screw Mount 

Colors - Raw (Aluminum) or Black

Accessories - Ships in Aluminum Alloy Coal Carry, w/ 2 Signature RoamProof Kevlar Charging Cables, 1 Aux Cable, 1 Dc in Charger, 1 Universal Clamp for 1/4" screw mount, 1 Action Cam Mount,   Aluminum carabiner. 

When we first started developing the Macro.II and Gigaboom, we decided we would have uncompromising standards for quality of parts and construction...

...then it was suggested we make our packaging out of cardboard. So we did the opposite, and made the packaging rugged adventuring products of their own. 

Gigaboom - RoamProof's "Camp Chest"

This aluminum campers chest is as versatile as it is sturdy.

Latches closed on two sides, w/ built in top-side handle on the fully detachable lid. 

Design inspired by old Aluminum coolers popular in the 1950's & 60's. 

Can function as a small cooler or rugged tote for camping/fire/climbing/boating supplies.

Size: L 15 x W 10 x H 10in

Macro.II - RoamProof's "Coal Carry"

 Made from Aluminum Alloy, the coal carry is an outdoorsman's perfect "go-bag."

 Simply twist to open/close using built in top-side handle on the fully detachable lid. 

Design inspired by old Aluminum lunch pails popular with coal miners years ago. 

Can function as a small cooler/picnic vessel, or rugged tote for camping/fire/climbing/first aid supplies. 

Size: Diam. 7 x H 11.5 in w/ handle

RoamProof Customer Reviews

The following are reviews from real backers/customers of our first speaker on the market, the MacroBoom. The MacroBoom is our entry level speaker, the "younger brother" of the Macro.II, and the "child" of the GigaBoom. 

"I found RoamProof browsing through Kickstarter and backed their unit MacroBoom. After months of waiting my unit arrived and I was thrilled with its performance. Unfortunately an issue arose with the speaker and it stopped working. I contacted RoamProof, provided proof and they promptly arranged a replacement, which has been roaming with me for ages. The quality of the unit is great and so is their service. Good stuff guys, I'm happy to support such a stellar company."

-C Williams (MacroBoom Backer)

"This really is an awesome piece of equipment! And it definitely is equipment. Heavy duty as all get out! The mounting attachments you get really open up the possibilities of where you can conveniently take this thing. I listen to it in my truck because it sounds better than my old worn out sound system. I put it on my dirtbike and essentially drag this thing through the mud. Hang it up in the shower. Doesn't skip a beat."

-R. H. K (MacroBoom Amazon Customer)

"This is an amazing piece of audio technology, and it's virtually indestructible. I take it everywhere - beach, pool, hiking, biking. I even take it in the shower! I have been wanting a waterproof Bluetooth speaker for years and am so glad that I waited to purchase one because the MacroBoom IP67 has more features and functions than I could have imagined. But the best part of what this unit has to offer is the crystal clear, rich and deep soundscape and the long battery life. I would recommend the MacroBoom to anyone who is wanting a portable, rugged speaker with audiophile sound quality. This is truly a top shelf product!"

- D. Cobb (MacroBoom Amazon Customer

TIMELINE

August - Campaign Launches

September - Campaign Closes

October - Tooling Begins (for product & packaging)

November - Tooling completed, Production Begins

December - Production Complete, product ships to our Warehouse

January - Product Ships to Backers!

T E A M

MATT, SEAN, HANK, HEIDI, "ROB", JUSTIN & MIKE

(insert team graphic)

Risks and challenges

RoamProof has been established and running for 2+ years. We've successfully run 3 crowdfunding campaigns, and continue to sell product daily through our website, Amazon, and other online retailers. We have a function system of customer service, and a small team that manages each piece of the manufacturing process. We have fully functioning samples and are poised for full production.

As with any Kickstarter, our primary/only risk is timing. We have established a history with backers and customers who trust us to deliver product. We will ALWAYS prioritize quality over timelines - However, we feel our predictions for delivery are conservative, and can be easily met. Feel free to find out more about us in the team section, or at RoamProof.com
story_txt:
The Gigaboom is our Staff Picked favorite speaker. It's  comes in two color ways, raw or gunmetal. Staff picked because:
1) THE BUILD IS BEEFY - it's constructed with a double-shot injected FULL TPU from body to core. Most speakers use over or single shot molding processes that aren't nearly as strong/thick. This process allows us the insane 4k lbs. crushproof rating. 
Since we use TPU, the speaker also absorbs shocks better than most speakers, which are generally made from abs plastics. ABS plastics are weaker and more brittle than TPU, but are used because...well...they're about half the price to use. TPU has insanely high shear and elastic strange, making it great in impact situations - for us, from 100ft. to the dirt, or from 30ft onto concrete, guaranteed. 
2) THE SOUND IS SUMPTUOUS - this is the speaker which caused one blind tester to say it had, "depth and clarity that gave [them] chills." We cannot summarize it better. Of all its totable competitors, this 86db, 50w speaker takes the cake. It quite simply has a fuller sound, and better bass. The 6 massive drivers and 2 T.I. amplifiers just do their job. As one of our team members said, "Think B*se, but bulletproof." 


DURABILITY / UTILITY
Body - Double Injected TPU Body w/ Metal Jacket 
IP67 - Waterproof for 30 min up to 3m (+ Dustproof) 
30+ ft - Standard In-House RoamProof drop test requirement 
4,000+ lbs - Standard In-House RoamProof load bear requirement 
Torch - 5 Lumen 3 in 1 SOS Signal Light 
5 -Year RoamProof Warranty
SOUND
Power - 2x 25W Ti Amplifiers ( 50W Total Output )
Drivers - Two 2.75” Subwoofers + Two 1” Tweeters; One 5" Passive Deep Bass Radiator.
TWS (TrueWireless) - Pair any 2 RoamProof speakers together for true stereo surround sound.
Bluetooth - CSR64210 4.0 Version 100 ft Range (Optional Aux-In)
Mic - Built-In, High Sensitivity w/ .CVC Echo Processing
Blind Test - participants preferred Gigaboom over Bea*s,  L* * ePro * f  and  J * Lcomparable speakers in full blind test.

BATTERY
Battery - 16000mah High-Stability Lithium Battery
Playtime - 20 Hours
Triple Charge Technology - 1) Solar @ 300mah (35-40 hours) 2) Micro USB @ 5v 2.1A (7.5 hours) 3) DC in @ 15v 4A (3 hours)
Built-in Powerbank - 2.1A USB-a Fast Charging Output + USB-c Output
OTHER
Dimensions - L 293 * W 162 * H 140mm ( 11.6 x 6.4 x 5.5 in ) 
Weight - 4.8 lbs
Colors - Raw (aluminum) or Gunmental
Mounting - Universal 1/4" Screw Mount
Accessories - Ships in aluminum Camp Chest, w/ 2 Signature RoamProof Kevlar Charging Cables, 1 Aux Cable, 1 Dc in Charger, 1 Universal Clamp for 1/4" screw mount, 1 Action Cam Mount, and 1 accessory tin. 



The Macro.II is the Packable alternative to the Gigaboom. 
Familiar with our smaller, Macroboom speaker? It's 2x as powerful, and is a big step up in bass. This is a perfect "step-up" speaker that sounds great on its own, and CRUSHES in surround mode when paired with another RoamProof speaker. Easily Packed/Carried.

SOUND
Power - 2x 15W Ti Amplifiers ( 30W Total Output ) 
Drivers - Two 2” Full Range Drivers; Two Passive Deep Bass Radiators. 
 TWS (TrueWireless) - Pair any 2 RoamProof speakers together for true stereo surround sound. 
Bluetooth - CSR64210 4.0 Version 100 ft Range (Optional Aux-In) 
Mic - Built-In, High Sensitivity w/ .CVC Echo Processing 
Blind Test - participants preferred Gigaboom over B*se, Bea*s, L* * ePro * f and J * Lcomparable speakers in full blind test.
DURABILITY / UTILITY

Body - Double Injected TPU Body w/ Metal Jacket 
IP67 - Waterproof for 30 min up to 3m (+ Dustproof) 
30+ ft - Standard In-House RoamProof drop test requirement 
4,000+ lbs - Standard In-House RoamProof load bear requirement 
Torch - 200 Lumen 3 in 1 SOS Signal Light
2 Yr. RoamPoof Warranty

BATTERY
Battery - 8800mah High-Stability Lithium Battery 
Playtime - 15 Hours 
Triple Charge Technology - 1) Solar @ 250mah (35-40 hours) 2) Micro USB @ 5v 2.1A (5 hours) 3) DC in @ 12v 2.7A (3.5 hours) 
Built-in Powerbank - 2.1A USB-a Fast Charging Output + USB-c Output
OTHER
Dimensions - L 233 * W 161 * H 89 mm ( 9.2 x 6.4 x 3.5 in ) 
Weight - 2.4 lbs 
Mounting - Universal 1/4" Screw Mount 
Colors - Raw (Aluminum) or Black
Accessories - Ships in Aluminum Alloy Coal Carry, w/ 2 Signature RoamProof Kevlar Charging Cables, 1 Aux Cable, 1 Dc in Charger, 1 Universal Clamp for 1/4" screw mount, 1 Action Cam Mount,   Aluminum carabiner. 



When we first started developing the Macro.II and Gigaboom, we decided we would have uncompromising standards for quality of parts and construction...
...then it was suggested we make our packaging out of cardboard. So we did the opposite, and made the packaging rugged adventuring products of their own. 
Gigaboom - RoamProof's "Camp Chest"

This aluminum campers chest is as versatile as it is sturdy.
Latches closed on two sides, w/ built in top-side handle on the fully detachable lid. 
Design inspired by old Aluminum coolers popular in the 1950's & 60's. 
Can function as a small cooler or rugged tote for camping/fire/climbing/boating supplies.
Size: L 15 x W 10 x H 10in
Macro.II - RoamProof's "Coal Carry"

 Made from Aluminum Alloy, the coal carry is an outdoorsman's perfect "go-bag."
 Simply twist to open/close using built in top-side handle on the fully detachable lid. 
Design inspired by old Aluminum lunch pails popular with coal miners years ago. 
Can function as a small cooler/picnic vessel, or rugged tote for camping/fire/climbing/first aid supplies. 
Size: Diam. 7 x H 11.5 in w/ handle

I have been wanting a waterproof Bluetooth speaker for years and am so glad that I waited to purchase one because the MacroBoom IP67 has more features and functions than I could have imagined. But the best part of what this unit has to offer is the crystal clear, rich and deep soundscape and the long battery life. I would recommend the MacroBoom to anyone who is wanting a portable, rugged speaker with audiophile sound quality. This is truly a top shelf product!"

story:
You head into the wild in order to connect more deeply with nature and enjoy the world for all its beauty and all its splendor. That does not mean, however, that you need to eschew all the pleasures of your modern life. You can have both! Yes, it is entirely possible and entirely reasonable to incorporate the magic of music and entertainment into your outdoor excursions. With SolarBox Mini, the most rugged outdoor mini speaker, it is easier to do so than ever before.

 

 

 

 

Built with original high power monocrystalline silicon solar panels, a new generation of solar charging technology, Solarbox mini can play music continuously for 30 minutes after 30 minutes of solar charging in clear sunlight.

The SolarBox Mini can also be charged by using the usb. When it is filled with a 2000mAh battery, it supports more than 20 hours of battery life. Indoor or outdoor, SolarBox Mini is the speaker that you need for your thrill-fraught life!

 

 

 

 

Designed for travelers and wanderers especially, SolarBox Mini is constructed for durability too. There are three layers of solid rubber and silica gel protecting SolarBox Mini, which is capable of absorbing and dispersing the sort of impact shock that will just obliterate most other speakers. When you fall or when you take a tumble, you can be confident that SolarBox Mini will survive!

 

Out in the rain or anywhere else that water may become an issue, SolarBox Mini thrives. Because of theIPX6 waterproof rating, this is a speaker that you can bring with you into damp areas. Camping, rafting, fishing on a river, or lounging around the pool, SolarBox Mini can withstand water jets from any and all directions. The inner body is always protected from water!

We took a product sample outside to Pasadena, USA and introduced the SolarBox Mini to people. We also collected some feedbacks and reviews of the SolarBox Mini and made a short video. Here is the video:

 

 

Another benefit of the rubber mesh that surrounds SolarBox Mini is that it is resistant to dust. On hiking trails or around campgrounds, the particles that cover your boots and pants will never be sufficiently intrusive to destroy your speaker! You can keep rocking out, forgetting about the possibility of dust becoming a problem.

Test Video

 

 

In extreme temperatures, SolarBox Mini – you guessed it – is a real survivor. This speaker can withstand temperatures from -68ºF (-20ºC) or 113℉ (45 ºC), so whether you are in the middle of a blizzard or heading out into the desert, you can carry it with you.

 

 

 

 

Small and lightweight, SolarBox Mini measures just 101 mm * 101 mm * 47 mm, making it extremely portable. Its weight clocks in at just 226 g, so you can slip it into your bag and forget that it is even there until you need to use it.

 

 

You may think that such a slim piece of technology would fall short in terms of sound, but nothing could be further from the truth: SolarBox Mini offers outstanding sound effects, with a 55mm speaker and an audio signal to noise ratio >=75db, proving you luxury audio enjoyment. Wake up your ears when you are playing music.

 

The SolarBox Mini is amazingly powerful and cool for a speaker of this size. The frequency it projects at is between 100 Hz and 18,000 Hz, and with a sound distortion rate low than 0.1%, this is a speaker that audio lovers will be impressed with, true high-definition!

 

 

 

Incorporating a Bluetooth 4.2 connection, you can ensure both your privacy and your speed, opening up IP connectivity to devices that support it so that sensors and other smart devices are able to connect directly to the internet. Using less power and enabling data transfers up to 2.5x faster than earlier versions, Bluetooth 4.2 is cutting-edge technology that will satisfy all your connection needs. Once the Bluetooth is connected, the speaker can even take phone calls, reading out the phone number to you and giving you the option to answer by pushing the play / pause button and hang up by pushing the play / pause button a second time.

 

For those who prefer to connect music players with an AUX cable, that is also an option when you are using SolarBox Mini. We have set out to create many options here, limiting our users in no way! There are even multiple ways to carry SolarBox Mini around with you.

 

Listening music and answering a phone call

 

 

Bike Mount

You could purchase a bike mount and link the bike mount to SolarBox Mini’s bracket fixing nut so that you can enjoy your music on your next ride.

 

Velcro strap

By simply using a velcro strap, you can easily attach SolarBox Mini to your arm, kettle, motorcycle, tent, or even a tree brunch.

 

Carabiner

SolarBox Mini can be tied with our specific carabiner, and then the carabiner is fixed in other locations, such as backpacks, etc. It is very convenient for your outdoor activity. You can carry it anywhere and enjoy the music while you are climbing or camping.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

Our team is focused on the R&D of Bluetooth speaker, digital camera, portable battery, and other digital products. Our products is sold in China, Southeast Asia, Europe, and America. After we created SolarBox, the portable solar powered wireless Bluetooth speaker for outdoors last year, with mainstream CSR Bluetooth module, imported audio power amplifier, and Hifi speaker to benefit people and let them enjoy high quality music.  We received a great marketing reaction and good reputation from users. Therefore, we decided to develop SolarBox Mini bring our customer a brand new user experince.

Furthermore, we are willing to be the earliest supporters and participants of the creative products. We hope to gather a group of friends who are just like us, so that together we can seek for the latest technology products, share the product experience, provide suggestions for the products before mass production, and help the products to become reality.

 

We've 781% funded and raised $101,180 in funds and gained support from 1400+ backers for SolarBox! And it is on Indiegogo’s marketplace now. Check it here: 

After the success of SolarBox, we prepared for more than a half year for a second generation. Now we are excited to introduce a mini version of Solarbox but more rugged!

 

 

 

1.What is the dimension of the SolarBox Mini, and is it more portable than SolarBox?

The dimension is:  101mm * 101mm *47mm  with the weight of 226g. It is mini version of functionally upgraded SolarBox.

2. How to connect my device to the SolarBox with my device?

Long press the power switch and turn the power on. The red and blue Bluetooth indicator will flash alternatively; Search the Bluetooth signal of nearby devices through your device and select “Solar Box”. Once the devices are connected, the blue indicator will keep lightening. The indicator will keep blinking when any data is under transferring.

3. Are there any safety tips when using the SolarBox?

Please use charge the SolarBox with DC 5V/1A output; Avoid any chemical liquid; Avoid heating source with high temperature.

4. How to adjust volume?

Long press the song/volume+ button to increase the volume; Long press the song/volume- button to decrease the volume.

3. How to switch songs?

Short press the song/volume+ button to switch to the next song; Short press the song/volume- to switch to the previous song.

5. Are there any safety tips when using the SolarBox?

Please use charge the SolarBox with DC 5V/1A output; Avoid any chemical liquid; Avoid heating source with high temperature.

6. How to answer and dial out phone calls?

When the SolarBox is connected to your smartphone, short press the “answer/play/pause” button to answer the phone call. Short press again to hang up the call. Long press the “answer/play/pause” button to dial out the last call.

7. What is the refund policy for SolarBox Mini? 

You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign.

8. What is the return and exchange policy for SolarBox Mini? 

Please note all sales are final.Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. 

9.  How can we contact you by email for customer service? 

Please feel free to contact us through email when you have any questions concerning hisolarbox@gmail.com

story:
TRULY WEARABLE

 

 

 In-Ear/Bone-Conduction

Hybrid Earphones

Flex Wave is designed to be used in two types which are Bone conduction and In-Ear type Unlike other bone conduction products, the unique clip-on bone conduction products are very comfortable and fit well with eyewear. The In-Ear type earphones offer powerful noise isolation and high quality music.

 

 

2 Types Available, MMCX Detachable, Long Lasting Battery,  Bluetooth 5.0, CD Rate HI-FI Codec, Application

 

 

 

“It is original and innovative product.”

I have never seen this type of bone conduction earphone. Wave is good to be able to wear the product without removing the glasses. What I like better than this is the sound quality of Wave. Compared with other bone conduction headphones, it provides you clear sound and also sound quality of in-ear is excellent.

Pre-user : Alex (engineer, 37)

 

 

Just fit on your own style.

 Conventional bone conduction earphones could not be worn with EYEWEAR, but WAVE is a clip-type structure that perfectly matches all EYEWEAR.

Match Every Eyewear!

 

 

Don’t need to change lens.

Don’t need to wear not your style anymore.

 

 

 

 

 

There are many situations that need silence or ambient noise. In-Ear headphones are good for noise isolation, and Bone-Conduction headphones are good for hearing ambient noise. It is difficult to take both features by one product.

 

I bet you have had an experience of agonizing over this. BUT, NOT NOW. IN-EAR? BONE-CONDUCTION? You have no need to worry about this. YOU CAN TAKE BOTH OF THEM.

 

 

 

The sound quality of our headphones was recognized since CES 2015.  We operated sound quality test many times for comparison with high-end headphones over 1,000USD.

 


The result was always same. “MobiFren’s overwhelming victory” That’s all.

IT’S SOUND, MobiFren

 Provides a CD-quality premium sound with aptX, AAC & MSTS tuning technology,

which has been developed over 10 years.

 

 

 

Create sound waves that are transmitted through the cranial bones which bypass your eardrums to reach the inner ears.

 

Bone conduction is safe on your ears. Gives you clear sound in the presence of ambient noise.

That is, you can hear and respond to any situations.

 

 

 

step 1

After confirmation of the position (left/right), Bone conduction earphone installed on the body of MMCX socket.

step 2

Wearing the main body connected to the bone conduction earphone.

step 3

Bone conduction earphone attached to glasses(goggles) or band.

step 4

ear after installation(Glasses or Band) as shown in the picture. Note: The M logo position in the same location as the picture is most effective.

 

 

 MobiFren SM provides parametric equalizer to change its DSP settings. It means, "you can change its original sound". If you tune its sound once, you can hear your original sound with any other devices. 

 

 

(Music modes and sound effects are only available on In-ear Mode)

 

 

 

TTS

It reads you when there’s a new message like as SMS or SNS via earphone. You can hear message, number and caller name while driving, even though you do not check your mobile. (SMS/WhatsApp/KakaoTalk/Line)

 

HOT CALL

 After storing the most frequently dialed number, press ‘+’ button on the earphone twice quickly to start the call.

 

LAST CALL (Recent call redialing)

Press a briefly twice the ‘-‘ button on the earphone. (iOS is not supported)

 

Voice Memo

 Press and hold the multi-function button for about 1 second during a call to record the call

 

 

 

 

If your mobile phone is out of ranges from the earphone, the earphone alarms you for 1 minute to prevent phone loss. If you wanna stop alarm tone, press any button on remote control.

 

 

 

 The lastest Bluetooth Ver. 5.0 provides double bandwidth more than Bluetooth Ver. 4.2 with low energy. Its use distance is four times wider than Bluetooth Ver. 4.2

 

 

 Flex Wave is equipped with a large capacity battery and can be used for a long time with one charge.

 

When camera app is running, press volume button to shoot.

 

 

 

  Flex Wave provides a sweatproof function. Flex Wave promises a performance that does not change even the intense exercise by completely blocking sweat penetration inside the product.

 

 

Flex Wave always promise perfect fit to you. Just Clip & Go!

 

 

1.    Headband

2.    Bluetooth Neckband

3.    Bone Conduction Earphone Unit

4.    In Ear Earphone Unit

5.    Eartips

6.    Charging Cable (Micro USB)

7.    Carrying Case

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 MobiFren has strived to develop and manufacture Bluetooth earphones for more than 10 years. We always challenge for the Best and have produced the best products. We wish to approach you in happiness with good products and promise you to our best with honesty and sincerity to make beautiful community.

 

 

 

 

 

 If you have any problems after you receive the product, feel free to contact us via the customer service email  (overseas@mobifren.com)
story_txt:
TRULY WEARABLE   In-Ear/Bone-ConductionHybrid EarphonesFlex Wave is designed to be used in two types which are Bone conduction and In-Ear type Unlike other bone conduction products, the unique clip-on bone conduction products are very comfortable and fit well with eyewear. The In-Ear type earphones offer powerful noise isolation and high quality music.  
2 Types Available, MMCX Detachable, Long Lasting Battery,  Bluetooth 5.0, CD Rate HI-FI Codec, Application   “It is original and innovative product.”I have never seen this type of bone conduction earphone. Wave is good to be able to wear the product without removing the glasses. What I like better than this is the sound quality of Wave. Compared with other bone conduction headphones, it provides you clear sound and also sound quality of in-ear is excellent.Pre-user : Alex (engineer, 37)  Just fit on your own style. Conventional bone conduction earphones could not be worn with EYEWEAR, but WAVE is a clip-type structure that perfectly matches all EYEWEAR.Match Every Eyewear!  Don’t need to change lens.Don’t need to wear not your style anymore.     There are many situations that need silence or ambient noise. In-Ear headphones are good for noise isolation, and Bone-Conduction headphones are good for hearing ambient noise. It is difficult to take both features by one product. I bet you have had an experience of agonizing over this. BUT, NOT NOW. IN-EAR? BONE-CONDUCTION? You have no need to worry about this. YOU CAN TAKE BOTH OF THEM.   The sound quality of our headphones was recognized since CES 2015.  We operated sound quality test many times for comparison with high-end headphones over 1,000USD. The result was always same. “MobiFren’s overwhelming victory” That’s all.IT’S SOUND, MobiFren Provides a CD-quality premium sound with aptX, AAC & MSTS tuning technology,which has been developed over 10 years.    Create sound waves that are transmitted through the cranial bones which bypass your eardrums to reach the inner ears. Bone conduction is safe on your ears. Gives you clear sound in the presence of ambient noise.That is, you can hear and respond to any situations.   step 1After confirmation of the position (left/right), Bone conduction earphone installed on the body of MMCX socket.step 2Wearing the main body connected to the bone conduction earphone.step 3Bone conduction earphone attached to glasses(goggles) or band.step 4ear after installation(Glasses or Band) as shown in the picture. Note: The M logo position in the same location as the picture is most effective.   MobiFren SM provides parametric equalizer to change its DSP settings. It means, "you can change its original sound". If you tune its sound once, you can hear your original sound with any other devices.   (Music modes and sound effects are only available on In-ear Mode)   TTSIt reads you when there’s a new message like as SMS or SNS via earphone. You can hear message, number and caller name while driving, even though you do not check your mobile. (SMS/WhatsApp/KakaoTalk/Line) HOT CALL After storing the most frequently dialed number, press ‘+’ button on the earphone twice quickly to start the call. LAST CALL (Recent call redialing)Press a briefly twice the ‘-‘ button on the earphone. (iOS is not supported) Voice Memo Press and hold the multi-function button for about 1 second during a call to record the call    If your mobile phone is out of ranges from the earphone, the earphone alarms you for 1 minute to prevent phone loss. If you wanna stop alarm tone, press any button on remote control.    The lastest Bluetooth Ver. 5.0 provides double bandwidth more than Bluetooth Ver. 4.2 with low energy. Its use distance is four times wider than Bluetooth Ver. 4.2   Flex Wave is equipped with a large capacity battery and can be used for a long time with one charge. When camera app is running, press volume button to shoot.     Flex Wave provides a sweatproof function. Flex Wave promises a performance that does not change even the intense exercise by completely blocking sweat penetration inside the product.  Flex Wave always promise perfect fit to you. Just Clip & Go!  1.    Headband2.    Bluetooth Neckband3.    Bone Conduction Earphone Unit4.    In Ear Earphone Unit5.    Eartips6.    Charging Cable (Micro USB)7.    Carrying Case           MobiFren has strived to develop and manufacture Bluetooth earphones for more than 10 years. We always challenge for the Best and have produced the best products. We wish to approach you in happiness with good products and promise you to our best with honesty and sincerity to make beautiful community.      If you have any problems after you receive the product, feel free to contact us via the customer service email  (overseas@mobifren.com)

story:
Symphonia

is a minimal sound system for mobilephones designed for listening to classical music, made from a single piece of solid mahogany wood, Symphonia is unique.

Symphonia is made in Italy.

 

Classical music:  you don’t need Bluetooth.

  • The internal shape is designed to amplify the typical frequencies of classical and opera music. Symphonia increases the sound volume and restores the naturalness of the voices and instruments.
  • We are purists of sound and we like the classical music. The main idea is using natural wood to listen to music without any other e-gadgets.
  • If you love classical music, you will love the SYMPHONIA.

 

 

 

How it's made:

Wahhworks is the name of our hub with several years of experience in design and prototyping for other companies. That’s why we have the knowledge and passion to carry out this project. 

Symphonia is suitable for most mobile phones on the market. The slot measures are 90 x 14 mm

TOP: in solid mahogany wood, cnc milled, sanded & finished by hand with raw linseed oil

.CASE BACK: polished methacrylate sheet, laser cut and engraving

PACKAGING: sewn cotton bag

 

Who we are:

We - Samuel , Birgit and I (Manuel) - are good friends and we're always thinking about creating something unique and original to listen to classical music. Mr Samuel is an industrial engineer and audiophile, his passion is building tube-stereos. Mrs Birgit loves precision and detail and truly loves working wood by hand. I'm Manuel from Milano, fashion and design seller and together we had the idea of “Symphonia” and now we bring our dream to reality: make something good and original together, with our efforts.

  • This campaign is important for us because we believe that listening to music improve us and it is an essential aspect of life.
  • This campaign is important for us because we are in lockdown mode and with your support, we can dedicate our time to develop something useful and constructive.
  • We are thankful to music lovers, we are thankfull to help us and we are thankful to Indiegogo to give us the intruments to support us. We are thankful to all the backers and not.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to reach € 2.000 to buy tools for our CNC machine and start the production.
  • We love: minimal design, natural  materials and a good sound, that's why “SYMPHONIA" was born.
  • Once the goal is reached, we will put all our energy into the production and refinement of the speaker to give you this new instrumento to play your favorite opera and classical music.

 

    If your are a Musician or Classical Music lover, spread the voice..

    • Hi folks we gently ask to make some noise about our campaign.
    • Remind to use Indiegogo share tools!
    • Thankful to enjoy the music - thankful to believe in SYMPHONIA- thankful to trust us. Samuel, Birgit and Manuel.

This campaign is important for us because we believe that listening to music improve us and it is an essential aspect of life.
This campaign is important for us because we are in lockdown mode and with your support, we can dedicate our time to develop something useful and constructive.
We are thankful to music lovers, we are thankfull to help us and we are thankful to Indiegogo to give us the intruments to support us. We are thankful to all the backers and not.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to reach € 2.000 to buy tools for our CNC machine and start the production.
We love: minimal design, natural  materials and a good sound, that's why “SYMPHONIA" was born.
Once the goal is reached, we will put all our energy into the production and refinement of the speaker to give you this new instrumento to play your favorite opera and classical music.

Hi folks we gently ask to make some noise about our campaign.
Remind to use Indiegogo share tools!
Thankful to enjoy the music - thankful to believe in SYMPHONIA- thankful to trust us. Samuel, Birgit and Manuel.

story:
~ Le projet 

Je me sens investi d'une mission et c'est pour cette raison que cet album va inévitablement voir le jour. J'ai déjà mis beaucoup de temps et d'argent dans ce projet et j'en mettrai encore plus, jusqu’à ce que tôt ou tard, j'arrive à mes fins. Mais pour bien faire les choses et pour les faire dans un délai raisonnable, je dois maintenant faire appel à vous; les gens qui croient en moi, ceux qui aiment mon son, ma voix, mon univers, et qui ont envie que cet album se fraie un chemin jusqu'à leurs oreilles.

Chanson: 50 contre 1

 

Chanson: Ballade pour une fille du plateau

 

~ Les fonds 

Je cherche à recueillir la somme de 10 000$ pour couvrir l'ensemble des frais relatifs à la production d'un album. Lors de ma première campagne de sociofinancement, avec les contributions reçus via le site Indigogo, par courriel et en main propre, j'ai recueilli 4900$ avec l'aide de 106 contributeurs. Bien qu'il me reste toujours 5100$ pour atteindre mon objectif, le montant visé avec cette campagne de sociofinancement (prise 2) est de 1000$. J'ai choisi un montant moindre (donc plus facile à atteindre), parce qu'après 30 jours, Indigogo me permettra de transférer ma nouvelle campagne de sociofinancement sur le site Indemand, mais seulement à condition d'avoir atteint ou dépassé mon objectif. Sur le site Indemand je pourrai continuer à amasser les fonds manquants sans contrainte de temps.

Voici quelques exemples de frais relatifs à la production d'un album: 

.Les musiciens

.L'ingénieur de son

.Le mixage

.Le “mastering”

.Location de mathériels sonores

.Le photographe

.L'infographiste

.L'impression d'une première série de CD

Et plusieurs autres

J'ai choisi une campagne de sociofinancement flexible. Donc que j'atteigne ou non mon objectif, tous les fonds amassés seront utilisés pour la réalisation de l'album. Et si par chance je dépasse mon objectif, tous les surplus iront à fignoler l'album et/ou à la production d'un premier vidéo clip.

J'ai vingt ans d'expérience comme musicien et je suis très conscient des défis que j'aurai à surmonter. Mais je suis confiant qu'avec le bagage professionnel que j'ai accumulé durant mon long parcours et entouré de mes nombreux collaborateurs, le résultat final atteindra le niveau de mes attentes gargantuesques.

 

~ Devenez mécène

                                                                                                             

La case Supportez ce projet  située en haut de la liste des contreparties vous permet de faire une contribution du montant de votre choix. Il n'y a pas de montants trop petit, ni trop grand. Par contre en échange de cette contribution il n'y a pas de récompenses, mis à part, mon éternelle gratitude et la satisfaction personnelle d'avoir aidé un artiste à réaliser son projet. 

 

~ Contreparties (récompenses)

Mais si vous êtes intéressé à me donner un petit coup de pouce en échange d'une contrepartie vous n'avez qu'à cliquer sur la ou les contreparties qui vous feraient plaisir et puis faire le don approprié. Il y a des récompenses pour tous les goûts et tous les budgets.

Copie numérique 

                 

Cette contrepartie inclut: Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel. Notes: Envoi prévu printemps 2017

Copie physique  

               

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale. Notes: Envoi prévu, printemps 2017

Passe V.I.P. 

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une invitation V.I.P. au lancement de l'album et une copie physique de l'album remise en main propre le soir du lancement. Notes: Lancement prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie.

Producteur 

             

Cette contrepartie inclut: Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale, la mention de votre nom dans le livret, en tant que producteur et une invitation au lancement de l'album. Notes: La copie physique pourra être remise en main propre le soir du lancement. Lancement prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie.

Chanteur invité

.Adulte (18 ans et plus)

.Ados (13 ans et plus)

.Enfant (12 ans et moins)

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une place pour participer en tant que chanteur à la session d'enregistrement de la chanson ( La vieille ivrogne), un code d’accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale, la mention de votre nom dans le livret de l'album et une invitation au lancement. 

Note: Enregistrement prévu en Estrie, un dimanche d'avril ou de mai 2017. Bienvenue aux chanteurs et chanteuses de tous les âges et de tous les niveaux. Les enfants devront-être accompagnés d'un adulte, chanteur ou non chanteur. Lancement de l'album prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie. Confirmation de la date d'enregistrement un mois à l'avance.  

Party de cuisine

                                                            

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une prestation solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même d'une durée de deux heures, chez vous, pour vous et une trentaine des vos proches. Dans un rayon de 150 km de Magog. Note: Au delà d'un rayon de 150 km de Magog: Faire un don de 1$ pour chaque tranche de 5 km additionnelle en cliquant sur la case Supportez ce projet situé en haut de la liste des contreparties. Les partys de cuisine auront lieux à partir du 2 mai 2017. Avant ou après avoir fait le don ou les dons appropriés,  contactez-moi pour réserver votre date à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com .

Party de cuisine (chez nous)

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une prestation solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même d'une durée de deux heures (minimum), Chez moi, dans ma propre cuisine, Note: Le party de cuisine aura lieux samedi le 29 Avril 2017 à Barnston-West. Formule “à la bonne franquette”, apportez votre vin.

Spectacle solo-acoustique                                                                         

Cette contrepartie inclut: Un spectacle solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même, d'une durée de deux heures (minimum) pour vous et une soixantaine des vos proches, chez vous ou à l'endroit de votre choix, dans un rayon de 150 km de Magog. Note: Au delà d'un rayon de 150 km de Magog: Faire un don de 1$ pour chaque tranche de 5 km additionnelle en cliquant sur la case   Supportez ce projet  située en haut de la liste des contreparties. Les spectacles-solo-acoustiques auront lieux à partir du 1er Mai 2017. Avant ou après avoir fait le don ou les dons appropriés, contactez-moi pour réserver votre date à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com .

Commandite   

                                                                                                

Cette contrepartie inclut:  Le logo et l'URL de votre entreprise dans le livret de l'album. Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livrée à votre adresse postale. Note: Les entreprises qui choisiront cette contrepartie devront me faire parvenir le logo et l'URL de leur entreprise à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com

story:
EAR-FREE

Driver Indispensable

BUIEJDOG Ear-Free Earphones bring good news to all drivers in the world!

Will you always feel not safe to answering call with your phone?

Will you never find a Portable Bluetooth Earphones in your car?

Will you feel it’s inconvenient to take a call with your car telephone when a people next to you?

Will you always don’t find your earphones when you want to make a call?

Will you always find your earphones out of power during talking?

All kinds of occasions push that a real sense of vehicle-mounted Earphones is what we need!

 

Magnetic Charge ​- Windshield Mounted

Designed for the car to provide an earphone place, mounted directly on the windshield, it’s convenience to pick and place, with the magnetic design; it can automatically find the location, which facilitates your driving life.

We knows that it’s not safe to get your earphone if you put it somewhere whiling driving, but if mounted in the window, Right in line of driving sight, it’s easy to take and keep safe. The solar charging container is use of super 3M glue, high/low temperature resistance can be firmly fixed in the window even if the use of a long time do not have to worry about falling; small installation on the windshield just like a decoration and won’t affects look.

 

Solar Powered/Safety and Environment/Permanent Power Supply

Solar charger to avoid the charging smoke and other security incidents,

we use the high temperature resistance lithium iron battery, it can withstand up to 85 degrees, intelligent charging circuit design, can intelligently adjust the charge current, will not happen charging smoke and other accidents.

The base is the battery function of the battery can support headset charging 5-7 times, so even in the rainy days do not have to worry about no electricity

 

Operation Simple & Convenient

Multi-function keys to facilitate the operation, more simple to match compared to other headphones, it automatically connected to the Bluetooth when you take down to use, and automatically hang up the phone off

 

Rock-solid Fit

Ergonomic design is used regardless of left and right ear, dual-use satisfy lefties and right-handed people, and will not fall off. It’s wear tightly with 3 different size tips

 

Not Only Can Be Used in The Car

Superb sound quality to deliver the most ground breaking audio listening experience. Not only a professional car headset, can also be used in outdoor, home and business occasions.

 

PRODUCT DETAILS & SPECIFICATIONS

 

Compare with Common Earphones​

Designed Drawing

 

 TIMELINE

Our Story

Product Design Original Intention: We are a long-term R&D team on vehicle and found that there are no real vehicle-mounted Earphones in the market, and we want to design such an Earphones to all drivers in the world.

We all know that there is no specific place for holding headphones in car, and no special headphones charging equipment but need to carry a charger. But actually it always can’t find or no electricity, that will caused a great inconvenience, all kinds of occasions push that we need for a real sense of vehicle-mounted Earphones.

Product Design Concept: We hope we can solve the vast majority of drivers’ issues with using Earphones in car, we hope our products can get the community generally recognized and to achieve the true effectiveness of the product.

Meanwhile, we are not only in the production of headphones, we hope a small step we made will cause a step of forward.

What We Can Give for People? Convenience, Safety, independence and enjoyment.

Solar charging makes convenient and safe, simple operation and can install in the window, Take it directly when need it, automatically power on/off and Bluetooth connection make it very simply use, to avoid many potential traffic danger
