story:
Who Are We?

Miu-Tech is specialist in designing and making elegant Hi-Fi equipment since 2003. We build audiophile grade vacuum tube amplifier, headphone pre-amplifier, CD player and DAC equipment.  Recently, an idea of combining home Hi-Fi with portable audio came up to our mind, and that's how we come up to the "DUPLEX"

"DUPLEX" is a vacuum tube power amplifier that reproduce Hi-Fi grade audio in your living room.  At the same time, you can bring it out to provide you audiophile music on the road.  It is the world's first amplifier that is a Hi-Fi but yet, also a portable headphone amplifier.


In order to make "DUPLEX" a successful project, we need very complicated PCB design in order to avoid noise from going into vacuum tube circuitry, we need highly accurate aluminum CNC tooling to make the best casing such that the electronic can fit the casing without any interference.  To achieve this, a lot of trial and error will involve.  In addition, to make the overall cost to be feasible to the market, a substantial minimum quantity is required.  Thus, we need your help to gather enough quantity to make this project possible.

What Will You Get?

A vacuum tube portable headphone amplifier can easily cost you US600.00 or more in the audiophile market.  However, "DUPLEX" is our theme project in 2016 and we hope most of the music lovers can enjoy high quality music like we do.  We are giving out perks as low as US420.00.  This price only last until the campaign ends and our retail price is US680.00 in our online store. 

Remember, we are selling one item to you.  But you are actually buying two audiophile equipment to your home, a vacuum tube amplifier Hi-Fi to your home stereo system, plus a portable vacuum tube headphone amplifier providing you Hi-Fi grade audio on the road.

We are Experience in Audiophile

We have over 10 years experience in audiophile industry and have more than hundreds of successful circuitry in our databases.  We also OEM for some famous brand name like Sansui and an Italian brand.

We also have our own workshop and partner factory.  Thus, there is no difficulties in making this project come true.  The only challenge is how to make "DUPLEX" the best dual usage amplifier in the market.

Magic of Vacumm Tube

Different from transistor amplifier, vacuum tube amplifier produce much "warmer" and "natural" sound.  This can easily distinguished by listening to the vocal reproduction.  The 'harmonic distortion' produced by vacuum tube making the vocal more realistic.  When you close your eyes and enjoy the music, it feels like the performer is right in front of you.  In addition, high fidelity is also a very important characteristic of vacuum tube amplifier.  Because of this, it provides a very strong positioning ability making it perfect when listening to live music playback like orchestra.  By simply listening to the speaker, you can tell the trumpet is on the right while the violin is on the left and so on.  

'DUPLEX' is a 'hybrid' vacuum tube amplifier, which mean it is using vacuum tube as the pre-amplification while using transistor circuit as the power amplifier.  This makes 'DUPLEX' keeping vacuum tube characteristic and at the same time, can produce powerful bass when needed.


Risks & Challenges

In order to build any vacuum tube audio product, noise is always a challenge.  Vacuum tube itself is a very sensitive component, especially when you have to put all other components inside a portable size casing.  Power, signal, charging all on the PCB causing interference to each other might produce noise.  Thus, a crystal clear vacuum tube headphone amplifier is quite challenging.  We are glad that we already overcame this challenge and we are few more steps to complete.  We need your help to complete the remaining steps.

Product Info

We have already confirmed our PCB design and below is the specification:

A very interesting parts in audiophile products is to modify the product with your own knowledge and components.  When using different components on different circuit, you can get totally different sound effect.  Of course, it only applies to experienced DIYers.  However, we will also provide a limited perk for using Thomson 6111 tube.  A very limited French vacuum tube only used in high end audio.  We will also upgrade some components in this perk such to fully utilize the power of this tube.  Special serial number will be engraved to these 10 amplifiers.  This special edition will only be provided to crowdfunding campaign.  We will NOT provide this in our retail version.

After Sale Service

We are a matured and developed company and already shipped thousands of products around the world.  We provide after sale service during warranty period.  Even though after the warranty period, we will still take care of your service request ,at a reasonable cost, to make sure what you purchased would not become a garbage right after warranty period is over.


Other Ways You Can Help

Get free gift by referring contributors!!!

Although you might not be able to contribute, you can still get free gift by referring contributors.  Please spread your word about this campaign across your social media channels.  If there are more than 3 contributors mentioned your name as the referral person, we will give out gift to you.  More contributors you referred, the higher value the gift we will give out.  So, act now and let's make the project a successful one.


Performance Test Run

We finally fine tuned our PCB version 2.2, and we are really happy with the performance.  In our workshop, we have a self-made 12" full range speaker.  It is a little challenging for such a small amplifier to drive a 12" full range speaker.  However, the result is out of our expectation.  We played "A Groovy Kind of Love" by Jheena Lodwick to start with.  We are amazed with the base performance of DUPLEX when listening to the deep bass produced by the djembe at the beginning of the song.  In addition, the vocal is also very outstanding and clear, which is the basic requirement for being a good vacuum tube amplifier.  Wanna try out the higher frequency performance, we played "Liebesleid" by Fritz Kreisler.  DUPLEX is able to accurately reproduce all notes played by the violin without difficulties.  Lastly, we played "Vincent" by David Roth.  DUPLEX is able to reproduce the thick and warm voice of David, and at the same times, the guitars playback by Santa Cruz and Lowden is never mixed up with each other.

We are very confident on DUPLEX, and we will offer to have 100% refund if you are not happy with its performance.  This only applied to the first 200 pieces order.  Please note the terms as shown in the perks before oredering.

When you watch below video during our test, please make sure you are using either high quality earphone or external audio system through the DAC system from you PC.  The smartphone or PC speaker can never able to reflect the actual performance of DUPLEX.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
WHO

Hi there! My name is Brittany Jade, I am the founder of Public Radio For All. After graduating from Syracuse University with a degree in Communications and Goldsmiths-University of London with a MA in Documentary Film Production, I started working in television and film post-production. During my seven years in the field, I worked my way up from receptionist to Video Editor, working on everything from commercials to documentaries to highly rated reality soaps.

Over the last few years, I developed a passion for both creating and consuming short form audio programming in the form of podcast and public radio.

While listening to public radio, I noticed (as many others have) a lack of diversity on the air. In the summer of 2016 I came up with an idea for a public radio station that made it a priority to represent women, people of color and the LGBTQ community.

WHAT

Public Radio For All (PRFA) is a web-based public radio station that focuses on music, cultural news and issues relevant to minority communities.

 

On the talk side, we have partnered with several independent podcast and public radio producers to create and share content covering a wide range of topics. From politics and race, to sex and feminism, it is our mission to feature voices that are commonly underrepresented in media.

On the music side you will find a diverse selection of the best new and old hip hop, r&b, house, soul, reggae and more. No playlist made up of the same 30 songs by the same 10 artist here!

NEWARK DIARIES

The PRFA studios are located in downtown Newark, NJ underneath the Gateway Project Spaces.

Gateway Project Spaces in Downtown Newark

As the daughter of a Newark public school teacher, I am proud to be a part of the artist community here and excited about the cities potential for growth and development.

Here at Public Radio For All, we have partnered with the Newark chapter of a national after school program to teach a select group of their students the art and technical skills of radio production.

Using the Radio Diaries Teen Reporter Handbook and the Radio Rookies DIY Toolkit as guides, we will give the students tools and direction to report on their own lives and communities. At the end of the program we will edit all of their tape into a series called "Newark Diaries" that will air here on Public Radio For All.

WHY

Through this fundraising campaign, our goal is to raise $4,000 dollars, which will go a very long way in helping us accomplish two major goals:

1. To pay for our studio space for 6 months to a year while we explore grants and other types of funding.

2. In addition to raising money for the studio space, we are also raising money to pay for the recorders and other necessary tools the "Newark Diaries" students will need to produce their shows. Your generous support is essential in getting this program up and running!

WHEN

The beta site launches on December 20th. 

Sometimes money is tight! If you would like to donate, but are unable to do so at the moment, please consider sharing this page and talk to anyone you know who might be interested in supporting Public Radio For All. 

GET INVOLVED!

If you have any ideas for a show (talk or music based) please email Brittany Jade at britt@prfa.fm.

THANK YOU

Thank you very much for taking the time to visit our page. Please go to www.prfa.fm to check out our programming and see for yourself how we are trying to change the definition of what a public radio station can be!

story: Bill Murphy started this project in 1998 when he created a summer jazz program that exposed young musicians to the opportunity to meet and play next to accomplished professional jazz musicians, a concept learned from Murphy's Jr. High and High School band director, Andre Arrouet, and his experience with the Walt Disney College All American Band in 1977. Bill Murphy and Jeff Holmes have been collaborating for almost 20 years. Their purpose is to share the beauty of music and to contribute to the world's library of jazz. They also desire to honor those teachers, students, and fans who have inspired them. We believe that it is important to keep alive this exciting American Music art form and to create music that is new, insightful, entertaining, and educational.

Their purpose is to share the beauty of music and to contribute to the world's library of jazz. They also desire to honor those teachers, students, and fans who have inspired them. We believe that it is important to keep alive this exciting American Music art form and to create music that is new, insightful, entertaining, and educational.

story: ~

Hello everyone, and thank you so much for checking out my Indiegogo campaign! I've been doing music for as long as I can remember, and I've finally been graced with the opportunity to record my first 4 song ep in Nashville! I need a little help and support from my friends and fans though, any little bit you can give is immensely appreciated!

My Story

For those of you who I've yet to have the pleasure of meeting, my name is Danielle Mohr! I'm a young full-time musician in Florida pursuing my dream of making a career out of writing songs and performing them. I've been writing songs for 9 years and I  love sharing them with people, it brings me great joy to know that I've touched someone with my art. This is my favorite job I've had so far and I don't plan on stopping anytime soon!

About my EP Project:

My ep will consist of 4 (possibly 5, depending on how much money I raise) of my songs that are near and dear to my heart. Songs about growth, love, and loss. Songs that I wrote to help empower others! I will be recording at the Sound Emporium in Nashville with Randy Rockit of Randy Barr Productions as my producer, Chad Carlson as my engineer, and James Rae of “The Producers” chair in Nashville. I will have the help of some top notch musicians on my album as well!

My Producer:

Randy 'Rockit' Barr 

http://randybarrproductions.com/

James Rea, Creator/Host - The Producer's Chair 

http://theproducerschair.com/

My Engineer

Chad Carlson

http://www.chadcarlsonmusic.com/

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to raise $12,500. This money will cover the cost of studio time, studio musicians, mixing and mastering the ep, scheduling the studio time, pre-production time, crafting the musical arrangements through tracking sessions, and getting a video made of the recording process! This is my first recorded project that I'll be doing of my songs, so I want to make sure I have every little thing taken care of!

Now I wouldn't just ask for your money with nothing in return! Besides the awesome overall perk of FINALLY being able to listen to my music somewhere besides my live shows, I'm offering some other really awesome perks.

I sincerely appreciate any amount you can give, it all helps to satisfy the goal I'm trying to reach! I couldn't do this without the continuous support of my family, friends, and fans, and it truly humbles me to be surrounded by such an awesome support system!

For any questions about the project or rewards, please email daniellemmohr@gmail.com

Risks & Challenges

There is a possibility that my goal won't be met in time, that's the biggest risk I'm taking by launching this campaign. Not to worry if that's the case, I'm determined to get my music out there to the masses, and in the case that my goal is not met, the money raised up until that point will act as a base for the funds I need to get this ep completed! I do music full-time with sometimes up to 7 gigs a week, so I would start putting money earned from that towards this project. It's to every day that an opportunity like this becomes available, so I'm very determined to make it work out.

 

Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to give, you can still help! It helps just as much if you share this campaign with friends on facebook, instagram, twitter, and other social media. The more people this reaches, the higher the chance of my achieving my goal is!
story_txt: Hello everyone, and thank you so much for checking out my Indiegogo campaign! I've been doing music for as long as I can remember, and I've finally been graced with the opportunity to record my first 4 song ep in Nashville! I need a little help and support from my friends and fans though, any little bit you can give is immensely appreciated!My StoryFor those of you who I've yet to have the pleasure of meeting, my name is Danielle Mohr! I'm a young full-time musician in Florida pursuing my dream of making a career out of writing songs and performing them. I've been writing songs for 9 years and I  love sharing them with people, it brings me great joy to know that I've touched someone with my art. This is my favorite job I've had so far and I don't plan on stopping anytime soon!About my EP Project:My ep will consist of 4 (possibly 5, depending on how much money I raise) of my songs that are near and dear to my heart. Songs about growth, love, and loss. Songs that I wrote to help empower others! I will be recording at the Sound Emporium in Nashville with Randy Rockit of Randy Barr Productions as my producer, Chad Carlson as my engineer, and James Rae of “The Producers” chair in Nashville. I will have the help of some top notch musicians on my album as well!My Producer:Randy 'Rockit' Barr http://randybarrproductions.com/James Rea, Creator/Host - The Producer's Chair http://theproducerschair.com/My EngineerChad Carlsonhttp://www.chadcarlsonmusic.com/What We Need & What You GetMy goal is to raise $12,500. This money will cover the cost of studio time, studio musicians, mixing and mastering the ep, scheduling the studio time, pre-production time, crafting the musical arrangements through tracking sessions, and getting a video made of the recording process! This is my first recorded project that I'll be doing of my songs, so I want to make sure I have every little thing taken care of!Now I wouldn't just ask for your money with nothing in return! Besides the awesome overall perk of FINALLY being able to listen to my music somewhere besides my live shows, I'm offering some other really awesome perks.I sincerely appreciate any amount you can give, it all helps to satisfy the goal I'm trying to reach! Not to worry if that's the case, I'm determined to get my music out there to the masses, and in the case that my goal is not met, the money raised up until that point will act as a base for the funds I need to get this ep completed! I do music full-time with sometimes up to 7 gigs a week, so I would start putting money earned from that towards this project. It's to every day that an opportunity like this becomes available, so I'm very determined to make it work out. Ways You Can HelpIf you are unable to give, you can still help! It helps just as much if you share this campaign with friends on facebook, instagram, twitter, and other social media. The more people this reaches, the higher the chance of my achieving my goal is!

story:
Unparalleled Audio Quality

 

Android platform by default exposes an audio engine that is generalized for every application used by the normal users. However, for the serious audiophile it is often insufficient in terms of quality, audio customization and lossless file format compatibility.

Air Tunes is the ultimate solution for this problem, offering a high resolution 32-bit audio processing engine developed from the native HAL(Hardware Abstraction Layer), which is focused on delivering the greatest audio quality from your device without any compromise.

 

 

Studio Quality DSPs

 

Air Tunes provides the following set of studio quality multi-channel DSPs for the professionals to tweak their sound with precision.

1. 8 Band EQ + Preamp with Bandwidth customization
2. Cycore Bass Boost (R)
3. Compressor with parameter controls
4. Dynamic amplification module
5. Stereo Enhancer with customizable room spread
6. Reverb with customizable controls
7. Phaser with customizable controls
8. Chorus effect with customization
9. Wah Effect with customization

 

 

Cycore Bass Boost (R)

 

This bass boosting module is a groundbreaking audio processing component included in our set of DSPs which provides a smooth and strong subsonic bass enhancement.  The specialty of this module is that it does not distort or dip the volume to achieve the bass boost like most other modules.

Based on countless hours of research and development in formulating a bass boosting solution for various audio applications, the team at Intellogic developed this proprietary processing module based on concepts of Harmonic Product Spectrum and Psycho-Acoustics . This bass boosting technique and implementation is unrivaled by any bass booster currently available in music players (especially in Android).

 

 

Stunning and Intuitive UI

 

 

 

The user interface of Air Tunes is a gem of its own making it easier to explore your music library with ease. You can easily find your music by browsing through the songs, artists, albums or your own playlists. The custom playlists are also streamlined with the player user interface allowing you to manage them easily.

There is gesture support embedded in the player to help you cycle through your songs efficiently. There are more customization options available in Settings which allow you to customize layouts, behaviors and various preferences.

 

 

The aesthetics are optimized to make the UI stunning with unobtrusive animations. The player connects to online services on demand to synchronize your artwork so that it is much more pleasurable browsing your albums and favorite artists.

 

 

DSP and Effects Preset Management

 

We understand that every song deserves its own audio tweaking and settings, which is why we have presets to allow you to save your effects and DSP settings so that you can set them immediately when required. This will allow you to maintain your own curated presets for each type of music you listen to.

 

 

Independent Effect Chain

 

Effects can either be set on the main playback channel or separate playback channels to achieve high end mixing quality without losing the raw audio data in the signal chain. This means stacking audio multiple effects will not affect other effects as you use separate effect channels.

 

 

    Ahead of the Competition

     

    Let's take a look at the most popular current media player options available for Android in comparison to Air Tunes.

     

     

    Tuned by professionals

     

    While the team at Intellogic are composed of audio engineers and audiophile developers, we have got constant feedback and guidance from industry professionals and audio engineers for fine tuning our Synchrotone audio engine and the DSPs that we have included in AirTunes. Our team of audio engineers and developers has spent countless hours crafting the best sounding audio platform (Synchrotone) and the effects for the Android platform.

     

     

    Air Tunes Development

     

     

     

    File Format Support

     

    Air Tunes supports the following audio formats and codecs.

    • FLAC
    • ALAC
    • MP4
    • MP3
    • AAC
    • MPC
    • MIDI
    • DSD
    • OPUS

     

    Backer Advantage

     

    As a backer you will get insider access to the beta version release as well as a premium version license of the player depending on the perk you selected when backing. Please refer to our perks for more details.

     

     

     

    Share our project with friends - #AirTunes

     

     

     

    FAQ

     

    Where can I download AirTunes ?

    • It will be available in the Google Play Store for all countries to download for your Android devices

    What does the free version offer ?

    • It allows you to use the media player without any audio effects and DSPs
    • All music library functionalities will work

    What does the premium version offer ?

    • All of the DSPs and Audio Effects will be activated

    How does the native Audio Engine work?

    • The Synchrotone audio engine is developed using C++ and linked with Android using the Android Native Development Kit and JNI.

    Can I use AirTunes as a regular media player?

    • Yes its a fully fledged media player but has audio effects and can give you a high fidelity audio quality.

    Where does the music and songs come from?

    • AirTunes uses the music in your device, so you can manage the song library as any other media player. It supports all the file types currently supported by Android.

    Is AirTunes available for iOS?

    • Not at the moment, but it is in our to do list right after releasing the full version.

    What versions of Android are supported?

    • It supports any android device above version 4.1 which is more than 95% of current android devices.

story:
Summary

Symphony is a low-cost hearing device created by Ampere Volt Ohm LLC (AVO). Started as a passion project by one of AVO's engineers, Symphony grew into a device capable of helping millions. Symphony's design is based on three criteria: reduced cost, simplicity, and adaptability. AVO's focus created a simple, inexpensive device which restores common ranges of hearing loss. 


Medical hearing-aids are small, expensive devices which are rarely covered by health insurance. With product costs ranging from $900 to $5000, the devices are a luxury few can afford. Symphony's price is $50, far below that of its competition. At this price, there are no market products which compare to Symphony's functionality. In addition, AVO is offering the first 60 pledges a Symphony at 50% of its normal value. Symphony is available in three models. Each model targets a specific rage of hearing-loss; low, mid, and high frequency.

Interfacing with Symphony is simple. Headphones attach to a standard audio jack. A switch controls power and volume is adjusted by a screw terminal. Symphony's electronics and batteries are housed in an ABS plastic case. The case is resistant movement, impact, and environmental effects. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Monetary pledges will be used to develop two additions to the device. First, a battery charger will be added to Symphony's circuitry. This will enable charging from USB ports and common smartphone chargers. Second, a clip will be developed to attach Symphony to a belt or shirt pocket. This feature will make symphony easier to carry and free the users hands. Additionally, AVO is developing a strategy to add BlueTooth communication to Symphony; though it is not available in the present model. Ampere Volt Ohm LLC is dedicated to open source technology, and will release Symphony's final design under the GPL license. Please pledge to AVO's campaign and give the gift of sound to yourself, a loved one, or someone in need.

Risks & Challenges

All projects have challenges and risks. Symphony is a rather complete system, making investment risk much reduced. However, Ampere Volt Ohm LLC (AVO) believes in transparency and would like to list the challenges it will face completing Symphony.

1) Symphony's battery charger has not been designed. Upon its completion, the charger will require testing. All portions of the design and testing process take time. There is a chance that AVO will need to delay Symphony's launch date. AVO is comprised of a team of electronic engineers with analog development experience. The risk of this delay is minimal, but present.

2) AVO has not selected Symphony's battery replacement. The selection process will take additional project time. There are thousands of competing battery systems on the market. An AVO Engineer has already begun the battery search. The risk of not finding a capable battery system is minimal.

3) AVO relies on the feedback of beta-testers for improving Symphony's features. If few individuals pledge to become beta-testers, AVO will need to determine another method for product testing. This delay will increase development time. The risk of not recruiting beta-testers is mild. To combat this difficulty, please pledge to be a beta-tester. AVO promises you will be happy with your decision.

story: Nowall’s Culture is about coming together on the things that matter, art, music, community, sharing and compassion. Within Nowall we believe that diversity is what should lead, we have a team in China and a team in America, we’re bringing together a unique group of people to accomplish our goals effectively and bringing together two very distinct cultures to achieve that.

Within Nowall we believe that diversity is what should lead, we have a team in China and a team in America, we’re bringing together a unique group of people to accomplish our goals effectively and bringing together two very distinct cultures to achieve that.

story:
InDemand in progress on 

<Click the Indiegogo logo for the InDemand page>

 

SUCCESSFULLY FUNDED on

 

 

 

 

 

Our ears are open to great music every day.  All the sound effects from games give us hints what's coming next. But you are still missing out the details.  

Adapt is only Digital to Analog Converter(DAC) YOU WILL NEED to turn smartphones and PCs into an incredibly powerful Hi-Fi audio source device worth the money of the device itself.

Have you ever fell deep inside an emotion that the music you loved gave you?
John Coltrane's Central Park west right during this fall season.
San Juan Sunset by Deodato while looking at the setting sun across the ocean horizon.
Late at night listening to Bill Evans Trio's Stella by Starlight.
With Adapt Reference Audio DAC, this experience is amplified with more stable, clear details inside the music.

 

Adapt is designed with philosophy and engineered from fundamentals. All the features and every little detail interconnect to create One flawless audio DAC.

With Adapt, you don't have to listen to a low quality, low volume music or carry another expensive bulky Digital Audio Player (DAP). 
Just a single Adapt completely upgrades your audio effortlessly.

Adapt will be an upgrade to your ear and your life. Enjoy the sunset and enjoy the rain with the Adapt on your hands.

<Adapt is the solution!>

 

  • Adapt Reference is for serious music listeners, music producers, hardcore gamers and anyone who wants to fully expand their listening experience. 
  • Adapt Standard is an affordable Hi-Fi DAC for audiophile beginners and enthusiasts who have interests in better music. 

 

The concept of Adapt started in February 2018. The audio DACs out in the market were bulky, expensive, or had a mediocre performance. So, we wanted to make a compact, reasonably priced, high performing DAC that can last long in this fast-changing world. 

 

<First Design concept sketches>

 

ESS, the best performer in the audio market  

Adapt uses the latest ESS 32bit SABRE Hi-Fi ES9218P DAC with the Triple Filtered Power Supply for the most stable yet dynamic audio experience. 

For MUSIC LOVERS: Have a seat in the middle of a small classic jazz bar at late-night or in a large orchestra hall waiting for the orchestra to finish their tuning.
For GAMERS: Catch the slightest noise your enemy makes in the wide open grass field. 

 

ULTRA HIGH precision sound

The two temperature compensated crystal oscillators(TCXO) in the Adapt Reference model differentiates itself from other portable audio DAC having more clean and consistent sound just like the high-end audio system.

In simpler words, A quartz watch is off by 50 seconds per month and a regular digital device's Oscillator is off by 25 seconds per month. But, TCXO is off by only 1.3 seconds per month. That's some accuracy.

Adapt Reference has two TCXOs dedicated to 44.1kHz and 48kHz native sampling rates. Dedicated frequency minimizes the even the tiniest error during the sampling rate conversion process. 

Adapt's high precision and high resolution gives you the best sound experience for any audio playback. Even the normal compressed music files and Youtube videos will sound more clean and accurate.

 

 

Just like HI-FI  

Adapt product design represents the identity of Dense. In its simple compact design, innovative twin heat sink design using aluminum alloy keeps the hardware inside maintain an optimum temperature. Stable system temperature means stable performance and extended product life.


Adapt = Power in simplicity

Adapt can connect to iPhones, Android phones, macOS, Windows PC with a single USB Type C connection. Volume is synced with the source device for an easy user interface.
2Vrms output can drive active speakers and any headphones in the market including high impedance professional headphones.
1.6" x 0.8" x 0.4" (40.5mm x 20mm x 10mm) size and 0.4oz (12g) in weight is made for portability.

 

 

These are some of the measurement comparing Adapt Reference, popular DAC Dragonfly Red, and  MacBook Pro, Which represents most of the popular devices' performance. As music lovers ourselves, data is not everything in audio, but it gives an idea how much it can perform.

The Frequency response of Adapt Reference is much wider than the other's and better in Total Harmonic Distortion(THD). You will be surprised how much Superior sound Adapt can give you.

<Frequency Response: From Top Adapt Reference, Dragonfly Red, MacBook Pro>

<THD measurement: From Top Adapt Reference, Dragonfly Red, MacBook Pro>

 * The ticks at 200Hz, 2kHz, and 20kHz is a noise from the measuring equipment.

 

 


 

 

 

 

Adapt x 1
USB Type C cable x 1 
Quick Guide x 1

For the funding period ONLY!!!
USB Type C  ↔  Lightning, Standard USB, Micro USB Converter x 1 

 

+ For Early birds!
This is a first edition Prototype PCB plated with a real gold. 
It is a symbolic item to us as this marks the start of our long journey.

<Prototype PCB Key-ring>

 

We have already started the funding from last month and from the first funds,  mass production preparation has been kicked off.
The large part of the R&D and pre-funding is mostly done. Most of the time will be spent on tooling and making purchase orders for materials to meet the shipping schedule on February 2019.
Due to extremely high demand for the MLCC parts around the world, MLCC purchase order will be placed when the funding reaches the 70% mark. Since the final product package is small, we expect to be able to ship the whole Indiegogo batch within February 2019. 

<Second Prototype with housing>

story:
Our Mission & Story

We are aiming to provide a reliable and high quality true wireless experience at an affordable price. In this modern busy world, the BASE of unstoppable starts with no wires attached.

There is a high interest of true wireless earbuds, and people want a reliable and affordable alternative to the Apple AirPods! The current alternative products on the market compromise quality and features. We streamlined the pairing process, added extended battery life, and provided a fit for everyone.

Your contribution will help unlock the full BASE true wireless earbuds experience for everyone.

 

BASE LINE 

We created the BASE Line for those on-the-go that enjoy talking on the phone just as much as listening to music. We provided a Unidirectional Microphone and Stereo Call for an enjoyable conversation experience and comfortable fit. Additionally, our Dual Mic CVC Noise Cancellation feature will allow you to have clear calls in any noisy environment.

 

BASE JUMP

We created the BASE Jump for the active that need a mix of powerful music and secure fit. We provided an ergonomic designed earbud with an IPX5 level water resistant. Additionally, we enabled a Native Volume Control function for easy access during active movements.

Features that BASE LINE & BASE JUMP offer

 

How BASE LINE works

 

 

How BASE JUMP works

 

What makes us different?

 

What's in the box?

Ultra portable pocket-size charging case!

BASE JUMP charging case: 3.08”(L) x 1.36” (W) x 1.37”(H) (78.3x34.5x34.7mm)

BASE LINE charging case: 2.13”(L) x 1.89” (W) x 1.02”(H) (54x48x26mm)

 

Earn 10% Cash Back

by Helping us Spreading The Word

  • First, become a BASE backer
  • Then, click the image below to become our Booster on Kickbooster

  • Start sharing your unique Kickbooster campaign link and get rewarded!

Thank you so much for supporting BASE! :)

BASE product design

Here is a behind the scenes glance at our first original product sketches.

 

BASE production photos

Both BASE models are currently in the mass production process.

 

One More Way You Can Help

Share BASE through Indiegogo and win PRIZEs!  

The best way to support us to share and spread the word of BASE!

  • First, log in your Indiegogo account
  • Then, become a BASE backer
  • Click the"Link" button at the top right side of this page (see the screenshot below)

  • Copy your unique BASE's campaign link. Share it with your friends and win PRIZES!!

story:
We Built A Better Mouse Trap... Introducing The HumBug

After three years in the making we are proud to introduce the HumBug UltraSonic pest repeller device. Designed for greater coverage distance due to our high output xt-33 transducer. Designed to repel most household pests.

Just plug your HumBug into a wall outlet anywhere you have an insect problem in your house and watch the HumBug go to work!

 

Safe For Humans & Household Pets!

The Humbug operates at 32khz-55khz creating auditory stress in most pests driving them away. Humans don't hear above 20khz with the exception being children hearing as high as 30khz making the HumBug silent and harmless. Cats & dogs hear frequencies between 22khz-25khz making it safe for your household pets.

Here is a partial list of the pests that hear the frequencies of the HumBug:

  • Mosquitoes
  • Fleas
  • House Fly
  • Spiders
  • Cockroaches
  • Ants
  • Grasshoppers
  • Mice
  • Rats
  • Bats

 

Built To Work In Your Country

Talking with team of engineers we insisted that the Humbug was capable of working in almost every country.  All you have to do is back our project and based on the country we are shipping to we will make sure you have the correct plug type to work in your country. See Image below for available socket types. So where does the HumBug work? 

  • United States
  • Canada
  • Mexico
  • Japan
  • Europe
  • South America
  • Asia
  • Russia
  • United Kingdom
  • Ireland
  • Australia
  • New Zealand
  • China
  • Argentina & more

 

Easy To Install & Economical To Operate

Just plug it into any existing wall socket and watch it go to work. You can expect to see results in as little as 7 days. The cost to operate each unit is approximately 20 cents USD per month when using it 24 hours a day. The total electrical draw on each unit is less than 2 watts.

 

 

What People Actually Say About The Ultrasonic Pest Repeller

We relied heavily on feedback from actual users and made changes based on what they had to say. We are pleased to have reached a perfect 5 star rating from the actual users based on our final design.

  •  Philip - I've noticed a reduction in the amount of flies in my place.
  •  Eddy - I was told it would take a week to see any results but I saw the results start in only two days!
  •  Dale - No bug problems since I installed the repellers, very pleased.
  •  Amanda - I highly recommend this product. The squirrel living in my wall was gone in less than a week and has not been back.
  •  Grace - The mosquito problem is my house was out of hand. I installed one in each room and... problem solved. I told several of my friends to watch for your launch!
  •  Diana - I had one room in my house that seemed to have more ants than my backyard. I installed the ultrasonic repeller and a few days later I saw the ant population start to diminish. Happy to let you know that ten days after the install my ant problem is no more.
  •  Byron - Can't even hear the thing working, glad there is a light to let me know it is powered up. It has not bothered my cat or two dogs and the insects are gone.

 

 

 

The HumBug Pest Repeller Is Built To Last

At the heart of the HumBug is our XT-33 extended range transducer which is designed to push our ultrasonic signal farther than the competition. Built of quality materials and components we are convinced that it's the best electronic pest repeller on the market. So convinced that we offer a 5 year no questions asked return policy. We are proud of our product and just as proud to stand behind it.

 

A Superior Product From A Simple Sketch

Three years ago we set out to design a great looking and superior performing pest repeller... and to think that the initial design was created on a restaurant napkin!

The initial design was changed and modified over the three years until we finalized the look and then set out to make the ultrasonic pest repeller... the HumBug was born!

story:
Have any questions? Ask them here via Facebook Messenger

Next Generation Radio

AiRadio is lossless, uncompressed HiFi streaming ready.
It unlocks the potential of upcoming high definition streaming services.
With built-in Amazon Alexa hands-free voice control - just ask your AiRadio for your favorite artist or song, or request a specific genre or mood. A beautiful Eco-friendly bamboo cabinet will take your listening experience to the next level. 

 

True HiFi Sound

AiRadio draws on the tradition of New England - the birthplace of American high-fidelity audio. Developed with Andover Audio of Boston, Voiz AiRadios unlock the potential of the excellent sound quality now possible with Wi-Fi streaming.  Tuning by Andover's acclaimed sound engineer, Bob Hazelwood, it delivers the same clean and accurate Hi-Fi reproduction that made the New England Sound legendary.

 

High Quality 

Sustainable bamboo cabinet features two 3” full-range drivers with oversized neodymium magnets. The digital signal processor with class-D digital amplifier creates a natural Hi-Fi sound for fatigue-free listening experiences.

 

Smart Multi-room Streaming Solution

The Voiz app gives you multi-room streaming at your fingertips. Continue listening to music or podcasts anywhere in your home.

 

Wide Soundstage 

The wide-soundstage feature makes you feel like you’re listening to separate speakers. It’s a room-enveloping experience that brings your favorite music to life.

Eco-Friendly and Tactile Comfort

The luxurious bamboo cabinet adds a warm and familiar feel to your listening experience.

 

360˚ View

 

Made to Compliment Your Decor

Unlike any other smart speakers, the natural and stylish look of the AiRadio fits your home’s interior. It will makes the AiRadio an integral part of your home’s design.

 

Vintage Retro Look

The aesthetics of AiRadio were inspired by vintage old-time radios. You know, the type your mom used to listen to. With its big central speaker set in a luxurious fabric, you’d think you’re back in the 50s! When you speak to Alexa the light illuminates, bringing you gently back into the 21st century!

 

Your Privacy is Safe

We understand your privacy concern. So we put the power switch in addition to the mic-mute button, which is very unique for Alexa built-in products. Pressing the power button shuts down the unit entirely, so no chance that anybody can listen to your conversations via Alexa. 

 

Go Vinyl

AiRadio lets you enjoy the warm, vintage sound of vinyl. Just connect your record player to AiRadio's AUX-in jack and get spinning!

Check this video:

 

 

Sound Demo

Headphones recommended

AiRadio plays Black Cow by Steely Dan

 

AiRadio plays WRTI Jazz Philadelphia

 

Featured By

"VOIZ Wants To Reinvent the Radio With AI" 

Mara Anton / TechTheLead

https://techthelead.com/voiz-wants-reinvent-rad...

"Retro-futuristic AiRadio from Voiz—Perfect for Listening to Streaming Radio"

L.Nicoll / Twice

https://www.twice.com/the-wire/https-www-voiz-link

"Voiz wants to reinvent radio by merging ’60s style and Alexa voice commands"

Craig Grannell / Stuff.tv

https://www.stuff.tv/hot-stuff/audio/voiz-wants-reinvent-radio-merging-60s-style-and-alexa-voice-commands

" Finding His Voiz"

Ted Green / Strata-Gee.com

https://www.strata-gee.com/finding-his-voiz/

 

 

The Interactive Light Ring

Have any questions? Ask them here via Facebook Messenger

 

Timeline

 

Models and Specifications

Specifications:

• WiFi Standards: IEEE 802.11 b/g/n

• Speaker Spec:    

3” Full Range Neodymium Driver    

Impedance: 4 ohm    

Sensitivity: 81db

• Amplifier Spec:    

Max Power Output: 10W x 2    

• Unit Dimensions: 12 x 6 x 6.1 in / 306 x 153 x 155 mm (W • H • D)

• Unit + Adapter Weight: 4 lb 3 oz + 5 oz = 4 lb 8 oz

• Streaming Services: Amazon  Music, Tidal, Spotify, iHeartRadio, and TuneIn

US Patent Pending (#29/687,388)

Features and specifications are subject to change.

 

About Voiz

My name is Hiro Ogura, the founder, and CEO of Voiz.

In 1985, I immigrated to the US landing in New York City with a dream and a few hundred dollars in my pocket. My dream was to produce a high-quality radio with my exceptional design ideas. 

Since I was a little boy,  I loved to build radios from scratch using different vessels from a local junkyard. That is where my vision began ...

I studied design and became a product designer, and created many products for notable brands such as Emerson Radio, Aurora Impex, Kaito, Datexx and Onkyo.  During this time I never gave up my dream of producing a great advanced radio with my knowledge of technologies and superior design. 

Thirty-four years later my dream is now coming true with AiRadio.

My passion for the best quality design and sound reproduction finally materialized with the advancement of artificial intelligence technology and the craftsmanship of bamboo cabinet making.

Later this month I look forward to delivering my dream radio to the consumer market. Please support us so we can continue to make great radios.

We need to raise $20,000 to cover our final developmental costs. I am committed to making Voiz a company that delivers value with superior quality products without compromise. 

Lucille Adubato-Ogura (President) and Hiro Ogura (CEO) of Voiz

 

Bob Hazelwood, Director of Engineering

Bob is a 35-year audio industry veteran. At JBL he was Product and Marketing Manager for JBL Mobile Audio. After three successful years, Bob returned to a/d/s/ as VP of Product Management, where he was responsible for managing the engineering, marketing, and service departments. In 1999 he was invited to join Cambridge SoundWorks to manage the transition and expansion of the company’s product line upon Henry Kloss’ retirement. Bob is now a director of engineering at Andover Audio and designing technology for, and coordinating the development of a new generation of Voiz products.

AiRadio

Currently, there are two AI platforms available: Google home or Amazon Alexa, both require long approval periods, Amazon had a shorter approval process but already extended to eight weeks from six weeks, and it requires nine samples to submit, and Spotify is now asking for two samples for approval. It costs us time and money. Fortunately, we have a reliable and supportive factory, and they are working around the clock to go to mass production as soon as Amazon approved. Also, the smartphone app requires a minimum order quantity of 3 thousand a per model, which is an enormous financial challenge for the startup company like us. So it is crucial to selling as many as possible at the IndieGoGo campaign. 

 

Future Plan

We are planning to create our own AI platform which dedicates to serving for music and entertainment in the future, and your support is paramount for Voiz's future.

Quality Assurance

We have over 30 years of experience in developing the products and longtime relationship with the factories and vendors. Also, we have a partnership with New England's legendary Andover Audio for sound engineering and quality control. It will ensure the highest quality and on-time delivery. 

Please share our campaign to all your social media.

Thank you,

Stay tuned!

story:
We’ve all been there. The mobile device you need most at the moment is a hundred miles away. Or it’s at 15% power. You and your friends want to watch a movie or listen to music or a podcast, but all you have is your tiny phone speaker. The Ayond system solves those problems and dozens more. Not only do you get flawless top quality sound, you also get a portable power station so your device never runs out of battery charge. There are no wires to fight with or lose, the entire package is convenient, light and easily packed and you can even say farewell to your insect friends, as the Ayond 02 has a built-in mosquito control system!

AYOND O2 is the most comfortable and smart lighting in the world
AYOND O2 is an imaginative product that absorbs various existing functional products. It boasts an all-in-one system that includes Bluetooth stereo speakers (4w x 2), power LED lights (bulb and daylight color settings), infinite color lights, warning lights for car accident prevention, mosquito repellent function and an auxiliary battery (power bank). It has a set time of illumination sleep timer (5 minutes - 20 minutes) and a dedicated application for device control (Android phone, iPhone support). 
 

The 4w stereo speaker provides crisp and powerful high-quality sound
Convenient Bluetooth 4.1 Enjoy high-quality sound with a wireless connection. Equipped with a digital signal processing (DSP) chipset, it minimizes the noise generated by wireless connections and provides clear and crisp sound quality through digital noise reduction technology.

Support Bluetooth 4.1 
Reduce power consumption by up to 90% It supports the latest Bluetooth V4.10, so it is more secure than 2.1 + EDR, 3.0 version and power consumption is reduced. You can expect longer usage/latency. Also, AYOND O2, which has an excellent reputation for cost and performance, offers a Bluetooth solution.

Up to 50 hours can be used when using speakers only! 
In low power mode, eco mode is activated after 5 minutes when Bluetooth is not used, and Bluetooth is in power save mode. Therefore, it has a low power design so that it can be utilized for a long period by reducing discharge time.
 

Powerful brightness LED, various colors produce atmosphere 
1,200LM suitable for outdoor activities 
Brightness, light bulb color, rich-mine color In-product mounting 



Infinite color RGB LED / Variety of colors
RGB LED is equipped with an infinite color light according to the user can set the atmosphere.

Warning light for automobile secondary accident prevention 
Using AYOND O2's bright light, it is possible to cope with the crisis by checking the remote distance of the vehicle with the light of the accident immediately after the accident, and easy installation. It is suitable to be used as lights that can inspect cars in dark places or outdoors places such as camping grounds and roads.

One might expect a device like this to be popular only with outdoor enthusiasts, but all anyone has to do is look at how popular power banks have become to realize a device that can recharge portable technology would be worth having along even if it didn’t do all these other amazing things. Oh, and did we mention it’s a portable high-fidelity adjustable power-efficient LED light too? This feature alone makes it indispensable for emergency kits.  



 

 
 

Light with dedicated APP and audio control
Audio and Light can be remotely controlled by PLAY your app. Install the AYOND O2 APP on ANDROID, IOS and connect Bluetooth connection to use easily.
 

 

Can charge all smartphones (ANDROID, IOS)
Charging can be done with any device that can be charged with a USB cable by mounting standard Type A USB.

Delicate features for your convenience
It has a large capacity of 10,400mAh, a luxurious Green / Red LED status indicator and battery overcharge/discharge prevention technology to protect the product safely. The emotional LED status indicator lights up the battery level check button (4 steps) to make it easy to check the user's convenience. Foreign matter is applied.

Set the sleep timer time
Lighting unit sleep timer time setting function (5 to 20 minutes when set in the application)
 



 


 


 



 


Ekomos is a company that seeks human-oriented values.
It is a company that pursues a pleasant and relaxed life by giving human-centered value to a vision of being able to see a better future that is faithful to the foundation, a little different thought from others, a free life, but creating human value and living and breathing technology. We always try to leap to the small hidden champion enterprise with the importance of one who has always believed and helped me.

We would be both honored and pleased if you would consider supporting the introduction of what might be the technology synthesis you’ve been waiting for. Our campaign will continue to show off the different uses of the Ayond 02 and we plan to offer some unique and exciting rewards to our contributors. Thank you for your time and generous contribution!  

 



 


 



 

 

Risks and challenges

We are ecstatic about the feedback and positive reviews regarding our product. We have launched our product on a much smaller South Korean crowdfunding site and we have had experience in production and fulfillment already so we are very confident that we will be able to deliver your rewards in a timely manner.

Of course, we cannot foresee natural acts of God that delay our production or shipping, but rest assured, our team of competent specialists will do everything we can to ship your rewards according to schedule. We thank you for being part of our company and to bringing the Ayond 02 to markets all over the world.
story_txt:
We’ve all been there. The mobile device you need most at the moment is a hundred miles away. Or it’s at 15% power. You and your friends want to watch a movie or listen to music or a podcast, but all you have is your tiny phone speaker. The Ayond system solves those problems and dozens more. Not only do you get flawless top quality sound, you also get a portable power station so your device never runs out of battery charge. There are no wires to fight with or lose, the entire package is convenient, light and easily packed and you can even say farewell to your insect friends, as the Ayond 02 has a built-in mosquito control system!AYOND O2 is the most comfortable and smart lighting in the worldAYOND O2 is an imaginative product that absorbs various existing functional products. It boasts an all-in-one system that includes Bluetooth stereo speakers (4w x 2), power LED lights (bulb and daylight color settings), infinite color lights, warning lights for car accident prevention, mosquito repellent function and an auxiliary battery (power bank). It has a set time of illumination sleep timer (5 minutes - 20 minutes) and a dedicated application for device control (Android phone, iPhone support).  The 4w stereo speaker provides crisp and powerful high-quality soundConvenient Bluetooth 4.1 Enjoy high-quality sound with a wireless connection. Equipped with a digital signal processing (DSP) chipset, it minimizes the noise generated by wireless connections and provides clear and crisp sound quality through digital noise reduction technology.Support Bluetooth 4.1 Reduce power consumption by up to 90% It supports the latest Bluetooth V4.10, so it is more secure than 2.1 + EDR, 3.0 version and power consumption is reduced. You can expect longer usage/latency. Also, AYOND O2, which has an excellent reputation for cost and performance, offers a Bluetooth solution.Up to 50 hours can be used when using speakers only! In low power mode, eco mode is activated after 5 minutes when Bluetooth is not used, and Bluetooth is in power save mode. Therefore, it has a low power design so that it can be utilized for a long period by reducing discharge time. Powerful brightness LED, various colors produce atmosphere 1,200LM suitable for outdoor activities Brightness, light bulb color, rich-mine color In-product mounting Infinite color RGB LED / Variety of colorsRGB LED is equipped with an infinite color light according to the user can set the atmosphere.Warning light for automobile secondary accident prevention Using AYOND O2's bright light, it is possible to cope with the crisis by checking the remote distance of the vehicle with the light of the accident immediately after the accident, and easy installation. It is suitable to be used as lights that can inspect cars in dark places or outdoors places such as camping grounds and roads.One might expect a device like this to be popular only with outdoor enthusiasts, but all anyone has to do is look at how popular power banks have become to realize a device that can recharge portable technology would be worth having along even if it didn’t do all these other amazing things. Oh, and did we mention it’s a portable high-fidelity adjustable power-efficient LED light too? This feature alone makes it indispensable for emergency kits.   
  Light with dedicated APP and audio controlAudio and Light can be remotely controlled by PLAY your app. Install the AYOND O2 APP on ANDROID, IOS and connect Bluetooth connection to use easily.  Can charge all smartphones (ANDROID, IOS)Charging can be done with any device that can be charged with a USB cable by mounting standard Type A USB.Delicate features for your convenienceIt has a large capacity of 10,400mAh, a luxurious Green / Red LED status indicator and battery overcharge/discharge prevention technology to protect the product safely. The emotional LED status indicator lights up the battery level check button (4 steps) to make it easy to check the user's convenience. Foreign matter is applied.Set the sleep timer timeLighting unit sleep timer time setting function (5 to 20 minutes when set in the application)     Ekomos is a company that seeks human-oriented values.It is a company that pursues a pleasant and relaxed life by giving human-centered value to a vision of being able to see a better future that is faithful to the foundation, a little different thought from others, a free life, but creating human value and living and breathing technology. We always try to leap to the small hidden champion enterprise with the importance of one who has always believed and helped me.We would be both honored and pleased if you would consider supporting the introduction of what might be the technology synthesis you’ve been waiting for. Our campaign will continue to show off the different uses of the Ayond 02 and we plan to offer some unique and exciting rewards to our contributors. Thank you for your time and generous contribution!       Risks and challengesWe are ecstatic about the feedback and positive reviews regarding our product. story:
• MacBook adopted USB Type C as it's power source, and many other brand's Notebook would follow 
  • MusicLinear is world's first USB Type C Linear Power Supply for Computer Audio (CAS)
 

Connection Diagram
 

Scene from audition / HiFi setup

A

 

 

- CD sales are dropping / music lovers buy download music content and use computer / NB computer as Computer Audio console 
- Notebook computer are standardizing using USB Type C, Power Delivery as power source 
- All Apple Macbook computer are now shipped with USB Type C, Power Delivery 
- Other brand of Notebook computers are changing to USB Type C, Power delivery also, example are Lenovo, Samsung, HP, ASUS and other brands 



Very low ripple / noise of MusicLinear output

A typical SMPS has 5 times the ripple / noise at it's output
 

  • Our design is ready - more than prototype, our factory pre-production is ready

 

 

The development of MusicLinear has been enabled and supported by industrial leaders from the beginning. From early stage of mastering USB Type C Power Delivery technology, we have been supported throughout the development stages with strong support of development boards, component samples and on-time feedback etc. 

  • On Semiconductor - Power Devices
  • TE Connectivity - USB Type C connector
  • Texas Instruments : USB Type C Controller

       

  • MusicLinear has been reviewed and certified by Arrow Electronics, for our Indiegogo campaign
  • An indication of our capability and readiness to ship  

 


 

  • Automatic AC input Voltage

    • Unlike most linear power supply, our design eliminate the need for manual switching of AC input voltage, MusicLinear adjust automatically 

  • Premium audio grade components

    • MusicLinear is not only a low noise power supply, it would become part of your audio setup, so we use only premium audio grade components.
      • Toroidal transformer
      • Audio grade capacitors with very low ESR (Equivalent Series Resistance) 
      • Filter capacitor bank : 45 x 330uF

​

"Pure Sound" capacitor bank

  • USB Type C 

    • Compliant to USB Type C Power Delivery

  • Smart Protection 

    • Protection against over limit current and short circuit
    • Over-Temperature protection

  • Dynamic Power Distribution 

    • Smart control algorithm to reduce power dissipation  


 

1. Power - Power On LED indicator 
2. Music Power - USB Type C power output LED indicator
          - LED is OFF when no USB Type C device is connected
          - LED is ON when USB Type C device is connected 
3. Rear Output - Rear power output LED indicator 
          - LED is OFF when power is output from USB Type C connector
          - LED is ON when power is output from rear connector (See 6 & 7)
4. USB Type C connector - Connector for power output 


5. Rear output switch
          - Press 2 seconds to switch power output to rear connector (non USB Type C)
          - During rear power output, press 2 seconds for switching back to front (USB Type C)
6 . Rear power output connector
7. Power Switch
          - Main power switch 
8. AC connector 
          - IEC socket for main AC power

 

 

 

 

 


USB C Socket - Reversible and convenient 

 

 

  • The world is our global platform 
  • It is linear - we lines up our global talent to design and produce MusicLinear


 

Q : MusicLinear look pretty nice as a HiFi equipment, is it an audio amplifier that drive my speakers ? 

A : MusicLinear do look nice with a trendy and cool output, it is a USB Type C, DC power supply for your CAS Notebook, you need a separate amplifier for your setup. (Refer to connection diagram)
 

Q : What is MusicLinear's rear output used for ? 

A: The rear output is the same low noise, clean DC power as delivered by the front USB Type C socket, for non USB Type C powered computers. The switching between front and rear is controlled by pressing rear switch.

If you intend to use MusicLinear for your Notebook that don't have USB Type C power, please send us a note and check with us for details.
 

Q : What is Linear Power Supply (LPS) ?

A :  LPS has a iron laminated transformer. This transformer has two purposes- It provides a safety barrier for the low voltage output from the AC input and reduces and the input from typically 110V or 220VAC to a much lower voltage around say 24VAC. The low voltage AC output from the transformer is then rectified by two or four diodes and smoothed into low voltage DC by large electrolytic capacitors.

 

Q : What is Switch Mode Power Supply (SMPS) ?

A : SMPS is a lot more complicated. The 115V or 230VAC voltage is rectified and smoothed by diodes and capacitors resulting in a high voltage DC, that DC is then converted into a safe, low voltage, high frequency (typically switching at 100kHz to 500kHz) voltage using a much smaller ferrite transformer and FETs or transistors. That voltage is then converted into the DC output voltage of choice by another set of diodes, capacitors and inductors. Corrections to the output voltage due to load or input changes are achieved by adjusting the pulse width of the high frequency waveform. The SMPS is relatively quite noisy by this nature.

 

Q : What is advantage of LPS over SMPS in Audio application ?

A : LPS works and stick to the same low frequency, typical 50Hz or 60Hz, of the main supply. The LPS is hence very quiet with very low noise. Audio equipment are well benefited by clean low noise DC power. Contrarily the residual high frequency of the SMPS becomes noise and is sent into the audio equipment making the music less quiet, music is less refine, and one would hear less details of the music.

 

MusicLinear meet the press 

 

       

Background Music Credit : 

Video : The Making of MusicLinear / Credit : Hansen & Lund

story:
Short Summary

Magnolia Space Studios is operated by a team of elite individuals, and we need your help to see this vision become a reality. Having worked alongside students, faculty, and professionals within the Greater Boston community and beyond, the team is led by Richard 'Trey' Watts, III, who studied at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology as a physics student.

We hope to provide the world with high-quality, gallium arsenide rimmed headphones that can be used in real space environments for no more than $325. Gallium arsenide is a photovoltaic material used on many spacecraft that allows them to absorb energy from the sun and power their electronics.

Every donation helps, and we would love to hear feedback from our clientele along the way. Be sure to spread the word to your friends and family, and we will achieve our goal that much quicker.Thank you so much for your support and we will continue to be tenacious until our product is accessible to all!

story:
FUSION Headphones

We believe music has the power to relieve and uplift people’s soul. With FUSION headphones, you can hear the sound you should hear - the bass, the detail, the dynamics. Most importantly, you feel the power of the music.

As an original brand manufacturer that specializes in designing and developing ultra-high quality headphones, OneAudio aims to create a wireless professional DJ headphone for DJs and music lovers.

We have worked on the functional verification of our product as DJ headphones are usually wired, but ours are wired and wireless. We came up with an ingenious design on dual-duty cable, which allows free conversions between 3.5mm and 6.3mm jacks. Also, we addressed the pain point of DJ headphones needing adapters by achieving the feature of adapter-free.

Our team has worked hard to accomplish this project, we have designed the product’s appearance, structure, and electronic components. The next steps include carrying out mass production and conducting a frequent market analysis to ensure the stability of the product. 

 

This project is very important to us. We strive to design and create professional and high-quality sound headphones. We have carefully listened to people's feedback. With your contribution, we will successfully complete these DJ + Wireless headphones: multifunctional, faster, and better.

 

Rewards

Get Yours Now!

 

FUSION Features

DJ DEVICE

We are passionate about DJ headphones; therefore, we have worked hard on their design: swiveling earcups, comfortable headband, defined sound, portability, and loudness of sound. 

We also created a jack lock system, so no matter how much movement there is, the cable will not get off the headphones' port. This is a great plus for DJs and musicians.

 


DUAL-DUTY CABLE & ADAPTER-FREE

This is a unique cable, specifically designed for FUSION headphones. On one of the ends there is a 3.5mm jack and on the other end there is a 6.3mm jack. This great feature allows free conversations and most importantly: it's adapter-free! Perfect for mixers, electric guitars, keyboards, and more.


BLUETOOTH

We wanted to take these headphones to the next level, so we made them wired and wireless! With Bluetooth version 4.0, FUSION headphones are designed to easily pair with other Bluetooth devices such as smartphones, laptops, and tablets. 


 

MUSIC SHARING

Two or more headphones can be connected to one another to allow the feature of music sharing. Pair your device via Bluetooth and share your tunes through the dual-duty cable!
 

Specifications

Frequency Response
 



 


Review Videos


    

 

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge lies in equipping the professional DJ headphones with ultra-high sound quality, making them wireless, and having the feature of adapter-free for the two jack port types – all at the same time.
 

 

About Us

OneAudio focuses on designing and producing high quality headphones with great sound and stunning appearance. Our factory operations have passed ISO9001-2000 certification and all our products have been approved by CE/ROHS/FCC/Telec certifications. You will be surprised by OneAudio's Highly Professional and High End products. OneAudio has the most professional R&D team in the industry, with 10 years of experience. Thus, we believe we have the expertise needed to accomplish this crowdfunding project.

 

Thank you for your support!

 

PS: To all backers, we have created a Facebook group. For any questions, please click below!

story:
The majority of people who need sound amplification (1 out of 10 persons; meaning you probably know a person with a hearing problem yourself) in daily life already wear glasses. A combination of improving vision and hearing in one product is convenient and comfortable. In the past hearing glasses were very popular, but bulky. With the BLU we have reinvented hearing glasses and use state of the art wireless technology in combination with fashionable frames.


We hear you think: Why the BLU instead of normal hearing aids and glasses?

Traditional hearing aids sit behind the ear and have one microphone that picks up sound, which is processed electronically with the hearing aid. They amplify sounds coming from all directions, meaning that you hear each and every noise amplified, thus creating an uncomfortable experience. 

Now, the BLU makes it possible to amplify sounds from the front, while dampening surround noise. Each arm of the glasses has an array of microphones to optimize hearing in noisy situations. 

The placement of the microphones in front of your ear creates a unique directionality. You can switch between hearing around you and hearing a person talk from the direction you look.

Besides better hearing, the BLU makes it possible to listen to your favorite music and pick up a phone call with your glasses. This innovation can literally change the way you hear and perceive things around you!

Chat with your friends at a busy terrace

Hear every word during your business meeting

Understanding in noisy environments




It is our firm belief that placement of microphones in front of your ear, in the arms of your glasses, gives better directional hearing, especially in noisy environments. With the BLU we added more advantages to this.

The BLU is an innovative pair of hearing glasses with Bluetooth™ connectivity based on air conduction. Each of the temples contains cutting edge electronics and multiple tiny microphones that pick up sounds from the front and separate them from background noise.


BLU’s proven, and patented, multi-microphone technology helps you optimize your directional hearing when in a noisy environment. Its wireless capability means that, via Bluetooth™ , you can connect to enabled devices like smartphones – iOS and Android, tablets and personal computers.

The BLU comes with a free application (iOS and Android supported) that you can easily download in the App Store or Google Play Store. With the BLU App you can easily:




We wanted the BLU to be rechargeable and still to be able to use continuously, without having the need for charging intervals. So we equipped the temples with easy to switch battery units. Each BLU comes with an extra set of batteries and a compact travel-proof charging unit. You can charge extra batteries while traveling, while using your BLU!




We have developed an App for the BLU (iOS and Android supported), which lets you customize your listening experience by changing programs, volume, and high-low tones. The free Varibel App is available in the App Store and Google Play Store.

With the BLU App you can easily:

Switch between programs & adjust your hearing settings


Listen to your favorite music


Answer hands-free phone calls with one touch






We have invented and patented a groundbreaking solution that combines multiple microphones, advanced microprocessor algorithms and high-tech hardware fitted into glasses temples. By adding wireless features we have developed the BLU. The BLU was developed with comfort, ease of use and style in mind.


 


The temples are modular units, meaning that the BLU-units contain all the necessary functions and can be fitted with different color faceplates to match a growing selection of different color glasses frames. The use of interchangeable faceplates at the temples (available in six different lengths) allows customization, each user to be fitted with their own comfortable, matching temple lengths.

The BLU units are built with carefully selected materials which are widely used for glasses frames and temples, and in hearing aids. They are known for their light weight, durability and with scientifically proven suitability for continuous skin contact.




To match your individual style we offer eight stylish frames – four stainless steel frames and four acetate frames. All frames can have prescription lenses fitted by your local optician. It is also possible to have sunglasses lenses fitted into the frames. All frames are available in six colors: black, grey, blue, brown, ruby and red.




BLU is a Bluetooth enabled pair of hearing glasses. It combines Varibel’s patented hearing aid microphone array technology with wireless capabilities. They are the world’s most versatile hearing glasses. 

  • Excellent directivity (dual-mic array) 
  • Bluetooth wireless technology 
  • Stereo audio streaming 
  • Audio control through App 
  • Rechargeable Li-Poly battery 
  • Hands-free phone use • Four-channel WDRC 
  • Adaptive feedback canceling 
  • Adaptive noise reduction 
  • 12 Band Gain Equalizer 
  • Low battery warning (tone adjustments) 
  • Programmable through VariFit software






We have already created a prototype of the BLU and we have made several BLU hearing glasses for tests with customers. From there we obtained much usable feedback which helped us to improve the BLU to the (prototype) product we have now. With your funds we can finally make the BLU a reality and start producing! Start producing is the main thing we need your contribution for. But of course we have lots of ideas for future improvements for the BLU: 

  • Extend the BLU with bone conduction possibility 

  • Possibility to fit the BLU technology to every kind of frames

  • Improvements of the BLU appearance like: smaller batteries, smaller temples 




Varibel consists of a team of people with years of experience in audiology, audio signal processing, product design and development, materials and ergonomics, all within the medical device industry. Over the last two years we have done extensive testing, prototyping and gathered user feedback. Not only from end users but also from distributors and dispensers. We have partnered with companies with a broad background in product development, PCB development, signal processing and Bluetooth development, all already working in the hearing aid and audio industry and also with optometrists for frame development.







Varibel Innovations bv. is a small, innovative team. Based on our experience in the hearing aid industry and hearing loss we know how to help people. Help them feel more confident and happy in several noisy situations.   




Your feedback will help us, and your support will enable us to reach our goals and beyond! Please support our campaign and spread the word!






Varibel has been working on the BLU since 2014 and we have sent some test BLU’s to several countries around the world. This is how we already have experienced a good share of risks and challenges in the past. Despite the thorough effort we put in anticipating any potential problem ahead, there is always the possibility for unexpected, minor alterations having to be performed. This might lead to slight delays in lead time. We order components from suppliers that we trust, but things can happen on their premises that we can’t anticipate or control. We know that the most important part of our process is that we fulfill our promise to you, our backers, and deliver your BLU hearing glasses on time. We are certainly up for this challenge and confident we will deliver!

International Backers 

We will ship the BLU by Varibel worldwide. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

Estimated Delivery 

We firmly believe that we are in the position to keep our engagements and deliver the BLU by Varibel to our backers by May 2016.
