With the BLU we have reinvented hearing glasses and use state of the art wireless technology in combination with fashionable frames.We hear you think: Why the BLU instead of normal hearing aids and glasses?Traditional hearing aids sit behind the ear and have one microphone that picks up sound, which is processed electronically with the hearing aid. They amplify sounds coming from all directions, meaning that you hear each and every noise amplified, thus creating an uncomfortable experience. Now, the BLU makes it possible to amplify sounds from the front, while dampening surround noise. Each arm of the glasses has an array of microphones to optimize hearing in noisy situations. The placement of the microphones in front of your ear creates a unique directionality. You can switch between hearing around you and hearing a person talk from the direction you look.
Besides better hearing, the BLU makes it possible to listen to your favorite music and pick up a phone call with your glasses. This innovation can literally change the way you hear and perceive things around you!



Chat with your friends at a busy terrace


Hear every word during your business meeting

Understanding in noisy environments






It is our firm belief that placement of microphones in front of your ear, in the arms of your glasses, gives better directional hearing, especially in noisy environments. With the BLU we added more advantages to this.
The BLU is an innovative pair of hearing glasses with Bluetooth™ connectivity based on air conduction. Each of the temples contains cutting edge electronics and multiple tiny microphones that pick up sounds from the front and separate them from background noise.



BLU’s proven, and patented, multi-microphone technology helps you optimize your directional hearing when in a noisy environment. Its wireless capability means that, via Bluetooth™ , you can connect to enabled devices like smartphones – iOS and Android, tablets and personal computers.
The BLU comes with a free application (iOS and Android supported) that you can easily download in the App Store or Google Play Store. With the BLU App you can easily:






We wanted the BLU to be rechargeable and still to be able to use continuously, without having the need for charging intervals. So we equipped the temples with easy to switch battery units. Each BLU comes with an extra set of batteries and a compact travel-proof charging unit. You can charge extra batteries while traveling, while using your BLU!







We have developed an App for the BLU (iOS and Android supported), which lets you customize your listening experience by changing programs, volume, and high-low tones. The free Varibel App is available in the App Store and Google Play Store.
With the BLU App you can easily:
Switch between programs & adjust your hearing settings


Listen to your favorite music



Answer hands-free phone calls with one touch








We have invented and patented a groundbreaking solution that combines multiple microphones, advanced microprocessor algorithms and high-tech hardware fitted into glasses temples. By adding wireless features we have developed the BLU. The BLU was developed with comfort, ease of use and style in mind.


 



The temples are modular units, meaning that the BLU-units contain all the necessary functions and can be fitted with different color faceplates to match a growing selection of different color glasses frames. The use of interchangeable faceplates at the temples (available in six different lengths) allows customization, each user to be fitted with their own comfortable, matching temple lengths.
The BLU units are built with carefully selected materials which are widely used for glasses frames and temples, and in hearing aids. They are known for their light weight, durability and with scientifically proven suitability for continuous skin contact.








To match your individual style we offer eight stylish frames – four stainless steel frames and four acetate frames. All frames can have prescription lenses fitted by your local optician. It is also possible to have sunglasses lenses fitted into the frames. All frames are available in six colors: black, grey, blue, brown, ruby and red.







BLU is a Bluetooth enabled pair of hearing glasses. It combines Varibel’s patented hearing aid microphone array technology with wireless capabilities. They are the world’s most versatile hearing glasses. 



Excellent directivity (dual-mic array) 


Bluetooth wireless technology 


Stereo audio streaming 


Audio control through App 


Rechargeable Li-Poly battery 


Hands-free phone use • Four-channel WDRC 


Adaptive feedback canceling 


Adaptive noise reduction 


12 Band Gain Equalizer 


Low battery warning (tone adjustments) 


Programmable through VariFit software














We have already created a prototype of the BLU and we have made several BLU hearing glasses for tests with customers. From there we obtained much usable feedback which helped us to improve the BLU to the (prototype) product we have now. With your funds we can finally make the BLU a reality and start producing! Start producing is the main thing we need your contribution for. But of course we have lots of ideas for future improvements for the BLU: 



Extend the BLU with bone conduction possibility 


Possibility to fit the BLU technology to every kind of frames


Improvements of the BLU appearance like: smaller batteries, smaller temples 







Varibel consists of a team of people with years of experience in audiology, audio signal processing, product design and development, materials and ergonomics, all within the medical device industry. Over the last two years we have done extensive testing, prototyping and gathered user feedback. Not only from end users but also from distributors and dispensers. We have partnered with companies with a broad background in product development, PCB development, signal processing and Bluetooth development, all already working in the hearing aid and audio industry and also with optometrists for frame development.











Varibel Innovations bv. is a small, innovative team. Based on our experience in the hearing aid industry and hearing loss we know how to help people. Help them feel more confident and happy in several noisy situations.   






Your feedback will help us, and your support will enable us to reach our goals and beyond! Please support our campaign and spread the word!













Varibel has been working on the BLU since 2014 and we have sent some test BLU’s to several countries around the world. This is how we already have experienced a good share of risks and challenges in the past. Despite the thorough effort we put in anticipating any potential problem ahead, there is always the possibility for unexpected, minor alterations having to be performed. This might lead to slight delays in lead time. We order components from suppliers that we trust, but things can happen on their premises that we can’t anticipate or control. We know that the most important part of our process is that we fulfill our promise to you, our backers, and deliver your BLU hearing glasses on time. We are certainly up for this challenge and confident we will deliver!
International Backers 
We will ship the BLU by Varibel worldwide. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.
Estimated Delivery 
We firmly believe that we are in the position to keep our engagements and deliver the BLU by Varibel to our backers by May 2016.

story:
Short Summary

As a  kid coming from a single parent home growing up in the tropical surroundings of the Rainforests of Far North Queensland , Australia, full of waterfalls & wildlife, I remember what it was like suddenly to only have 1 parent in my home life. For solace I sought refuge in music, jazz music in particular, and decided at 13 that I wanted to become a jazz musician. Through the life long journey it has been to follow that unlikely dream into reality as a musician & recording artist in New York City, even  as the music industry  changed drastically making it very difficult to  barely survive sometimes, one thing never changed.. my quest for quality sound & tone and to somehow make a little difference in the world.

When it comes to music, the warmth of real wood stands out to my ear. Perhaps because I grew up in such a natural environment I notice it more. So when I see people listening to music on plastic headphones, I tell myself they just must not know what they’re missing. If they could only experience the true analogue warmth that comes with music delivered via genuine wood.. without the audiophile high end pricing and awkward designs , that would make them fall in love with their favorite  music  all over again. Additionally, I thought by creating a pair of opulent, genuine wooden headphones that not only delivered that analogue warmth, but were an accessory one would proudly and stylishly wear publicly, together we could make the birthday of a child from a single parent home like the one I came from a little bit brighter, because together we will gift them a pair of our JC Stylles "WoodyBuds" on your behalf... when you upgrade your ears to luxury !

So I set out to conceive an affordable range of boutique, luxury, analogue headphones made from genuine wood, that also allows you to pay it forward to a child from a single parent family, and after self-funding 2 years and testing products, I bring you JC Stylles Opulears!

Our initial collection (that's me, my family, and a couple of part time assistants) comes in a range of quality woods and luxurious designs that in comparison to plastic models, feels like you're sporting a Lexus for your ears, and are currently worn by several professional musicians, including Grammy winners.

THE JAZZ SERIES is a funky fashionable look, currently available in Cherrywood with a piano lacquered gloss finish, and a 100% genuine leather headband accessory for durability, complimented by microfiber cushioned ears for comfort. The 50mm drivers inside the wooden outers deliver a frequency response of 20-20,000 Hz, as do all of our models. Great for the beach, park, riding the subway, even the gym.

 

The Executive- shown below in Walnut, will actually be available in a darker ebony in a matt finish. It  is a streamlined  design with  minimal branding, and a luxurious super soft  cushioned headband. They fit snugly with excellent sound isolation as a result, have swiveling earpieces for easy optional wear when not in use, and are perfect for the office or  professional, looking for a classy headphone that compliments their style. 

 

The top of the line Signature Series comes in walnut wood with a matt finish, and embossed branding on a longer classic outer ear, and the luxurious headband cushioning also found on the Executive. The longer earpiece design is a great choice for taller wearers, and allows the ear to be fully ensconced inside the ear cushions. All models come with a luxury dust / carrybag and  a free 1 year warranty.

Singularly , as an Artist in today's music business which has changed drastically over the last decade,  independent of corporate financial backing,  I have developed JC Stylles Opulears over 2 years with my own limited funds, as I have with all my recordings and products. This has included establishing relationships with various suppliers and manufacturers and securing trademarks. I have gone about  as far as possible  to this point with self funding and a couple of  part time assistants, and the aim with this campaign is to raise enough funds to open the first small JC Stylles Opulears store in New York City, and  be able to order  more substantial stock. Currently the minimal stock as seen here has been ordered for testing and sampling.  As I work with several international manufacturers to bring my product range to fruition, I have minimum order requirements to meet including refining further packaging.

Buds4Buds Gift Registry Program

Although it is fair to say that life can be tough on all of us, children from broken homes with only a sole provider single parent sometimes struggle that little bit more to have something as simple as a birthday gift realized. Our "Buds 4 Buds" initiative will allow single parents to register their child/children for a birthday or seasonal gift via our website email to receive a gift of a brand new pair of our  JC Stylles Opulears "WoodyBuds" to be mailed out or for their birthday or seasonal gift!

Register Here:buds4budsgiftregistry@jcstylles.com

A parent can register their child up to 17 years of age by simply sending a short email on why a pair of JC Stylles Opulears "WoodyBuds" valued at $49.99 might be appreciated for their childs birthday or seasonal gift. You will receive a confirmation email once your email has been received and read. Our free gifts are triggered when a customer purchases a pair of JC Stylles Opulears,  and are distributed in correlation to the orders and registrations received. That's it-Simple and Easy!

 

PERKS

Visual list of Perks are offered below, and you can order your Perks from the corresponding Perk section on the right hand side of the page.

Grab your own JC Stylles Opulears "Woody Buds" at 30% off the normal price for $35, normally $49.99.

 

Serious guitar players can grab a digital copy of highly sought after "JC Stylles Benson Picking Tutorial" normally $99, for only $69.

Serious guitar players can grab a 1hr Skype lesson with JC Stylles for $150. Includes complimentary digital copy of "JC Stylles Benson Picking Tutorial".

Grab your own pair of JC Stylles Cherrywood Opulears for $245-30% off the retail price of $349. (Available in Cherrywood currently, with Walnut to be added at a later date).

Grab your own pair of the Executive Series JC Stylles Opulears for $265-30% off the retail price of $379.

Grab your own pair of the top-of -the -line Signature Series JC Stylles Opulears for $279-30% off the retail price of $399.

 

Shop for you and a friend with our JC Stylles Cherrywood friend pack and get a great discount on 2 pairs for only $399, instead of $698!

 

Shop for you and a friend with our Executive Series JC Stylles Opulears friend pack, and get 2 pairs for only $429, instead of $758 retail!

 

Think ahead and shop for you and treat your friend to 2 pairs of Signature Series JC Stylles Opulears with our friend pack for only $449, instead of $798 retail!

Save on our wholesale pack of 10- ideal for gifting to your staff, or retailing in your own business $1,750.

x 10

Our wholesale 10 pack of the Executive Series are great for your professional work staff, or retail for your own business-$1,900.

x 10

 

Our wholesale 10 pack of JC Stylles Opulears Signature series is on special foR $1,999.

x 10

Q & A

Q-How soon can you supply your Perks?

A-Due to us already working with our suppliers/manufacturers from the US to Asia, we have a system that allows us to order smaller quantities and fulfill quickly within 2-3 weeks of placing the order on completion of the campaign.

Q- So are you ready to release the product on a larger scale?

A- Yes, that is the reason for this campaign after 2 years of trialing, developing and testing. We now need further funds to grow to the next level.

Q- You mentioned a warranty, how does that work?

A-We are confidant in our product, however in the unlikely event it fails to function, we offer a full replacement warranty for free for 12 months from date of purchase. Just provide the date and copy of receipt of purchase and send to opulears@jcstylles,com so we can handle that for you.

Q- You mentioned the Jazz Series is available currently in Cherrywood for now, but will also be available in Walnut later on, why is this?

A- Our testing trials included Walnut. We are keeping the range at a minimal size currently for the campaign, but will be able to increase the range to include Walnut after we have raised the funds we are seeking. We are comfortable meeting the demand for Cherrywood initially, so we only wish to  offer that which we know we can supply now.

Q- You mentioned the Executive is going to be made in Ebony, but it is shown in Walnut, why is that?

A- Our supplier was able to provide us with an earlier sample of the product to test, so we took it  eager to trial it on the understanding that it is actually going to be manufactured from Ebony. We want to offer at least 3 distinctly different woods to cater to the different aesthetic tastes of our customers.

Q-Where are you planning to open a store in New York City?

A- We have been assessing various area's, but the last bastion of affordability seems to be downtown around the East Village area, so that will be our focus in regards to keeping costs low as we build this business. We want to have a physical presence in addition to the web, as we would like to  also be able to offer customers a chance to trade-in their plastic headphones for JC Stylles Opulears, and get a decent discount on the retail price when doing so. We will need a physical shop and a 2nd hand retailers license in order to provide that service.

Q- Is the Buds4Buds gift registry already working?

A- We have gifted our "WoodyBuds" already to a few select children as part of our trials and they have been very well received and appreciated. We hope you will join us in making this a successful program together with a true win-win outcome in this pay-it -forward initiative.

story:
Most people are looking for a portable speaker to fit their daily lives. Perhaps they are interested in a speaker with a modern design that will be a great add-on for their office desk, or even for their surround system at home. Others are interested in a durable speaker that will be able to handle their adventurous lifestyles.

We in Phonics Technologies decided to come up with a solution and created the Submarine--a waterproof speaker with an elegant design featuring True Wireless Stereo technology to connect up to 2 Submarine speakers at the same time, creating a clear and loud 360° sound.

 

 

True Wireless 360° Surround Sound

 

 

Submarine is a high-quality speaker that delivers amazing sound. We have implemented a process called True Wireless Stereo that delivers a superior listening experience. Hardware and software intelligently fuse right and left channels from two Submarine Speakers to create 360 degrees of sound, similar to a high-end surround system.

While pairing two Submarine speakers, the first speaker paired to your Bluetooth enabled device will act as the master and play the right channel of sound, and the speaker that is paired to the master speaker will be called the slave and play the left channel of sound, creating an intelligent wireless surround system. No more wires for your surround systems at home or portable speakers.

 

Optimized Wireless Performance with Bluetooth 4.2 Technology

 

The Phonics Submarine speakers use Bluetooth 4.2 Technology for an optimized wireless performance. The chip is faster, has better range, and is more energy efficient. You can listen for a longer period of time without compromising the fidelity of sound or battery life.

 

Compatible With Any Bluetooth Enabled Device

 

Once the Submarine speakers are connected to your phone, you can control them easily through any Bluetooth enabled device, such as a smart phone, tablet, smart TV, and more.

 

Fill Your Space With True Sound

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Submarine speakers have a connectivity range of over 10 meters, large enough to fill any room with high-quality sound.

 

Long Lasting Battery Life

 

With the Submarine, you will stay connected with up to 8 hours of battery life.

 

Key Features

 


 

 

 

Modern & Sophisticated Design

 

We have designed and engineered the Submarine True Wireless Stereo Speakers with a modern and durable design. With the highest quality materials, we created a continuous, smooth matte surface for the Submarine speakers that is both comfortable to touch and elegant to view. The modern design will fit any setting in your lifestyle.

 

Refresh your living room with a new modern look and replace your old, wired surround system. Add true wireless sound to your daily routine, or take the Submarine with you for a memorable adventure.

 

Take The Submarine Anywhere You Go

The Submarine features sophisticated yet simple design. With IP65 rated structure, the Submarine is water and dust resistant. Take your Submarine speaker anywhere you--go indoors and outdoors. Whether you are hiking the great trail or relaxing with friends by the pool, making a mad play on the court, or listening to tunes in the office, the submarine speakers can do it all with 360 degrees of rich sound.

 

 

 

Easy to Use 4-Buttons Display

 

We created the Submarine speakers with an easy to use control panel. With only 4 buttons, the Submarine speakers are easy to connect, use, and enjoy.

 

 

The Submarine Vs. Traditional Speaker


 

How Can I Back This Project?

 

Pick a perk and become a backer for our project to bring the Submarine to life. Choose one of the options to back us, and as a thank you, we will guarantee the lowest prices and deliver them to you before everyone else.  

Timeline

 

What's in the box?

 

 

 

One Year Warranty

​

At Phonics Technologies we stand behind our name and products. Each Submarine speaker by Phonics Technologies comes with a 1-year full warranty. We will ensure every unit is free from manufacture defects before shipment and will handle them with great care during shipment. For more information please visit us at www.phonicstech.com

 

Media & Press

 

Tech Specs

 

Bluetooth Version: V4.2 TWS

Dimensions of Submarine Speaker: 3" x 7" / 7.6cm x 17.8cm

Weight of Submarine Speaker: 14.5oz / 0.41kg

Power and Battery 

  • Audio Playback: Up to 8 hours
  • Capacity:  2,000 mAh (polymer lithium ion battery)
  • Charging time: ≥ 3.5 Hours

Speaker Specs

  • Speaker Output: 8W
  • Speaker Impedance (ohm): 4
  • Frequency Response: 180HZ- 15000HZ
  • Speaker Driver Size: 50mm

Built in Mic Sensitivity: -43db

Water Resistance Grade: IP65 rated

 

About Phonics Technologies

Phonics Technologies is a product development team in Las Vegas, Nevada. For the past year, we have been developing the Submarine from its initial idea to the innovative product we now offer.

Phonics Technologies consists of a group of students passionate about bringing true wireless experience to your hands. The team was created about 2 years ago with students from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, pursuing different degrees, such as engineering, computer science, hospitality, and finance. While developing the speakers, the team worked closely with the Startup Incubator at the Adelson Educational Campus, a program supporting innovation in young entrepreneurs, as well as the Arrow Certification program, which specializes in engineering and product development. This process allowed us to ensure we create and deliver a well-engineered and tested speaker to the market.

 

The Development of the Submarine

First Prototype of the Submarine

The Submarine Team 

Design and Planning

The Final Product

 

Media Contact

Web: www.phonicstech.com

Email: info@phonicstech.com

We have implemented a process called True Wireless Stereo that delivers a superior listening experience. Hardware and software intelligently fuse right and left channels from two Submarine Speakers to create 360 degrees of sound, similar to a high-end surround system. While pairing two Submarine speakers, the first speaker paired to your Bluetooth enabled device will act as the master and play the right channel of sound, and the speaker that is paired to the master speaker will be called the slave and play the left channel of sound, creating an intelligent wireless surround system. No more wires for your surround systems at home or portable speakers. Optimized Wireless Performance with Bluetooth 4.2 Technology The Phonics Submarine speakers use Bluetooth 4.2 Technology for an optimized wireless performance. The chip is faster, has better range, and is more energy efficient. You can listen for a longer period of time without compromising the fidelity of sound or battery life. Compatible With Any Bluetooth Enabled Device Once the Submarine speakers are connected to your phone, you can control them easily through any Bluetooth enabled device, such as a smart phone, tablet, smart TV, and more. Fill Your Space With True Sound          Submarine speakers have a connectivity range of over 10 meters, large enough to fill any room with high-quality sound. Long Lasting Battery Life With the Submarine, you will stay connected with up to 8 hours of battery life. Key Features 
   Modern & Sophisticated Design We have designed and engineered the Submarine True Wireless Stereo Speakers with a modern and durable design. With the highest quality materials, we created a continuous, smooth matte surface for the Submarine speakers that is both comfortable to touch and elegant to view. The modern design will fit any setting in your lifestyle. Refresh your living room with a new modern look and replace your old, wired surround system. Add true wireless sound to your daily routine, or take the Submarine with you for a memorable adventure. Take The Submarine Anywhere You GoThe Submarine features sophisticated yet simple design. With IP65 rated structure, the Submarine is water and dust resistant. Take your Submarine speaker anywhere you--go indoors and outdoors. Whether you are hiking the great trail or relaxing with friends by the pool, making a mad play on the court, or listening to tunes in the office, the submarine speakers can do it all with 360 degrees of rich sound.   Easy to Use 4-Buttons Display We created the Submarine speakers with an easy to use control panel. With only 4 buttons, the Submarine speakers are easy to connect, use, and enjoy.  The Submarine Vs. Traditional Speaker How Can I Back This Project? Pick a perk and become a backer for our project to bring the Submarine to life. Choose one of the options to back us, and as a thank you, we will guarantee the lowest prices and deliver them to you before everyone else.  Timeline What's in the box?   One Year Warranty ​At Phonics Technologies we stand behind our name and products. Each Submarine speaker by Phonics Technologies comes with a 1-year full warranty. We will ensure every unit is free from manufacture defects before shipment and will handle them with great care during shipment. For more information please visit us at www.phonicstech.com Media & Press Tech Specs Bluetooth Version: V4.2 TWSDimensions of Submarine Speaker: 3" x 7" / 7.6cm x 17.8cmWeight of Submarine Speaker: 14.5oz / 0.41kgPower and Battery 

Audio Playback: Up to 8 hours

Capacity:  2,000 mAh (polymer lithium ion battery)

Charging time: ≥ 3.5 Hours
Speaker Specs

Speaker Output: 8W

Speaker Impedance (ohm): 4

Frequency Response: 180HZ- 15000HZ

Speaker Driver Size: 50mm
Built in Mic Sensitivity: -43dbWater Resistance Grade: IP65 rated About Phonics TechnologiesPhonics Technologies is a product development team in Las Vegas, Nevada. For the past year, we have been developing the Submarine from its initial idea to the innovative product we now offer.Phonics Technologies consists of a group of students passionate about bringing true wireless experience to your hands. The team was created about 2 years ago with students from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, pursuing different degrees, such as engineering, computer science, hospitality, and finance. While developing the speakers, the team worked closely with the Startup Incubator at the Adelson Educational Campus, a program supporting innovation in young entrepreneurs, as well as the Arrow Certification program, which specializes in engineering and product development. This process allowed us to ensure we create and deliver a well-engineered and tested speaker to the market. The Development of the SubmarineFirst Prototype of the SubmarineThe Submarine Team Design and PlanningThe Final Product Media ContactWeb: www.phonicstech.comEmail: info@phonicstech.com

story:
The Drown audio platform delivers stunning tactile sound for a fully immersive audio experience. Hear your favorite games like it’s the first time. Drown gives you the ability to perceive your in-game surroundings more accurately - as if it were a true physical space. You feel like you’re actually in the game. 

 

TACTILE EARPHONES
VS. TYPICAL HEADSETS

 

 

Drown uses physics to trigger all three audio pathways to your brain, while passively blocking
outside noise.

1. Patent-pending acoustic waveguides sculpt the sound waves through a tactile system using scientifically tuned, high-end dynamic graphene drivers.

2. Physical awareness is created through bone and cartilage conduction. This gives you a deep, powerful bass response, to help you feel and perceive sound.

3. Spatial awareness is created by vibrations that stimulate nerves. This is how you perceive height, depth, and distance. These tactile audio waves deliver a hyper-realistic sound environment.

Drown brings these components together to create a unique and powerful audio experience.

 

 
 
 
 

Using data from thousands of ear scans and 3D-printed prototypes put in hundreds of ears, we have developed customizable sizing options.

A range of inserts are included with every Drown order, so you can find the fit that’s best for you.

 

​

To find the best fit start with a small size and increase as needed. It should feel snug and secure in your ear.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Designed in Edinburgh, Scotland, Drown delivers unrivaled audio that disrupts industry standards and improves gameplay.

 


MEASUREMENTS
Cable Length 95in (2400mm)
Dimensions (Hard Plastic ID) L: 1.77in W: 1.18in D: 0.7in
L: 45mm W: 30mm D: 18mm
Weight 0.04lb (20g)
AUDIO
Compatible Systems PC & Mac, Xbox, Playstation, Nintendo, Apple or Android Mobile Phones, or anything with an audio jack.
Cable Connections 3.5mm Jack
Cable Material Oxygen free kevlar coating.
Connector Gold-plated 3.5mm right angled audio jack
Inline Control box Volume up and down. Mute button
Frequency Response (Driver) 10Hz - 22KHZ
Impedence (Driver) 32 Ohms
Driver Size 10mm Graphene Driver
BOOM MIC SPECIFICATION (PRO-GAMER)
Microphone Size (Diameter) 9mm Back Electret
Pick-Up Pattern Uni-Directional noise canceling
Frequency Response 100Hz - 15KHz
Sensitivity (S) -47 (+/- 3dB)
Output Impedence (Z out) 680 Ohms
Signal to Noise Ratio 65
Maximum Input Sound Pressure Level 110
Standard Operating Voltage 1.5
Operating Voltage Range 1.0-10V
Decrease Voltage Characteristics -3
Current Consumption 0-500 microA

 

 

Drown’s team of audio engineers, designers and creative thinkers have developed an audio platform so realistic and immersive that you feel an emotional connection.

 

Our manufacturing partners are standing by. Indiegogo Flexible Funding gives us the opportunity to start tooling as soon as possible. We will start full production of Drown tactile earphones as soon as we reach our crowdfunding goal. Order early for the best price - and the earliest shipping date!

 

Free Shipping to UK and the USA

 

Where We Ship:

Based in Edinburgh, Scotland, we offer Free Shipping to the UK and the US. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for any shipping costs that apply to you.

When We Ship:

We plan to start shipping Drown in early 2020. If we reach our goal quickly, we will begin early tooling. Drown will keep you up-to-date on our progress, and notify you on exact shipping dates as soon as possible. Actual ship dates may vary.

Why Pre-Order?

Early backers of Drown will be one of the first to experience Drown’s game-changing audio. Improve your game and make all your friends jelly. Because you put your faith in us, you will also get Drown at the lowest price it will ever be available.

 

 

 

Let your friends know!

 

Follow us:

story:
Inspired by an Totem from afar land of Africa 

Our founder Amanda never stops traveling and searching for new inspiration around the world through her own eyes. Music is her forever companion along every journey.

In 2018 high summer, Amanda took another trip into the wilderness of Africa. Camping outside of an ancient tribe, the young chief of the tribe was surprisingly hospitable and welcoming to modern visitors. Amanda was invited into the campsite and immediately captivated by the tiger Totem hang in on the entrance. 

The totem stands for “Power, Fearlessness, and Ferocity”, it’s the spiritual animal for every warrior of the tribe ever since 2500 years ago. Although nowadays tiger is believed to become extinct in this continent.

She was impressed by the wild vitality of this artwork. The beautiful, robust, and mysterious figure engraved into Amanda’s memory for a long time after the trip ended.

When she came back from her trip, she was inspired to think about the possibility of developing a tiger-shaped headset. Among all the mediocre boring design of all wireless headphones, this spirit animal stood out as a break from the norm, it certainly will be a completely revolutionary unique design and extremely eye-catching compared with other daily earphones.

By combining dynamic modern design with ancient totem. The industrial design of earphone was given birth from a collision of two disparate styles and ideas. Empowered and inspired by this spiritual animal, Amanda wants to share the unleashed power by design to those who are passionate about traveling and sharing music like herself. 

From cool looks to stunning sound effects (from the inside out), it brings new, unique and unprecedented sensory experiences. Not only the shape is wild, but the heart is the same.

 

  • Unique Design
  • Unparalleled Sound
  • Master Switching Mode
  • Ergonomic Fit
  • Super Stable Connection
  • IPX5 Water Resistance
  • Lightweight Mini Size

 

 

  • Unique and Bold Design

Getting tired of the monotonous look of the boring wireless earphone? Meet Tiger&Rose, the game-changing TWS earphone with unforgettable proprietary design, sleek fit and unbeatable sound performance which redefine what you should know about wireless earbuds.

 

  • Unparalleled and Immersive Sound

Tiger & Rose was optimized by the best-certificated tuner to further refine the sound and ensure the most perfect balance.

 

  • Master Switching Mode

Tiger&Rose's stable chips allow both earphone operate in a master switching mode, which means each earphone can receive and transmit audio signals individually as master so you can seamlessly transit from two to either one and freely switch between them. Therefore, it will be no harm to your brain, much healthier and more friendly. 

 

  • Ergonomic Fit and Never Fall Out

Its ergonomic design comes with different sized ear tips (S/M/L) to best fit your ears.  Simply place the Tiger&Rose Earbuds and twist into your ears.  They will never fall out, even when running, working, exercising , or engaging in any other activities.

 

  • Super Stable Connection with BT 5.0 + EDR.2.4GHz

Tiger & Rose utilizes the latest Bluetooth 5.0 connection and EDR.2.4GHz technology to make sure you never miss a beat. Instant pairing, rock-solid, reliable connection, and low power consumption that lets you listen longer. 

 

  • IPX5 Water Resistance

Don’t let a little weather get you down! The earbuds are sweatproof and rainproof, allowing you to face inclement conditions without worry.

 

  • Mini Size and Lightweight as A Feather

It comes with special appearance but mini size, and it is super lightweight as a feather. When you wear them, you can hardly feel them wearing. 

    

 

With an emphasis on user-friendly features, Tiger&Rose gives you intuitive ways to control your phone easier than ever.

 

  •  Music

Single-tap on MFB to play/pause the song, double-tap on L/R MFB for next/previous song.

 

  •  Voice Assistant

Everyone loves the convenience of voice assistants. With Tiger & Rose, it couldn’t be easier. Simply long-press the MFB button for 2 seconds to activate Siri or your preferred voice assistant.


 

  •  Calling

Single-tap on MFB to answer/cancel the calls. Long press MFB to decline the calls.

 


  • Graphene-enhanced Premium Audio 

Features a 10mm-diameter driver  and grapheme speaker, develop a rich, dynamic, true wireless stereo experience, which is capable to adapt the sound to your individual hearing. This allows you to enjoy your favorite music like never before.  Simply have a good time with your favorite tunes and experience crystal clear telephony.

 

 


    

 

                   



                    
  

 

         



 

Already Finish Shipping

We are happy to share a good news with every backer that Tiger&Rose earbuds have finally shipped out today. We have always been working hard to keep our word to meet the promise of shipment. 

But meanwhile we are very sorry for 20 backers (We have sent an apology email to every backer) from Southeast Asian countries,  that the goods can not be shipped out today. Because Chinese New Year is coming soon, most of companies have already had a holiday last week.

We have consulted several forwarders from last week to today, but they all told us it's already the cut-off time for shipping to some Southeast Asian countries.

But we promise we will arrange the shipment once we come back to work at the first time. The probably shipment time may be no later than 5th Feb.

Thank you for your great support and understanding.

story:
Everyone's ears are different. Ordinary true wireless earphones are often too big to fit comfortably into your ear, hurting some parts of your ear after long periods of use. Poorly fitting earphones just fall off when you are exercising.

 
 The VIE FIT's patented "Soft Shell(p)” structure changes shape according to your ear and custom-fits softly and securely, so you can wear the earphones for long periods of time without stress or pain. 

Most earphones have a one size fits all assumption. We don’t expect you to fit to our product. We want our product to fit to you. That's why we replaced the traditional fixed angle speaker assembly with a flexible one.

 Vie Fit’s articulating speaker, located on the tip of soft-shell is omnidirectional and moves naturally to fit the angle of your ear delivering optimal sound directly to your eardrum. The gapless fit allows you to experience the full power of Vie Fit’s high quality 8mm neodymium dynamic speakers while efficiently eliminating outside noise.

 

 

VIE FIT 2 uses Qualcomm's latest module “QCC3020” which comes with Bluetooth ver 5.0 with the latest audio profile. This module solves many problems existed in the past of audio drop out, caused by the right side & left side connectivity or Bluetooth and WiFi coexistence.  It provides much stronger, stable connectivity especially within crowded areas. It also consumes much more efficiently which results in longer playtime.

This chip provides the capability to connect both sides directly to the smartphone, combined with the latest smartphone which deploys Qualcomm's chips “Snapdragon 845” or the later version.

 

 VIE FIT 2 comes with 6 hours of continuous listening time and 33 hours of playback with the included charging case become much smaller and slimmer. The charging case can be fully charged within an hour through the USB-C cable port.

 Vie Fit 2 is highly water-resistant, rated at IPX5, so you can sweat or even dance in the rain. (It does not endure submerging in water).

Whether you’re at home or out and about, background noise can make having a clear conversation difficult. Qualcomm's® cVc™ ambient noise cancellation technology provides the highest quality advanced audio enhancements and noise suppression. You get uncompromised call quality with your Vie Fit earphones. 

 

 

 

The VIE crew is a team of music and tech lovers with a passion for music and innovation. We believe in simplicity, integrity, and love. We live these core values every day, which is evident in our design skills and product development. Our vision is to become the top brand for fostering happy, music-filled lifestyles. On our journey so far, we’ve gained support from powerful global partners, such as Yamaha and Stratasys, who have generously offered to contribute resources to ensure we meet our Kickstarter commitments. The VIE crew has completed the series of the successful Kickstarter campaign “VIE SHAIR - The Pain Free, Sociable Headphones” and “VIE FIT - The Softest, Custom-fit, True Wireless Earphones”fulfilled the delivery to their backers in 2016 and 2018.

story:
BH

ITP - INCREASE THE PEACE!
 

Dr. Laz here. Some of you may know me as the first rapper in the Jewish music scene. I’m talking years before Shlock Rock came along. And when reggae star Matisyahu was in diapers. I know I’m dating myself but it’s true! I was teaching in the inner-city of Buffalo back in the 70’s when rap first started to make it on a few mainstream radio stations.

My students were my teachers back then and since I’ve always been into music, rap became a big part of my repertoire. But I never limited myself to one genre of music. Growing up in the small city of Buffalo, NY, with parents who went to see Ella, Sinatra, Tony Bennett, Count Basie, and more, I learned to appreciate all forms of music, from rap to reggae, from blues to bluegrass, and from jazz to doo-wop. LP's were always playing in the abode and it was obvious to me that music had some deep power to it. As a teenager, often on the rebellious side, I began to wonder how music might be used to help people lead better lives... to create some positive changes in the world around us.

Some of you make know me from the education scene. I’ve been working in the field of special needs for over 35 years and found music to be a therapeutic goldmine. You can check out my music videos on YouTube. It was an honor for me to receive the Teacher of the Year award from two different public school districts in my career, including Buffalo, NY in 1980 and from the Broward County Public schools in south Florida in 2007. I still do music & drama therapy for Broward, which is the country’s 6th largest school district. In 2008 I was one of five teachers from across America to be inducted into the National Teachers Hall of Fame. I’ve been at the forefront of educational leadership and continue to fight for the rights of individuals with special needs and for those coming from disadvantaged situations. Check out my music video dedication called “Singing For Angels” on YouTube.

Some of you know me from my work in the Crown Heights community. I was asked by the mayor’s office to be the liaison between the Hassidic and Black communities shortly after the race riots there in 1991. Working together with several African-American leaders, including Richard Green & Rev. Paul Chandler, we formed Project CURE, a grassroots organization dedicated to fostering mutual respect and harmony. I wrote a book (“Sharing Turf – Race Relations After The Crown Heights Riots”) about these amazing experiences. 

Our work back then, and to this very day, continues to inspire me. There were lots of doubters. Back in the early 90's the media often portrayed blacks & Jews as enemies. Despite this as well as other obstacles - such as our own stereotypes about each other, we were able to move forward. And fairly quickly! We got the NY Knicks to dedicate one game a season to racial harmony. Our joint Project CURE basketball team played during halftime at the famous MSG - Madison Square Garden! My music group opened for Al Green and The Winans at Gospel Night in Brooklyn just a year after the riots took place. Shortly after that we played in DC for the US Congress! What started as a small grassroots community effort turned into this exciting fast paced organization. We found ourselves on pretty much every major TV show at the time, including ESPN, Montel Williams, Donahue, and more.

Showtime turned my book into a major movie called “Crown Heights.” The movie, which also used three of my original songs, stars Howie Mandel as myself (no joke!) and is available on Netflix and other major internet sites and bookstores.

This past summer 2016 was the 25th reunion of us coming together as a more united community. Our band, Dr. Laz & The CURE, was the closing act for the One Crown Heights event, featured at a large, community park near the Brooklyn Children’s Museum. There are several videos of our group’s live performance on YouTube.

My new music video project is based on a tune I wrote close to three decades ago. Yikes! It’s called Increase The Peace, which was our motto back then and continues to be at the forefront of our beliefs and actions. I actually wrote the tune about a year before the Crown Heights riots, as I was tired of hearing about various negative racial incidents that were hitting the NYC area back then. It was my musical response to those events, urging people to take a more positive path and begin to appreciate our diversity. I never imagined back then that I would be using this tune for my own community of Crown Heights.

The video will feature both African-American and Hassidic dancers and singers, and will have an authentic street vibe to it, showing some conflict but leading to a meaningful and positive conclusion - all done in an upbeat rap/reggae style.

We’re looking to raise around $18,000 to make this project a top-notch professional production. The filming will take place mostly in Crown Heights and other street locations in good ol’ Brooklyn.

And you can find more information about my projects, books, and music on my two main sites at:  www.ProjectCureTheWorld.com and www.drlaz.com.

It's time to utilize the awesome power of music to help create some positive change. Starting with the "man in the mirror" to ultimately the world at large. 

I thank you in advance for your support for this timely and worthwhile project that is long overdue. Despite having an African-American president and the many positive strides our country has made in the area of race relations, we need to do more to foster respect. Race issues continue to be a major concern throughout the world. It’s more important than ever to truly ITP – Increase The Peace!

God bless... One Love

Dr. Laz & The CURE

To contact me directly please email me at

DrLaz770@gmail.com

story:
Best Christmas Gift this year!

It looks like dancing fountain, except it's dry. It sounds like fountain oozing or water fall pounding or geyser bursting, depends on the music you play.

It looks like snow, except not cold. You can virtually see a white Christmas in a crystal ball with your favorite songs. It looks like firecrackers, except no fire. It can generate 16,000,000 colors sync with your party beats. It looks cool and flashy, but not a toy. It's a top-of-the-line portable speaker!!

 

What's "Bass Fountain" Speaker?

"EyE Balls" consists of two portions, the "EyE" speaker and the micro "Balls". By inserting the neck of the Balls into the opening of the EyE, the EyE Balls effectively forms a magnificent "Light & Physical" show of "Music you can see" & "Bass you can see".

This campaign is a value pack of bundled "EyE" & "Balls" . You can use EyE speaker with or without  Balls.

 

 

What's "EyE" Speaker?

EyE is a top-of-the-line speaker, comparable to Bose Mini2 & JBL Pulse2, with affordable price. EyE Pair is two EyE to form a True Wireless Stereo system, just like latest iPhone7's AirPods.
Here is our real lab test result:

 

Amazon Review 4.8-star (as of 9/2016): EyE on Amazon

To learn more about EyE speaker: EyE on Indiegogo 

 

 

Principle of EyE Balls

 

 

Lighting sync with your music


 

 

Get a pair for a Stereo show!

 

 

Your own experiments !

 

 

 

Delivery Schedules

 

1. "EyE Balls": shipping by November, before Thanksgiving!

2. "EyE": shipping worldwide now: Purchase Now

story:
E9 - Turntable Vintage

 
E9 - Laptop
 
E9 - Gym

 

How the E9 was born

The E9’s inventor, Stephanie England, is always on the go. A full-time Engineering student and maker of practical gadgets, she enjoys experimenting with electrical circuits and building her own guitars. Music gives her inspiration; in her creative projects and as she shuffles around her workshop building her next neat piece of tech. She’s a loyal fan of vintage audio devices, but dislikes the encumbrance of the audio wires while doing work. Wanting to reconcile both her passions for music and tech, she began experimenting with various wireless transmitters available on the market. She was unhappy with the sound quality and fluidity they provided, so she set out to build a device which could respond to her specific requirements. Hence, the E9 was born.

 

Creating a device that will allow individuals to recycle, reuse, and reduce their carbon footprint while also reducing the cost of purchasing new audio devices. For us at E9, this is what it’s all about.  Unfortunately, as mentioned above, the E9 was created in the spare bedroom workshop of a University student. As a result, funds available are limited and the mass production of the E9 is fully dependent on you, our future potential backers. This crowd-funding campaign is the last step to make E9 a possibility.

 

The E9 is a fully patented device and is currently in its last phase of development before heading to production. This crowd-funding campaign is what will allow E9 to move into its production phase, and finally, to you, our backers.

 

At this very moment, we have fully working prototypes of the E9 and various mock-ups of the potential final look for the device. In our crowdfunding video, you can see the rectangular test prototype we’ve been working with. The final version will resemble the more elegant mock-ups in the pictures below.


 

In terms of production, we have quotes for both PCB and exterior case from a local Canadian manufacturer that will be able to build and assemble our product. We have also sourced a manufacturer for full retail packaging. Now, all that remains, is the funding required for production.

 

Our crowd-funding goal of $25,000 is set with the production cost of the E9 in mind. The cost of creating the molds and custom programmed PCB circuitry with our manufacturer represents our goal. Given the manufacturing location and origin of the E9, we have access to grants and government funding. Combined with our crowd-funding goal, we can launch into production.

 

This crowd-funding success is critical. The E9 already has potential retail partners interested and this is how we can get our beloved device on stores shelves for everyone to enjoy with you.

 

The device itself:


The E9 Audio Transmitter is a palm-sized Bluetooth adaptor that makes all your audio equipment wireless. Its smart design connects seamlessly with any Bluetooth-capable audio device (headphones, stereo, guitar etc.) and is engineered to perfectly match the sound quality you get from a wired experience. E9 Audio Transmitter can also be paired with your smartphone to take calls hands-free and its on-board receiving & transmitting technology lets you pair two non-Bluetooth devices simultaneously.

 

 

SOUND QUALITY :

We have worked thoroughly in crafting the E9 to ensure that the wireless audio quality it provides perfectly matches the sound consumers would get from a wired experience.

AUDIO FLUIDITY :

With the E9, you will not get interference, signal degradation or audio skips. With its operational range of 15 m / 50 ft and its battery lasting 12 hours, you will experience a smooth experience.

DEVICE COMPATIBILITY :

The E9 was created in close consultation with Bluetooth and makes uses of the its latest, high-end technology to bring its quality audio experience to all Bluetooth-capable devices.
 

E9 - Demo Multiple Devices

 
E9 - Up to 7 devices
 

 

E9 - Car

 

E9 - Gaming Headset

 

The Impact

Many products on the market are created with a “planned obsolescence” - meaning that it’s only a matter of time before they break and need to be replaced. Not only was the E9 built to last and not lose functionality and quality in delivery over time, we also built it to answer a need in the market for a device that can make old devices relevant again.
Remember all those vinyl records, 8-track tapes, cassettes and compact discs (CD) you have collected over the years, stored in a box in your basement? They can now enjoy a second life in combination with the E9 and get you back in touch with music you cherished.
This is why we are offering the E9 at such a “killer price”. When Stephanie created this, her sole purpose was to offer a solution regarding overconsumption and to allow everyone to profit from her device by saving and recycling their old devices.

 

Risks and challenges

In our industry, many of the risks and challenges can arise from competing companies with a bigger bankroll than us that could beat us to a product launch.
For this reason, we have filled for a patent well ahead of our launch so we could properly anticipate all the risks related to competition in a legal fashion.

Another challenge we face is the success of our crowdfunding campaign. It is extremely important to us that we can raise our capital needed to launch production without seeking out private investors or big corporations to us as we know that they might not support our idea of keeping the shelf price low and making it accessible to as many people as possible.

Some of the other risks or challenges faced in our industry happen post campaign, with the production, packaging and shipping of the product. To make sure it wouldn’t happen, we have partnered with a local mechanical engineer for a new industrial design (Design shown in 3D rendering and prototype casing showed in pictures). Through these, we have been able to hash out every single detail of the production process, from the tooling to the delays involved.

 

E9 - 3D Mockup

 

Working with top designers and manufacturers also allowed us to have our packaging and shipping methods prepared and ready to go. Everything is made in Canada.

 

The only predictable risk is to adapt to Android and iOS programming based on future changes to mobile operating systems and hardware.

 

Other ways you can help

This concept and idea originated from a spare bedroom converted into a workshop, on a student’s budget. We understand not everyone will have the means to support us financially. If that’s the case for you, that’s totally cool. If you feel as strongly about this project as we do, then there are a few other ways you can help.

Chances are, someone you know could help us out and not only pledge, but also benefit from the functionalities of the E9. Please help us spread the word by sharing this with your family and friends!

Much Love!

 

The E9 Team

 

Q&A (Questions & Answers) :

  1. How do you connect two non-Bluetooth devices together?The E9 is equipped with both transmitting and receiving capability. By connecting your first non-Bluetooth device to a transmitting E9, you can the pair it with another E9 in  receiving mode on your second non-Bluetooth device.
  2. How long does pairing take with the E9
    The E9 pair within 6 seconds of holding the pairing button.
  3. Can we choose which color the E9 comes in?
    A color option will be introduced as a stretch goal if we hit $60 000 in funding!
  4. I’ve seen other similar products on crowdfunding campaigns, what differentiates you?
    We have also seen similar products, but none of them work with the latest Bluetooth version or offer as many features as we do such as the transmitting and receiving mode. We also have a filed patent for the US and Canada and all our quality control is done here, according to North-American standards.

story:
Short Summary

I am a graduating college student who is passionate about creating premium audio experiences.  I founded Acoustic Masterminds® with the mission to make it convenient to diagnose acoustic issues in every environment, bringing excellent, enjoyable acoustic experiences to the world.  Whether I’m at a conference, concert, or restaurant, I am aware of the acoustic issues that cause increased stress and listening fatigue.  Room Calc will make it quick and easy for acoustic service providers to diagnosis and offer solutions for all types of venues.  Currently, the acoustic diagnosis process is only cost-effective for larger venues.  My goal is to make this process more accessible for small to medium venues, while still supporting large venues.

In May 2017, I will earn a B.S. in Digital Audio Technology from Cogswell College. I have created sound design for linear and interactive media and have a decade of experience in live sound mixing, recording and post production at church. These experiences have created a desire to solve acoustic issues for all types of rooms and venues.

This past November (2016), Acoustic Masterminds® launched AcoustiTools™ which also served as a proof-of-concept for the 3D technology that Acoustic Room Modes Calculator™ (Room Calc™) incorporates. 

With the goal to launch in late 2017, Room Calc is a professional tool that provides an easy way to solve acoustic problems with a mobile device. Room Calc takes a venue’s dimensions, constructs a model of the venue, and calculates room modes and other problematic acoustic issues for analysis and treatment solutions. Using advanced technology coming to mobile devices, Room Calc rapidly models, analyzes, and diagnoses complex acoustic issues, displaying the results using Augmented Reality.

Ways your contribution will help

Room Calc is currently under development.  To complete the development for launch, funds are needed to cover development costs, cloud service costs to run the core functions of Room Calc on secure servers, legal fees for creating contracts such as Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policies, patent application, etc.

With your contribution, I will be able to complete Room Calc, revolutionize the acoustic service field, and further the vision of making all your audio experiences enjoyable.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Over the past few months, I have been mentored in creating financial projections and have concluded that it will take $112,000 to bring Room Calc to market.  I have depleted my own savings, as well as received help from family to bring AcoustiTools to market, and am now launching this campaign to make Room Calc a reality.

Your contribution will go straight into funding costs such as:

  • Development (expert programming in emerging technology)
  • Cloud service costs (to run the core functions of Room Calc on secure servers)
  • Legal fees (for creating contracts such as Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policies, etc.)
  • PR fees to let the industry know about the new revolutionary product
  • Development resources (devices, development tools, etc.)
  • Patent fees

Perks offered:

  • Social Media shout out!
  • Your name listed on AcousticMasterminds.com (Generous Contributor Thank You List)
  • Hand-written thank you note from Caleb Madsen, Acoustic Masterminds Founder
  • Coupon for a free copy of AcoustiTools (Must have Tango-enabled device to take advantage of perk.)

What happens with the contributions if the goal isn't reached?

All funds will be used as described whether or not the goal is met.  This is the first funding campaign for Room Calc which will help continue our progress toward launch.

 

The Impact

Room Calc will not only impact the acoustics industry but my goal is for Room Calc to impact and improve everyone's auditory life, reducing brain stress and fatigue.

Have you ever had trouble hearing someone across the table from you in a restaurant, cafe, or a similar setting no matter how loud you were talking?  Have you ever had trouble understanding a speaker in a conference hall, office, or elsewhere?  These are experiences I envision solving by revolutionizing the acoustic industry with the speedy, mobile diagnostic technology of Room Calc.

 

Challenges

The main challenge has been defining my target market to break into the acoustic industry with Room Calc.

The solution I've found is targeting acoustic service providers such as those who sell treatment and those who survey the rooms and venues needing treatment.

I have been actively making connections and have several advisers experienced in different areas.  My mentors have been a massive help to me as I've been navigating the challenges of a start-up company.  By having this net of wisdom to draw upon, I am confident that Room Calc will launch successfully with your contribution.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help bring enjoyable audio experiences everywhere by using the share buttons for this Indiegogo campaign.  I really appreciate your interest in this project!
story_txt:
Short Summary
I am a graduating college student who is passionate about creating premium audio experiences.  I founded Acoustic Masterminds® with the mission to make it convenient to diagnose acoustic issues in every environment, bringing excellent, enjoyable acoustic experiences to the world.  Whether I’m at a conference, concert, or restaurant, I am aware of the acoustic issues that cause increased stress and listening fatigue.  Room Calc will make it quick and easy for acoustic service providers to diagnosis and offer solutions for all types of venues.  Currently, the acoustic diagnosis process is only cost-effective for larger venues.  My goal is to make this process more accessible for small to medium venues, while still supporting large venues.
In May 2017, I will earn a B.S. in Digital Audio Technology from Cogswell College. I have created sound design for linear and interactive media and have a decade of experience in live sound mixing, recording and post production at church. These experiences have created a desire to solve acoustic issues for all types of rooms and venues.
This past November (2016), Acoustic Masterminds® launched AcoustiTools™ which also served as a proof-of-concept for the 3D technology that Acoustic Room Modes Calculator™ (Room Calc™) incorporates. 
With the goal to launch in late 2017, Room Calc is a professional tool that provides an easy way to solve acoustic problems with a mobile device. Room Calc takes a venue’s dimensions, constructs a model of the venue, and calculates room modes and other problematic acoustic issues for analysis and treatment solutions. Using advanced technology coming to mobile devices, Room Calc rapidly models, analyzes, and diagnoses complex acoustic issues, displaying the results using Augmented Reality.
Ways your contribution will help
Room Calc is currently under development.  To complete the development for launch, funds are needed to cover development costs, cloud service costs to run the core functions of Room Calc on secure servers, legal fees for creating contracts such as Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policies, patent application, etc.
With your contribution, I will be able to complete Room Calc, revolutionize the acoustic service field, and further the vision of making all your audio experiences enjoyable.
 

What We Need & What You Get
Over the past few months, I have been mentored in creating financial projections and have concluded that it will take $112,000 to bring Room Calc to market.  I have depleted my own savings, as well as received help from family to bring AcoustiTools to market, and am now launching this campaign to make Room Calc a reality.
Your contribution will go straight into funding costs such as:

Development (expert programming in emerging technology)
Cloud service costs (to run the core functions of Room Calc on secure servers)
Legal fees (for creating contracts such as Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policies, etc.)
PR fees to let the industry know about the new revolutionary product
Development resources (devices, development tools, etc.)
Patent fees

Perks offered:

Social Media shout out!
Your name listed on AcousticMasterminds.com (Generous Contributor Thank You List)
Hand-written thank you note from Caleb Madsen, Acoustic Masterminds Founder
Coupon for a free copy of AcoustiTools (Must have Tango-enabled device to take advantage of perk.)

What happens with the contributions if the goal isn't reached?
All funds will be used as described whether or not the goal is met.  This is the first funding campaign for Room Calc which will help continue our progress toward launch.
 

The Impact
Room Calc will not only impact the acoustics industry but my goal is for Room Calc to impact and improve everyone's auditory life, reducing brain stress and fatigue.
Have you ever had trouble hearing someone across the table from you in a restaurant, cafe, or a similar setting no matter how loud you were talking?  Have you ever had trouble understanding a speaker in a conference hall, office, or elsewhere?  These are experiences I envision solving by revolutionizing the acoustic industry with the speedy, mobile diagnostic technology of Room Calc.
 

Challenges
The main challenge has been defining my target market to break into the acoustic industry with Room Calc.
The solution I've found is targeting acoustic service providers such as those who sell treatment and those who survey the rooms and venues needing treatment.
I have been actively making connections and have several advisers experienced in different areas.  My mentors have been a massive help to me as I've been navigating the challenges of a start-up company.  By having this net of wisdom to draw upon, I am confident that Room Calc will launch successfully with your contribution.
 
Other Ways You Can HelpHelp bring enjoyable audio experiences everywhere by using the share buttons for this Indiegogo campaign.  I really appreciate your interest in this project!

story:
Featured on

 

  • User reviews
  • Owners comments
  • Dedicated Head-Fi thread
  • Kickstarter comment board

 

BUILDING ON SUCCESS

Thanks to hundreds of loyal and satisfied backers we have successfully fulfilled our first crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter. With the help of our loyal fan base, backer- and headphone community we gratefully continued to develop and manufacture our headphone line-up on this successful concept.

Mitchell & Johnson headphones will reproduce the natural sounding recordings you like so much and will get you the lifelike movie playback.  

 

NEW LINE-UP

 

How much as we love to tailor our products to the customer needs, this is an InDemand campaign, meaning the headphones have already been designed, manufactured, tested and even been stored, ready to ship to you. 

 
GL1

GL2

 
MJ1

 

MJ2

 
JP1

The JP1 has a nice extra twist in that the right ear cup does twist at 90 degrees so if you're mixing or DJ-ing you get the benefit.

 

SOUND EVANGELIST CLUB

By backing one of our headphone perks you will be joining our special club of ‘Sound Evangelist’ as an early adopter at the different product level you choose, automatically providing you with substantial benefits on future product introductions. We will be advising on how to sign up for Sound Evangelists referral and reward programs in the next few weeks and help build the community.

We’re passing on some huge discounts so you can be first on board. Join us and help spread the word as a Sound Evangelist on how we can all improve the enjoyment of our music.

 

The Experts Views:-

Read what others have to say about our headphones on dedicated websites like Head-Fi reviews, dedicated forum threads (click) and comments of the backers of our Kickstarter campaign (click)

 

*) TECH BACKGROUND

Most headphones have the sound coming from a single cone speaker, ours have a hybrids concept called Electrostatz® where an electrostatic is added. The next visuals show why and how they can deliver such precision and clarity.

The electrostatic drivers from the electret type are made of very thin electrically charged material that oscillates and vibrates in a very uniform way hence less distortion and a more pure original to the original studio master recording can be heard.

Cross over occurs here at 4Khz and the sound separation between the bass, the mids, trebles and highs lets each driver do the best job it can with those sound frequencies.

Put the 2 drivers together and you have the best of both worlds, a hybrid electrostatic experience, that is a portable electrostatic experience that smashes the price barrier of a normal everyday electrostatic pair of headphones.

 

ABOUT MITCHELL & JOHNSON

Mitchell & Johnson is an existing UK based audio manufacturer with its own sales, distribution and retail network . Check our website for some of the award winning products.

We are a truly global team, small and nimble, a Hi-Fi specialist company started in 2012, with team members in London, Hong Kong, Thailand, USA and the EU, though post Brexit, we better keep quiet about that for now! 

With this InDemand campaign Mitchell & Johnson is here to provide audio enthusiasts with the best affordable sound: the best of both worlds hybrid driver headphones*) that will  deliver. These headphones are stocked in the warehouse to ensure these beauties will be on their way to your home asap.

We have some groundbreaking products in development stage which we are very eager to finalise. The funds raised with this campaign will be re-invested in those products.

 

ADDITIONAL INFO

SHIPPING, COSTS AND DELIVERY TIME

We will ship from Hong Kong, and we cannot be liable for any local taxes or customs duties that your border authorities will impose. Please research the limits in place in your country. The global variations for imports are huge and it’s impossible to keep track.

 

RISK & CHALLENGES

None actually. Our Kickstarter campaign had unforseen difficulties, but this time we  wanted to be sure we were ready to go: the headphones sit in a warehouse ready to ship.

Excellent extra quality control has been in place to ensure the best production quality, we stand proud to solve any issue that might arise, our fellow Sound Evangelists will be taken good care of.

 

WE NEED YOUR HELP

If you like the idea of the campaign please evangelise and like and share our Facebook, Twitter, visit our website and look at the Indiegogo sharing tools to help you to help us

Even $1 reward will help us, especially when you take that perk as serious as we do. If you backed the initial Kickstarter project that helped us develop and market our headphones, you will be helping a lot by leaving your honest feedback here on Indiegogo.

Thank you

 

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS [still under construction]

 

Headphones

"Will you be offering balanced configurations, recabling or any other modification services?"

Not for this campaign. If time and funds allow we will definitely be looking at going balanced for our next generation of Electrostatz and offering recabling services! As much as we would like to encourage owners to modify the headphones to their needs, we simply cannot void any warranty. Please note that the balanced option does not always bring out the best in headphones.

"What is the main difference between your headphones and others at a similar price?"

Our headphones use a patented technology called Electrostatz that will give you crystal clear sound

 

Perks, rewards

"Can I get multiple perks?"

Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.

"Can I change my perk?"

Unfortunately, not during the campaign.  Before we send you your gear, we'll send you an email with a link to a system that will help you manage your perk and input your shipping information.

 

Shipping, taxes  

"I've changed my mind. Can I get a refund?"

Sorry, Indiegogo's policy is No Refunds. Unfortunately, there's nothing we can do about this. When your contribution is deposited into our PayPal account, it comes from Indiegogo, not from you. So if we were to refund your contribution, it wouldn't make it back to you. Please see Indiegogo's rules here.

"How much is shipping?"

We decided on a flat shipping fee per unit purchased of $10, we wanted to keeps the costs of getting your headphones to you as low as possible wherever you live in the world.

"When you ship, will you please declare a lesser value on the customs form?"

No.

"What's the warranty?"

Our headphones come with a 3 year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

story:
ALTER EGO: our story and our brand

We are makers of acoustic and electric string instruments. For twenty-five years we have been committed to delivering the best sound and playability experience to the traveling and studio musician.

This campaign is to launch our new line of acoustic electric upright basses: the EVO line.

In the past two years, we have been working hard to design a new hollow-body acoustic EUB that is the most portable travel bass while keeping all the acoustic features of the traditional double bass. The EVO bass features a sound board in red spruce and a chamber of resonance. Compared to our very much loved acoustic EUB, we reduced weight by about 30%.

We now need your help to make it the most affordable EUB by ALTER EGO.
 

 

#EVO is lighter

EVO weights about 30% less than our lightest EUB.

- Its alloy structure is engineered for sustaining the highest string tension of a double bass.
- Its upper bout parts are removable to fit in a compact travel bag. They adjust for a perfect individualized ergonomics while preserving dimension and proportions of a traditional instrument.

 

 

#EVO is acoustic

EVO is traditional woods where it matters.

- Its soundboard is in select red spruce from Val di Fiemme. A fine crafted neck in maple and smooth fingerboard make EVO very comfortable to play.
- The use of regular strings and a traditional bridge combined with a multi-source modular pickup system give considerable tonal versatility for each musician to create their own sound.

 

#EVO is affordable

EVO is a bass player’s best return of investment.

- EVO is a highly dependable instrument, designed through the last detail to last a lifetime.
- It comes with quality third-party components that one does not need to upgrade.
- Its built-in active electronics provides a buffered output created by the musician, ready to be used at high volume on any stages and studios.

 

EVO comes with its gig bag, adjustable removable parts, built-in active electronics, removable neck, and adjustable neck system.

 

 

ALEXANDER HOHENEGGER, the designer

When Alexander started, in 1991, he was a music student and wanted to solve a personal need, common to many players of large music instruments: he wishes he could have an instrument, reduced in size, that was the alter ego of his own cello.

In his company, Alexander let musicians have a leading role in our design vision. The classical instrument is and remains the gold standard; the ALTER EGO instruments expand on it thanks to their features and modular concept.

It was a trial-and-error process, and today, after so many years of research and development, the ALTER EGO instruments with their sound board are the closer you can get in terms of sound and playability to the classical instrument we departed from.

 

 

The Indiegogo Campaign


Our EVO line was conceived to make our instruments more affordable to musicians.
Your help is to cover our costs of research of development so that they don’t have an impact on the final price of the instruments.

We have completed several rounds of tests with different prototypes, and we are now at the production stage.

Secure your EVO bass today at a limited introductory price before it is offered to the public.

We ship worldwide. You’ll receive your bass in custom-made reinforced shipping boxes that are compact, safe, and reusable.

 

For those of you who play the bass but may not be ready to buy an EVO bass today, please do not miss to check out our microphones and pickups for traditional bass.


Any contribution is highly appreciated, so please get the word out!
