story:
The Microsoft Surface is a powerful device, but because it's so compact, its speakers lack the sound quality most people want.  So we developed the Surface Sound Speaker by bidul.  The Surface Sound Speaker is the first, wireless speaker system made just for the Surface line of tablets.  Its innovative shape fits seamlessly with Surface and turns your music, conference calls ... all your audio into rich, room filling  sound.  More than just a speaker, the Surface Sound is packed with convenience and performance.  Connect external devices with NFC or Bluetooth and stream audio instantly or use our integrated SD card port for music playback.  Need a charge?  Surface Sound doubles as a mobile power bank, just plug in any smart device with our micro USB connection and go!  Best of all, the Surface Sound Speaker holds a charge for up to 20 hours and can go anywhere with its compact design. 


Surface Sound Speaker 3D conception

Surface Sound Speaker white matt

Surface Sound Speaker black matt

Surface Sound Speaker grey matt

Surface Sound


  • Surface Sound offer multi connection possibilities such as Bluetooth, NFC Bluetooth, Skype, and a Micro Jack connection.
  • Surface Sound is made for several uses: With a Surface Tablet, a Bluetooth device or in standalone mode.
  • Surface Sound is “Designed for Surface”.
  • You will experiment the pure sound and the quality of the Surface Sound.
  • Use the Surface Sound as a power bank for Smartphones.
  • You can take Surface Sound with you everywhere thanks to its mobility and its design.


F.A.Q.

1. Which of Surface tablet models is Surface Sound compatible with?

Surface Sound is compatible with all Surface models.

2. Can I use Surface Sound with my Smartphone, my notebook or another Bluetooth devices?

Yes, Surface Sound is fully Bluetooth / NFC Bluetooth compatible and it can be used with a smartphone, a notebook, a laptop, a tablet, etc.

3. Is Surface Sound Skype compatible?

Yes, Surface Sound is fully Skype compatible. The internal microphone allows you to use Surface Sound for Skype conferences.

4. Do I need to pair manually my Surface Sound with my device each time I want to use it?

No, the pairing is automatic once you have made it the first time.

5. What is the maximum transmission distance between Surface Sound and Bluetooth device?

The Transmission distance is up to 15 meters depending the area where Surface Sound is used.

6. Can I use USB Flash Drive or micro-SD card to play music?

Yes, Surface Sound allows you to play .mp3 and .wav files directly from USB Flash Drive or micro-SD card.

7. What is the battery autonomy of Surface Sound?

Thanks to the 4000 mAh lithium battery, Surface sound can be used up to 20 hours in playing mode.

Look at the pre-production of the Surface !

Participate to the project !



A special access to our Intranet will be available for the ones who participate at a minimum of the Prestige offer, and will be allowed to chat with our team and the other contributors in order to improve our future products, and also to propose ideas and solutions for the current Surface Sound.

Bidul & Co

Philippe                            Nicolas                               Alain

With an experience of many years in the field of data storage and the development of software for assisted backup, we create a range of products and software for backup and exchange of digital data.

Since its creation in 2011, Bidul & Co masters both research and development (R&D) products, communication and marketing in different distribution channels in Europe and in North America (United States & Canada). In total, we are doing business in 26 countries.

Bidul is part of the French Tech Lyon, which allows us potential partnerships. Indeed, we are a French company located in Lyon, France.

We already worked together in our previous job since the end of the 90’s, and it was clear that we had the same goal: propose technology innovations to this international market. We sell accessories for Smartphones, Android, Apple licensed MFI, and Microsoft tablets under the program « Designed for Surface ».

Philippe Beraldin: Marketing Director and Co-Founder of Bidul & Co

Philippe has 13 years of experience in the IT sector and consumable accessory.

Philippe, on both his career, is the key figure for the promotion and communication of Bidul products.

He has a very good ability to unite several market players for the creation of commercial operations (Organization of a European competition around the 100th anniversary of Harley Davidson, European competition to win a flight in the stratosphere, organizing an event for the launch of a product, etc.).

Philippe is a specialist in social marketing.

Philippe is involved in the development of Bidul products, bringing his knowledge of the users (consumers) and his mastery of existing and future market trends.

Nicolas Basset: Commercial Director and Co-Founder of Bidul & Co

Nicolas has 16 years of experience as a sales manager in the European sector of consumable and computer accessory.

Nicolas has a good network of distributors in Europe but also in the United States, woven throughout his career thanks to his precision and availability.

Nicolas is also involved in the development of Bidul products, sharing his vision of customer expectations.

Alain Favre: Product Director and Co-Founder of Bidul & Co

Alain has more than 18 years of experience in the Information Technology industry, including 10 years as a technical manager and product in the area of computer consumables and accessories.

Alain masters the design, the implementation and the control of the production of new products.

Alain is also a computer programmer for MAC and PC (software public and professionals in the field of security).

Laurie Bustos: Marketing and sales support of Bidul & Co

Laurie has a training course of two years in international trade in Lyon, and few experiences in companies thanks to internships abroad.

Laurie manages the export development of new products in Europe and North America through the Indiegogo program.


We are looking for your help to launch our product and every cents of the funding we'll get will go to the production of the Surface Sound !

Bidul & Co team at the CES in Las Vegas, 2015

Risks
Our prototype has been approved and the product complies with the FCC and CE standards. The production is waiting to be launched, so no problems should be expected to date.
We particularly care about the development and the quality of our products and about the satisfaction of our users.

Challenges

For the future, we want to strengthen our presence in the USA to be more active in this state which could be a promise of development for us.

We would also like to sell new products adapted for the Windows Phones.

We want to continue to propose new products which are different but easy to use, in order to satisfy more people as possible.

Furthermore, we want to sell our products in Latino America.


Join us on Facebook and Twitter ! It is not only a product we want to create, it is a community to debate on several technological subjects and projects. Every comment and idea is useful for us and this is a way to be close to our users.

2. Can I use Surface Sound with my Smartphone, my notebook or another Bluetooth devices?
Yes, Surface Sound is fully Bluetooth / NFC Bluetooth compatible and it can be used with a smartphone, a notebook, a laptop, a tablet, etc.
3. Is Surface Sound Skype compatible?
Yes, Surface Sound is fully Skype compatible. The internal microphone allows you to use Surface Sound for Skype conferences.
4. Do I need to pair manually my Surface Sound with my device each time I want to use it?
No, the pairing is automatic once you have made it the first time.
5. What is the maximum transmission distance between Surface Sound and Bluetooth device?
The Transmission distance is up to 15 meters depending the area where Surface Sound is used.
6. Can I use USB Flash Drive or micro-SD card to play music?
Yes, Surface Sound allows you to play .mp3 and .wav files directly from USB Flash Drive or micro-SD card.
7. What is the battery autonomy of Surface Sound?
Thanks to the 4000 mAh lithium battery, Surface sound can be used up to 20 hours in playing mode.
Look at the pre-production of the Surface !





Participate to the project !











A special access to our Intranet will be available for the ones who participate at a minimum of the Prestige offer, and will be allowed to chat with our team and the other contributors in order to improve our future products, and also to propose ideas and solutions for the current Surface Sound.
Bidul & Co


Philippe                            Nicolas                               Alain
With an experience of many years in the field
of data storage and the development of software for assisted backup, we create
a range of products and software for backup and exchange of digital data.
Since its creation in 2011, Bidul & Co
masters both research and development (R&D) products, communication and
marketing in different distribution channels in Europe and in North America
(United States & Canada). In total, we are doing business in 26 countries.
Bidul is part of the
French Tech Lyon, which allows us potential partnerships. Indeed, we are a
French company located in Lyon, France.
We already worked together in our previous job
since the end of the 90’s, and it was clear that we had the same goal: propose
technology innovations to this international market. We
sell accessories for Smartphones, Android, Apple licensed MFI, and Microsoft
tablets under the program « Designed for Surface ».
Philippe Beraldin: Marketing Director and
Co-Founder of Bidul & Co

Philippe has 13 years of experience in the IT
sector and consumable accessory.
Philippe, on both his career, is the key
figure for the promotion and communication of Bidul products.
He has a very good ability to unite several
market players for the creation of commercial operations (Organization of a
European competition around the 100th anniversary of Harley Davidson, European
competition to win a flight in the stratosphere, organizing an event for the
launch of a product, etc.).
Philippe is a specialist in social marketing.
Philippe is involved in the development of
Bidul products, bringing his knowledge of the users (consumers) and his mastery
of existing and future market trends.

Nicolas Basset: Commercial Director and
Co-Founder of Bidul & Co

Nicolas has 16 years of experience as a sales
manager in the European sector of consumable and computer accessory.
Nicolas has a good network of distributors in
Europe but also in the United States, woven throughout his career thanks to his
precision and availability.
Nicolas is also involved in the development of
Bidul products, sharing his vision of customer expectations.
Alain Favre: Product Director and Co-Founder
of Bidul & Co

Alain has more than 18 years of experience in
the Information Technology industry, including 10 years as a technical manager
and product in the area of computer consumables and accessories.
Alain masters the design, the implementation
and the control of the production of new products.
Alain is also a computer programmer for MAC
and PC (software public and professionals in the field of security).
Laurie
Bustos: Marketing and sales support of Bidul & Co
Laurie has a training course of two years in
international trade in Lyon, and few experiences in companies thanks to
internships abroad.
Laurie manages the export development of new
products in Europe and North America through the Indiegogo program.


We are looking for your help to launch our product and every cents of the funding we'll get will go to the production of the Surface Sound !









Bidul & Co team at the CES in Las Vegas, 2015


Risks
Our prototype has been approved and the product complies with the FCC and CE standards. The production is waiting to be launched, so no problems should be expected to date.
We particularly care about the development and the quality of our products and about the satisfaction of our users.

Challenges
For the future, we want to strengthen our presence in the USA to be more active in this state which could be a promise of development for us.
We would also like to sell new products adapted for the Windows Phones.
We want to continue to propose new products which are different but easy to use, in order to satisfy more people as possible.
Furthermore, we want to sell our products in Latino America.

Join us on Facebook and Twitter ! It is not only a product we want to create, it is a community to debate on several technological subjects and projects. Every comment and idea is useful for us and this is a way to be close to our users.

story:
Pi 2 Design is proud to announce the 502DAC family of High Resolution Audio Shields for the Raspberry Pi platform!

 

The 502DAC & 502DAC PRO are fully compliant Raspberry Pi shields designed to deliver the highest quality audio for your music listening. This powerful combination is suitable for the bedroom, the living room, game room or anywhere high quality sound is desired. Add an inexpensive USB drive to form a high performance, compact music server system. Stream music from local storage or from your phone over Wifi. Control the system with your phone over WiFI or Bluetooth.

 

Open source, off-the-shelf software allows the 502DAC/Raspberry Pi combination to serve as an audio endpoint that can be situated in multiple rooms throughout your house or office, playing music from a central server, remotely controlled from your phone. It also allows you to stream music directly from your phone (Airplay, Airfoil, UPnP/DLNA, etc).

 

The 502DAC family consists of the 502DAC and the 502DAC PRO. Each version is designed with the high performance WM8804 AES/EBU digital audio transmitter coupled with a high-Resolution 24-Bit@192Khz DAC. Dual ultra-low noise clock oscillators are used to ensure that files based on 44.1K or 48K frame rates (up to 16/24-Bit @ 176.4Khz/192Khz) play flawlessly.

The digital side of the 502DAC family consists of transformer isolated single ended AES/EBU and balanced output AES/EBU, as well as optical S/PDIF. Ultra-low noise Voltage Regulators are used to provide proper operating voltage to this circuitry thus eliminating coupled noise from the Raspberry Pi platform. The digital outputs from this section deliver bit perfect digital data with noise levels below -150dBu! No PC/USB based transport can beat this performance. The 502DAC and 502DAC Pro digital sections deliver the following specifications:

  • WM8804 AES/EBU Digital Audio Transmitter 
  • Dual Low Noise, Low Jitter NDK NZ2520SD Oscillators
  • Bit Perfect 16-Bit and 24-Bit Digital Transport
  • Transformer Isolated Single Ended AES/EBU via 75 ohm BNC (RCA Adapter included)
  • Transformer Isolated Balanced AES/EBU via 1/4" TRRS Jack (XLR Adapter included)
  • Optical TOSLINK Transmitter for S/PDIF

 

502DAC - PCM5122 Analog DAC

The analog side of the 502DAC2 is based around the high quality TI PCM5122. The 502DAC Analog Section delivers the following specifications:

  • PCM5122 Direct Path 24-Bit@384Khz Audio DAC
  • 2Vrms Ground Centered DC Output (No Coupling Capacitors)
  • SW selectable Digital Filtering and Equalization
  • .002% THD+N @ -6dbu (0dbu = 0.775Vrms)
  • -95db Residual Noise @ -6dbu (0dbu = 0.775Vrms)
  • Less than -125db Noise Floor
  • Dual Gold Plated RCA Jacks
Download the 502DAC Hardware Reference Manual w/test results

 

502DAC PRO - PCM1792 Analog DAC

The analog side of the 502DAC PRO is based around the professional, audiophile quality TI PCM1792. The output of this DAC is buffered and filtered via a pair of LM49720 Ultra-Low Distortion op amps. The resulting output delivers up to 2V RMS stereo with THD+N levels (measured at -6dbu into 600 ohm) below -100dBu with an outstanding noise floor below -135dBu! The analog and headphone amplifier sections easily meet or beat most DAC/Amplifier units costing upwards of $1000 or more!

The 502DAC PRO Analog Section delivers the following specifications:

  • PCM1792 Advanced Segment 24-Bit@192Khz Audio DAC
  • LME49720 Ultra-Low Distortion Op Amp I/V Section provides 2Vrms Out
  • -102dBu THD+N, 1Khz @ -6dBu (0dBu = 0.775Vrms)
  • Less than -130dBu Noise Floor, 1Khz @ -6dbu (0dBu = 0.775Vrms)
  • Dual Gold Plated RCA Jacks

In addition to the outstanding analog line level output, the 502DAC PRO also includes an audiophile quality headphone amplifier based on the LME49600 w/LME49720 Op Amps. This amplifier can deliver up to 8V RMS @ 200ma with THD levels below -90 dBu with a noise floor below -120dBu! This headphone amplifier will drive virtually any headphone (IEM, Dynamic, Planar, etc) from 16 ohm to 300 ohm with ease, fidelity and clarity. The built in DC Servo creates <1mv DC offset, insuring your expensive headphone investment is safe!

The 502DAC PRO Headphone Amplifier Section has the following specifications:

  • LME49600 w/LME49720 Op Amps drives up to 8Vrms (6Vrms @ 32 ohm)
  • Integrated DC Servo Insures <1mv DC Offset (prevents damage to headphones)
  • -97dbu THD+N, 1Khz  @ 0dBu into 600 ohm (0db = 2Vrms )
  • Less than -125dBu Noise Floor, 1Khz @ 0dBu into 600 ohm (0dBu = 0.775Vrms)
  • <1 ohm Output Impedance
  • 3.5mm Stereo Headphone Jack

Download the 502DAC PRO HW Reference Manual w/test results

 

Industry Standard, Open Source Players

Industry-standard PCM5122 (502DAC) and WM8804 (502DAC PRO) drivers work without modification or configuration. This ease-of-use insures that you will be up and running and delivering the highest quality stereo audio from the Raspberry Pi quickly and inexpensively.

The 502DAC and 502DAC Pro were designed to be plug-and-play with virtually all Raspberry Pi Audio Players, Multimedia Platforms and Multi-Room Audio Endpoints including, but not limited to the following:

 

Why Our Audio Shield?

We know there are many choices for audio shields designed to run on the Raspberry Pi. We believe the 502DAC and 502DAC Pro stand above those shields when it comes to features and, ultimately, the sound. With the best digital audio quality you can buy and two levels of outstanding analog audio quality, the 502DAC or 502DAC Pro may well be the last audio shields you buy! Compare for yourself:

 

What You Get

Getting the most out of your music collection does not require large sums of money, nor large stacks of gear. If you know how to use a Raspberry Pi, then you already have the basis of a superb sound system without spending thousands!

And if you don't know Raspberry Pi from Apple Pie or Lemon Meringue (my favorite) there are great, easy to follow guides like this one from Likehacker:

http://lifehacker.com/5976912/a-beginners-guide-to-diying-with-the-raspberry-pi?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=pulsenews

Get started today, so you can be ready when the campaign is over and your 502DAC or 502DAC Pro arrives!

 

Why We Need You

The 502DAC is already in early production and the 502DAC Pro is just entering production. This campaign is designed to spread the word to the larger marketplace of those who want High-Resolution, Audiophile quality sound using the incredibly flexible, inexpensive Raspberry Pi platform.

All of this will be backed by a 30 day money back guarantee and an unprecedented 3-year warranty. Unlimited email support is provided as well as educational and volume discounts. We have the utmost confidence that we can deliver the highest quality products you expect and deserve!

 

Risks & Challenges

Because the 502DAC is already in early production, and the 502DAC Pro is built on this base platform, we are very confident that we will be able to deliver products starting as soon as the campaign ends and the funds are transferred. Obviously the total numbers that we sell could have an impact on that. But we are already preparing to build one hundred of each before the campaign ends, in order to get the Early Birds out asap.

We will provide regular updates regarding these pre-production units as the campaign goes on and of course will answer any questions about the product, whether technical, logistical or other!

story:
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR SUPPORTING OUR CAMPAIGN!

We have kick started full production of ORION360 speaker system with ATMOS + VORTEX BASS subwoofer.

We will keep all our backers, supports and well wishers informed about the progress with regular updates.

Please reach us on info@feelorion.com if you have any questions.

Thank you very much for your continued support.

Best Regards

-The ORION360 TEAM 

   

 

 

 

We are a boutique design studio driven by a team of designers and product development experts with an ambition to envisage and nurture futuristic products.

Our expertise is in concept development, design, marketing and prototyping products.

We have established agreements with reputed manufacturing partners around the world to help us with our manufacturing and logistic needs.

ORION360 concept is 100% complete with a working prototype in hand.

Below is the production timeline for your reference.

 

When will i receive my ORION360 ?

If you are one of the early adopter, you will receive your ORION360 by Feb 2018. Other pledgers will receive their ORION360 in March 2018, We will provide continuous updates aboiut the production schedule during and after the campaign.

Where do you ship to ?

We ship all over the world where delivery is possible.

Is the shipping included ?

Shipping is included for super early bird pledgers. Shipping for other pledgers is US$18.00 anywhere in the world.

Is there warranty included for ORION360 ?

Yes, ORION360 comes with a 1 year replacement warranty.

Just email to orders@feelorion.com

Does ORION360 come in more than 1 color ?

Yes, At present ORION360 comes in 3 color : Charcoal Black, Metallic Grey, Dark Walnut.

There are more colour options in our stretch goals which will be unveiled as we reach our goal.

How many speakers are inside ORION360 ?

There are 7 custom designed high output speakers inside ORION360 with a combined output of 120watts arranged in a circular fashion for a true 360 degree surround sound.

What is the output of ORION360 under max volume ?

ORION360 produces an output of 120watts that is around 110db of audible sound which is loud enough for a portable music system.

Does the ORION360 GTEK sensors need periodic up keeping ?

No, GTEK sensors are encased inside a safe & secure metallic case and you do you have to worry about dust or cleaning.

How much does ORION360 weighs ?

ORION360 is lightweight and very portable considering it's powerful output. It measures 7.3 x 3.8 inches and weighs roughly 39oz.

Can ORION360 be used as a dedicated Soundbar for Television ?

Yes, You can certainly use ORION360 as a Soundbar for your Television. 
There is an AUX input socket on ORION360 for non-bluetooth streaming which you can plug in to the TV.

Also we include a complimentary AUX cable with ORION360 music system which should help you.

Will Bluetooth streaming work if the Analog AUX input in plugged in on ORION360 ?

You can certainly use Bluetooth streaming even when the analog input is plugged in. 
AUX streaming works when all bluetooth contacts are disconnected (Bluetooth has high priority over AUX for easy of operation). 
You can also do a power reset for a quick bluetooth disconnect and start using AUX right away.

What is the Operating range of ORION360 GTEK gesture sensors ?

ORION360 gesture sensors can detect gestures instructions between 1-8 inches of accuracy.

Whats the Frequency response for ORION360 music system ?

The frequency response for ORION360 will be 38Hz-20kHz +/- 4db.

Do we have to download additional App's to equalise ORION360 ?

No additionally App's are necessary. We want ORION360 to work with equalizers from any streaming devices.

What is the Hi-Res streaming bit rate for ORION360 ?

ORION360 comes with a Hi-Res streaming bit-rate of 24/96khz.

Do you have more questions ?

Please Email info@feelorion.com for any additional questions!

Risks & Challenges

Like any hardware project, there are risks and challenges associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics.

We’re working with a tier-one manufacturing partner that builds music system for some of the most renowned brands in the business. That said, there is always a chance that unexpected changes or issues may arise during execution impacting the delivery schedule.

Risks & Challenges
Like any hardware project, there are risks and challenges associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics.
We’re working with a tier-one manufacturing partner that builds music system for some of the most renowned brands in the business. That said, there is always a chance that unexpected changes or issues may arise during execution impacting the delivery schedule.

story:
Mitchell Acoustics is a British audio company started by myself,  Paul Mitchell.

My express intent is to make the enjoyment of beautifully recorded stereo music, simpler and more accessible for everyone.

I have been responsible for designing many award winning audio units in the past having worked in the consumer electronics industry since 1980. I am also a professional musician and recording artist and have performed extensively around the world.

This campaign has been created to raise awareness for our first product to be launched under the Mitchell Acoustics brand, the uStream One true wireless Bluetooth stereo speaker set. A simple to use twin speaker system that works purely on Bluetooth to deliver sound quality with serious Hi-Fi credentials.

 

You will be the first in the world to get the uStream One in July as soon as our production stock arrives in the UK

The uStream One system consists of two identical wireless bluetooth active speakers that use TWS technology to link to each other without any wires or connecting cables, making them truly wireless. Just plug them in to the mains power and they will connect to each other within in seconds, allowing you to connect any Bluetooth music source as a single device, just like you would with your wireless ear pods.

You can use a smartphone, laptop,  tablet or even a smart device like an Amazon Echo or Google Home, nominating the uStream One's as your preferred playback device.

A huge amount of people are now getting their music from YouTube and listening on their smartphones and tablets. With the uStream One you can now listen to all that music in glorious stereo- something you cannot do with any networked audio device.

The most important aspect of the system is the sound quality, I can assure you it is comparable to systems that are three times the price.

Some reviews from people in the music industry:

Steve Sidwell: 

Award Winning Producer/Arranger

Grammy, Tony, Emmy award winner

Clients include: Robbie Williams, Michael Buble, Jeff Beck, McFly and many more

"I spend hours in a recording studio and I can safely say, at the price point, there is nothing beats the uStream One speakers for pure musical power and convenience. A truly stunning sound from such a small system"

 

John Etchells:

Renowned Sound Engineer

over 200 credits

Artists include: Queen, Dire Straits, David Gilmour, George Harrison & many more

"The first time I heard the uStream One speakers I was actually blown away. At the price there really is nothing that sounds this good and in such a convenient package..my wife loves them too!"

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS:

The uStream One has a number of different inputs on its rear panel allowing connection of any other audio kit you may have, like a turntable, TV or MP3 player for example.

These include:

1 x Stereo L + R RCA connector for a turntable

1 x Digital Optical connection

1 x 3.5mm Line-In connector

1 x USB connector

 

Rated Output Power: 100 watts

THD (Total Harmonic Distortion): <0.5% at 1W 1KHz

Frequency Response Range: 20Hz – 20KHz20

Speaker Driver Size: 106mm bass driver, 38mm treble driver

Diaphragm: Magnesium Alloy

Voice Coil: Proprietary design voice coil with 20oz (566g) neodymium magnet

Power Supply: AC 110-230V, 50/60 Hz 

 

Height: 24cm

Width: 15cm

Depth: 23cm

 

Weight: 3.3 KG Per Speaker

 

 

 

Our Guarantee

One thing we can guarantee you. We have paid for the first shipment of 500 units and these are being made now and they will ship to the UK to arrive by early July. All orders placed via Indiegogo will ship in July via our courier partner and be fully trackable.

The warranty on the uStream One is a full 5 Year warranty from date of purchase.

We are offering deep discounts now pre-launch to help our cash flow,  as we like many others have been affected by the Covid 19 epidemic. By selling a number of units now at these discounted prices,  we can move forward and get additional stocks in place for our retail launch.

 

Enjoy a uStream One now all to yourself in your lounge, kitchen or bedroom.Enjoy your music in stereo as it was meant to be heard.  If you have a larger house or apartment enjoy the deeper discounts on the double pack or the family pack.

 

Choose your colour finish at checkout, available in Piano Black or Piano White
story_txt:
Mitchell Acoustics is a British audio company started by myself,  Paul Mitchell.
My express intent is to make the enjoyment of beautifully recorded stereo music, simpler and more accessible for everyone.
I have been responsible for designing many award winning audio units in the past having worked in the consumer electronics industry since 1980. I am also a professional musician and recording artist and have performed extensively around the world.
This campaign has been created to raise awareness for our first product to be launched under the Mitchell Acoustics brand, the uStream One true wireless Bluetooth stereo speaker set. A simple to use twin speaker system that works purely on Bluetooth to deliver sound quality with serious Hi-Fi credentials.
 


You will be the first in the world to get the uStream One in July as soon as our production stock arrives in the UK
The uStream One system consists of two identical wireless bluetooth active speakers that use TWS technology to link to each other without any wires or connecting cables, making them truly wireless. Just plug them in to the mains power and they will connect to each other within in seconds, allowing you to connect any Bluetooth music source as a single device, just like you would with your wireless ear pods.
You can use a smartphone, laptop,  tablet or even a smart device like an Amazon Echo or Google Home, nominating the uStream One's as your preferred playback device.
A huge amount of people are now getting their music from YouTube and listening on their smartphones and tablets. With the uStream One you can now listen to all that music in glorious stereo- something you cannot do with any networked audio device.
The most important aspect of the system is the sound quality, I can assure you it is comparable to systems that are three times the price.

Some reviews from people in the music industry:
Steve Sidwell: 
Award Winning Producer/Arranger
Grammy, Tony, Emmy award winner
Clients include: Robbie Williams, Michael Buble, Jeff Beck, McFly and many more
"I spend hours in a recording studio and I can safely say, at the price point, there is nothing beats the uStream One speakers for pure musical power and convenience. A truly stunning sound from such a small system"
 
John Etchells:
Renowned Sound Engineer
over 200 credits
Artists include: Queen, Dire Straits, David Gilmour, George Harrison & many more

"The first time I heard the uStream One speakers I was actually blown away. At the price there really is nothing that sounds this good and in such a convenient package..my wife loves them too!"
 

 
SPECIFICATIONS:
The uStream One has a number of different inputs on its rear panel allowing connection of any other audio kit you may have, like a turntable, TV or MP3 player for example.
These include:
1 x Stereo L + R RCA connector for a turntable
1 x Digital Optical connection
1 x 3.5mm Line-In connector
1 x USB connector
 
Rated Output Power: 100 watts
THD (Total Harmonic Distortion): <0.5% at 1W 1KHz
Frequency Response Range: 20Hz – 20KHz20
Speaker Driver Size: 106mm bass driver, 38mm treble driver
Diaphragm: Magnesium Alloy
Voice Coil: Proprietary design voice coil with 20oz (566g) neodymium magnet
Power Supply: AC 110-230V, 50/60 Hz 
 
Height: 24cm
Width: 15cm
Depth: 23cm
 
Weight: 3.3 KG Per Speaker

 

 
 Our GuaranteeOne thing we can guarantee you. We have paid for the first shipment of 500 units and these are being made now and they will ship to the UK to arrive by early July. All orders placed via Indiegogo will ship in July via our courier partner and be fully trackable.The warranty on the uStream One is a full 5 Year warranty from date of purchase.We are offering deep discounts now pre-launch to help our cash flow,  as we like many others have been affected by the Covid 19 epidemic. By selling a number of units now at these discounted prices,  we can move forward and get additional stocks in place for our retail launch. Enjoy a uStream One now all to yourself in your lounge, kitchen or bedroom.Enjoy your music in stereo as it was meant to be heard.  If you have a larger house or apartment enjoy the deeper discounts on the double pack or the family pack. Choose your colour finish at checkout, available in Piano Black or Piano White

story:
You love listening to music and speaking cord-free on your phone.  Unfortunately, if you live in a city with cold winters, this proves to be a challenge.

After one too many commutes in Chicago and New York and experiencing earaches and freezing ears, we decided to come up with a solution.

And that's why we created Sound Huggle.

The World's Coziest Hi-Fidelity Headphones

Our patented headphones are built to be the world’s most comfortable, durable headphones that deliver premium studio sound quality.  Unlock your next bold adventure with these premium bluetooth headphone earmuffs that make cold listening possible.  

 

 

 

Inspired​ ​by​ ​our​ ​DJ​ ​experience​ ​over​ ​the​ ​last​ ​decade,​ ​the​ ​acoustical​ ​nature​ ​of​ ​our​ ​design​ ​creates a​ ​self-enclosed​ ​studio​ ​sound​ ​box​ ​around​ ​your​ ​ear​ ​that​ ​delivers​ ​high​ ​fidelity​ ​sound​ ​with​ ​deep​ ​rich bass,​ ​balanced​ ​midrange,​ ​and​ ​crisp,​ ​clear​ ​highs.  

Sound Huggles offer excellent full-range performance with deep, punchy bass that is filling and not over exaggerated. The mid-range is perfectly balanced with excellent voice and horn reproduction. The high frequencies are crisp and clean, not overly bright or piercing.

The headphones deliver an expansive sound stage with impressive depth and excellent stereo separation. On well mixed tracks, it sounds as if the audio experience is coming from a space much wider than the confines of the headphones.

  • Hi-Fi​ ​sound​ ​with​ ​crystal​ ​clear​ ​audio
  • Speaker​ ​Size:​ ​1.6​ ​in.​ ​+/-​ ​0.01​ ​in.​ ​x​ ​0.3​ ​in.​ ​+/-​ ​0.01​ ​in.
  • ​Impedance:​ ​32​ ​ohms​ ​(at​ ​1kHz)​ ​+/-​ ​15%
  • Speaker Frequency Range: 20-20 kHz
  • Input Sound Level 115 db +/- 3dB

 

At​ ​Sound​ ​Huggle,​ ​we​ ​believe​ ​in​ ​building​ ​high​ ​quality,​ ​lifelong​ ​products​ ​that​ ​enable​ ​you​ ​to embrace​ ​any​ ​adventure.​ ​Our​ ​headphones​ ​are​ ​engineered​ ​to​ ​be​ ​unstoppable​ ​and​ ​hide world-class​ ​sound​ ​inside​ ​a​ ​winter-inspired​ ​minimalist​ ​design. 

  • Instant​ ​accessibility​ ​with​ ​unique​ ​foldable​ ​design
  • Impossibly​ ​durable​ ​and​ ​can​ ​survive​ ​being​ ​run​ ​over​ ​by​ ​an​ ​3,010​ ​lb​ ​car
  • Withstands​ ​up​ ​to​ ​-5C/​ ​23F​ ​degrees​ ​thanks​ ​to​ ​a​ ​specially​ ​formulated,​ ​industrial​ ​strength engineered​ ​Polyoxymethlyene​ ​(POM),​ ​a​ ​material​ ​often​ ​used​ ​in​ ​precision​ ​parts​ ​for​ ​its​ ​high strength​ ​and​ ​rigidity
  • Patented​ ​one-size-fits-all​ ​design​ ​and​ ​360​ ​degree​ ​expandability​ ​to​ ​match​ ​any​ ​way​ ​you want​ ​to​ ​wear​ ​it

 

Our​ ​knit​ ​and​ ​fleece​ ​headphones​ ​bring​ ​ultimate​ ​warmth​ ​and​ ​comfort​ ​by​ ​building​ ​a​ ​microclimate around​ ​your​ ​ear.​ ​In​ ​addition​ ​to​ ​its​ ​knit​ ​and​ ​furry​ ​exterior,​ ​Sound​ ​Huggle​ ​encloses​ ​its​ ​speakers with​ ​layers​ ​of​ ​thermal​ ​foam​ ​and​ ​nano-foam​ ​composites​ ​for​ ​added​ ​cushioning,​ ​comfort,​ ​and optimal​ ​acoustics.​ ​​

​For​ ​added​ ​tactile​ ​softness,​ ​our​ ​custom-cable​ ​knit​ ​design​ ​is​ ​made​ ​possible​ ​by a​ ​central​ ​braid,​ ​which​ ​forms​ ​a​ ​unique​ ​interwoven​ ​cable-crossing​ ​design,​ ​set​ ​against​ ​a background​ ​of​ ​purl​ ​stitches.  

  • Lightweight​ ​material
  • Non-deforming​ ​fabric,​ ​won’t​ ​wrinkle
  • Heat​ ​retention​ ​design
  • Moisture​ ​wicking
  • Color​ ​stays​ ​vibrant​ ​with​ ​no-fade​ ​material
  • Acrylic​ ​knit​ ​allows​ ​for​ ​softer​ ​feel​ ​against​ ​your​ ​ears​ ​vs​ ​plastic​ ​or​ ​leather

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

​

 

 

 




 

  • Items that come in box: Sound Huggle headphone earmuffs + micro-USB charger
  • Measurements
    • When extended 7 in. x 6 in.
    • When collapsed 4.5 in. x 2.8 in.
  • Bluetooth Type: Version 4.1
  • Battery Life: 7 hours of music, 9 hours of talk time on 1 single charge
  • Battery Capacity: 180 m/Ah
  • Recharge Time: 4 hours before first use. Recharge in only 1.5 hours thereafter.
  • Max Distance from Bluetooth Device: 30-45 feet
  • Speaker Size: 1.6 in. +/- 0.01 in. x 0.3 in. +/- 0.01 in.
  • Impedance: 32 ohms (at 1kHz) +/- 15%
  • Speaker Frequency Range: 20-20 kHz
  • Hi-Fi & Stereo enabled
  • Input Sound Level 115 db +/- 3dB
  • Operating Temperature 23F to 120F*

*Operating temperature is dependent on operating temperature of your device (e.g., if your phone shuts off in the cold, then your Sound Huggle will not work, regardless of the temperature)

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?
 

We’re starting our journey with Indiegogo because we believe the backer community will play an integral role in Sound Huggle’s development and release of new innovations. Through Indiegogo, we’re not just pre-selling our headphones to early adopters, but rather, forging relationships with a passionate community of creative and fashion-tech conscious individuals.  

Indiegogo, your feedback will enable us to bring the latest fashion audio-tech gear to market, and your support will enable us to continue to pour our blood, sweat, and tears to build a product that you’ll absolutely love.

 

HOW WILL WE USE THESE FUNDS?
 

We will be using these funds to create our first production orders of Sound Huggle headphone earmuffs, including all the tooling, molds and components that these complex designs need across knit patterns and designs.

 

TO OUR INTERNATIONAL BACKERS
 

This project isn't just for backers in the United States. We'll be shipping Sound Huggles worldwide.

Please note that shipping to any country outside the United States and Canada may be delayed or canceled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations.

In case of cancellation, we will refund your pledge. Additional taxes and duties may apply to your international order, as designated by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

Please note that there is no way for us to charge an additional amount on our end for any applicable VAT/duties that may be a result of a specific country's local tax code. Therefore, these fees may be incurred upon receipt of your reward.

These fees are the responsibility of each backer, and additional information regarding VAT/duties can be found in our FAQ below.

 

FOR OUR EARLY BACKERS
​

Our team is excited to launch the world’s most durable, comfortable headphones that deliver studio sound quality. However, we know that the most important part of our process is that we fulfill our promise to you.

We have worked through the challenges of managing production, packaging, and rest assured your Sound Huggles have shipped worldwide earlier this month. We can't wait to get the Sound Huggles into your hands.

 

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

Q: What is included with your Sound Huggle?

A: One micro-USB charging cable so you can charge through your laptop or wall outlet charger.

 

Q: Does the volume control on the Sound Huggle control the phone volume directly or an internal amplifier?

A: You only need to adjust one volume. The volume on your Sound Huggle and your phone will be synced.

 

Q: How long is the warranty?

A: One year and it covers any manufacturer issues. This warranty covers the repair and replacement of any defective material or component.

 

Q: How about the Bluetooth range?

A: Bluetooth range is 30-45 feet (10-15 meters) depending on your surrounding environment.

 

Q: Can I use Sound Huggle with devices other than my mobile phone?

A: Yes. They can be used with all devices that support Bluetooth.

 

Q: How long is the charging cable?

A: The charging cable is about 12 inches (30 cm.)  

 

Q:  Can you do firmware updates?  Or is there a way to update the software inside?

A:  Unfortunately not.  

 

Q:  What kind of chip sets are we using?

A:  ISSC Micro-Chip.

 

Q: How can I get free shipping?

A: We offer free shipping Worldwide. 

 

Q: I live outside the United States. Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my reward?

A: This depends on your local tax code. Any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer, and not our team. We have absolutely no control over charging each backer additional duties/VAT at the time the pledge is made, and so these fees (if applicable) may be imposed at the time of receiving the package. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your reward, please get in touch with your local post office.

 

Q: What is the dimension and weight of a Sound Huggle?

A: A Sound Huggle weighs approximately b/n 10-12 ounces.  When extended, the dimensions are approximately 7 inches by 6 inches and when collapsed, the dimensions are 4.5 inches x 2.8 inches.

 

Q: When do I choose which color(s) I want?

A: Similar to getting your shipping information, we’ll ask for your color choice(s) when we send out our backer survey, which will be emailed to you after the project ends and shortly before we ship.

 

Q: What is your return policy?

A: Unfortunately we cannot accept returns from Indiegogo purchases. We will, however, repair or replace a defective unit at no cost. Thank you for your understanding.

 

We designed Sound Huggle around simplicity, snugness, and sound, and wanted the rest of the world to enjoy them too! Please share our product with your family and friends.

story:
Surround sound has never been so easy

Connect to the 4-unit-system like a single speaker within seconds

No manual pairing needed, no guidance needed

ELEVATE YOUR STREAMING EXPERIENCE | Movies and music on your laptop get the surround-sound treatment.  

BRING THE PARTY ANYWHERE | Ultimate portability with the perk of modular speakers. Bring one or bring all four to the beach, park, or a friend’s house. 

SPREAD THE SOUND AROUND | Room-filling sound anywhere with four speakers to distribute where you want them.

UPGRADE A CLASSROOM OR CONFERENCE ROOM | Using the built-in microphone, SIMO enhances any room by distributing sound and speaking range.

ATTENTION TO DETAIL | Every curve and edge of SIMO is carefully designed by the Pangissimo team, and beautifully built

 

Our Story

Pangissimo was founded by a group of four engineering students from Boston University in an engineering technology innovation course. Parsa, Constantine, James and Esiri came together for a class project to solve a frequently encountered problem.

We sought a portable speaker system that provided surround sound capabilities at an affordable price. It turns out, a lot of other people wanted the same thing. Our class project piqued the interest of various large firms, investors, and startup competitions and soon Pangissimo was formed. The name “Pangissimo” is the combination of the words “Pangea” (the supercontinent) and “fortissimo” (meaning to play loudly in Italian). Our innovative speaker, SIMO, stands for Single Input Multiple Output.

As young college students, we have learned everything from scratch and cultivated a diverse, passionate, innovative culture within our company. Upon forming Pangissimo, our team was accepted in the BU Venture Accelerator, winning 1st place in the BU New Venture Competition, and was featured in the American Journal of Innovation and Boston Business Journal. In raising our target fundraising goal, we hope to continue gaining a strong community of SIMO lovers and growing our company together as a team. We will be using the fundraised money to support our manufacturing efforts for SIMO to get this revolutionary product into your hands ASAP! We are deeply thankful for all of your support and are incredibly excited to bring you SIMO!

Risks and Challenges

There are risks that may be out of our control. However, If there are any delays, we promise to communicate with our backers right away. We will keep each backer in the loop about the final shipping date.

story:
What is 'JAZZ XL'?  

JAZZ XL - A tumbler sized, aptX Bluetooth enabled, fully active and professional quality speaker. Equally suited to the quality conscious DJ, musician or music lover.

The JAZZ XL utilizes the same high-end design and construction techniques found in professional speakers to bring dynamic, emotive sound to a compact modern design. Say goodbye to boring injection moulded plastic and welcome real craftsmanship married to the best technology.

Experience a larger than life sound from a compact yet powerful wireless speaker; JAZZ XL. Enthral your indoor as well as outdoor parties and get-togethers with this simply astonishing wireless speaker. Encompassed in an optimized acoustic enclosure, JAZZ  XL delivers surprisingly loud and impactful audio with its efficient full range drivers. Choose from a variety spectral light effects and make your music ‘dance’. Indulge with its superior universal connectivity with 3.5mm Audio Jack, USB Flash Disk & Micro-SD Card.  Bang on to your favorite tracks and get enthralled into the amazing fusion of light and sound.Indulge in Mobile Hands-free function with JAZZ XL.


            







Features :

  • Encompassed in an optimized acoustic enclosure,JAZZ  XL delivers surprisingly loud and impactful audio with its efficient full range drivers

  • Unique Surrounding metal grille-design

  • 2000mAh top quality li-ion long lasting battery

  • 15 mins Auto Shut-down for enlongating the battery life

  • 2 x 5W Class D High-Fidelity Amplifier

  • Recycled Green Energy Lightning Paper Technology LED

  • Universal Compatibility via Bluetooth,USB Flash Disk,Micro-SD Card,Aux-in

  • Inbuilt Microphone for attending calls

  • Easy Switch between phone calls and music playback.

  • Micro-USB Charging.

  • Manufactured in ISO Standards workplace

Bring a universe of wireless music
into every part of your life

Technical Specifications :

  • E-INK Display Made of Recycled material
  • Bluetooth version: 4.0+EDR.

  • Bluetooth Protocol : A2DP,AVRCP,HFP,HSP

  • Input Mode: Bluetooth / Usb Flash Disk /TF Card / Aux-in / Mic

  • Loud Speaker: 4Ω/5W x 2

  • Bass Enhancement : 1 x Passive Radiator

  • Frequency response: 90Hz – 20KHz

  • Distortion：＜1%

  • S/N Ratio:  ＞70dB

  • Bluetooth Distance: ≥10m

  • Battery:Built-in lithium-ion 2000mAh

  • Input Power:  DC5V 500-1000mAh

  • Playing time: 4-6* Hours

  • Charging Time: 2-3* Hours

  • Charge Port:Micro USB

  • Product Size: 18 * 7.8 * 6.8cm

*Working time is tested under Standard APE music playing in bluetooth mode.

Battery Charging time is recorded under connection of power adaptor in 5V 1A Supply.

What's in the Box?

1x ZB-JAZZ XL Bluetooth Speaker

1x Micro Usb Charging cable

1x 3.5mm Audio Cable

1x User Manual

Product includes a 1-year worry-free warranty!

How does it work?





Who are we?

ZOOOK was born in France, conceptualized and created by technology freaks who are artistic and creative. This fusion of techno-art and the desire to create a high-velocity impact on Earth by its mere existence led to ZOOOK. Specialized in high-end designing, manufacturing and marketing innovative Consumer electronic products is its sole purpose. 

                                     

Where we are in production

The JAZZ XL fully-functional prototypes are ready. The electronics are solid and the communications firmware is underway. What we’re experimenting with right now is the speaker driver and the acoustic design. Our designers are currently tweaking the acoustics of the JAZZ XL and are testing enhancement options.

                                             Schematics of our Speaker



Why we need your help

We have fully functional samples of the JAZZ XL that will soon be ready for production. Though we have big ambitions, we are a medium sized company and only have the capacity to finance modest production runs.  Placing an order of multiple thousands of units is beyond our grasp.  

This is where you come in.  You can help us to increase the amount of units we can produce as well as accelerate the speed with which we can get it into the homes of our customers. Your support will make this possible and will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with creating the best sounding, most liberating audio devices in the world.


What will we do with your funds?

We are ready for everything needed to start production-PCB designs, case molds, etc.  In fact, we have pre-orders from our agents and know the ratio of direct sales to wholesale orders.  Your Perks contributions will help us lower our costs even more because we will be able to buy more components.

Guaranteed Shipping by October, 2015.  If we miss the shipping date, we will gladly refund your contribution.


Risks & Challenges

ZOOOK has been in business since 2013. We specialize in creative electronics.   When we saw the design and the effort that our staff put into the ZOOOK JAZZ XL, we knew that we had to get it out to let the world experience this magic hands-on.  One of our current manufacturing lines will dedicate a new team for the production of this model. Organizing the raw materials could be an issue and with the holiday season nearing,supply-chain delays are beyond anyone's control,However, We are confident of delivering the product that we promise.

Guaranteed Shipping by late October, 2015. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us by spreading the word via email and social media. You can earn $10 in credit toward our campaign every time one of your referrals purchases a JAZZ XL.  The amount of credit you can earn is limitless!  Once the campaign is over, we will apply this credit to your account, giving you a refund on your purchase or credit on the purchase of a new JAZZ XL.  Please note that contributors cannot receive referral credit for referring themselves.  Of two contributors, only one can be the 'referrer' and receive campaign credit for the other's contribution.

story:
Mbudz, are the World's most affordable truly wireless earphones, designed to deliver sound that is as perfect as the fit and style. The wireless earphones available would cost your pocket twice the cost of these earphones. We had to have a large campaign goal to cover up for the manufacturing cost as we want to make these earphones affordable for all our customers.

                              


We have made sure that Mbudz deliver:

  • Maximized sound, so you hear natural-sounding lows, lifelike vocals and clear instruments
  • Minimized distraction, with a sealed acoustic design that helps immerse you in your music
  • All-day comfort, tips that stay soft yet provide a stable fit
  • Extra durability, engineered and tested for the demands of your active lifestyle
  • One-touch convenience, with a variety of options for easily enjoying music and making calls                                               

                                 


As seen on:

    


Mbudz are small and lightweight for comfort, but deliver deep, rich sound across a wide frequency range. And the sealed acoustic design provides a more immersive listening experience to let you hear every detail of your music.      

                


                         


                       

                        A comparison of Mbudz with other earphones


We have designed Mbudz to fit you and your style with a wide range of colors for you to choose from. 



Mbudz can provide up to 4.5 hours of playtime and can be charged by placing them in a charging case that can be attached to your key ring so you don’t have to carry them separately.  The charger once charged can charge your Mbudz up to a 100% in 15 minutes and can charge them more than 20 times. 

While designing Mbudz we made sure that they don’t fall off your ears while you are playing any sport, at the gym or even skydiving.

Mbudz are designed to provide passive noise cancellation, so whether you are in a busy street or any noisy place you can enjoy your favorite music or attend a call without being distracted or disturbed by the surrounding noise.

Mbudz provide powerful performance and a comfortable fit you just won’t find in most earphones



Mbudz are compatible with almost every device with Bluetooth capability. 

                               



USING THE EARPHONES

·  Press for 4 seconds- On/Off

·  Tap- Play/Pause/Accept incoming call

Bluetooth

·  Dual Mode Bluetooth 4.1 

·  Wireless reach 10-30 meters

·  Full compatibility with Apple, Android, Windows phone, BlackBerry


Battery (expected)

·  4.5 hours of active usage

·  Standby time 10 days (240 hours) 

·  Charging time less than 20 minutes


Compatibility (with Bluetooth - listening)

·  iPhone® 4S, 5, 5C, 5S, 6, 6 Plus, 6s, 6s Plus

·  iPad® - all

·  Android phones 

·  Windows Phone 

·  Blackberry 

              

FAQS

What is included with the Mbudz package? 

1 pair of Mbudz, charging case with 16 GB of storage capacity and a usb to charge the charger 

How many times can we charge the earphones, using the charger?

Mbudz can be charged up to a 100% approximately 20 times using the charger, and then you will have to charge the charging case through the usb cable to be able to charge your earphones again.

How does it charge my mobile?

The charger can charge both  apple  and other mobile devices, you just have to connect your USB cable to the charging case and charge them.

What is the sound like?

When we say high end audio sound quality we really mean it, we have tested the sound quality of Mbudz against some of the pioneers in the market and are sure that you too would be surprised. 

What is the bluetooth range? 

Bluetooth range is 10-30 m depending on your surrounding environment.

Can I use the earphones with other devices than my mobile?  

Yes. With all devices that support bluetooth!   

Are the earphones durable?

Yes. Every pair of Mbudz will go a series of systematic durability tests. We pull, drop, scratch, water etc during the testing and quality assurance phase just to ensure that they live up to the high quality standards. Mbudz are also Sweat Proof and live up to a very high industry standard.

story:
Launching iLepo ANC earphone providing extremely good Active Noise Cancelling starting at $19 (+shipping). 

iLepo is so proud of the quality and value of these earphones that they would like as many people as possible to try them out and say what they think in a YouTube video. If you want to post a video review of either of these on your YouTube account, you can apply to get a free review unit here.


iLepo ANC features:

iLepo ANC (Active Noise Cancelling) embeds microphones and powered electronics in the earphone to remove background noise. The iLepo ANC earphone captures ambient noise and re-creates an inverse sound wave in real-time to feed it back in the earphones to cancel out most of the sound around the user. Especially good at blocking out low frequencies in surrounding noise for public transportation such as for bus, train, subway or airplane engines and at other noisy places with constant noise. This also allows the user to experience better audio clarity at lower volume, effectively healthier to hearing.

iLepo ANC provides the market's best value high quality noise-cancelling earphones!

Only 30 grams and easy to carry. 10 hours battery life in fully ANC mode.

iLepo ANC will use standard MicroUSB port for charging if this Indiegogo campaign reaches at least 2000 backers for the iLepo ANC earphones, otherwise they will use the current special NanoUSB connector to be charged using the special NanoUSB cable provided.

iLepo ANC ON/OFF buttons can easily switch on/off ANC mode with up to 10-hour battery life, the earphones also work fine without battery power left but without the noise cancelling function active.

iLepo ANC earphone available in 2 colors, Black, Silver:

Choose the color you want! 

Can only ship Black version if at least 1000 orders for the black ANC earphone, otherwise iLepo will ship you the default silver colored ANC earphone perk.

iLepo ANC earphone Technical specs:

Model

 iLepo ANC

Color

 Black, Silver

Diameter

 14.3mm ± 0.3mm

Impedance

 33 Ohm

Sensitivity

 96db ± 3db

Frequency response

 20Hz-22000Hz

power

 30mw

power

 50mw

Distortion

≤1.5% (1mw 1KHz)

Sensitivity

 -42db ± 3db

Cable Length

 120cm

Jack Plug

 3.5mm angled

In the box for iLepo ANC:

1*iLepo ANC earphone

1* USB charging cable

1* carry bag

4*pairs earpieces (XS, S, M, L):

Where to use iLepo ANC earphone?

Airplane/Metro/Bus/Street, You can just enjoy pure music in any public place with big noise.

More about iLepo earphone

1st Class Components 

iLepo ANC earphone is designed with durable best class components, qualified Li-thium battery and qualified quality control system at manufacturing.


Professional acoustics design 

With more than 5 years experience about OEM/ODM earphone designing.
2 years experience about ANC earphone researching and designing.

Solid manufacturing system

Professional production line with assembly, testing and packaging to make sure every function work 100% perfect before ex-factory.
8 times QC(quality control process) during the whole production process.
At least 6-8 hours aging testing for every earphone.

iLepo(Shenzhen Gaoxin Electronics Digital Co.,Limited) is a leading design house and manufacture of ANC earphone/headphone/speaker located in Shenzhen, China.

 iLepo aims to provide best quality earphones powered with leading technology to consumers all over the world at affordable prices.

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ

1,Why flexible target?

iLepo is a professional digital  ANC earphone manufacturer. iLepo already start working on the mold in April 2016, T1 finished around middle of May 2016, No matter the fund raising amount, iLepo will complete iLepo ANC earphone and ship to all of our backers!

2, Can I use the iLepo ANC earphone even if the battery is over?

Yes, the iLepo ANC earphone still can play the audio just fine as any other passive headphones even the battery is over, just the ANC function will not be enabled, You can use iLepo ANC earphone like a traditional earphone. 

3, What device can work with iLepo ANC earphone?

iLepo ANC earphone is compatible with all Android smart phones, apple devices (iphone, ipad, ipad mini, Macbook), Windows smart phones, notebooks, MP3 player, CD player, walkman etc. every devices with 3.5mm stereo audio jack.

4, Is iLepo ANC earphone waterproof?

No

5, ANC earphone  battery life?

ANC earphone: 9-10hours

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Facebook:    https://www.facebook.com/ilepoteam

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/iLepo_Gaoxin

Youtube:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu1QJpfYKVCwSuL1zk070Bw

story:
THE TRUU VISION

High technology and pure innovation define Truu. Wireless earbuds that charge wirelessly. Truu is changing the industry by providing a true wireless and hassle free experience. Place the earbuds on our carefully designed charger and the wireless charging will take care of the rest. No wires, no charging cases, no hassle.

Truu is founded as a new tech-oriented branch of Sudio, a high-quality lifestyle brand within earphones since 2013. Funds are now needed to start up this new branch of the company and make Truu production ready.

The name comes from the industry term “true wireless” which has become the industry descriptor for wireless earbuds. We believe it doesn't get any truer than this.

FRIEND OF ALL EARS

The earbud design is derived from careful studies of the ear anatomy and has resulted in a perfect in-ear fit that remains in your ear no matter shape and size. The lines of the Truu earbud gently follows the ear and rests in the bottom of the ear.

Additionally, the Truu earbuds are equipped with COMPLY™ foam tips. We have tested all foam ear tip products out there and we have concluded that COMPLY™ has the best performance.

The name Truu comes from the industry term “true wireless” which has become the industry descriptor for wireless earbuds. We believe it doesn't get any truer than this.

MAGNETISM + TRUE WIRELESS = PERFECT MATCH

The two earbuds are beautifully connected by grade N52-magnets. The earbuds are activated by separating these magnets. The charger is also equipped with magnets to facilitate the wireless charging. The most effective charging is made by separating the two earbuds before placing them on the charger.

THE WIRELESS FREEDOM

We believe the future is wireless and there is no running away from it. Here are a few reasons why Truu is leading that development:

1. Not having to plug your earbuds into cords or place them in cases is pure freedom. 

2. We want the wireless charger to be a generic interior piece in your home. The charger that comes with your Truu earbuds has a Scandinavian design with wooden details, inspired by our Swedish heritage. We aim to develop several charger concepts going forward in order to offer a range of chargers suitable for different needs and different designs.


OTHER SPECIFICS

BLUETOOTH 4.1

Bluetooth 4.1 means a highly stable Bluetooth connection with a trouble free pairing combined with a good Bluetooth range and low power consumption. See specifics below.

SWEAT PROOF

This was not negotiable for us. A sophisticated mechanical design has ensured robust earbuds with the very highest build quality.

BUILT-IN MICROPHONE

The right earbud has a built-in microphone which enables the user to also make calls with Truu.

BATTERY LIFETIME

To make life simpler for the user, our battery has 5 hours of playing time, so your Truu will last close to a whole day.


THE NITTY GRITTY

GENERAL

• Weight: 5 g 

• Sweat proof 

• Grade N52 magnet

SOUND

•  Speaker: Balanced Armature

•  Frequency Range: 18-22 000 Hz

•  Speaker Sensitivity: 105 dB SPL +- 2dB

•  Speaker Impedance (DC): 25 Ohm

BATTERY

•  Battery: Rechargeable Li-Ion

•  Mono play time: Up to 15 hours

•  Stereo play time: Up to 5 hours

•  Standby: 240 hours

•  Charging Time: 70 min

BLUETOOTH

•  Bluetooth Version: 4.1

•  Compatible with: All Bluetooth devices.

•  Dual bluetooth connection

•  Auto pairing

•  Bluetooth range: 12 m

MICROPHONE

•  Wide-range

•  Frequency range: 100Hz ~ 16KHz

WHAT COMES WITH MY TRUU?


WHAT IS THE FUNDING FOR?

We have a passionate team in place, eager to get going with testing & certifications. The components are tested and the design is ready. Three main points are relevant for the funding:

•  Build and design all toolings and make Truu production ready 

•  Compliance testing & certifications 

•  Source components and production for the world's first true wireless earbuds with wireless charging

•  Source components and production for the world's first true wireless earbuds

EARLY THANKS

The prototypes were created with the help from the Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm and their facilities. The video was filmed with the help of two friends from the media institute of Stockholm: Fredrik Lönning and Adam Bassari. You are our heroes!

For the rest of you; Please do not hesitate to share our project with the help of indiegogo’s sharing tools. We are nothing without our Truu ambassadors!



RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We are certain that the components will work together and fit inside the dimensions of our design. Although, one can never be completely sure until production is scalable under a technical and economical point of view and we have tested the product over and over again. We have filed an application for patent and registered the design at the Swedish patent office. Patent pending.
