story:
Poppins Makes Any Headphone Wireless In Less Than 60 seconds. 

Unbox, Pair and Play, no software, no downloads of apps. Just pure seamless joy of Music or Film - hands free. Easy to use and no set up required. State of the art Audio technology gives you most complete audio experience. No compromises. Your daily use headphone, now wireless.

 

 

 

 

"The funky little Poppins is a Bluetooth receiver that wirelessly connects to your phone...." - BBC SCIENCE FOCUS

"...share music or watch a film wirelessly, making it handy for  travelling couples or parents taking long car journeys with their kids." - TECHDIGEST

"With a click of a button, two Poppins can also be paired to a single device so that you and your friend can listen to the same music together." - WHAT HI-FI?

 

 

 

Poppins brings best in class technology and design to rejuvenate your classic headphones. Poppins features include:

  • Wireless Headphone -  Make any headphone wireless in less than 60 seconds. No Software. No Apps. No Downloads.
  • Share Music with Friends - With a single click of a button two Poppins can be paired to a single phone, laptop or tablet so you and your friend can listen, watch and play to the same media together.
  • Handsfree Calling - Accept and Reject Calls straight from your Poppins.
  • Siri/Google Assistant - Launch Siri or Google Assistant on a click of a button
  • Lossless Sound - Experience LossLess sound straight to your wireless headphones.
  • Affordable - Starting at $25, Poppins is the most affordable and feature loaded wireless adapter on the market.

 

Social For Duo!

You can pair two Poppins together with any phone, laptop or tablet. With one click of a button, you can ‘bond’ your Poppins together with your friend’s and enjoy the same music, movie or even dance to the same groove at the same time - all from one phone or computer!

 

Wireless For The Loud!

Make your classic speaker or boombox wireless! Simply connect your Poppins to the audio jack (Aux In) of your speaker and wirelessly play music from your phone, laptop or tablet straight out of the speakers. It’s Magic. It’s Freedom.

 

Calls. Siri. Google Assistant.

Poppins works with both Siri and Google Assistant. Just speak into your headphones mic and let your phone do all the talking. Poppins smart audio management technology makes it great to use outdoors with any digital assistant. You can Accept/Reject phone calls, Control the volume and talk away handsfree, with your phone in your pocket.

 

Apps in Love :)

Poppins works with Apps like Skype, WeChat, WhatsApp, Facetime and Viber. You can receive Voice/Video Calls on our Poppins. If you wish to switch to speaker mode, simply click on the 'speaker' icon on your smart device. Simply press the power button on your Poppins to accept the call and talk away.

 

 

Your Color. Your Choice.

Poppins comes in 4 vibrant colors with rubber texture and a clip-on magnet!

 

 

 

 

Battery

Poppins Battery last 8+ hours on continuous use!​

Poppins comes with an optimised power management system which allows you to stream your favorite playlists for hours. Whether it is stepping up your game in cardio or doing a marathon run on Netflix, Poppins will stay by your side, providing you lossless quality sound experience, zero latency.

 

LossLess Sound

You have spent a lot of money on getting the best audio quality from your headphones! We believe that the most important aspect of audio is retaining the quality and authenticity of the artist to provide listeners with a beautiful sonic experience. Poppins micro-controllers are engineered to mirror the exact sound it receives directly to the listener's ears, without creating any time lag or drop in quality in between. Get high quality sound across the room straight into your brain, zero latency.

 

Compatibility

Poppins works with Apple, Android and Windows Devices!

Poppins is designed to seamlessly pair with your Bluetooth device (BLE 2.1 and above) - be it your phone, your laptop or your tablet. It is also tuned to support all popular headphones and earphones in the world (no counterfeits please.) Poppins is calibrated to adjust to any headphone type - be it In-ear Monitors, On-Ear or Over-Ear Headphones. 

All Poppins requires is a headphone jack and its ready to go! We have made it so simple that you require only 1 minute of your time - Plug-in, Pair and Play. No Downloads, No Apps or Software Required.

*Cheaper substandard headphones may not get optimal use.

 

Certifications

Poppins is certified for Conformité Européenne (CE), Federal Communications Commission (FCC) and Restriction of Hazardous Substances (RoHS). This means that Poppins is FREE from hazardous materials found in electrical and electronic products and does not radiate harmful emissions. Most crowd fund platforms do not require products to be certified, but with Poppins we are going the extra mile for our backers.

 

Specifications

 

We will begin shipping to all our backers within 60 days from the end of our campaign. With invaluable lessons learnt during the logistical phase of our last 'Smart Buckle' Campaign we are fully confident of meeting this shipping goal.

We believe in the best of crowdfunding where a community of innovators and thinkers supports exciting new ideas that DELIVER. We proved this with Smart Buckle, shipping a fully certified product to over a thousand backers within a couple of months of closing our campaign. We had a few lessons through that process and it has honed us to be even more precise and relentlessly focussed on quality and execution. That is why you can feel confident that when we say Guaranteed Shipping with 60 days of Poppins campaign close, we mean it!

 

 

About the Team

Shripal Gandhi | Co Founder

National Award Winner and recognized as the "Top 50 Inspiring Entrepreneurs of India" by Economic Times.

Passionate for over 15 years about innovation and creation of human centric products, reflecting the idea of simplicity and mindfulness. With over eleven (11) global patents to his name he brings deep product and technology expertise, he also has deep hand-on operational knowledge of large scale electronics manufacturing of global consumer products. When searching for inspiration he spends time teaching science to community children and help open their creative and mindful self.

Alexei Levene | Co Founder

A serial entrepreneur who believes in the concept of 'business as a force for good'

With a background in consumer products, business consulting, and sustainable technologies. Alexei is a globetrotter who has lived in UK, US, Poland, India and France contributing to Fortune 500 corporations and innovative start-ups. Loves philosophy, disruptive technologies and adventure. Dreams of a world without waste, with access to clean water, food and education for all.

Our Track Record 

This Poppins crowdfund comes on the back of a successful crowdfunding campaign we ran for our first product, Smart Buckle. We launched Smart Buckle on Kickstarter during the summer and had nearly a thousand backers pre-ordering the product from over 30 countries. We are proud not only to have shipped 100% of Smart Buckles to our backers but also to have won distribution agreements across the world. In less that 120 days since launch we have shipped over 7,000 units all over the world. 

Proof is in the facts, check here. You can also visit us here.

Why we built Poppins?

We found over the last several months with the onslaught of wireless headphones emerging into the market that all our current devices will be obsolete and be put away into our desk drawers. That is not too cool for the planet. We looked around and found that the wireless adaptors for headphones were either poorly designed or just another crowdfunding promise which never got delivered by large funded projects. It took us less than 9 months to get here with a real product that we use everyday in our offices and in our homes. We made it for our own use and decided that we can make it for all those who fell in love with it. It is round cookie like device. The way it is designed, the magnet just clips on to you like a little force of gravity. It is seamless with your fashion and a really cool fidgety toy to play with - we promise, once you play with it, you will keep playing. And of course, we wanted hi-def sound quality with the best quality transmission of audio, when we made Poppins. We enjoy it daily, and we bring you the same.

Simple. With Purpose.

 

Contact Us

We are a small inspired team spread globally. If you have questions or need additional information, please feel free to write to us.

hello@gooseberry.store

We would love to hear your feedback, ideas or interest in partnerships.

Thank you for supporting us.

 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Check out our FAQ's (here) for commonly asked questions.

 

Technical

 

~BATTERY~

How long does the battery last?

Poppins will last upto 8 hours whether you are listening to music, taking calls or watching movies, all from a 30 minute charge.

How do I charge my Poppins?

You can charge your Poppins by connecting it to a reliable USB power source with the Micro USB Cable provided in the packaging.

What is the charge time? 

The charge time of the Poppins is estimated at 30 minutes.

What is the standby time of Poppins? 

The Standby time is about 200 hours.

~BLUETOOTH~

How many Bluetooth devices can connect to Poppins in pairing mode?

You can connect two Poppins together, where the ‘parent’ will connect with your phone, laptop or tablet, so you and your friend can hear the same tracks at the same time.

Is Poppins compatible with the latest Bluetooth version 4.2?

Yes, Poppins supports all Bluetooth versions above 2.1

How do I connect my Poppins with my phone?

You can connect your Poppins with your phone via Bluetooth.

Will it have controls for answering the phone and for volume/track selection?

If your headphone has a microphone then you will be able to accept/reject phone calls and control the volume with your Poppins.

How far away can I be from my phone when using this device to listen to music?

You can get 20-25 feet away from the device before it disconnects. You might get 30 feet if there isn't much interfering between you and your Poppins.

~COMPATIBILITY~

Will this work with my Phone?

Yes, Poppins works with all the devices which have Bluetooth 2.1 or above.

Which OS is Poppins compatible with?

Poppins works with iOS, Android and Windows.

What all headphones/earphones does Poppins work with?

Poppins works with quality In-Ear, On-Ear and Over-Ear headphones.

~FEATURES~

If I have headphones without a mic, will Poppins pick up my voice? Does it have an inbuilt mic?

You need to have headphones with a mic to answer telephone calls, as Poppins currently does not have an inbuilt microphone. You can press the power button on the Poppins or play/pause button on your headphones to answer the call. Poppins does not have an inbuilt mic.

What are the functions that I can control with Poppins?

• Play/Pause Music

• Change Tracks 

• Adjust Volume Tracks

• Answer Calls

• Supports Siri and Google Assistant

Is Poppins Splash Proof?

Yes, Poppins is Splash Proof

Shipping Details 

We believe shipping is an integral part of online shopping experience. At Gooseberry we stand behind your shipping experience. We make sure that the shipping cost; shipping time, shipping quality, and communication around shipping are world-class. Please be absolutely certain that your shipping address is entered correctly when ordering. Once your order is shipped, we no longer have the ability to change the address. In the event of an error, you may make changes to your shipping information as long as your order has not been processed and shipped.

What is the Poppins Shipping timeline?

We will ship Poppins towards the end of Feb 2018.  It will take about 90 days from close of the campaign to support manufacturing, quality assurance and logistics setup. Post that point, it will take between 5 to 10 working days for the product to reach most countries, except a few countries which usually take longer due to their customs process which can be as long as 15 working days.

We believe all backers packages will be shipped no later than the second week of March 2018 depending on the volume of 5000 units.

Do you ship to the USA as well as international locations across the globe?

Yes, we do support International Shipping. The shipping charges may vary from location to location. The shipping charges are borne by the customer.

How is shipping handled?

Shipping is handled through a quality 3rd party logistic partner we have engaged.

Is Duty included in the shipping cost?

Yes, Duty is included in the shipping cost.

Do I need to worry about customs?

Every Country has a different customs laws, we suggest to please enquire with your nearest customs office for details regarding international shipping and import charges.

Is there any shipping cost to deliver it to my location, if yes then how is shipping calculated for International orders?

Shipping cost will be calculated based on the unit price and the geography we are shipping to, this is calculated at the time of your purchase 

What is the general turn around time to deliver the product? Do we ship to PO Box addresses?

The general turn around time would be 15 - 20 working days. Again this solely depends on the shipping carrier about the direct PO Box Address Delivery.

Is there any way I can expedite the shipping process?

No, Shipping time is fixed with the shipping partner.

Refund & Return Policy 

We deeply appreciate your support for Gooseberry and have taken thorough care to craft the Gooseberry experience for you. If in any case you receive a defective product from our side you can exchange the product either for repair or replacement within the 90 days warranty period.

When can I exchange my defective product received from Gooseberry?

You can ship us the product through FedEx or other shipping services available to you. Please choose the right shipping service that can quickly deliver the product back to Gooseberry within 90 days from the date of purchase.

If I have purchased a product of Gooseberry from a local store or from gooseberry.store where should I return the product?

You can return the product to the original point of purchase. In case you have purchased in a local store you can return it to them or if you have purchased it online on gooseberry.store you can send us and email at hello@gooseberry.store

Who will pay the shipping cost if I want to Ship the product back to Gooseberry?

In case of return of the product the customer will have to pay the shipping cost. We would also like to inform that it is in best interest to insure the product from the logistics or shipping company, as we cannot be held responsible for the package if we don’t receive it. Our review team will first inspect the product on arrival for any sign of use or damage, it should be unused, unaltered, unsoiled on clearing the review the refund will be processed.

Return / Replacement Criteria

Eligible

  • You received a faulty/defective product
  • You received a physically damaged product
  • The product is different from description on the website

Not Eligible

  • Products that have been worn/washed/soiled
  • In case the original packaging is lost or damaged
  • In case the original payment information documents are not available

Terms & Conditions

  • Products must be in their original condition with full packaging intact.
  • Only unused, unaltered, unsoiled items with their original tags will be accepted.
  • Replacements will be made basis availability of that item on the website.
  • This return policy is only applicable to the products purchased from this website.
  • For products purchased from outside this website, the return policy of the point of purchase will be applied.

Risks and Challenges 

Our team has self funded the development of Poppins to date and as such we have completed all tooling and arrived at a PVT (Product Validated) stage of development. This means that we have a working prototype that is performing exceptionally well.

With that we do not see any risks on production, however we are holding ourselves to a high standard by promising our crowd fund backers that we WILL SHIP YOUR PRODUCT WITHIN 60 DAYS from the close of the campaign. Whilst there is a risk that we might miss this deadline we have done everything to ensure that this is both achievable and a milestone that we live up to - that is our commitment to you.

The key challenge for us now is to run an effective campaign that brings awareness of this incredible product to a mainstream audience who value their timepiece and who agree with our philosophy that rejuvenating your existing product is a better way to live than simply buying new products all the time.

Passionate for over 15 years about innovation and creation of human centric products, reflecting the idea of simplicity and mindfulness. With over eleven (11) global patents to his name he brings deep product and technology expertise, he also has deep hand-on operational knowledge of large scale electronics manufacturing of global consumer products. When searching for inspiration he spends time teaching science to community children and help open their creative and mindful self.
Alexei Levene | Co Founder
A serial entrepreneur who believes in the concept of 'business as a force for good'
With a background in consumer products, business consulting, and sustainable technologies. Alexei is a globetrotter who has lived in UK, US, Poland, India and France contributing to Fortune 500 corporations and innovative start-ups. Loves philosophy, disruptive technologies and adventure. Dreams of a world without waste, with access to clean water, food and education for all.
Our Track Record 
This Poppins crowdfund comes on the back of a successful crowdfunding campaign we ran for our first product, Smart Buckle. We launched Smart Buckle on Kickstarter during the summer and had nearly a thousand backers pre-ordering the product from over 30 countries. We are proud not only to have shipped 100% of Smart Buckles to our backers but also to have won distribution agreements across the world. In less that 120 days since launch we have shipped over 7,000 units all over the world. 
Proof is in the facts, check here. You can also visit us here.
Why we built Poppins?
We found over the last several months with the onslaught of wireless headphones emerging into the market that all our current devices will be obsolete and be put away into our desk drawers. That is not too cool for the planet. We looked around and found that the wireless adaptors for headphones were either poorly designed or just another crowdfunding promise which never got delivered by large funded projects. It took us less than 9 months to get here with a real product that we use everyday in our offices and in our homes. We made it for our own use and decided that we can make it for all those who fell in love with it. It is round cookie like device. The way it is designed, the magnet just clips on to you like a little force of gravity. It is seamless with your fashion and a really cool fidgety toy to play with - we promise, once you play with it, you will keep playing. And of course, we wanted hi-def sound quality with the best quality transmission of audio, when we made Poppins. We enjoy it daily, and we bring you the same.
Simple. With Purpose.



 
Contact Us
We are a small inspired team spread globally. If you have questions or need additional information, please feel free to write to us.
hello@gooseberry.store
We would love to hear your feedback, ideas or interest in partnerships.
Thank you for supporting us.
 

 
 

 

Frequently Asked Questions
Check out our FAQ's (here) for commonly asked questions.
 
Technical
 
~BATTERY~
How long does the battery last?
Poppins will last upto 8 hours whether you are listening to music, taking calls or watching movies, all from a 30 minute charge.
How do I charge my Poppins?
You can charge your Poppins by connecting it to a reliable USB power source with the Micro USB Cable provided in the packaging.
What is the charge time? 
The charge time of the Poppins is estimated at 30 minutes.
What is the standby time of Poppins? 
The Standby time is about 200 hours.
~BLUETOOTH~
How many Bluetooth devices can connect to Poppins in pairing mode?
You can connect two Poppins together, where the ‘parent’ will connect with your phone, laptop or tablet, so you and your friend can hear the same tracks at the same time.
Is Poppins compatible with the latest Bluetooth version 4.2?
Yes, Poppins supports all Bluetooth versions above 2.1
How do I connect my Poppins with my phone?
You can connect your Poppins with your phone via Bluetooth.
Will it have controls for answering the phone and for volume/track selection?
If your headphone has a microphone then you will be able to accept/reject phone calls and control the volume with your Poppins.
How far away can I be from my phone when using this device to listen to music?
You can get 20-25 feet away from the device before it disconnects. You might get 30 feet if there isn't much interfering between you and your Poppins.
~COMPATIBILITY~
Will this work with my Phone?
Yes, Poppins works with all the devices which have Bluetooth 2.1 or above.
Which OS is Poppins compatible with?
Poppins works with iOS, Android and Windows.
What all headphones/earphones does Poppins work with?
Poppins works with quality In-Ear, On-Ear and Over-Ear headphones.
~FEATURES~
If I have headphones without a mic, will Poppins pick up my voice? Does it have an inbuilt mic?
You need to have headphones with a mic to answer telephone calls, as Poppins currently does not have an inbuilt microphone. You can press the power button on the Poppins or play/pause button on your headphones to answer the call. Poppins does not have an inbuilt mic.
What are the functions that I can control with Poppins?
• Play/Pause Music
• Change Tracks 
• Adjust Volume Tracks
• Answer Calls
• Supports Siri and Google Assistant
Is Poppins Splash Proof?
Yes, Poppins is Splash Proof


Shipping Details 
We believe shipping is an integral part of online shopping experience. At Gooseberry we stand behind your shipping experience. We make sure that the shipping cost; shipping time, shipping quality, and communication around shipping are world-class. Please be absolutely certain that your shipping address is entered correctly when ordering. Once your order is shipped, we no longer have the ability to change the address. In the event of an error, you may make changes to your shipping information as long as your order has not been processed and shipped.
What is the Poppins Shipping timeline?
We will ship Poppins towards the end of Feb 2018.  It will take about 90 days from close of the campaign to support manufacturing, quality assurance and logistics setup. Post that point, it will take between 5 to 10 working days for the product to reach most countries, except a few countries which usually take longer due to their customs process which can be as long as 15 working days.
We believe all backers packages will be shipped no later than the second week of March 2018 depending on the volume of 5000 units.
Do you ship to the USA as well as international locations across the globe?
Yes, we do support International Shipping. The shipping charges may vary from location to location. The shipping charges are borne by the customer.
How is shipping handled?
Shipping is handled through a quality 3rd party logistic partner we have engaged.
Is Duty included in the shipping cost?
Yes, Duty is included in the shipping cost.
Do I need to worry about customs?
Every Country has a different customs laws, we suggest to please enquire with your nearest customs office for details regarding international shipping and import charges.
Is there any shipping cost to deliver it to my location, if yes then how is shipping calculated for International orders?
Shipping cost will be calculated based on the unit price and the geography we are shipping to, this is calculated at the time of your purchase 
What is the general turn around time to deliver the product? Do we ship to PO Box addresses?
The general turn around time would be 15 - 20 working days. Again this solely depends on the shipping carrier about the direct PO Box Address Delivery.
Is there any way I can expedite the shipping process?
No, Shipping time is fixed with the shipping partner.

Refund & Return Policy 
We deeply appreciate your support for Gooseberry and have taken thorough care to craft the Gooseberry experience for you. If in any case you receive a defective product from our side you can exchange the product either for repair or replacement within the 90 days warranty period.
When can I exchange my defective product received from Gooseberry?
You can ship us the product through FedEx or other shipping services available to you. Please choose the right shipping service that can quickly deliver the product back to Gooseberry within 90 days from the date of purchase.
If I have purchased a product of Gooseberry from a local store or from gooseberry.store where should I return the product?
You can return the product to the original point of purchase. In case you have purchased in a local store you can return it to them or if you have purchased it online on gooseberry.store you can send us and email at hello@gooseberry.store
Who will pay the shipping cost if I want to Ship the product back to Gooseberry?
In case of return of the product the customer will have to pay the shipping cost. We would also like to inform that it is in best interest to insure the product from the logistics or shipping company, as we cannot be held responsible for the package if we don’t receive it. Our review team will first inspect the product on arrival for any sign of use or damage, it should be unused, unaltered, unsoiled on clearing the review the refund will be processed.
Return / Replacement Criteria
Eligible

You received a faulty/defective product
You received a physically damaged product
The product is different from description on the website

Not Eligible

Products that have been worn/washed/soiled
In case the original packaging is lost or damaged
In case the original payment information documents are not available


Terms & Conditions

Products must be in their original condition with full packaging intact.
Only unused, unaltered, unsoiled items with their original tags will be accepted.
Replacements will be made basis availability of that item on the website.
This return policy is only applicable to the products purchased from this website.
For products purchased from outside this website, the return policy of the point of purchase will be applied.


Risks and Challenges 
Our team has self funded the development of Poppins to date and as such we have completed all tooling and arrived at a PVT (Product Validated) stage of development. This means that we have a working prototype that is performing exceptionally well.
With that we do not see any risks on production, however we are holding ourselves to a high standard by promising our crowd fund backers that we WILL SHIP YOUR PRODUCT WITHIN 60 DAYS from the close of the campaign. Whilst there is a risk that we might miss this deadline we have done everything to ensure that this is both achievable and a milestone that we live up to - that is our commitment to you.
The key challenge for us now is to run an effective campaign that brings awareness of this incredible product to a mainstream audience who value their timepiece and who agree with our philosophy that rejuvenating your existing product is a better way to live than simply buying new products all the time.

story:
The Bluetooth as a stand-alone is a great Hi-Fi speaker.
But when it’s placed in it's Hub in the suitcase, something magical happens.  

 

Most speakers are built big because rich sound requires large Box. It's just something that's been sacrificed with modern portable speakers. But with Nomadic Audio’s patent-pending technology you can use the revolutionary High-End Bluetooth speaker as a stand-alone, and as an audio driver once placed in an enclosure (Speakase carry-on Suitcase), where the sound is Upgraded and becomes a full-scale Hi-Fi Speaker System !

 

 

A vast majority of portable speakers today use small, low-cost audio drivers that boost bass and high frequencies with digital signal processor (DSP) audio techniques that create the illusion of high-quality sound. But the reason big speakers ALWAYS sound better is that sound requires bigger audio drivers in bigger boxes in order to sound more realistic.  

We did things differently and made an incredible small speaker with big audio drivers, instead of small drivers. In fact, around 70% of Nomadic speaker’s surface is a moving membrane of two 4”x 6” woofers in a box-less design, providing a full and rich sound. We added two high-end soft dome 22mm (0.9") tweeters to cover the entire frequency range, and we did it all without any acoustic compromises.  

So the speaker sounds better on its own than any portable speaker out there.  

Then we have the Speakase, a suitcase/acoustic box that turns it into a massive, powerful big box speaker- regardless of whether it's empty or fully packed. The portable speaker was designed to also operate as a driver in a boxed enclosure, so once the stand legs are folded into the speaker, it switches modes to become a fully air generated sound system.  

After sliding the speaker into the Speakase suitcase, the synergy of both creates a much more powerful bass and a big life-like sound. The Bluetooth speaker takes advantage of the Speakase's (suitcase) acoustic-enhancing internal volume.  

The back of the drivers are open to the cabinet, creating an acoustic loading that enhances and boosts the audio experience through its carefully engineered structure.

What is the Product Status?
We have produced and shipped Nomadic Audio Speakase first batch worldwide. We got fantastic feedback from all our community and we are heading forward to further manufacturing and distributing it in major countries worldwide.   
We have already fulfilled almost all our Indiegogo orders and wish all our community quality music enjoyment with Nomadic Audio Speakase.

story:
Air Twins is designed to create a new combination of Wireless Earbuds and Power Bank. By integrating a smart spinnable cover on the power bank, Air Twins becomes a simple and stylish gadget that simultaneously charge your mobile devices and listening to music without the annoying wires anytime, anywhere. As easy as a tap on the earbuds, it transform into an earphone and your siri receiver with stable wireless connectivity.

 

Air Twins is the best true-wireless stereo earbuds for

★★★★★ Travel

★★★★★ Sport

★★★★★ Game

★★★★☆ Studio

★★★★★ VR

Air Twins BOM Draft

 

 

Air Twins is featured in:

"...the Air Twins Earbuds are the perfect all-day audio system."

 

"...an Apple AirPods Alternatives with good price–performance ratio."

 

 

Clean Outlook

The spinnable cover symbolize the essence of Ye!!'s design. We aim to make simple and unique gadgets through practicial mechanical design. It is not only a matter of making a black  metallic machine, but everyone looks human while using every parts of this gadget. 

 

Air Twins Spinnable Cover

 

Fashion Elements

Our design team uses three trendy color (Vermilion, Black & White) and make it looks like ear ornaments while in use. Gilbert (the Art Director) followed the streamlined drone/bee body and formulated the whole concept of Air Twins. Anyone can be a cool agent with the little earbuds and it is your best companion while you are running or study in a library.

Air Twins 3 Color

 

Sound Quality

We’ve spent almost 3 years researching with acoustic specialists and audio engineers to establish our own acoustic product knowledge - Air Twins has been built with 6mm micro speaker driver that provide clearly superior sound. Our engineers are fine-tuning the driver and we are confident to make a different with rich and textured music experience.

Air Twins Latest Frequency Response Chart with industrial qualified CLIO system

 

Daily Usage

There are no other earbuds have more reserved battery than Air Twins. We offer more than 60 hours playtime (about 25 times recharge) with our Power Case, you can  charge your mobile devices no matter where you are, with more than 2.5 straight days of music. With the built-in microphone, the hand-free function allows you to chat and accept calls with just a tap, simply perfect for urban area's calls.

Running with Air Twins

Air Twins on Phone

Gaming with Air Twins

Gym with Air Twins

Charging your mobile devices

 

Specs

Model: BE200

Product: True Wireless Stereo Bluetooth Earbuds with Power Case

Bluetooth Version: 4.1

Impedance: 16Ω

Sensitivity: 94 dB/mW

Frequency: 20Hz - 20KHz

Playtime: Up to 3 hours

Maximum Playtime with Power Case: Up to 60 hours

Input: 5V/1A

Output: 5V/1.5A

Battery Capacity: 2,800mAh

Charging Time: 60 minutes (Earphone) / 3 hours (Power Case)

Dimension: 15 x 15 x 25mm (Earphone) / 89 x 89 x 60mm (Power Case)

Weight: 4g (Earphone) / 101g (Power Case)

 

Why Air Twins

True-Wireless-Stereo Bluetooth Earbuds in the market

Proudly designed from Hong Kong design team, we create, we produce, we offer direct-sale to the customers. Unlike our peers, your contribution will be 100% allocated to the engineering team for the research on development.

Product Development Timeline


Latest team photo

(From the left)

Tim Yip: Marketing team member

Carl Li: Assistant Sales Manager

Felix Chan: Managing Director 

Travis Fong: Sales and Marketing Manager

(Other)

Gilbert Ho: Art Director

Susanne Luk: Senior Sales Executive

 

FAQ

How long is the warranty?

Every Air Twins comes with 1 year limited warranty. All the earbuds will be checked by our internal Quality Control team to make sure you receive the best out of us.

 

Can I use Air Twins to watch movies or play VR games?

Yes, the Air Twins is designed with VR in mind and pair with most of the VR device including the Oculus Rift.

 

Is there any compatibility issue with Air Twins?

Unlike other testing Bluetooth module, Air Twins has the most stable 4.1 module to ensure your connectivity to any Bluetooth-authorized devices, for example, iPhone, smartphones, portable players, tablets, laptops and etc.

 

How long does Air Twins battery charge for my iPhone 7 Plus?

With smart power charging technology, Air Twins can charge up to 100% of a iPhone 7. 

 

How long does the Air Twins earbuds battery last when using individually?

Inter-connected with both earbuds, Air Twins can last up to 3 hours. If your battery runs out, you can simply quick charge your earbuds in less than 1 hour and fully enjoy your music again.

 

Why should we back you now?

We aim to distribute the earbuds in Q3 2017. Your support  is an integral contribution to enable us for the prototype and early stage development. What we can offer you is the early-bird offer and the prioirity shipment in return.

 

Do I need to pay VAT/GST?

You are responsible with any laws and regulations in their countries. In case if there is any import taxes, customs duties and fees, backers are required to fulfill these additional charges and we have no control on any charges generated out of the Indiegogo system.

 

Is there any refund policy?

Refunds are allowed on case-by-case basis before assigned production deadline. There will be no refunds after we shipped the products.

 

I'm interested in being a distributor, how can I contact you?

Send us a message at info@yelltowin.com and we'll work together to spread this amazing gadget.

 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

For most of the cases, please send to info@yelltowin.com and our team will get back to you asap.

 

Risks and challenges

What you are seeing in our videos and pictures are come from our 3D rendering or real prototypes. We are working hard to make it better to fit your need.

We have done almost everything to make it ready for mass production, this means we limit your risks to a minimal level. We have our own factory and we prioritize this project especially for you.

With prototype developed and well tested by our engineer team, we currently do not have any concerns on meeting the promised product specifications and delivery time. We work as a team day and night and our production team is well trained to work seamlessly on every process. We  completed most of the component sourcing and we have no doubt on delivering the products to you on time.

We concerned on other unexpected delays that may occur, for example, the newly strict regulation on lithium battery, weather condition, or any other incident that may occur in our factory. In case there is anything happen, we promise to update every backers as soon as possible and we will strive for our best to provide the backers the Air Twins with excellent quality.

We have contacted Floship and currently in the progress of coming up a partnership on logistic arrangement. We truly want to ensure that everything will go smooth during the fulfilment process. Every backers will receive an online survey from us in the End of April, 2017. This is when you’ll choose your Air Twins colours and make sure your shipping address is correct.

You will have 14 business days to complete your survey.

If you have any questions at all email us at info@yelltowin.com

story:
Breakers Social Club is a three piece alternative rock band from Long Beach California. We blend melodic Instrumentals and heartfelt lyrics to make music that comes from our personal life experiences and the influences around us. Breakers Social Club consist of three musicians with backgrounds in drum line, choir, and solo performances.

We are:

Joseph Gonzalez - Guitar and Vocals   

Matt La Motte       - Drums 

Samara Brinson   - Bass, and Vocals

 

We have launched this Indiegogo campaign to raise the funds for our first album. About two months ago after one of our shows in Long Beach California, our car was broken into and all of our gear was stolen. Our insurance covered a portion of the lost items, but we invested a lot of our own money in new gear to continue playing shows. Thats why we have turned to our friends, family and fans. We are looking for your help to make this album possible! For your donations we have set up multiple gifts that you can purchase. They will not only help us, but will get you awesome tunes, merchandise, and much more!

 

We are looking to raise $3,500 for recording, logo design, and merchandise printing. The money we raise will be divided into building a strong Electronic Press Kit (to be sent to venues and managers) and merchandise that will be available for all of our fans at shows and online (t- shirts, albums ect). We are using the flexible funding model, so we will receive the funds even if we don't raise the full $3500, but if we don't reach our goal, Indiegogo will charge us double, so we are really looking for help from every one who is able. We also wanna give you guys the best album and gifts that we can.

 

**If we don't reach our goal, we will record a shorter album and cut back on our launch events.

 

**If we SURPASS our goal, we will be able to pay for higher-quality mastering and expand our mini-tour to places further away from Long Beach

.

The money we raise will be divided into building a strong Electronic Press Kit (to be sent to venues and managers) and merchandise that will be available for all of our fans at shows and online (t- shirts, albums ect). We are using the flexible funding model, so we will receive the funds even if we don't raise the full $3500, but if we don't reach our goal, Indiegogo will charge us double, so we are really looking for help from every one who is able. We also wanna give you guys the best album and gifts that we can. **If we don't reach our goal, we will record a shorter album and cut back on our launch events. **If we SURPASS our goal, we will be able to pay for higher-quality mastering and expand our mini-tour to places further away from Long Beach.

story:
The TONE:

The Tradesman is an organic, light-to-mid-range transparent overdrive pedal that is designed to be unobtrusive yet enhance all of the sweet sounding, rich harmonics from your equipment while pushing your signal into overdriven bliss. This is not your run of the mill overdrive - the Tradesman was built to inspire! With heightened playing sensitivity, a musical and versatile tone shaping EQ, enough headroom to sing the sweet blues, but enough thick drive to cut through the mix...you will be heard!

  • Handcrafted solid Oregon black walnut enclosure - every pedal is truly one-of-a-kind
  • Studio-grade components and original circuitry designed in the USA by Tone Whizard Labs, exclusively for Artistry Audio    
  • Solid USA made aluminum knobs for Volume, Gain, and Tone
  • Organic, mostly transparent overdrive ranging from light crunch to mildly aggressive tones
  • Custom-designed input stage for superb sensitivity, signal integrity, and incredible headroom
  • 4558-based soft-clipping stage utilizing 1N4148 diodes
  • Click-less, true bypass switching to preserve signal integrity
  • Studio-inspired "Tilt" EQ for optimum versatility
  • Boost toggle takes your entire signal to the next level
  • Space-saving top-mounted jacks
  • Powered by any standard pedal power supply 

The WHY:

Bringing craftsmanship back to music.

I'm a guitar player. And a gear nerd too. But at some point I feel like I got a little lost in all the flashing lights and cables. What if I could fall in love with simply music again? Do you remember when you first picked up a guitar, or when you nailed your first solo, or wrote a song for someone you love? Do you remember the pure joy and inspiration that came from simply being in the music? I believe that we, as musicians, can become distracted and lose sight of our craft. I believe that the gear we invest in has the power to either push us forward or hold us back. The idea behind Artistry Audio is to bring my fellow musicians back to making music. This is my craft...I set out to design an overdrive pedal that not only gets you excited to play music, but is aesthetically rich, pleasing to the eyes and ears, and free of distractions. I've given enough functionality for the musician to preserve and carve out their own unique tone while keeping it simple enough to keep you focused on what's important.

 

The Journey:

No Compromises.

The journey to building the first finished prototype was not an easy one. Many late nights in the shop away from family, and many early mornings at the computer have gone into making the Tradesman the best that it could be. Learning the characteristics of different lumber, testing and sourcing the best parts and materials, figuring out how to take a solid block of wood, maintain its beauty and integrity while turning it into a rich and useful tool; all this was a daunting challenge, but the end result couldn't have turned out any better. I'm truly proud to have developed a pedal where every single unit I build is a one-of-a-kind and no two are the same.  I have had the opportunity to collaborate with a man by the name of Todd Dozier of Tone Whizard Labs. He is an expert in his field, passionate about his craft, and truly knows great tone. When I conceptualized the idea for the circuitry and brought it to him, he knew exactly how to bring it to life. The circuitry designed by Todd was carefully thought out and only high quality, studio-grade components were sourced. The more musicians that join me on my journey, the more I will be able to craft and accomplish for everyone involved.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The funds used from the campaign will be invested into tools and equipment that will allow me to stay ahead of demand, turn out consistently high-quality pedals, and start development on future effects! The better Artistry Audio starts off, the bigger our future is. Our goal of $10,000 would allow us to make some much needed upgrades to our shop: full dust extraction and compressed air; led lighting; a spray finishing booth; industrial tools to keep up with the workload (CNC machine and a bigger, safer table saw); and purchase enough materials to build the Tradesman affordably. Keep in mind that although this is a big chunk of money, there are a lot of start-up costs like fees, taxes, perks and shipping, and bulk materials before we get to re-invest these funds back into the business. From the spark of the Tradesman concept up until now I have already covered much of the initial investment such as purchasing a shop and tools, commissioning Tone Whizard Labs for the circuitry design, and countless hours of trial and error, research, and design that went into making this a reality.

I am really excited to offer some killer perks! Now is the time to get your hands on a signed and numbered Tradesman before we go into full production. We have some other awesome perks too, so check 'em out!

If our goal is not met, the funds raised will still go toward purchasing enough tools and equipment to keep up with production demands and buying in bulk as many materials as possible.

 

Risks & Challenges

High Demand will be the biggest (and most anticipated) challenge. I have physically prepared by making sure I have enough space and equipment to craft these pedals in batches and have outlined a streamlined production process to maximize 'time' efficiency.

During the past year, I have been working hard to ensure that my product would be something that I could produce quickly and with minimum interruptions. All operations taking place in my shop - this way I don't have to rely on outside services to build, assemble, and ship the pedals.

HELP SPREAD THE WORD!

Don't forget to use the share tools up top to let your friends know about our campaign! Get out there and spread the word!

 

THANK YOU!

I'd be a fool to think that I got here all on my own...

Sloane & Atticus - You are my drive. You never cease to encourage me and have supported all of my creative passions relentlessly. Thank you!

Todd Dozier (Tone Whizard Labs) - You truly are a tone wizard. Developing this pedal together has been a blast. Thanks for helping turn my ideas into reality!

Adam Rick and Michael Cunningham - My best friends also happen to be slayers in the video production department. You guys helped me tell my story.

Ben Brunskill, Video Editor - Thank you for your work!  www.mrmixalot.com

Thank you to all of my friends and family who have never stopped challenging me and have stuck by my side through this wild adventure.

AND YOU! Thank you for supporting the underdog, keeping the entrepreneur's dream alive, and choosing Artistry.

story:
German   Spanish   Italian    French   Japanese   Chinese  Korean       

R&M is a consumer electronics start-up merging superb sound and best connectivity with unique design products. Our creative curiosity makes us evolve and think about how to enjoy our music and how multimedia experiences can drive us to happiness.

 

Today, we want to introduce to the backer community our latest development,  A device to modernize your old loved audio devices,   A device to connect the past and future - 

The R&M SoundHub,  the next generation of digital sound amplifiers.

R&M SoundHub is the newtro (Retrospect +New) concept of the digital sound amplifiers. With it, you will not only be able to amplify your music to any passive speaker but also convert your old (and maybe abandoned) audio devices to today's music streaming such as Spotify or Tidal.

Connect your past and your future with R&M SoundHub!  

R&M SoundHub is the newtro (Retrospect +New) concept of the digital sound amplifiers. With it, you will not only be able to amplify your music to any passive speaker but also convert your old (and maybe abandoned) audio devices to today's music streaming such as Spotify or Tidal.

Connect your past and your future with R&M SoundHub!  

 

 Connect & modernize all your beloved audio device!

  •  Connect to Spotify and other music, radio applications with SoundHub 
  •  Enjoy wireless connectivity: Bluetooth, WiFi, Airplay, DLNA
  •  Enjoy wired connectivity: HDMI, Optic, Aux, USB-DAC, USB-A, LAN
  •  Create a home cinema in your living room. Connect your TV and passive speakers 
  •  Modernize  your old devices such as Turntable, CD/DVD player and others 
  •  Connect your sub-woofer via 3.5 phone jack and feel deeper bass sound
  • Listen to music with your own headset
  •  Play same music with several speakers simultaneously (Multi-room, Multi-channel)
  •  Decorate your home with compact  designed SoundHub

 

ALL combinations to connected! 

 

 

Choose from Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Airplay or DLNA wirelessly. In addition, use HDMI, Optical, USB-In, USB DAC, Ethernet, AUX or headset by wiring.

 

 

All connectivity can be controlled by our remote controller or R&M App. You will be able to use SoundHub as a gateway to connect all your devices and create your center of entertainment.

 

Thanks to SoundHub’s connectivity, you can link your old devices to top platforms like Spotify, TuneIn or Tidal or connect them with your TV or Audio – giving your beloved speakers a new life.

 

 

Easily connects to your TV, Home Theatre, giving you the best sound quality for a more enjoyable movie-watching experience with your family. Watching your favorite movies and TV series at home has never been this immersive.

 

Give new life, modernize your classic old Speakers!

Yes, technology is continuously evolving and it sometimes breaks our hearts. If you have lovely passive speakers but you are no longer enjoying them, R&M SoundHub is your winning choice! 

Home joy! 

Imagine to boost your parties amplifying your turntable music to your speakers or Home Theatre systems or relaxing yourself listening amplified music in your personal headphones via RCA jack. 

SoundHub connects your preferred music or radio streaming platforms to any loudspeaker so you can freely crank up the volume while your favorite song is playing. SoundHub also supports the latest music formats including high-resolution,  lossless codecs such as FLAC, ALAC, WAV with  24bits/192Khz resolution. 

 

 

 

You can connect SoundHub to online streaming platforms such as Spotify by our free R&M App, start enjoying an amazing wireless music experience.  The connection is super easy thanks to  our unique patented technology (Patent no 1013730990000)

 

 

 

Yes, SoundHub is also AirPlay friendly! Simply connect your SoundHub to the same network to link your iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

 

By connecting echo input via AUX or Bluetooth, all Alexa functionalities can be used. The setup and the power feeding from the USB port are both simple.

 

 

Play the same music in all rooms using Multi-room function. With our first-generation models "BOSK" and "BOSK-Twin", you can connect SoundHub all together by the function of R&M App. Enrich your music experience more deeply!

 

RÖTH & MYERS PASSIVE SPEAKERS offer a robust construction for trusted reliability and overall sonic performance, for which we adapted the corrugated paper pipe, a unique patented technology (Patent no 1018512410000, 2/18/2019), as core sound enclosure.   

 

 

Rugged  MDF enclosure finished by zebra wood veneer has lacquer finished board as a baffle and an aluminum rear panel.  A passive crossover network is used for a high-quality sound with precise MPP capacitors and air-cored coils,  all elaborately and skilled by handmade.

Input connections include banana connectors as well as screw terminal receptacles.

 

 

With intensive and sound tuning,  we set 40W as for proper spec which can sufficiently provide rich enough audio volume for the home sound environment, combined with connectivity and high-resolution codec playback at an affordable and convenient cost.

Setup is super-easy,  1 touch setup by WiFi/BT button or 3 step setup via our App (our patented technology, Registered no 1013730990000, March 5, 2014)

 

 

 

 

 

Our team has completed the prototype development of SoundHub and has already passed European CE, American FCC approval tested by official laboratories such as safety, EMI/EMC emission, RoHS, and REACH. And we’re under the final sound tuning stage to get the best-optimized sound level.  

 

With your support, we will run the production of SoundHub. Rest assured that we have developed a quality product to meet your expectations.

 

   

 

RÖTH & MYERS is the natural result of a founding team with deep roots in the new IT technologies industry united by the vision of creating a product that gives people back the possibility to enjoy music with all their senses.

Always at the forefront of technology, our R&D team in Korea makes the European creative product and design a reality, achieving the perfect symbiosis.

An exclusive device that achieves the fusion of the latest technology and a high-quality sound that will inspire you:

Because we want you to enjoy high-quality sound.

Because we want you to enjoy the sound with all its connectivity.

Because we want you to enjoy the sound without losing its essence. 

 

 We appreciate you for taking the time to read about our project and we thank you for your support. 

 

Website         

Facebook

Youtube

Instagram

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve completed the prototype development and SoundHub is currently under the final tuning stage. In fact, we have already produced 50 units of the final product. We do not foresee any risks in making this project a reality. While there are always risks and challenges that come in creating and producing a physical product, we are confident in our ability to overcome them. Rest assured that we will remain transparent with the progress we are making every step of the way.

story:
Imagine... having your own personal, individually customized, set of earphones!  

Earphones are mass-produced on a global scale and you have probably had the misfortune to use them, felt the discomfort, scorned the cheap and boring appearance and most importantly, wished for your own earphones!

ChaosHz is the answer to your dreams. ChaosHz is an exclusive, personalized, fully handcrafted, Hi-Fi, and custom designed In-Ear earphones which are made especially for you.  

Review of ChaosHz

EXCELLENT HI-FI SOUND

  1. Monitoring level: adopting the technology standard of star custom and fit for use in sports scenes.
  2. Lou unit: three units moving iron. Presenting perfect sound quality.
  3. Eight strands of wire: multi-core transmission; twist type weave that avoids interference.

 

PICTURE CUSTOMIZATION

The picture customization of ChaosHz earphones allows you to stand out from the group. Offering your favorite pictures such as the characters in a game or movie, a wonderful scenery and so on.

We have done a lot of researches and analysis, and created a set of efficient process in sure of meeting the needs.

 

VALUE-ADDED SERVICES

Light, steady, fit for your auricle.

Whether on work or fitness, ChaosHz will bring you a striking sound experience. It is based on ear modeling, fit for ear canal shape, more comfortable.

100% Hand Made  

The manufacture of ChaosHz includes 14 procedures and each of them is well built by hand. Compared with the traditionally manufactured industrial earphones, we want you to be filled with awe when you receive ChaosHz.

Through 14 procedures, 45 techniques and over 10 hours of production and testing. Like listening to music? Wish that your ears could display proudly your love for all things brass and awesome? Then these are the earphones for you! Steampunk-style ChaosHz is fully hand-crafted earphones with the gracious steampunk sense. Every pair of the punk-style earbuds is unique.

 Hi-Fi Sound Quality

Beautifully handcrafted ChaosHz, offering the unprecedented level of fidelity. All frequencies sound true and clean from the deepest lows through to the highest highs and pure vocal presence. Once you become used to the sound of ChaosHz, your ears open up to a new world of sound, and you'll find it hard to go back to traditional headphones.

Why Choose ChaosHz

Everyone can get a Bluetooth connector for free, turn your HiFi earphones to wireless.

Custom earphones are sophisticated products, and they can be only made by experienced engineers. The ChaosHz team has over 15 years of professional experience, produced over 30,000 sets and served over twenty thousand customers. They add new meaning to the word “over”.

 It is very expensive before, but now very suitable for you.  

The ChaosHz earphones are perfectly designed. They fit your ears perfectly and at the same time the sound insulation is excellent.

The price of ChaosHz is one-third of those on the market.  

It is not a job it's a passion 

 We are not only earphone professionals but also real enthusiasts. After 15 years, we have given up working for others and decided to step out into the big wide world by ourselves and show what we know and more especially what we could not show while working for others.

Who and Why 

We are audio freaks with a young, enthusiastic entrepreneurial team behind us. These handcrafted headsets are our first product line. After much trial and error and testing we now have a competitive custom headset service of the highest quality. In the future we hope to provide a customized headset service to each and every one of you.

Our craftsmen started making custom headphones when they were teenagers and have acquired extensive experience over the last fifteen years. Since officially entering the field of custom cords, ChaosHz Team has developed wide user base and further enhanced its techniques and expertise. Today we present custom headphones that are fully handcrafted from cords earbuds.

Please contact us: hi@chaoshz.com

It is based on ear modeling, fit for ear canal shape, more comfortable.100% Hand Made  The manufacture of ChaosHz includes 14 procedures and each of them is well built by hand. Compared with the traditionally manufactured industrial earphones, we want you to be filled with awe when you receive ChaosHz.

Through 14 procedures, 45 techniques and over 10 hours of production and testing. Like listening to music? Wish that your ears could display proudly your love for all things brass and awesome? Then these are the earphones for you! Steampunk-style ChaosHz is fully hand-crafted earphones with the gracious steampunk sense. Every pair of the punk-style earbuds is unique.

 Hi-Fi Sound QualityBeautifully handcrafted ChaosHz, offering the unprecedented level of fidelity. All frequencies sound true and clean from the deepest lows through to the highest highs and pure vocal presence. Once you become used to the sound of ChaosHz, your ears open up to a new world of sound, and you'll find it hard to go back to traditional headphones.Why Choose ChaosHzEveryone can get a Bluetooth connector for free, turn your HiFi earphones to wireless.Custom earphones are sophisticated products, and they can be only made by experienced engineers. The ChaosHz team has over 15 years of professional experience, produced over 30,000 sets and served over twenty thousand customers. They add new meaning to the word “over”. It is very expensive before, but now very suitable for you.  The ChaosHz earphones are perfectly designed. They fit your ears perfectly and at the same time the sound insulation is excellent.The price of ChaosHz is one-third of those on the market.  It is not a job it's a passion  We are not only earphone professionals but also real enthusiasts. After 15 years, we have given up working for others and decided to step out into the big wide world by ourselves and show what we know and more especially what we could not show while working for others.Who and Why We are audio freaks with a young, enthusiastic entrepreneurial team behind us. These handcrafted headsets are our first product line. After much trial and error and testing we now have a competitive custom headset service of the highest quality. In the future we hope to provide a customized headset service to each and every one of you.Our craftsmen started making custom headphones when they were teenagers and have acquired extensive experience over the last fifteen years. Since officially entering the field of custom cords, ChaosHz Team has developed wide user base and further enhanced its techniques and expertise. Today we present custom headphones that are fully handcrafted from cords earbuds.Please contact us: hi@chaoshz.com

story:
We are Tripsitters, an indie rock band from Norman, Ok. We are a three piece band made up of Jeremiah Rankin as lead vocals and guitar, Michael Moffitt as backing vocals and lead guitar, and Logan Morris as drums. We had been playing around the state of Oklahoma for the past 6 months and are ready to get our music recorded for you guys. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We have a goal of $1000 which will go toward paying the remainder of our studio time and help us to produce music videos for each single. We have multiple perks for all your donations. $5 will get you a hand written letter from each of us thanking you for your contribution. $15 will get you a Tripsitters T-shirt and a hand written letter. $30 will get you a Tripsitters T-shirt and a signed poster. $50 will get you a signed poster and half of the songs we're recording before they're posted anywhere else. $100 will get you a signed poster and the full EP before its released anywhere. If all funds are not met, the money we do receive  will first go toward paying for studio time and secondly toward producing the music videos.

This project is very special to all of us because with this EP we'll be able to reach a broader audience and people will be able to listen to our music whenever and wherever they want. We're very excited to be taking this next step in our band's career and hope that you will be able to help us fund something that we love to do.

If you find yourself saying, "I can barely help myself", then we have the perfect solution. Help us getting the word out and sharing this with your friends and family. We appreciate any contribution you can, whether it's just sharing on your social media or donating funds, you're the best and we love you.

story:
MIDI controllers

Our company Microdesignum s.r.o. produces MIDI controllers for guitarists and we also focus on MIDI modules for Electro Harmonix guitar pedals that have no MIDI control. We have already developed MIDI modules for EHX POG2, Cathedral, Ravish Sitar and Ring Thing pedals that are used by musicians worldwide. We have developed the MIDI modules that a musician is able to simply build into his pedal by himself, or we also offer the new pedals with the built-in MIDI control.

MIDI controller for x9 pedals

Many musicians ask us about the control module for EHX x9 guitar effects. These pedals have another control principle and thus another HW module and firmware has to be developed. We need $3000 USD for such development.

The new MIDI module will allow to musicians to entirely control the x9 guitar effects including the ON footswitch, the program selector (1-9) and the control knobs (Dry, Organ, Mod, Click in case of C9 pedal).

Advantages of remote MIDI control

The x9 pedals with MIDI control can be mounted in rack and they can be controlled remotely by a MIDI foot controller or by a computer. The program number (instrument type) and its parameters can be changed by single pressing a footswitch on a MIDI controler. No manual turning the knobs during live playing is necessary.

Moreover, the parameters such as MOD or CLICK can be controlled in real-time by an expression pedal or by control data from a computer.

Variants

1. Compact variant: can be mounted on the top of the x9 pedal.

2. Rack variant: the x9 pedal is screwed at the rear side of the 1U rack panel.

 

Other our MIDI controllers for EHX guitar effects

POG2 with our MIDI control:

Cathedral Stereo Reverb with our MIDI control (controlled by our MIDI Grande 8F1D):

Ravish Sitar with our MIDI control (controlled by our MIDI Grande 6F1D):

Ring Thing with our MIDI Control (controlled by our MIDI Grande 10F1D):

 

How to support this project

  • Contribute to this project.
  • Share this project on social media.
  • Tell your friends on discussion forums.

About us

Our company is based in the Czech Republic, Central Europe, European Union. We have many experiences with building MIDI controllers, MIDI switchers and other custom-build MIDI and audio devices. We have customers in 32 countries and on 5 continets. We produce final products or standalone modules that users build into their gear. Our MIDI modules are easy to use and safe for the device that they are being built in.

story:
The Perfect Marriage of Smartphone and Headphone

ProStereo™ D1 Professional Wireless Hi-Fi Headphone Amp + DAC works with any smartphone or computer. Smartphones and computers on their own do not always produce smooth sound - in fact, it's often noticeably bad! Upgrade your music to studio quality!

Here's the truth:

Audio CDs use a bit depth of 16-bits, while DVD-Video and Blu-ray discs can use 24-bit audio.

ProStereo™ D1 has Hi-res audio certification from JAS with an audio output of up to 32-bit / 384 kHz.

A Total Solution of Hi-Fi Audio Experience

To deliver the best quality of music enjoyment, ProStereo™ D1 bundled with a pair of High-Res Audio Headphones with 5Hz - 70 kHz high-frequency range produces smooth bass sounds.

 

How It Works

ProStereo™ D1 supports the Sample Rate Converter, no matter which type of music file is playing on your mobile phone, or in USB DAC Mode (MP3, AAC, FLAC, etc.), the audio data can be raised up to 32-bit / 384 kHz and is processed by an independent Hi-Fi DAC.

 

 

Extraordinary USB DAC With High-Resolution Audio

ProStereo™ D1 can be used as a professional external USB DAC by connecting the USB cable to your devices and external accessories (phone, mp3 player, or computer).

 

 

High-Resolution Audio Earphones Included

The ProStereo™ D1 comes with earphones that are fully compliant with the Hi-Res Audio requirements set by the Japan Audio Society. You will notice a clear and fine sound output in wide treble performance and a solid, deep bass due to a frequency rate up to 70 kHz. There is also a 9mm dynamic driver to allow for a sense of natural sound clarity.

 

 

As Seen On...

 

 

Share ProStereo D1!



 

 

 





 

 

 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES

  • Rotatable volume knob with LED light guide.
  • Using the world-class AKM DAC and headphone amplifier chip.
  • Extraordinary Bluetooth with sampling rate converter and high-end headphone amplifier.
  • Upgraded USB DAC with high-resolution audio specifications.
  • Allow effortless playing of music when connected with Bluetooth-enabled devices.
  • Triangular prism design with a circular charging dock.
  • Outstanding craftsmanship with a strong bottom to stand on different surfaces.
  • Metallic and minimalistic appearance with a cool touch.

 

 

  • Bluetooth version: 4.1
  • Profile Support: A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, HFP
  • Codec: SBC, AAC,PCM
  • Support USB DAC
  • Maximum Power Output: 40mW+40mW (16Ω)
  • Maximum Power voltage: (RMS):0.9V
  • Signal-to-Noise Ratio: 110dB
  • Crosstalk: 80dB
  • THD (A-Weighted): less than 0.02%
  • Play time: Up to 6.5 hours
  • Music time: SRC On: 5 hours; SRC Off: 6 hours
  • Standby time: 100 hours
  • USB Audio: Class 1 (Up to 24-bit/96kHz)
  • DAC & Headphone Amp chipset: AKM AK4376A
  • Charging: Type-C USB
  • Multipoint connectivity

 

 

  • Full compliance with Hi-Res Audio requirement from Japan Audio Society
  • 9mm Neodymium magnet driver
  • Sensitivity (DB/MW): 102 ± 3dB
  • Frequency Range(HZ): 5Hz – 70kHz
  • Max. Input Power: 10mW
  • Impedance: 17Ω
  • 4 pairs of earbuds (SS, S, M, L sizes)

 

 

 

About i.Tech

As one of the leading Bluetooth brands in the industry, i.Tech has been focusing on innovation and design of high-quality Bluetooth headsets & mobile accessories.

For many years, i.Tech Dynamic has been the number one Bluetooth headsets brand in Hong Kong, Singapore, and Malaysia. With its headquarters in Hong Kong, iTech is well positioned to reach the world, and stay strong in Asian markets.

As an innovative and design-focused brand, i.Tech Dynamic has won several international prestigious awards including CES Innovation award, iF design award, etc. In recent years, i.Tech has actively developed premium phone accessories and released a new brand of ProStereo™ to bring their customers a wider range of high-quality mobile audio products.

 

Winner of International Prestigious Awards

 


 

Thank you for checking out our ProStereo D1 campaign! Please make sure to give us a shoutout on Facebook, or Tweet at us on Twitter for the latest information on ProStereo D1 products and tech-related topics!

story:
Boostle TruWireless In-Ear Headphones, next generation NFC and Bluetooth wireless earbuds. 

Boostle TruWireless In-Ear Headphones are currently in development but we are in need of beta testers to give feedback for the final product. By contributing to our campaign, you will become a beta tester of the developmental product, provide your feedback, then receive the final product.

What Makes Us Different?

Sound Quality: 

Other Wireless Earbuds: All wireless earbuds on the market connect to each other via Bluetooth, then connect to your phone via Bluetooth. This ruins the sound quality because both connections are working on the same connectivity method at the same time.

Our Wireless Earbuds: Boostle TruWireless In-Ear Headphones connect to each other via NFC because of the close range of each ear, then connects to your phone via the latest version of Bluetooth. This separates the signal and makes for a rich, synced sound experience.

Features

Other Wireless Earbuds: Only offer sound capabilities

Our Wireless Earbuds: Boostle TruWireless In-Ear Headphones not only offer the richest sound quality on the market but also have all the features you have come to expect in headphones such as a microphone, noise cancellation, and control buttons.

Your Experience

Other Wireless Earbuds: Only send you the final product

Our Wireless Earbuds: Everyone here at Boostle wants you to enjoy the product and be happy with it, that is why we want you to test our developmental model, so that you can tell us everything that's perfect and everything that needs to be worked on, then we send you the final product that you are happy with.

story:
AUVIO has created and sold over 15 million pieces of the best wired and wireless earbuds in the past decade, and now we have gone completely wireless into the future. With our engineering and design expertise and testing data, AUVIO brings you the ultimate AUVIO MOTION+, designed with your freedom in mind. This true wireless PLUS earbuds is carefully engineered with the best ergonomic fit for active individuals to enjoy the freedom to experience accurate yet dynamic sound while on the move.

YOU'VE GOT THE POWER

Stay in MOTION with 48 hours play time. From work to workout, AUVIO MOTION+ is all you will need to carry with you. With the latest Bluetooth chipset and specially designed firmware, power consumption is at its optimal. AUVIO MOTION+ uses carefully selected and tested high quality lithium polymer battery in both ear pieces and in the charging case. The 500 mAH battery capacity in the charging case gives AUVIO MOTION+ up to 5 full charges and 40 hours extra play time.

 

 A PERFECT FIT TO YOUR ACTIVE LIFESTYLE 

Lightweight, slip proof fit, sweat proof protection.  We have tested AUVIO MOTION+ with over 100 users  participating in different activities of various intensity and duration to engineer its structure for the best ergonomic fit. 

We have selected the strongest and lightest material in the industry. It's 4-layer printed board design reduces the overall size and weight of AUVIO MOTION+.

The wing tips, ear tips and earbud structures are carefully designed so these lightweight earbuds fit snug and comfortable in your ears. Never worry about losing your earbuds during your work outs or runs. 

AUVIO MOTION+'s IPX5 water resistant structure and nano coating provide double sweat and splash proof protection to the earbuds and it's internal electronic components. Regardless of whether you are running a marathon in the rain or working out a sweat in an intensive weight training session, they are there to stay.  

 

 

COMPLETELY WIRE FREE

Listen wireless, charge wireless. We’ve cut all wires from these lightweight earbuds so they will never get in your way again. Be free, be comfortable to do whatever you want for hours and hours, forgetting they are even there.   

 

THE LATEST AND THE GREATEST 

Connect and stay connected. AUVIO MOTION+ uses the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chipset and True Wireless PLUS technology to secure simultaneous stereo connectivity to both earbuds for the most accurate sound and uninterrupted connection.  The dynamically configured antenna is specially turned to the best angle for the greatest reception. AUVIO MOTION+ has gone through different use cases to verify the best reception (such as pocket test, backpack test) in different environments (bus, train, street, office, etc.). You can be 45ft away from your device and still stay connected for hours!  AUVIO MOTION+ also has smart pairing technology that only requires you to just pair once and they will take care of the rest to pair automatically.  

 

AMAZING SOUND 

Stereo Phone Calls. AUVIO MOTION+ uses the latest true wireless PLUS technology delivering audio to both earbuds at the same time. When on a call, it suppresses background noise such as traffic or nearby conversations so the person on the other end hears your clearly. Together with it's snug, slip proof fit, AUVIO MOTION+ gives that perfect barrier for noise isolation so you can have the best quality conversations. 

Engineered to take sound to the next level inside and out. On the inside, AUVIO MOTION+ uses extremely light and thin graphene speaker drivers to reproduce strong bass, crystal clear vocals and deliver wider range of sound frequency (20-40kHz). It can capture extremely small variations in music signal so you can enjoy endless hours of unbelievable dynamic yet accurate sound.  On the outside, its lightweight snug fit reduces ambient noise to the ears so you can enjoy music at lower volume making it much safer to your hearing. You will be able to hear every detail without distortion.

GO FUTHER WITH THE AUVIO MOTION+ APP 

We understand everyone is different so we have created the AUVO MOTION+ app so you have the power in your hands to customize the earbuds as you like them.  

Create your own sound curve. Customize and save EQ settings depending on the kind of music you are listening to. 

Lost and found. Just in case you forgot where you put your earbuds, the app will help you find its last detected location. 

Control the controls.  AUVIO MOTION+ app lets you customize each button and each press the way you like it.  

 QUALITY GUARANTEED 

AUVIO is serious about quality. Our Engineering and Quality Experts have developed testing methodologies designed to put each of our products through extreme conditions, life and user tests.  

IPX5 Testing

 

WHATS IN THE BOX

AUVIO MOTION+ 

Charging case

USB charging cable

Wing tips (S/M/L)

Eartips (S/M/L)

SEE WHY AUVIO MOTION+ IS ALL YOU NEED

WHERE ARE WE NOW 

 After many stages of testing and retesting, our designers and engineers have come to the final design stage. We have confirmed the material that gives AUVIO MOTION+ its light and durable body, the structure with the perfect ergonomic fit and electrical components that will give it it's overall reliability and user experience. 

Here is a first look at the AUVIO MOTION+ appearance and functional prototypes.  

HOW IT WORKS

Wireless Charge Earbuds

Simply place AUVIO MOTION+ in the charging case to start charging. The LEDs lights turn red during charging. 

 

Wireless Charge Charging Case

Place AUVIO MOTION+ charging case on a wireless charging pad to start charging wire-free.

 

Easy Pairing

Pair AUVIO MOTION+ in just a few quick steps.

  1. Remove the earbuds from the charging case. Wait a few seconds and the LED will flash red and blue alternatively in pairing mode.
  2. Turn on Bluetooth function on your device to begin searching for AUVIO MOTION+.
  3. Select AUVIO MOTION+ from the list of devices to pair. LED on the earbuds flash blue every 4 seconds when pairing is successful.
 

Auto Pairing

If AUVIO MOTION+ was already paired with your device before, simply remove the earbuds from the charging case and they will pair automatically with your device. 

 

Magnetic

 Controls

 

PERKS

 

About AUVIO

AUVIO has been creating quality audio devices for more than 10 years and is one of the top brands for audio in the United States.  AUVIO has sold more than 15 million units in more than 6,000 stores across the U.S. 

AUVIO is dedicated to creating and innovating experiences that fits seamlessly into everyday lives. Every aspect of product experience is considered in AUVIO designs – from hardware to software and everything in between – ensuring products are stylish, easy to use and meets our customers’ needs and desires.

Risks and challenges

We fully expect to deliver AUVIO Motion+ true wireless plus earbuds with exceptional quality according to our project timeline. However, even the most well-planned process can meet unpredictable events. We will make sure we keep you updated on our progress so you know exactly where we are and what we are doing.

International backers: We will ship AUVIO Motion+ worldwide, except of Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. Please be aware that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

Estimated delivery: Each reward tier may have a different shipment dates. We will provide updates if the shipment date changes. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at support@auviosound.com.

Music courtesy of Nicolai Heidlas.
