AUVIO has created and sold over 15 million pieces of the best wired and wireless earbuds in the past decade, and now we have gone completely wireless into the future. With our engineering and design expertise and testing data, AUVIO brings you the ultimate AUVIO MOTION+, designed with your freedom in mind. This true wireless PLUS earbuds is carefully engineered with the best ergonomic fit for active individuals to enjoy the freedom to experience accurate yet dynamic sound while on the move.YOU'VE GOT THE POWERStay in MOTION with 48 hours play time. From work to workout, AUVIO MOTION+ is all you will need to carry with you. With the latest Bluetooth chipset and specially designed firmware, power consumption is at its optimal. AUVIO MOTION+ uses carefully selected and tested high quality lithium polymer battery in both ear pieces and in the charging case. The 500 mAH battery capacity in the charging case gives AUVIO MOTION+ up to 5 full charges and 40 hours extra play time.  A PERFECT FIT TO YOUR ACTIVE LIFESTYLE Lightweight, slip proof fit, sweat proof protection.  We have tested AUVIO MOTION+ with over 100 users  participating in different activities of various intensity and duration to engineer its structure for the best ergonomic fit. We have selected the strongest and lightest material in the industry. It's 4-layer printed board design reduces the overall size and weight of AUVIO MOTION+.The wing tips, ear tips and earbud structures are carefully designed so these lightweight earbuds fit snug and comfortable in your ears. Never worry about losing your earbuds during your work outs or runs. AUVIO MOTION+'s IPX5 water resistant structure and nano coating provide double sweat and splash proof protection to the earbuds and it's internal electronic components. Regardless of whether you are running a marathon in the rain or working out a sweat in an intensive weight training session, they are there to stay.    COMPLETELY WIRE FREEListen wireless, charge wireless. We’ve cut all wires from these lightweight earbuds so they will never get in your way again. Be free, be comfortable to do whatever you want for hours and hours, forgetting they are even there.    THE LATEST AND THE GREATEST Connect and stay connected. AUVIO MOTION+ uses the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chipset and True Wireless PLUS technology to secure simultaneous stereo connectivity to both earbuds for the most accurate sound and uninterrupted connection.  The dynamically configured antenna is specially turned to the best angle for the greatest reception. AUVIO MOTION+ has gone through different use cases to verify the best reception (such as pocket test, backpack test) in different environments (bus, train, street, office, etc.). You can be 45ft away from your device and still stay connected for hours!  AUVIO MOTION+ also has smart pairing technology that only requires you to just pair once and they will take care of the rest to pair automatically.   AMAZING SOUND Stereo Phone Calls. AUVIO MOTION+ uses the latest true wireless PLUS technology delivering audio to both earbuds at the same time. When on a call, it suppresses background noise such as traffic or nearby conversations so the person on the other end hears your clearly. Together with it's snug, slip proof fit, AUVIO MOTION+ gives that perfect barrier for noise isolation so you can have the best quality conversations. Engineered to take sound to the next level inside and out. On the inside, AUVIO MOTION+ uses extremely light and thin graphene speaker drivers to reproduce strong bass, crystal clear vocals and deliver wider range of sound frequency (20-40kHz). It can capture extremely small variations in music signal so you can enjoy endless hours of unbelievable dynamic yet accurate sound.  On the outside, its lightweight snug fit reduces ambient noise to the ears so you can enjoy music at lower volume making it much safer to your hearing. You will be able to hear every detail without distortion.GO FUTHER WITH THE AUVIO MOTION+ APP We understand everyone is different so we have created the AUVO MOTION+ app so you have the power in your hands to customize the earbuds as you like them.  Create your own sound curve. Customize and save EQ settings depending on the kind of music you are listening to. Lost and found. Just in case you forgot where you put your earbuds, the app will help you find its last detected location. Control the controls.  AUVIO MOTION+ app lets you customize each button and each press the way you like it.   QUALITY GUARANTEED AUVIO is serious about quality. Our Engineering and Quality Experts have developed testing methodologies designed to put each of our products through extreme conditions, life and user tests.  IPX5 Testing WHATS IN THE BOXAUVIO MOTION+ Charging caseUSB charging cableWing tips (S/M/L)Eartips (S/M/L)SEE WHY AUVIO MOTION+ IS ALL YOU NEEDWHERE ARE WE NOW  After many stages of testing and retesting, our designers and engineers have come to the final design stage. We have confirmed the material that gives AUVIO MOTION+ its light and durable body, the structure with the perfect ergonomic fit and electrical components that will give it it's overall reliability and user experience. Here is a first look at the AUVIO MOTION+ appearance and functional prototypes.  HOW IT WORKSWireless Charge EarbudsSimply place AUVIO MOTION+ in the charging case to start charging. The LEDs lights turn red during charging. 

 
Wireless Charge Charging CasePlace AUVIO MOTION+ charging case on a wireless charging pad to start charging wire-free.

 
Easy Pairing
Pair AUVIO MOTION+ in just a few quick steps.


Remove the earbuds from the charging case. Wait a few seconds and the LED will flash red and blue alternatively in pairing mode.
Turn on Bluetooth function on your device to begin searching for AUVIO MOTION+.
Select AUVIO MOTION+ from the list of devices to pair. LED on the earbuds flash blue every 4 seconds when pairing is successful.

 
Auto Pairing
If AUVIO MOTION+ was already paired with your device before, simply remove the earbuds from the charging case and they will pair automatically with your device. 

 

Magnetic
 Controls


 
PERKS

 
About AUVIO
AUVIO has been creating quality audio devices for more than 10 years and is one of the top brands for audio in the United States.  AUVIO has sold more than 15 million units in more than 6,000 stores across the U.S. 
AUVIO is dedicated to creating and innovating experiences that fits seamlessly into everyday lives. Every aspect of product experience is considered in AUVIO designs – from hardware to software and everything in between – ensuring products are stylish, easy to use and meets our customers’ needs and desires.

Risks and challenges
We fully expect to deliver AUVIO Motion+ true wireless plus earbuds with exceptional quality according to our project timeline. However, even the most well-planned process can meet unpredictable events. We will make sure we keep you updated on our progress so you know exactly where we are and what we are doing.
International backers: We will ship AUVIO Motion+ worldwide, except of Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. Please be aware that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.
Estimated delivery: Each reward tier may have a different shipment dates. We will provide updates if the shipment date changes. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at support@auviosound.com.
Music courtesy of Nicolai Heidlas.

story:
WE NEED YOUR HELP TO LAUNCH JVIBES! 

We are at the final stage... get ready for an ear blowing experience!

It doesn't matter if you can give us $10, $1 or share this post. Anything helps!

We have since improved the sound, as well as the software. The audio quality also got much better (if that was even possible).

JVibes 2019 

 

- Waterproof

-Bluetooth

-Max Sound

-Button gestures

-No additional software needed. 

-Up to 30 hr battery life. 

 

For a limited time get this earbuds even cheaper, don´t miss this amazing chance! 

 

ONLY 50 FOUNDERS EDITION EARBUDS WILL BE PRODUCED.

FEAUTURED ON: 

 

 

Thanks! 

Jaltechs Team

Risk

Our greatest challenge comes once you have received your JVibes. Our great staff will always be there to help, and we will live to the very highest expectations you have.

Here are a few shots of our production Line!

 

An the certified Holograms!!!

Expect yours really soon!!

story:
No wires. No Hassle. Total Freedom.

Unbeatable audio quality

Crisp, Dynamic Sound with Graphene Technology developed by Electronics Research Lab and audio engineers from MIT.

Graphene is a wafer-like thin layer of carbon. It is the thinnest, lightest, and strongest compound, and it is also the best conductor of electricity. ERL drivers utilize graphene coated diaphragms that vibrate to generate precision sound with ultra high fidelity.

Light and sleek. Sublime comfort and fit.

ERL earbuds are engineered to stay comfortably in your ears during your workout. The eartips are designed to spread the contact evenly around the insides of your ear, offering an unmatched combination of comfort and stability.

 

 

 

Unbreakable Bluetooth Connection

Unbreakable Bluetooth connection presented by Electronics Research Lab, with collaboration with top hardware and antenna engineers from MIT. Instant 0.5 second Bluetooth pairing with your phone or other compatible music devices. Fully optimized antenna design with patented technology from MIT to maximize Bluetooth signal strength.

No skips. No drops. No compromise.

Unrivaled Playtime

ERL earbuds play for up to 3.5 hours off of a single charge, long enough to power you through any workout. The included charging case offers an extra 40 hours music playback while on-the-go. A quick 15 minutes charging will give you another 45 minutes music playback.

Easy Access to Smart Assistants

 

 

Sweat and Splash Proof

We used hydrophobic nanocoating to give ERL earbuds a boost to propel water. Now you can focus on reaching your new heights during your workouts.

 

Great Value at Great Price

 

Product Details and Specifications

Timeline

Audio and Antenna engineering/tuning are completed and ready for manufacturing. We aslo have all other toolings for the product, and we plan to ship orders soon - by the end of January 2018.

Manufacturing updates:

 

Quick Start Guide

 

What You Get

And FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

Share and send your unique link to your friends. When they back us on Indiegogo through your unique link, you receive 15% cash back of the tracked amount. Read here (our update #1) for more details.

 

Risks & Challenges

We fully expect to deliver ERL total wireless earbuds with exceptional quality according to our timeline. However, even the most well-planned manufacturing process can meet unpredictable hiccups. 

Most likely to present difficulties is the Bluetooth Antenna Design. A sensitive component which requires extensive debugging and testing to create the strongest possible connection—both of which may require time. 

The Android and iOS companion apps will be rigorously tested and optimized to deliver a tight user experience. Depending on feedback, aspects of the app may need to be reworked and fine-tuned. 

International backers: We will ship ERL worldwide, with the exception of Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. 

Estimated delivery: Each reward tier may have a different estimated shipment month. While we do not expect these to change, the estimated shipment month might shift. We will provide updates if the estimated shipment date changes. At any time up until your headphone has shipped, you may request a full refund by emailing support@geterl.com. 

Warranty: We stand firmly behind our products. Each ERL earphone includes a 7-day (after you receive it) money back guarantee, 6-month free exchange period, and 1-year limited warranty. Need help? We're here for you. If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at support@geterl.com. 

Battery life: Actual battery life will vary based on how the earphones are used.

Trademarks: Trademarks and names that belong to third parties. Water resistance: ERL is sweat resistant but not waterproof. Incidental exposure to water – like unforeseeable rain – won’t ruin your device, but submerging the device is not recommended.

We will continue working to ensure that we deliver our backers a low-risk, high-quality product on time.

story:
Ohmni 360° is an ALL-IN-ONE, intelligent portable speaker. Ohmni 360° is the first and last wireless speaker you will ever need. Ohmni's operating system has the ability to download apps straight from the Google Play Store and stream music apps straight from the speaker. Ohmni 360° ends the need to pair a smartphone or tablet to play music from a speaker. Ohmni provides 360 degree sound and uses smart room adaptation technology to analyze room size and layout to evenly distribute music across the room without any dead zones or gaps. 












Connect sister speakers and have multi-room control. Have full control over paired Ohmni 360° speakers in different rooms. Play the same song across multiple rooms by connecting sister speakers using the App interface or the speaker interface. Supports WiFi, Bluetooth, DNLA and AirPlay. 





 

Ohmni 360° has more capabilities than any other speaker in the market and sounds better! Below are a few charts and video comparing Ohmni 360° against other high end speakers in the market.




Get unmatched sound quality compared to other Bluetooth speakers in the market. Ohmni 360º outputs 100% lossless audio when played straight from music Apps, storage or WiFi. Bluetooth speakers compress audio files in order for them to be transmitted via Bluetooth, causing loss of audio quality. With Ohmni 360º you will be able to experience true CD quality audio.


 




Ohmni 360º intelligently analyzes room size and layout to customize the output of audio in order to evenly distribute music across the room. This means you can experience true 360º sound across any room layout without any dead zones or gaps.




Ohmni 360° works straight from the box and does not require any tedious installation or setup. Simply turn on and start streaming your favorite music. Ohmni 360° comes pre-installed with music apps and is capable of OTA updates. You may also download any app available in the Google Play store. 


Portable enough to go anywhere and tough enough for any occasion. Take it to the beach, go camping, or even take it to the top of the mountain on your next skiing trip. Ohmni 360° thrives in any environment and can be counted on for your next adventure. We developed Ohmni 360° to have an outer body tough enough to handle everyday life.






We developed Ohmni 360° to be modern, sleek, and to look elegant in any room or setting. Ohmni 360° design was made to fit right in with all home decor. Wake up to your favorite music when used as an alarm clock or set reminders and Ohmni 360° will remind you and send a message to your phone when away.



We are passing our advertising costs to you guys! Share this project on your facebook, twitter or instagram page and receive a FREE Ohmni 360º Mini speaker with your contribution.  ***Very limited quantity available***












What is Ohmni 360°?

Ohmni 360° is an ALL-IN-ONE, intelligent portable speaker. Ohmni's OS has the ability to download apps straight from the Google Play Store and stream music apps using WiFi. Ohmni also provides 360° sound, hence the name. 

Do I need to be connected to WiFi to stream music?

Yes, but only to stream music from apps that require WiFi in order to work. Some apps, such as Spotify 'Premium', allow users to save playlists for offline use. We also developed Ohmni 360° to be able to download and save songs directly to its 64GB internal memory and have Bluetooth capabilities to stream from your Bluetooth enabled device when WiFi is not available.   

Am I limited to downloading only music apps?

No. You can download any app that is available from the Google Play Store.

What type of material is Ohmni 360° made out of?

Ohmni 360° is made out of the best premium quality PC/ABS to ensure the best connection with the Bluetooth and WiFi antennas. Units will have a scratch resistant metallic anodized finish. This finish ensures that all Ohmni 360° components function to the best of their capabilities. 

How loud is Ohmni 360°

Ohmni 360° is able to reach 99dB which is in line with speakers that sell in the $200-400 range. Ohmni 360° smart X1 equalizer outputs the purest sound for every song you play thus enabling you to listen to music in a premium way no other portable speaker in the market can match.

Will it work with my android phone?

Yes, Ohmni will work with any smartphone that has Bluetooth capability. 

What are smart connect pair capabilities?

Smart connect lets you connect other Ohmni speakers in different rooms to stream the same music or you can set Ohmni speakers side by side to play in stereo mode using left and right channels.

Does Ohmni 360° have a 3.5mm port?

No, but we might consider adding it if we hear many of you would like this feature.

When I set an alarm, will Ohmni 360° stay in closed or open position?

Ohmni position will be closed. When the alarm is set to go off it will open and play an alarm sound or song depending on your choice when setting the alarm.

Can I set the alarm without my smartphone using the Ohmni dashboard app?

Yes, you don't need the ohmni dashboard app to control the speaker or set alarms. Ohmni has its own built-in dashboard to control the LED lights, alarms etc.

How long does the battery last?

Ohmni's rechargeable battery lasts approximately 20 hours with heavy use and recharges to full capacity in 6 hours.

Is it AirPlay compatible?

Yes. 

How well will Ohmni 360° hold up against drops or water spills?

Upon designing Ohmni 360° we realized making our Ohmni shock proof and splash proof would be essential to everyday use. We made Ohmni 360° resistant to 5ft drops and water splash proof. However, Ohmni's screen is not shatter proof so we made it easy to replace the glass and all speakers come with "1" complimentary replacement screen free of charge (additional replacement screens will be sold for $15 each + S/H)

What is the Ohmni cloud?

It will be a cloud service that you can set to automatically upload and backup all your music stored in Ohmni 360° or smartphone, enabling you to access all your songs and playlists from the cloud on any device. 

Will the Ohmni cloud be free?

Upon receiving your Ohmni 360° speaker and registering it you will receive a 1-year free complimentary subscription code for 1TB of storage. If you buy additional speakers you can use those codes to receive additional free years or additional storage. Subscription will run at $9.99 per month.

How will I be able to play songs that my friends are playing?

There are two ways to play the same music as your friends.

1: You can listen to the songs your friends are listening to by creating a shared group playlist. The share group playlist allows you to add and remove songs from the playlist, shuffle play and take turns being the DJ. 

2: Generate a unique code which you can give to anyone to access your playlist. The code will allow your friends to listen to what your are listening or download music from your Ohmni cloud account. You can set each code with restrictions. Restrictions will enable you to set certain time limits on which your friends can access your music profile or only let them listen to the music you are currently playing. 

Will Ohmni 360° sync the music stored in my phone automatically?

Yes and no. You can set Ohmni 360° to sync music everyday, once a week, once a month or manually. As soon as your phone is connected to the same WiFi network as Ohmni 360° it will sync new songs from your phone to the Ohmni cloud or Ohmni storage depending on your settings.

Is Ohmni voice recognition similar to that of Amazon echo or Siri?

Yes, it's similar to both. Ohmni 360° is powered by Google Now which you will be able to control within close distance of the speaker itself or use your smartphone to speak to Ohmni 360° which comes in handy if you are in another room from where Ohmni 360° is located.

How much internal storage does Ohmni 360° have?

 It will be a little bit less than 64GB because the OS will take some storage space. 

Will Ohmni 360° have aptX?

Yes, Ohmni will also have the aptX codec allowing you to get the best Bluetooth sound experience while streaming your favorite music.

1: You can listen to the songs your friends are listening to by creating a shared group playlist. The share group playlist allows you to add and remove songs from the playlist, shuffle play and take turns being the DJ. 
2: Generate a unique code which you can give to anyone to access your playlist. The code will allow your friends to listen to what your are listening or download music from your Ohmni cloud account. You can set each code with restrictions. Restrictions will enable you to set certain time limits on which your friends can access your music profile or only let them listen to the music you are currently playing. 
Will Ohmni 360° sync the music stored in my phone automatically?
Yes and no. You can set Ohmni 360° to sync music everyday, once a week, once a month or manually. As soon as your phone is connected to the same WiFi network as Ohmni 360° it will sync new songs from your phone to the Ohmni cloud or Ohmni storage depending on your settings.
Is Ohmni voice recognition similar to that of Amazon echo or Siri?
Yes, it's similar to both. Ohmni 360° is powered by Google Now which you will be able to control within close distance of the speaker itself or use your smartphone to speak to Ohmni 360° which comes in handy if you are in another room from where Ohmni 360° is located.
How much internal storage does Ohmni 360° have?
 It will be a little bit less than 64GB because the OS will take some storage space. 
Will Ohmni 360° have aptX?
Yes, Ohmni will also have the aptX codec allowing you to get the best Bluetooth sound experience while streaming your favorite music.

story:
Developed for amplification by audiophiles

B-Wiz 1708 is an integrated amplifier designed to reproduce the most meticulous sonic details of each chord, beat and audio composition. 
Suitable for old school vinyl as much as the latest digital files, B-Wiz 1708 is fully equipped to handle all different needs.
It is equipped with Bluetooth which makes it fully operating at any time... who does not have a phone or tablet always on? 
Moreover it has high-performance headphone output, for a highly emotional listening. 
Equipped with a digital class D amplifier, carefully selected for the sound quality, B-Wiz  1708 offers an output power of 250W never seen before! 
Particular attention was paid to the layout of the amplifier, short signal path and particular care in the power supply ensure an impeccable sound. 
The case made entirely of metal, it guarantees high strength and vibration, further enhancing the sound quality. 
Insulating plastic legs with soft rubber base ensures high stability.



Kiral Creative Solutions is an ambitious startup who wants to bring new design in every day objects. Who says that something commonly used can't be improved?
This is our mission, bring objects to new life by changing their design.
Today is, obviously, the B-Wiz 1708 ... tomorrow can be the B-Wiz speakers (we're working on it!), a new amp or everything else!

Synthesis Art in Music is a 25 years old company which is excellence in made in Italy. Famous and apreciated worldwide especially for tube amplifiers, decided to run the risk to make something that different and, in some way, crazy.
They reserve such a maniacal attention to any particular that are the perfect partner in crime!


We decided to launch this Indiegogo campaign to share with you the enthusiasm and the love we have for the B-Wiz1708!

It is not just an exceptional amplifier but a true object of design entirely made in Italy, from design to production.

We have done everything for our goal to be as reasonable as possible to ensure to start production. This is why we opted for the flexible fund: to ensure that everyone has appreciated and preordained the B-Wiz 1708 on Indiegogo receives it.

There's more, because the B-Wiz 1708 is just the beginning for us as we would like it to become a real line, we are already studying the speakers to match and who knows .what else!

Ideas and enthusiasm are not lacking, we just need your help, in return we offer you the opportunity to have your B-Wiz 1708 at unthinkable price outside the Indiegogo campaign!

The B-Wiz 1708, as all Synthesis products, is made by hand in their factory in Italy. 
All metalwork, boards, transformers and major parts are Italian-made and sourced locally. 
They take a great deal of pride in their workmanship, and so will you.

Whenever I look at an object I immediately think of what I could do to modify it and improve it.  Should I add or remove something to make it look better? The same thing happens when I enter a house I’ve never seen before, I start knocking down walls in my head, and I virtually restyle the place down to the furniture.

I love music and as all music lovers, I like to hear a clear and clean sound!

One day I decided to buy a new amplifier, so I surfed the net and noticed Synthesis had some that where very cool. I instantly thought that a company that cared so much for design would find my idea for a new amplifier simply brilliant. Looking at the pictures on the site I saw a Synthesis amp that has a plexiglass case, so you can see what it looks like inside. There! That was the right idea to start on, though I had left out a tiny detail…would the owner of the company take me seriously or think me crazy? 

So the idea behind the making of B-Wiz1708 is that if something is worth doing it's worth doing well, even those things you don't understand at first. 
I wanted to see the finished product, because to see really means touching with your eyes!

The collaboration between Kiral for the design of B-Wiz1708 and Synthesis for its making and production, aimed to create an amplifier with distinctive features, we wanted the best: an excellent sound and a cool design.  An amp is the kind of object you try to hide in a house, by sticking it on a bookshelf; we made it into something fashionable, happy and colourful, beautiful to look at!

The plexiglass case has a coloured mask and you can choose your color between green, red, turquoise or fuxia, and all the commands are lit up by a different colour led light according to the source the music comes from, USB, CD and so forth.  B-Wiz1708 can be personalized, becoming a home ware object that people will notice in your house!

The Black version is more technical, maybe a bit more masculine and elegant: will be perfect in every house.

Music…Music…it makes you dream, it relaxes you or it charges you up to the point a crazy dance is due! 
This is why the mood lighting system helps you create the right atmosphere as you can choose between 12 different types of cover light intensity so it will create YOUR personal ed unique atmosphere!

There is no risks whatsoever!
We guarantee that every single B-Wiz 1708 will be preordered on indiegogo will be produced and sent to you!
This is why we decided to keep our goal reasonable! We hope to reach the goal in a very short time and to overcome it!

The challenge is that you can have a MADE IN ITALY design product in your house at a very special price.
By preordering the B-Wiz 1708 during the indiegogo campaign you'll save at least $ 599






Question: How long have you been working on this project?
: I started design the B-Wiz 1708 in December 2014 and, after nights and days of brainstorming and  conversations, Synthesis studied the technical part and set up the prototype. This took 4 months

Question: Why do you ask for 15,000 dollars?
: Kiral and Synthesis have put their own money on the design and made great efforts to create the prototype. We’re very proud we did it without asking funds!
15,000 dollars is the minimum we need to start the production.
There are many expense, i.e. order the components, that can take over 4 months if we can’t pay in advance.

Question: What about the warrantee?
: With the B-Wiz 1708 you’ll receive the regular 2 years warrantee

Question: How will you deliver if your goal is not met?

: As we trust in this project we decided to run the risk and produce and deliver every B-Wiz 1708 will be preordered even if we do not reach our goal!

Question: What is the Bluetooth wireless range, maximum distance?
:That mainly depends of the location you are using the  B-Wiz1708. Normally between 10-15 meters. Inside buildings and depending on the room you are using B-Wiz 1708 the range can be shorter.

Question: What are the shipping costs?
: Shipping costs are $ 30 for shipping  in the UE and $ 50 worldwide.
The cost may seem a bit high, but as the B-Wiz1708 is not a simple box and have a great value, this costs includes the insurance shipping!
We decided to ask a little more but be sure to bring to you the B-Wiz in the perfect condition it deserves!


If you have any other questions or suggestions contact us here on Indiegogo or feel free to write at info@b-wiz1708.com
Any suggestion will be apreciate!


Dimensions and Weight

Unit Weight:    3,0 Kg
Unit Dimensions:    290x130x280 mm (WxHxD)Shipping Weight:    4,0 Kg (approx)Shipping Dimensions:    390x230x380 mm (WxHxD)

Power requirements

AC Power Input:  85VAC to 135VAC 50/ 60Hz or 
                                 170VAC to 265VAC 50/ 60Hz
Power Consumption:  300W maximum

INPUTS

(All inputs are selectable by remote control or by front panel button)

Phono (turntable)
Connector:   Gold plated RCA
Cartridge type:    Moving MagnetCartridge
Cartridge load impedance:   47KΩ (100pF)
S/N ratio:    >80dB

Line In 
Connector:    Gold plated RCA
Input level:    1.0VRMS
Input impedance:  100KΩ

Optical
Connector:   Toslink compatible
Resolution:  16-24Bit  32-192 KHz 
Format  PCM

USB
Connector:    USB “B” Type for Mac and Android
Format:   PCM 16 Bit up to 48KHz
Driver:   Driverless, USB audio 1.0 compatible

Bluetooth
Antenna:    Built in
Profile:    A2DP Audio Stream Receiver

OUTPUTS

Line Output (Variable output level by remote control or by front panel buttons)
Connector:  Gold plated RCA (this output can be used for subwoofer)
Output level:  1.0V RMS  
MaxOutput impedance:  100Ω
S/N ratio:  >90dB

Stereo Power Output
8Ω loudspeakers connected  65 watts per channel, both channels driven
4Ω loudspeakers connected  125 watts per channel, both channels driven
THD (power amp):  <0.03% (1W 20Hz-20KHz)                                     
                                       <1% at rated power, 1KHz, 230VAC mains
Frequency response:  20Hz – 20KHz +- 0,5 dB
S/N ratio:  >90dB

Headphone Power Output
Impedance allowable:    32-300 Ω
Max Power Output:    200mW (1KHz, <0.03% THD)
Output Impedance:  From 10Hz to 10kHz < 50 Ω
Frequency response:  20Hz – 20KHz +- 0,5 dB
S/N ratio:  >95dB

REMOTE CONTROL
Plastic remote control RC5 compatible




If you want you can also help us to spread the word about B-Wiz 1708 by referring your friends. We'll be very grateful 
It's simple and easy, just follow this two steps:

1- Log into your account on Indiegogo (if you have one, but you can share even without an indiegogo account!)

2. Click on the sharing buttons near the top of our campaign page, which automatically shares your unique link via email or social media. 

You can also copy your unique link by clicking on the link button and paste that into your social media updates or emails.

story:
Exquisite design. Exceptional acoustic engineering. A work of art.

Symphonica is a totally acoustic horn speaker that boosts and enhances the sound from your phone without using electronics. Engineers at major phone companies like Apple and Samsung have created audio systems in their flagship model phones that produce very high quality audio. However there is only so much they can do within the limited internal space of your phone, and so Symphonica channels this high quality audio through its specially designed, patented acoustic chamber, where it is equalized and amplified and emerges with added body, warmth, and tone that fills your personal listening space with an expansive sound field of music with high clarity and a full dynamic range. 

Symphonica's smooth, balanced sound provides the perfect environment for concentration, meditation, relaxation, or for drifting off to a peaceful and restful sleep.

Symphonica brings beauty, grace and warmth back to a world dominated by flat and unfeeling plastic iPhone and Android accessories. Its inspired, passionate design reminds that form can be just as valuable as function, capturing the attention and drawing the eye to the flowing, organic patterns expressed in the natural wood grain. Symphonica breaks the mold of boring utilitarian accessories and instead makes a bold statement about uniting the elements of art, fashion, and function all together in one outstanding product.


Graceful Curves, Flowing Lines, the Alluring Beauty of Natural Wood

An Inspired Fusion of Art and Science

Designed by a veteran audio engineer with decades of experience creating high end audio products and constructed from environmentally friendly woods, Symphonica needs no electricity yet boosts the sound from your iPhone speaker by more than 6db, filling the room by acoustically amplifying its sound. Symphonica also enhances the sound, adding the body and warmth that you've been missing.


Symphonica is made from sustainably harvested hardwoods and wastes no electricity, making it the greenest, most environmentally-friendly way to display, charge, and amplify your smartphone,

What about those small Bluetooth Speakers? Why would I want a Symphonica instead?

Bluetooth speakers are convenient, but not only do they look unremarkable, they mostly sound unremarkable as well. They force you to make a big compromise in sound quality, as Bluetooth transmission compresses the audio and reduces its dynamic range and fidelity, and then the typical speakers play it back using fairly low quality electronics, introducing artifacts, noise, and distortion before finally smothering it all with a layer of artificially inflated bass - poorly implemented Bluetooth is a mess. And even if you buy expensive ones that reproduce the audio more faithfully you're still up against the inherent limitations of the technology with regards to your lost dynamic range.

Now, if you're mostly blasting Miley Cyrus tracks for partying friends you'll hardly notice. But if you appreciate listening more quietly to the more subtle nuances of acoustic instruments, pure and intimate vocals that put you in the same room as the artist, and the incredible dynamics of classical music with all the swells and crescendos and diminuendos that convey so much feeling and emotional impact, then Bluetooth is robbing you of more than you realize. It's taking what was intended to be an active experience where you are stirred and inspired by virtuoso performers at the height of their musical prowess, and converting it into the technological equivalent of elevator Muzak - bland background imitation that uses your nostalgic memories to distract you from how inadequate the sound is right now. 

With Symphonica what you get out of it is as pure as what goes into it. There is no added electronic noise, distortion, hiss, dropout, or artifacts that come from the use of Bluetooth or low end electronic speakers, just the sweet sound of your favorite performances.











 

Your own Elegantly Sculpted Work of Art

Symphonica's elegant appearance and graceful flowing lines make it a welcome addition to any home or office, and a conversation starter the second your visitors lay their eyes on it. Not only does the natural wood grain each speaker its own individual fingerprint, each is hand sanded, finished and polished to the satisfaction of a craftsman, making it your own unique art sculpture that adds character and charm to any room you place it in.


Symphonica adds unmatched Elegance, Character and Style - no matter where in your house you place it!


Absolutely everyone we've shown Symphonica to has fallen in love with it, wanted to touch it, hold it, and has asked when and where they could get one either for themselves or as a gift for someone else - and we know that you will love it too!


Look Who's Talking About Symphonica


The Symphonica Sound

Simply put, Symphonica sounds nothing like your phone's tinny speakers or those toneless plastic accessories you've become accustomed to listening to your phone through. Not only does it increase the volume, But Symphonica adds warmth, richness, smoothness and a truly unique 'woody' resonance. Do you appreciate passionate, emotional vocals and the natural sound of unplugged acoustic instruments? Then you've got to try Symphonica!

Symphonica currently supports the following smartphone models:

Apple iPhones:

iPhone 5/5S/5C/SE 
iPhone 6/6 Plus/6S/6S Plus 
iPhone 7/7 Plus/Red Special Edition 

Android Phones:

Samsung Galaxy S6/S6 Edge 
Samsung Galaxy S7/S7 Edge 
Samsung Galaxy S8/S8+ 

And more coming soon...


Charge your smartphones with confidence!

Our commitment to quality means that both our Symphonica speaker and docking stand come with premium quality cables. Sure that costs us a lot more, but it means that you can keep your iPhone charged while in use and be confident that your valuable device is not being put at risk by shoddy bargain basement cables. And there's no reason for Android users to feel neglected, as we also offer the equivalent Micro-USB version as well. Just let us know which you prefer when you make your pledge.


 

Do it DIY for a fun project!

Do you prefer wood with a specific tint or color? Want to express your inner artist? Let Symphonica become your canvas! Get The Casual version and paint it or apply a wood stain to match your individual tastes and decor.


Choose your preferred finish to suit your taste and decor


Symphonica makes a great gift!

We've all been in the situation where we're facing the question of what do you get as a gift to a friend who pretty much already has everything? You get them something useful, something special, something unique, something that you know they probably have never even seen before. Symphonica fits the bill as a great gift for any occasion, and for $20 more you can even add an engraved personalized message.


Add a personalized message and make your gift even more memorable!


Perks

We really appreciate your support, and we've got great perks at different pledge levels to show you our gratitude:
 

Symphonica Bluetooth Media Remote

You may have seen Bluetooth Media Remotes before, but never one like this elegant beauty crafted from natural wood. Use it to start, stop and control media playback on your phone, tablet or computer whether you're at home relaxing on the sofa or in the middle of your workout at the gym - no more awkwardly grasping for your phone when you need to skip to the next track.


Hardwood Smartphone Dock

Carved from a single block of hardwood, these stylish docks give you the perfect place to put your phone while its charging or syncing on your desk or kitchen counter or on your bedside table when you're catching up on sleep. Say goodbye to those plain old plastic stands and treat yourself and your home decor with an accessory that is not just useful, but is inspiring as well.

 

 

Phone Cases
Don't settle for a boring plastic or silicone phone case - take things up a couple notches with these beautiful hardwood options that protect and project style at the same time. Available in 3 finishes and for all current iPhone and Samsung Galaxy S model phones.

|
Natural or dark stain - which shade of hardwood is perfect for you?


Perks at a Glance
Wondering which perks you should choose? The chart below lays them all out for you - pick your favorites, pick your pledge amount, and please back us with a pledge.


 

Meet the Symphonica Team 

Here's a bit of information about the small team that has worked to make Symphonica a reality:


Freddie Kwoh - Inventor of Symphonica

Symphonica was designed by Frederick ("Freddie") Kwoh, a seasoned audio engineer and product designer who held multiple patents in the field. Drawing from his decades of experience he has created an innovative and beautiful product which not only serves a useful purpose, but pleases the eye as well. Sadly, Freddie passed away last year, but we are continuing on to fulfill his dream of bringing this product to market.


Marc Edwards - Marketing, Sales & Distribution

No matter how great the product, you still need to let people know about it and get it out to them. Marc is in charge of spreading the word, as well as managing all the behind the scenes processes involved in getting your Symphonica to your front door.

The Impact

So that's our project in a nutshell. We absolutely love Symphonica and have been working really hard for a long time to get it out there, and if you've read this far we think you're probably feeling some love for it too. We've done all that we can on our own, but now we need your help to raise the money we need for the first production run. 
 

Risks & Challenges

Unfortunately, we've already experienced the greatest challenge a project like this could encounter, the untimely passing away of its inventor and designer during its original crowdfunding campaign. After taking some time to regroup and reorganize we are moving forward again, and having had gone through the worst case scenario we are confident that we can get through any other challenge that could possibly arise.

Getting a product like this from the mind of the designer into the hands of backers involves a great deal of hard work, planning. and coordination between designer, manufacturer and logistics in order to deliver on schedule.

In recognition of this we have worked closely with the production personnel for over a year, refining the specifications and ironing out the technical challenges and complexities involved in transitioning from prototypes and samples to full scale production.

We also have a team member with significant professional experience in handling freight and logistics on a daily basis, and so we are well prepared to deal with the complications that can arise in moving products between the factory, warehouse, and the end user.

As a result of this we are confident that once our goal is met we will be able to deliver on schedule to all our backers.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Love Symphonica but can't buy one yourself? Please contribute to our campaign anyway by helping spread the word to all your friends - its as easy as clicking the Share buttons below.

Symphonica is a totally acoustic horn speaker that boosts and enhances the sound from your phone without using electronics. Engineers at major phone companies like Apple and Samsung have created audio systems in their flagship model phones that produce very high quality audio. However there is only so much they can do within the limited internal space of your phone, and so Symphonica channels this high quality audio through its specially designed, patented acoustic chamber, where it is equalized and amplified and emerges with added body, warmth, and tone that fills your personal listening space with an expansive sound field of music with high clarity and a full dynamic range. 
Symphonica's smooth, balanced sound provides the perfect environment for concentration, meditation, relaxation, or for drifting off to a peaceful and restful sleep.Symphonica brings beauty, grace and warmth back to a world dominated by flat and unfeeling plastic iPhone and Android accessories. Its inspired, passionate design reminds that form can be just as valuable as function, capturing the attention and drawing the eye to the flowing, organic patterns expressed in the natural wood grain. Symphonica breaks the mold of boring utilitarian accessories and instead makes a bold statement about uniting the elements of art, fashion, and function all together in one outstanding product.Graceful Curves, Flowing Lines, the Alluring Beauty of Natural Wood
An Inspired Fusion of Art and Science
Designed by a veteran audio engineer with decades of experience creating high end audio products and constructed from environmentally friendly woods, Symphonica needs no electricity yet boosts the sound from your iPhone speaker by more than 6db, filling the room by acoustically amplifying its sound. Symphonica also enhances the sound, adding the body and warmth that you've been missing.
Symphonica is made from sustainably harvested hardwoods and wastes no electricity, making it the greenest, most environmentally-friendly way to display, charge, and amplify your smartphone,
What about those small Bluetooth Speakers? Why would I want a Symphonica instead?
Bluetooth speakers are convenient, but not only do they look unremarkable, they mostly sound unremarkable as well. They force you to make a big compromise in sound quality, as Bluetooth transmission compresses the audio and reduces its dynamic range and fidelity, and then the typical speakers play it back using fairly low quality electronics, introducing artifacts, noise, and distortion before finally smothering it all with a layer of artificially inflated bass - poorly implemented Bluetooth is a mess. And even if you buy expensive ones that reproduce the audio more faithfully you're still up against the inherent limitations of the technology with regards to your lost dynamic range.
Now, if you're mostly blasting Miley Cyrus tracks for partying friends you'll hardly notice. But if you appreciate listening more quietly to the more subtle nuances of acoustic instruments, pure and intimate vocals that put you in the same room as the artist, and the incredible dynamics of classical music with all the swells and crescendos and diminuendos that convey so much feeling and emotional impact, then Bluetooth is robbing you of more than you realize. It's taking what was intended to be an active experience where you are stirred and inspired by virtuoso performers at the height of their musical prowess, and converting it into the technological equivalent of elevator Muzak - bland background imitation that uses your nostalgic memories to distract you from how inadequate the sound is right now. 
With Symphonica what you get out of it is as pure as what goes into it. There is no added electronic noise, distortion, hiss, dropout, or artifacts that come from the use of Bluetooth or low end electronic speakers, just the sweet sound of your favorite performances.

 
Your own Elegantly Sculpted Work of Art
Symphonica's elegant appearance and graceful flowing lines make it a welcome addition to any home or office, and a conversation starter the second your visitors lay their eyes on it. Not only does the natural wood grain each speaker its own individual fingerprint, each is hand sanded, finished and polished to the satisfaction of a craftsman, making it your own unique art sculpture that adds character and charm to any room you place it in.
Symphonica adds unmatched Elegance, Character and Style - no matter where in your house you place it!
Absolutely everyone we've shown Symphonica to has fallen in love with it, wanted to touch it, hold it, and has asked when and where they could get one either for themselves or as a gift for someone else - and we know that you will love it too!


Look Who's Talking About Symphonica



The Symphonica Sound
Simply put, Symphonica sounds nothing like your phone's tinny speakers or those toneless plastic accessories you've become accustomed to listening to your phone through. Not only does it increase the volume, But Symphonica adds warmth, richness, smoothness and a truly unique 'woody' resonance. Do you appreciate passionate, emotional vocals and the natural sound of unplugged acoustic instruments? Then you've got to try Symphonica!Symphonica currently supports the following smartphone models:
Apple iPhones:
iPhone 5/5S/5C/SE iPhone 6/6 Plus/6S/6S Plus iPhone 7/7 Plus/Red Special Edition 
Android Phones:
Samsung Galaxy S6/S6 Edge Samsung Galaxy S7/S7 Edge Samsung Galaxy S8/S8+ And more coming soon...

Charge your smartphones with confidence!
Our commitment to quality means that both our Symphonica speaker and docking stand come with premium quality cables. Sure that costs us a lot more, but it means that you can keep your iPhone charged while in use and be confident that your valuable device is not being put at risk by shoddy bargain basement cables. And there's no reason for Android users to feel neglected, as we also offer the equivalent Micro-USB version as well. Just let us know which you prefer when you make your pledge.
 
Do it DIY for a fun project!
Do you prefer wood with a specific tint or color? Want to express your inner artist? Let Symphonica become your canvas! Get The Casual version and paint it or apply a wood stain to match your individual tastes and decor.
Choose your preferred finish to suit your taste and decor

Symphonica makes a great gift!
We've all been in the situation where we're facing the question of what do you get as a gift to a friend who pretty much already has everything? You get them something useful, something special, something unique, something that you know they probably have never even seen before. Symphonica fits the bill as a great gift for any occasion, and for $20 more you can even add an engraved personalized message.
Add a personalized message and make your gift even more memorable!

Perks
We really appreciate your support, and we've got great perks at different pledge levels to show you our gratitude: 
Symphonica Bluetooth Media Remote
You may have seen Bluetooth Media Remotes before, but never one like this elegant beauty crafted from natural wood. Use it to start, stop and control media playback on your phone, tablet or computer whether you're at home relaxing on the sofa or in the middle of your workout at the gym - no more awkwardly grasping for your phone when you need to skip to the next track.

Hardwood Smartphone Dock
Carved from a single block of hardwood, these stylish docks give you the perfect place to put your phone while its charging or syncing on your desk or kitchen counter or on your bedside table when you're catching up on sleep. Say goodbye to those plain old plastic stands and treat yourself and your home decor with an accessory that is not just useful, but is inspiring as well.
 
 
Phone CasesDon't settle for a boring plastic or silicone phone case - take things up a couple notches with these beautiful hardwood options that protect and project style at the same time. Available in 3 finishes and for all current iPhone and Samsung Galaxy S model phones.
|Natural or dark stain - which shade of hardwood is perfect for you?
Perks at a GlanceWondering which perks you should choose? The chart below lays them all out for you - pick your favorites, pick your pledge amount, and please back us with a pledge. 

Meet the Symphonica Team 
Here's a bit of information about the small team that has worked to make Symphonica a reality:
Freddie Kwoh - Inventor of Symphonica
Symphonica was designed by Frederick ("Freddie") Kwoh, a seasoned audio engineer and product designer who held multiple patents in the field. Drawing from his decades of experience he has created an innovative and beautiful product which not only serves a useful purpose, but pleases the eye as well. Sadly, Freddie passed away last year, but we are continuing on to fulfill his dream of bringing this product to market.
Marc Edwards - Marketing, Sales & Distribution
No matter how great the product, you still need to let people know about it and get it out to them. Marc is in charge of spreading the word, as well as managing all the behind the scenes processes involved in getting your Symphonica to your front door.
The Impact
So that's our project in a nutshell. We absolutely love Symphonica and have been working really hard for a long time to get it out there, and if you've read this far we think you're probably feeling some love for it too. We've done all that we can on our own, but now we need your help to raise the money we need for the first production run.  

Risks & Challenges
Unfortunately, we've already experienced the greatest challenge a project like this could encounter, the untimely passing away of its inventor and designer during its original crowdfunding campaign. After taking some time to regroup and reorganize we are moving forward again, and having had gone through the worst case scenario we are confident that we can get through any other challenge that could possibly arise.
Getting a product like this from the mind of the designer into the hands of backers involves a great deal of hard work, planning. and coordination between designer, manufacturer and logistics in order to deliver on schedule.
In recognition of this we have worked closely with the production personnel for over a year, refining the specifications and ironing out the technical challenges and complexities involved in transitioning from prototypes and samples to full scale production.
We also have a team member with significant professional experience in handling freight and logistics on a daily basis, and so we are well prepared to deal with the complications that can arise in moving products between the factory, warehouse, and the end user.
As a result of this we are confident that once our goal is met we will be able to deliver on schedule to all our backers. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Love Symphonica but can't buy one yourself? Please contribute to our campaign anyway by helping spread the word to all your friends - its as easy as clicking the Share buttons below.

story:
My name is Mette Damiri, I'm 26, and I am a singer/songwriter from Denmark. I currently live in Rome, Italy, where I'm doing a masters degree in Arts and Culture Management at Rome Business School. In between exams, I write songs and play concerts at various venues in Rome. I've been working on this album for the last 4 years and I can't wait to start recording!

For the first time, people will see the real me behind all the glitter and sound effects of my previous released singles. This album is about love, struggles, and the journey we all have to go through in life.

I've had a difficult childhood. I was at the bottom of the food chain through all my school years. I moved out when I was 15, I had a full time job, and lived on my own. I've had many personal struggles in my young years, but they have made me the woman I am today. This is what this album will reflect. For the first time, I have the courage to just be me, and to let people see me. The genre and sound of the album are inspired by some of my greatest idols such as: Norah Jones, Katie Melua, Dolly Parton, and Bonnie Raitt.

I wrote this song "Stop Pretending" in 2012. This is a live recording of the song. The song will be featured on the album and I can't wait to start recording it! 

The album will be recorded at the beautiful Scene Music Studio in Rome, Italy.

The producer's behind the album are Matteo Caretto and Nikolai Banke, and together they have the perfect skills and experience to make a kick-ass album.

With your support, we can create a strong album, with a high artistic standard and a great commercial potential!

Besides good karma, you will receive some awesome "perks" for your donation.

We have made a collection of great benefits, only available for this campaign, in exchange for your help. We believe that good work should be rewarded, and we want to pay the musicians on the album fairly! Your support will therefore also benefit hard-working musicians. 

Quality cost money. We need your help to cover the project expenses.  

Your contribution will go to:

  • Studio Time - 1500€
  • Musicians - 1000€
  • Mix and Mastering - 500€
  • Album Artwork/Graphic Design - 500€
  • Printing of CD and Vinyl - 1000€
  • Online Release and Marketing - 1000€

 

Every form of help is very appreciated! And if you don't have the opportunity to donate, you can help in many other ways! :)  You can:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Share the link to the campaign on Facebook and Twitter
  • Send good vibes! :)

story:
Despre Wineot

Wineot e un podcast despre orice. 
Invitații noștri beau vin în timp ce ne răspund nouă la întrebări, ca să fie totul mai distractiv și mai palpitant. Iar pentru voi e pur și simplu ca și cum ați sta de vorbă la un pahar de vin cu noi.
Ne gândim la subiectele de discuție cu muuult înainte de a lansa vreun episod, când procrastinăm la serviciu sau când ne uităm prin comentariile cu sugestii pe care le lasă cei care ne ascultă. 

Episoadele sunt postate săptămânal, miercurea, iar până acum am vorbit despre alcool (d'ooh), fashion, ce înseamnă să fii gay în Iași, Tinder, călătorii, pisici, glume, creativitate etc.

Pe lângă faptul că ne-am distrat vorbind cu oameni foarte mișto, sunt câteva sute de oameni care, săptămânal, au făcut cunoștință cu ei, mulți dintre ei scriindu-ne să ne spună că ne ascultă cu plăcere acasă, la muncă, pe stradă, sau în somn. Deocamdată, suntem singurul podcast (de care știm) din Iași. Dincolo de plăcerea evidentă de a sta la un pahar de vin cu oameni care fac să se întâmple lucruri în comunitatea noastră, avem și satisfacția de a fi construit o mică și veselă platformă care îi aduce laolaltă. And we'd like to keep it going. De la sfârșitul lui ianuarie 2017, vom continua oricum sezonul al doilea, avem deja în minte invitați alături de care abia așteptăm să stăm la un pahar cu vin.

De ce facem campania asta

Pentru că producția efectivă a podcastului presupune niște cheltuieli (cea mai semnificativă fiind timpul de studio), am decis să le acoperim și cu ajutorul vostru. 

Cum ne poți susține

Desigur, pe această platformă ne ajuți dacă donezi cât poți pentru a susține producția Wineot. Pe lângă asta, ne ajută dacă ne asculți, spui prietenilor tăi despre noi sau distribui ediția ta preferată de Wineot pe Facebook. Le găsești pe toate pe www.wineotpodcast.com.

story:
Our Story

Many endeavors start as a dream.  And so it was for ElectroPhonic’s founder Joe Floyd, who one night had a vivid dream in which he was playing an electric guitar with a fantastic soaring sound coming from the guitar itself with no amp or effects pedals.  This “dream guitar” had the lush harmonics and singing tone of an electric guitar, but with all the freedom of an acoustic guitar.

Determined to make this vision a reality, Joe built and tested the first prototype.  He then joined forces with Jan Lucas and together they developed several more refined prototypes.  Soon Andy came into the mix and solidified the EP development team.  After many more months of painstaking R and D, the ElectroPhonic™ Model One was born.

There have been previous attempts to set the guitarist free, but ElectroPhonic’s groundbreaking guitar takes things a whole step further, bringing everything together in a professional, simple-to-use, great sounding guitar.

The ElectroPhonic™ team considers their innovative guitar to be an evolution of the art, worthy of a place alongside traditional electric and acoustic guitars.  The hardwood body of an EP guitar is also it’s “tone cabinet,” and as such, the guitar combines elements of electric and acoustic guitars.  EP has combined modern technology and design with traditional electric guitar sensibilities to bring every lover of high-quality, eminently playable guitars something new and exciting to unleash their creativity.  The first instrument is called the Model One EP, and as the name suggests, this is just the beginning of a new generation of electric guitars.

 

Introducing the Model One EP

The Model One EP is the world's first self-amplified electric guitar using patented acoustic tuned labyrinth technology for an incredible playing experience.

This revolutionary electric guitar features ElectroPhonic technology and has an analog FET pre-amp, studio-quality effects, a 16-watt stereo power amp, and a dual speaker system. All electronics are powered by our state-of-the-art rechargeable Li-Ion smart power system.  

Also included is EP Link™ which allows players to connect their Model One EP to a Smart Phone and interface with the many guitar applications available.  And, the best part is that there are no cables, outboard effects or amp needed!

You now have freedom - hanging out at the beach, in the park, by a campfire, at an outdoor festival or wherever you want to go.  On stage, on a mountain top, or kicking back in your favorite chair, you will be inspired to play.

 

All About TONE

Analog electronics, dual paper-cone speakers, and dual 8 watt Class D power amp create an immersive sound field. Turn up the gain control and feel the rich harmonics— like a great tube amp.  High quality reverb and chorus effects with simple controls.  You have amazing expressive range at your fingertips. From warm clean tones to mild overdrive to crunch, to full metal shred. It's all there.

 

Play Where You've Never Played Before

 

Tones You'll Love

 

Plug It In To Your Amp Or Workstation

 

 

Anytime, Anywhere

 

 

10 Reasons to Own a Model One EP

 

  1. Nothing else offers the thrilling playing experience of a cranked ElectroPhonicTM guitar slung around your neck.  You literally feel the power in your hands as the sound resonates through you.

  2. An incredible array of sounds at your fingertips, from warm clean tones to heavy overdrive... plus sweet analog effects.

  3. No need for any additional cables, apps, phones, tablets or software - works right out the box.

  4. No need to carry amps and stomp boxes - grab and go with complete creative freedom.

  5. High current Lithium-Ion power supply for amazing sonic punch.

  6. Can be plugged directly into a workstation or PA for recording or stage.

  7. Practice with headphones - keeps your family and neighbors happy as you rock out!

  8. Great for spontaneous jams with friends, anytime, anywhere.

  9. Great for travel.  Your Model One EP goes everywhere with you; hotel room, camp site, tour bus, beach, park, or just kicking back at home in your favorite chair.

  10. Perfect for catching moments of inspiration - grab it just like you would an acoustic guitar.

 

Features

 

The Future

The ElectroPhonic platform offers endless possibilities for future development as new technologies emerge. For example, we are currently exploring the potential of Field Programmable Analog Arrays, to create realistic amp tones and analog effects in a small, low voltage circuit. We are working closely with one of the leaders of this technology. 

Playing a Model One EP is a unique experience. It is a guitar like no other.

 

FAQs

  • Are you including a battery charger with each guitar?

Yes.

  • Do you ship internationally?

Yes.  We ship to over 50 countries now.

  • Is there anywhere I can go to try out a Model One EP before I buy it?

Not at this time.  We are working on several options for the future.

  • Can I plug the Model One guitar into an amp if I want to?

Yes. With or without the on board preamp and effects.

  • Are you making a left handed Model One EP?

We will in the future.

  • What pickups are you using?

All of our guitars come with custom wound humbucker and single coil pickups.

  • How do I get my Model One EP with a Tremolo system?

After our campaign is over, we will contact everyone who has bought a guitar and offer them a Tremolo system and a more options for the color and finish.

  • Do your guitars come with a warranty?

Yes.  One year warranty for all parts and labor.  Normal wear or accidents not covered.

  • Where is ElectroPhonic Innovations located?

Our shop is in Inglewood, California.

  • Do you make all parts of the Model One EP?

We do the majority of the work.  We partner with companies and individuals who excel in their respective niches.  All assembly is done in Inglewood.

 

As Seen In

 

 

Thank-you for your interest and support. 

Follow us on Facebook at https://facebook.com/epmagic or visit our website at http://electrophonicinnovations.com.

 

Product specifications are subject to change without notice. E&OE.

Thank-you for your interest and support. 

Follow us on Facebook at https://facebook.com/epmagic or visit our website at http://electrophonicinnovations.com.
 
Product specifications are subject to change without notice. E&OE.

story:
A chance meeting in Masindi, Uganda spawned an unlikely partnership between 17 yrs old Sudanese Rapper Rabby KizZy & English Producer Tim Feben resulting these 2 tracks from their short session. 

We can make a full length album with your help. We want to tell Rabby's (born: Juach Atem/Bior) story thus far; from war torn South Sudan, across Africa as a refugee, to family reunions, and trying to make it as a rapper on Africas 'East Coast'. The album will tell the story of this journey right up to our chance encounter, a triumph in the face of adversity, with music inspired by the countries and experiences along the way in true Hip Hop style! However we live in different countries and with a standing start we have no label backing, which means its on us to make it happen. Thats where the pre-orders come in. If you like the music consider supporting the project by pre-ordering the album.

There are many talented young people across the world without the tools and platform to get their talents heard and realised. I hope our chance meeting can turn into a lasting partnership with this in mind!

150 pre-orders will give us what we need to start recording.

250+ pre-orders and we'll complete the record and make a dent into production costs. More than that still and we can increase our marketing and coverage, make more of an impact and start to build lasting links with more people from the region giving them the tools and platform to get their music out and heard!

Listen to the second sampler featuring the whole DMG (do more good) Crew here: https://soundcloud.com/timfeben/dmg-crew-vs-tim...

story:
TUTTI MATTI IN THE PRESS

(Click pictures to hyperlink)

 

WHY TUTTI MATTI?

A question many of you are probably asking yourselves? What is Tutti Matti and why do I want what they have? Well let's tell you about the name first! Tutti Matti is an Italian word. Tutti means all together or in orchestral music, we all play together. Matti means mad or crazy, combine the two, and we all play (or party) crazy together! 

The next part of the question is why do you want to support us? Though our company has a small team, we are a company that is for the people by the people. We do not have big corporations backing us plotting our next move, so when you speak to us, you are connected directly to one of four members of Tutti Studio team. We are committed to keeping us small so we have little red tape to go through when making product changes. 

The next part...the most important, what are you supporting?!?!

 

 

We are Tutti Studio, our 1st product in the road map is Tutti Matti speaker (pictured above) which is what you are supporting. This is not just an ordinary wireless speaker, it is far more than that. Tutti Matti is the entry way into an audio company that specializes in connecting people as much as we specialize in connecting wireless  speakers. There are hundreds of speakers on the market that are wireless, durable, portable, and loud. Some have the ability to connect to others, however, I assure you, you will not find one that connects to 20 speaker units without latency ! We are solving the issue of portability, connect-ability, durability, and quality all wrapped into one...or 20. Our goal is to make Tutti Matti a staple of social interactions. We want everyone to have Tutti Matti the same way they have a phone. Having a get-together or event? Tell everyone to bring their Tutti Matti's and link them up for some of the best quality sound immersion you will ever hear outside of a concert, on the sands of a beach, the desert, the snow, or way into the mountains! 

Tutti Speakers play loud, clear, have a category leading bass performance, and provide  unique features.

They are created by dancers for dancers and those who live their life through music. Essentially, those who love music and want to party on the go!

 

Key Features

 

 

SOUND TUNING

Most speakers built by reputable brands sound pretty good when you're sitting right beside them. But how about when you are 20 feet away, on a patio, with ten people talking? Good luck.

Since we were tuning the Tutti Matti specifically for partying, we prioritized "sound quality at a distance". You'll hear details in the music, at a distance, during a party.

 

360° DSP

 

These speakers are all controlled by a DSP (Digital Signal Processor) that makes sure each speaker is getting the right information to play to its strengths, creating a full range of uncompromising clarity, even at full party volume. One set leans more to the high frequencies, another rolls off a bit lower more focused on the midrange, and then there’s a larger speaker that’s focused on creating sweet, sweet, low lows.

 

 

Using our top-notch acoustic reflection algorithm, a single speaker can reproduce a 3D surround effect...

There are three different speaker driver designs in this five speaker configuration, making every spot the Sweet Spot.

 

 

Channel Splitting

With a simple user interface, users can orient speakers however they'd like. Adjust to left, right, or center on each speaker to create the most immersive sound experience possible.

Product Description

The tutti matting is the only speaker that can start, sustain, and close a party. One is enough to keep things bumping. Two+ is next level. Use the microphone to MC the party or get some karaoke shenanigans going. With two or more use the liquid dance floor feature to create your ideal acoustic experience. Synchronize up to eight units with the touch of a button to enlarge your acoustic footprint, or to create a single accurate, and uninterrupted sound-field. Bluetooth gets you in wireless with your favorite party jams, from any source. Wireless use gets you 10 hours of jams, plug it in for permanent party duty.

 

 

Liquid Sound  Dimensions

“A portable Sound Dimensions, defined by sound”. This was the inspiration, and starting point that led to the Matti, and the Liquid Sound  Dimensions feature.

With the simple flick of a switch, you can set a group of Matti speakers to perform Left, Center, Right, duties. The effect this creates is a completely immersive sound-field. You are literally “inside the music”, if anything will make you want to get your groove on, it’s The Liquid Sound Dimensions.

 

One Button for connecting Master and Slaves Instantly

This is all accomplished through Bluetooth to the Master device, and that is it! No apps, no other software. Just connect to any device capable of pairing via Bluetooth and you're set!

How do you connect them? Simple press the pair button on the top of the "Master" Tutti Matti speaker and it immediately links by our proprietary PartyNet protocol  to the rest of the speakers within a second.

 

 

No Latency among all the devices

Proprietary Party Net Protocol, Sync up to 20 speakers.

PartyNet seamlessly connects up to 20 Matti speakers with zero latency. As people arrive with their Matti’s, the party grows in size and sound. The best part is that all your friends can bring their Tutti Matti's to connect with yours!  There is absolutely no restrictions in pairing, you can mix and match however you please!

 

 

 

 

Pre-AMP for MIC

Want voice control? You got it! We can even provide you with a Mic, whether it be through karaoke, emcee, or DJing a party. You are in control and you are the voice of the party!

With the touch of a single button, your voice will emerge in all it’s glory, from all the speakers, wirelessly, in perfect unison.

 

 

Tripod Hole

 

 

Partying requires a seriously reliable speaker. Everything about Tutti Matti was engineered to party hard. Steel grills, aluminum handle, extra thick molded polymer sub-chassis, and a thick silicone rubber bumper. 

 

 

AND YES, IT'S GOT A BIG, FAT BATTERY... 

You get 10+ hours of party level sound with just one full charge. Each full charge take less than 1 hour! Party's still on everyone!

 

 

 

 

HAVE FUN WITH Tutti Matti Hybrid HIFI Speaker

Anywhere and Everywhere 

 

Tutti Matti ( Hybrid BT/WiFi) ~ Compared with BT speaker and WiFi speaker

 

 

Specification

 

Dimension and Weight

  • Dimension: 5.9 x 5.9 x 4.72 (inch)
  • Weight: 1.633 kg

 

 

 

 

What's in the box

  • TUTTI MATTI Speaker x 1
  • User's manual x 1
  • International Adapter  x 1

 

 

 

We are ready to ship now! 

 

 

 

 

SAFETY TESTING

Having a product that abides by international safety standards is important to us. Tutti Matti is certified globally.  Please View our Testing Conditions in the professional Lab.

 

WORD ON THE STREET

We have been hardening our concept all over the world. Tutti Matti has brought the party to big name dancers from Hollywood to Shanghai to Italy to Germany, while gathering feedback from the dance community to help Tutti Studio's engineering and design team refine the Tutti Matti, and turn it into an indestructible portable speaker with the features and fidelity to turn any space into a liquid Sound Dimensions.  

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to help fulfill large orders which will help us reduce shipping costs. In addition to recent upgrades and future developmental plans, we need funding to help get us off the ground so we can continue producing amazing products for you and connect the world.

When you back us here on Indiegogo, you get the Tutti Matti speakers at a super discounted rate and get in on the ground level of what is sure to be a staple in the audio community. Our company is all about the people, not only connecting speakers, but connecting people, care about people and care about the earth!

We are not here for a quick buck, we are genuinely committed to our product and making it better so feedback is a must! We also have some exciting plans for all who back us up, some free Tutti Matti's may be included!

 

Tutti Studio's Commitment

We are committed to our customers, so much so that we were fully funded (doubling the goal) on a previous campaign, but willingly refunded all of our customers. Why? Well, we had recently figured out new ways to improve the product and felt that it would be dishonest on our first release to sell units that were inferior to their predecessor. So, we refunded everyone and here we are again, with a new release of our upgraded product! This is how committed we are!

Risks & Challenges

Risks, well we are entering one of the more saturated markets out there! With sound giants like Beats by Dre, JBL, or Bose, we are competing with a lot of mega corporations. But why will we succeed? In our books, we already have succeeded. We have already created the product, tested the product, and shared the product. People love it! We have not met another company that offers the same ability or the same quality that our Tutti Matti speakers have. Better yet, we have not yet met an audio company with the same transparency and dedication to customer satisfaction that we provide. As mentioned before, we already refunded an entire campaign simply because we wanted those people to have a fair shot at an improved product at a cheaper rate! That was a huge risk in itself! Like most start-up companies, we are challenged with manufacturing and shipping cost. With your help we believe we can truly improve the product and provide one that each person in this world can all be proud of! 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, you're on a budget, maybe can't afford to help right now? That is totally okay! You can help us by sharing this page, getting the word out, going into the middle street and shouting "Tutti Matti Rocks!" Okay, maybe not the last one, but help share this and spread the word through social media. We have prepared some pretty awesome things for those who purchase and provide reviews via photo or video! So please help us let you be the voice of the party!
